MEMBER NAME  $FCD02MV
NTCD03MV  PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP2))            -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
MEMBER NAME  $FCD03MV
UNIXCD03  PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN1   DISP=(SHR))          -
                   TO  (DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(RPL))            -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
MEMBER NAME  $NTIKON
$NTIKON   PROCESS
HTS540A RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                         -
        SYSOPTS=                                          -
               \'cmd (del \                                          -
               \\\\\n060entnas011\\pos01\\ndmfiles\ ||               -
               \\\cdflag\\703\\eamtrmin_703_ace.flg)'\

STEP00    RUN TASK (PGM=NT) SNODE -
       SYSOPTS='cmd(ren \\n060wja01.kroger.com\mainframe\vpsstat.txt -
                      vpsstat.bkup)'

STEP10    COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED

MEMBER NAME  #COPY
________                          /* STEP NAME                      */ -
 COPY                                                                  -
  FROM(      /* IOEXIT, OR DSN IS REQUIRED                  */    -
             /*    IOEXIT CAN BE SPECIFIED IN TYPE FILE    */    -
   IOEXIT=(________,____________)                                      -
   TYPE=________                                                       -
   DSN=____________________________________________(________)/________ -
    ALIAS=_                                                            -
    DCB=(DSORG=__,LRECL=_____,                                         -
         RECFM=__,BLKSIZE=_____)                                       -
    DISP=(___,______,______)      /* (SHR) IS THE DEFAULT           */ -
    EXCLUDE=(________,________)                                        -
    LABEL=(1,SL)                  /* SAME AS "DD" STATEMENT         */ -
    PDS.DIR=_                                                          -
    PNODE                                                              -
    REPLACE                                                            -
    SELECT=(_______,_______)                                           -
    UNIT=________                                                      -
    VOL=SER=______                /* SAME AS "DD" STATEMENT          */-
      )                                                                -
  COMPRESS PRIME=_____                                                 -
  CKPT=____________                                                    -
  TO  (      /*  IOEXIT, OR DSN IS REQUIRED                  */    -
             /*    IOEXIT CAN BE SPECIFIED IN TYPE FILE    */    -
   IOEXIT=(________,____________)                                      -
   TYPE=________                                                       -
   DSN=____________________________________________(________)/________ -
    DCB=(DSORG=__,LRECL=_____,                                         -
         RECFM=__,BLKSIZE=_____)                                       -
    DISP=(___,______,______)      /* (NEW,CATLG,DELETE) IS DEFAULT  */ -
    LABEL=(,SL)                   /* SAME AS "DD" STATEMENT         */ -
    SNODE                                                              -
    SPACE=(_____,(_____,_____,_____),RLSE,CONTIG,ROUND)                -
    UNIT=________                                                      -
    VOL=SER=______                /* SAME AS "DD" STATMENT          */ -
      )

  PNODE=________________                                               -

  STARTT=(MM/DD/YY,HH:MM:SS)                                           -

MEMBER NAME  #RUNTASK
________                          /* STEP NAME                      */ -
 RUN TASK (                                                            -
   PGM=________,                  /* PROGRAM NAME TO BE ATTACHED    */ -
   PARM=(________,______________) /* PARAMETERS TO BE PASSED - ONE  */ -
                                  /* OR MORE MAY BE SPECIFIED       */ -
      )                                                                -
   PNODE                          /* SPECIFY NODE TO SUBMIT TASK    */
MEMBER NAME  #SUBMIT
________                                                               -
 SUBMIT                                                                -
  DSN=____________________________________________(________)/________  -
  HOLD=____                                                            -
  NEWNAME=________                                                     -
  NOTIFY=________                                                      -
  PACCT=________________                                               -
  PNODEID=(________,________,________)                                 -
  PRTY=__                                                              -
  RETAIN=_                                                             -
  SACCT=________________                                               -
  SNODE=________________                                               -
  SNODEID=(________,________,________)                                 -
  STARTT=__________                                                    -

  &________=________________________________________________________
MEMBER NAME  @COPY
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */
/*                                                                  */
/*               CD COPY STATEMENT MODEL                            */
/*                                                                  */
/*   THE MODEL IDENTIFIES ALL VALID KEYWORDS ASSOCIATED WITH        */
/*   THE COPY STATEMENT.  UNDERSCORES HAVE BEEN INCLUDED TO         */
/*   IDENTIFY PARAMETER LENGTHS.                                    */
/*                                                                  */
/*   ALL PARAMETERS ON THE COPY STATEMENT ARE OPTIONAL WITH         */
/*   THE EXCEPTION OF THE DSN PARAMETER IN THE FROM CLAUSE.         */
/*                                                                  */
/*   THE FOLLOWING STEPS NEED TO BE COMPLETED IN ORDER TO           */
/*   PROPERLY USE THE SKELETON:                                     */
/*                                                                  */
/*   1.  DELETE ALL LINES NOT APPLICABLE TO THE COPY FUNCTION       */
/*   2.  REPLACE ALL UNDERSCORES WITH THE APPROPRIATE PARAMETER     */
/*       VALUE                                                      */
/*   3.  AFTER COMPLETING THE COPY STATEMENT, MAKE SURE THAT        */
/*       THE PROPER CONTINUATION MARKS (-) STILL EXIST.             */
/*   4.  VERIFY THAT ALL UNDERSCORES HAVE BEEN REPLACED WITH        */
/*       A VALID INPUT OR DELETED                                   */
/*                                                                  */
/*   SEE THE CD-MVS COMMAND REFERENCE MANUAL FOR A COMPLETE         */
/*   DESCRIPTION OF ALL PARAMETERS.                                 */
/*                                                                  */
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *    */
*
________                          /* STEP NAME                      */ -
 COPY                                                                  -
 /*                                                                 */ -
 /*               *** SOURCE DATA SET ATTRIBUTES ***                */ -
 /*                                                                 */ -
  FROM(      /*  IOEXIT, OR DSN IS REQUIRED                  */    -
             /*   IOEXIT CAN BE SPECIFIED IN TYPE FILE    */    -
   IOEXIT=(________,____________)                                      -
   TYPE=________                                                       -
   DSN=____________________________________________(________)/________ -
                                  /* DATA SET NAME(MEM)/PASSWORD    */ -
    ALIAS=_                       /* Y OR N, PDS ALIASES SENT       */ -
    DCB=(DSORG=__,LRECL=_____,    /* DATA CONTROL BLOCK             */ -
         RECFM=__,BLKSIZE=_____)  /*                                */ -
    DISP=(___,______,______)      /* DATA SET DISPOSITION           */ -
    EXCLUDE=(________,________)   /* PDS MEMBER EXCLUDE LIST        */ -
    LABEL=(1,SL)                  /* LABEL INFORMATION              */ -
    PDS.DIR=_                     /* Y OR N, SEND DATA IN DIRECTORY */ -
    PNODE                         /* 'FROM' NODE, PNODE OR SNODE    */ -
    REPLACE                       /* REPLACE OR NOREPLACE IDENTICAL */ -
                                  /* PDS MEMBER NAMES               */ -
    SELECT=(_______,_______)      /* PDS MEMBER SELECT LIST         */ -
    UNIT=________                 /* UNIT DEVICE TYPE               */ -
    VOL=SER=______                /* VOLUME SERIAL                  */ -
      )                                                                -
 /*                                                                 */ -
 /*  SPECIFIES DATA COMPRESSION AND PRIME COMPRESSION CHARACTER     */ -
 /*  IN CHARACTER OR HEX FORMAT. EXAMPLE, PRIME=X'00' OR            */ -
 /*                                       PRIME=C'1'                */ -
  COMPRESS PRIME=_____                                                 -
 /*                                                                 */ -
 /*  SPECIFIES CHECKPOINT INTERVAL IN BYTES                         */ -
 /*                                                                 */ -
  CKPT=____________                                                    -
 /*                                                                 */ -
 /*             *** DESTINATION DATA SET ATTRIBUTES ***             */ -
 /*                                                                 */ -
  TO  (      /*  IOEXIT, OR DSN IS REQUIRED                  */    -
             /*   IOEXIT CAN BE SPECIFIED IN TYPE FILE    */    -
   IOEXIT=(________,____________)                                      -
   TYPE=________                                                       -
   DSN=____________________________________________(________)/________ -
                                  /* DATA SET NAME(MEM)/PASSWORD    */ -
    DCB=(DSORG=__,LRECL=_____,    /* DATA CONTROL BLOCK             */ -
         RECFM=__,BLKSIZE=_____)  /*                                */ -
    DISP=(___,______,______)      /* DATA SET DISPOSITION           */ -
    LABEL=(,SL)                   /* LABEL INFORMATION              */ -
    SNODE                         /* 'TO' NODE, PNODE OR SNODE      */ -
    SPACE=(_____,(_____,_____,_____),RLSE,CONTIG,ROUND)                -
    UNIT=________                 /* UNIT DEVICE TYPE               */ -
    VOL=SER=______                /* VOLUME SERIAL                  */ -
      )
MEMBER NAME  @EIF
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */
/*                                                                  */
/*         CD EIF STATEMENT MODEL TUTORIAL                      */
/*                                                                  */
/*   THE MODEL IDENTIFIES THE VALID SYNTAX ASSOCIATED WITH          */
/*   THE EIF STATEMENT.                                             */
/*                                                                  */
/*                                                                  */
/*   SEE THE CD COMMAND REFERENCE MANUAL FOR A COMPLETE         */
/*   DESCRIPTION OF ALL PARAMETERS.                                 */
/*                                                                  */
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *    */
/*
         EIF                                                             */
/*                                                                  */
/*NOTE THAT A LABEL IS NOT ALLOWED ON THE EIF STATEMENT.            */
/*                                                                  */
MEMBER NAME  @ELSE
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */
/*                                                                  */
/*         CD ELSE STATEMENT MODEL TUTORIAL                         */
/*                                                                  */
/*   THE MODEL IDENTIFIES THE VALID SYNTAX ASSOCIATED WITH          */
/*   THE ELSE STATEMENT.                                            */
/*                                                                  */
/*                                                                  */
/*   SEE THE CD COMMAND REFERENCE MANUAL FOR A COMPLETE             */
/*   DESCRIPTION OF ALL PARAMETERS.                                 */
/*                                                                  */
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */
/*                                                                  */
         ELSE
/*                                                                  */
/*NOTE THAT A LABEL IS NOT ALLOWED ON THE ELSE STATEMENT.           */
/*                                                                  */
MEMBER NAME  @EXIT
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */
/*                                                                  */
/*         CD EXIT STATEMENT MODEL TUTORIAL                         */
/*                                                                  */
/*   THE MODEL IDENTIFIES THE VALID SYNTAX ASSOCIATED WITH          */
/*   THE EXIT STATEMENT.                                            */
/*                                                                  */
/*                                                                  */
/*   SEE THE CD COMMAND REFERENCE MANUAL FOR A COMPLETE             */
/*   DESCRIPTION OF ALL PARAMETERS.                                 */
/*                                                                  */
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */
/*                                                                  */
         EXIT
/*                                                                  */
/*NOTE- A LABEL IS NOT ALLOWED ON THE EXIT STATEMENT.               */
/*                                                                  */
MEMBER NAME  @GOTO
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */
/*                                                                  */
/*         CD GOTO STATEMENT MODEL TUTORIAL                         */
/*                                                                  */
/*   THE MODEL IDENTIFIES THE VALID SYNTAX ASSOCIATED WITH          */
/*   THE GOTO STATEMENT.                                            */
/*                                                                  */
/*                                                                  */
/*   SEE THE CD COMMAND REFERENCE MANUAL FOR A COMPLETE             */
/*   DESCRIPTION OF ALL PARAMETERS.                                 */
/*                                                                  */
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */
/*                                                                  */
LABEL___ GOTO STEPNAME
/*                                                                  */
/* LABEL IS THE STEP NAME OF THE GOTO STATEMENT.                    */
/*                                                                  */
/* STEPNAME IS THE STEP NAME OF THE STATEMENT TO WHICH CONTROL IS   */
/* TRANSFERRED.  NOTE-ONLY FORWARD GOTO ALLOWED.                    */
/*                                                                  */
MEMBER NAME  @IF
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */
/*                                                                  */
/*         CD IF STATEMENT MODEL TUTORIAL                           */
/*                                                                  */
/*   THE MODEL IDENTIFIES THE VALID SYNTAX ASSOCIATED WITH          */
/*   THE IF STATEMENT.  PARAMETERS ARE EXPLAINED.                   */
/*                                                                  */
/*                                                                  */
/*   THE FOLLOWING STEPS NEED TO BE COMPLETED IN ORDER TO           */
/*   PROPERLY USE THE MODEL:                                        */
/*                                                                  */
/*   1.  REPLACE LABEL, STEPNAME, CONDITION, AND NN WITH THE        */
/*       APPROPRIATE VALUES.                                        */
/*                                                                  */
/*   SEE THE CD COMMAND REFERENCE MANUAL FOR A COMPLETE             */
/*   DESCRIPTION OF ALL PARAMETERS.                                 */
/*                                                                  */
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *    */
/*                                                                  */
LABEL___ IF (STEPNAME CONDITION NN) THEN
/*                                                                  */
/* LABEL     IS THE STEP NAME FOR THE IF STATEMENT.                 */
/*                                                                  */
/* STEPNAME  IS THE NAME OF THE PREVIOUS STEP WHOSE                 */
/*           CONDITION IS BEING TESTED.                             */
/*                                                                  */
/* CONDITION IS THE LOGICAL CONDITION FOR TESTING THE COMPLETION    */
/*           OF THE PREVIOUS STEP (EQ, NE, GE, GT, LE, LT)          */
/*                                                                  */
/* NN        IS THE COMPLETION BEING TESTED.                        */
/*                                                                  */
MEMBER NAME  @PROCESS
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */
/*                                                                  */
/*              CD PROCESS STATEMENT MODEL                          */
/*                                                                  */
/*   THE MODEL IDENTIFIES ALL VALID SYNTAX ASSOCIATED WITH          */
/*   THE PROCESS STATEMENT.  UNDERSCORES HAVE BEEN INCLUDED TO      */
/*   IDENTIFY PARAMETER LENGTHS.                                    */
/*                                                                  */
/*   ALL PARAMETERS ON THE PROCESS STATEMENT ARE OPTIONAL, BUT      */
/*   THE PROCESS NAME (LABEL) SHOULD BE SPECIFIED.                  */
/*                                                                  */
/*   THE FOLLOWING STEPS NEED TO BE COMPLETED IN ORDER TO           */
/*   PROPERLY USE THE MODEL:                                        */
/*                                                                  */
/*   1.  DELETE ALL LINES NOT APPLICABLE                            */
/*   2.  REPLACE ALL UNDERSCORES WITH THE APPROPRIATE PARAMETER     */
/*       VALUE                                                      */
/*   3.  AFTER COMPLETING THE STATEMENT, MAKE SURE THAT             */
/*       THE PROPER CONTINUATION MARKS (-) STILL EXIST              */
/*   4.  VERIFY THAT ALL UNDERSCORES HAVE BEEN REPLACED WITH        */
/*       A VALID INPUT OR DELETED                                   */
/*                                                                  */
/*   SEE THE CD COMMAND REFERENCE FOR A COMPLETE EXPLANATION        */
/*   OF ALL PARAMETERS.                                             */
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *    */
/*                                                                  */
________                          /* PROCESS NAME                   */ -
 PROCESS                                                               -
  SNODE=________________          /* LOGICAL NODE NAME              */ -
  CLASS=___                       /* PROCESS CLASS                  */ -
  HOLD=____                       /* YES, NO, OR CALL               */ -
  NOTIFY=________                 /* NOTIFICATION ID - %USER        */ -
  PACCT=________________          /* PROCESS ACCOUNTING DATA        */ -
  PNODE=________________          /* PRIMARY NODE NAME              */ -
  PNODEID=(________,________,________)                              */ -
                                  /* SECURITY ID, PSWD, NEW PSWD    */ -
  PRTY=__                         /* PROCESS PRIORITY               */ -
  RETAIN=_                        /* YES, NO, OR INIT               */ -
  SACCT=________________          /* PROCESS ACCOUNTING DATA        */ -
  SNODEID=(________,________,________)                              */ -
                                  /* SECURITY ID, PSWD, NEW PSWD    */ -
  STARTT=(MM/DD/YY,HH:MM:SS)      /* START DATE/TIME                */ -
 /*                                                                 */ -
 /*  THE FOLLOWING SPECIFIES THE DEFAULT VALUE TO BE SUBSTITUTED    */ -
 /*  FOR THE SYMBOLIC PARAMETER IN THE PROCESS.  THIS WILL OVER-    */ -
 /*  RIDE ANY DEFAULT VALUES SPECIFIED IN THE PROCESS COMMAND.      */ -
 /*                                                                 */ -
  &________=________________________________________________________
MEMBER NAME  @RUNJOB
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */
/*                                                                  */
/*                   CD RUN JOB MODEL                               */
/*                                                                  */
/*   THE MODEL IDENTIFIES ALL VALID SYNTAX ASSOCIATED WITH          */
/*   THE RUN JOB COMMAND.  UNDERSCORES HAVE BEEN INCLUDED TO        */
/*   IDENTIFY PARAMETER LENGTHS.                                    */
/*                                                                  */
/*   THE REQUIRED PARAMETERS FOR THE RUN JOB COMMAND ARE THE JOB    */
/*   KEYWORD AND THE DSN PARAMETER.              .                  */
/*                                                                  */
/*   THE FOLLOWING STEPS NEED TO BE COMPLETED IN ORDER TO           */
/*   PROPERLY USE THE MODEL:                                        */
/*                                                                  */
/*   1.  DELETE ALL LINES NOT APPLICABLE                            */
/*   2.  REPLACE ALL UNDERSCORES WITH THE APPROPRIATE PARAMETER     */
/*       VALUE                                                      */
/*   3.  AFTER COMPLETING THE STATEMENT, MAKE SURE THAT             */
/*       THE PROPER CONTINUATION MARKS (-) STILL EXIST              */
/*   4.  VERIFY THAT ALL UNDERSCORES HAVE BEEN REPLACED WITH        */
/*       A VALID INPUT OR DELETED                                   */
/*                                                                  */
/*   SEE THE CD COMMAND REFERENCE FOR A COMPLETE EXPLANATION        */
/*   OF ALL PARAMETERS.                                             */
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *    */
/*                                                                  */
________                          /* STEP NAME                      */ -
 RUN JOB (                                                             -
   DSN=____________________________________________(________)/________ -
                                  /* DATA SET NAME(MEM)/PASSWORD    */ -
         )                                                          */ -
   PNODE                          /* SPECIFY NODE TO SUBMIT JOB     */
MEMBER NAME  @RUNTASK
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */
/*                                                                  */
/*                   CD RUN TASK MODEL                              */
/*                                                                  */
/*   THE MODEL IDENTIFIES ALL VALID SYNTAX ASSOCIATED WITH          */
/*   THE RUN TASK COMMAND. UNDERSCORES HAVE BEEN INCLUDED TO        */
/*   IDENTIFY PARAMETER LENGTHS.                                    */
/*                                                                  */
/*   THE REQUIRED PARAMETERS FOR THE RUN TASK COMMAND ARE THE TASK  */
/*   KEYWORD AND THE PGM PARAMETER.              .                  */
/*                                                                  */
/*   THE FOLLOWING STEPS NEED TO BE COMPLETED IN ORDER TO           */
/*   PROPERLY USE THE MODEL:                                        */
/*                                                                  */
/*   1.  DELETE ALL LINES NOT APPLICABLE                            */
/*   2.  REPLACE ALL UNDERSCORES WITH THE APPROPRIATE PARAMETER     */
/*       VALUE                                                      */
/*   3.  AFTER COMPLETING THE STATEMENT, MAKE SURE THAT             */
/*       THE PROPER CONTINUATION MARKS (-) STILL EXIST              */
/*   4.  VERIFY THAT ALL UNDERSCORES HAVE BEEN REPLACED WITH        */
/*       A VALID INPUT OR DELETED                                   */
/*                                                                  */
/*   SEE THE CD COMMAND REFERENCE FOR A COMPLETE EXPLANATION        */
/*   OF ALL PARAMETERS.                                             */
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *    */
/*                                                                  */
________                          /* STEP NAME                      */ -
 RUN TASK (                                                            -
   PGM=________,                  /* PROGRAM NAME TO BE ATTACHED    */ -
   PARM=(________,______________) /* PARAMETERS TO BE PASSED - ONE  */ -
                                  /* OR MORE MAY BE SPECIFIED       */ -
      )                                                                -
   PNODE                          /* SPECIFY NODE TO SUBMIT TASK    */
MEMBER NAME  @SUBMIT
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */
/*                                                                  */
/*          CD SUBMIT WITHIN A PROCESS STATEMENT                    */
/*                     MODEL TUTORIAL                               */
/*                                                                  */
/*   THE MODEL IDENTIFIES ALL VALID KEYWORDS ASSOCIATED WITH        */
/*   THE SUBMIT STATEMENT.  UNDERSCORES HAVE BEEN INCLUDED TO       */
/*   IDENTIFY PARAMETER LENGTHS.                                    */
/*                                                                  */
/*   ALL PARAMETERS ON THE SUBMIT STATEMENT ARE OPTIONAL WITH       */
/*   THE EXCEPTION OF THE DSN PARAMETER.                            */
/*                                                                  */
/*   THE FOLLOWING STEPS NEED TO BE COMPLETED IN ORDER TO           */
/*   PROPERLY USE THE SKELETON:                                     */
/*                                                                  */
/*   1.  DELETE ALL LINES NOT APPLICABLE TO THE SUBMIT FUNCTION     */
/*   2.  REPLACE ALL UNDERSCORES WITH THE APPROPRIATE PARAMETER     */
/*       VALUE                                                      */
/*   3.  AFTER COMPLETING THE SUBMIT STATEMENT, MAKE SURE THAT      */
/*       THE PROPER CONTINUATION MARKS (-) STILL EXIST.             */
/*   4.  VERIFY THAT ALL UNDERSCORES HAVE BEEN REPLACED WITH        */
/*       A VALID INPUT OR DELETED                                   */
/*                                                                  */
/*   SEE THE CD COMMAND REFERENCE MANUAL FOR A COMPLETE             */
/*   DESCRIPTION OF ALL PARAMETERS.                                 */
/*                                                                  */
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *    */
*
________                          /* STEP NAME                      */ -
 SUBMIT                                                                -
  DSN=____________________________________________(________)/________  -
                                  /* DATA SET NAME(MEM)/PASSWORD    */ -
  HOLD=____                       /* HOLD QUEUE - YES,NO,CALL       */ -
  NEWNAME=________                /* NEW NAME FOR THE PROCESS       */ -
  NOTIFY=________                 /* NOTIFY TSO USER                */ -
  PACCT=________________          /* PROCESS ACCOUNTING DATA        */ -
  PNODEID=(________,________,________)                              */ -
                                  /* SECURITY ID, PSWD, NEW PSWD    */ -
  PRTY=__                         /* PROCESS PRIORITY               */ -
  RETAIN=_                        /* YES, NO, OR INIT               */ -
  SACCT=________________          /* PROCESS ACCOUNTING DATA        */ -
  SNODE=________________          /* SECONDARY NODE NAME            */ -
  SNODEID=(________,________,________)                              */ -
                                  /* SECURITY ID, PSWD, NEW PSWD    */ -
  STARTT=__________               /* START DATE, DAY, OR TIME       */ -
  SUBNODE=_____                   /* SUBMITTING NODE - PNODE/SNODE  */ -
 /*                                                                 */ -
 /*  THE FOLLOWING SPECIFIES THE DEFAULT VALUE TO BE SUBSTITUTED    */ -
 /*  FOR THE SYMBOLIC PARAMETER IN THE PROCESS.  THIS WILL OVER-    */ -
 /*  RIDE ANY DEFAULT VALUES SPECIFIED IN THE PROCESS COMMAND.      */ -
 /*                                                                 */ -
  &________=________________________________________________________
MEMBER NAME  ABCNDM
ABCNDM    PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF       (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX)                                       -
                   SNODE                                            -
                   SYSOPTS="&SCRIPT"
MEMBER NAME  ABCNDM2
ABCNDM2   PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF       (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX)                                       -
                   SNODE                                            -
                   SYSOPTS="&SCRIPT"
MEMBER NAME  ABCNDM3
ABCNDM3    PROCESS
* SEND A FILE TO THE ABC UNIX BOX
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   COMPRESS EXT
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
STEP2   IF (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
NOTIF2P RUN TASK(PGM=D955WTO,                                       -
          PARM=(&FAILMSG))
          EIF
* IF THE COPY WORKED, KICK OFF THE SCRIPT ON THE UNIX BOX
STEP3    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIF3P  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX)                                       -
                     SNODE                                            -
                     SYSOPTS="&SCRIPT"
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  ACSSEND
ACSSEND  PROCESS PRTY=8 CLASS=4 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED    -
                         SNODE=FMSPT12 SNODEID=(cdunix,cdunix123)
STEP1     COPY    FROM(      DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR)                -
                  TO  (      DSN=&DSN2 DISP=&DISP)              -
                             CKPT=0K COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  ADVERTIS
ADVERTIS PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                              -
                 PNODE=&PNODE
STEP1  COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSNADS                           -
                     DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                     -
                     SNODE)                                -
                TO(DSN=&DSNCDC                             -
                     UNIT=SYSDA                            -
                     DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)               -
                     SPACE=(CYL,(10,5),RLSE)               -
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE                 -
                          RECFM=FB                         -
                          LRECL=&LRECL)                    -
                    PNODE)
MEMBER NAME  ADVERTI2
ADVERTI2 PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                              -
                 PNODE=&PNODE
STEP1 COPY      FROM(DSN=&DSNCDC                             -
                     UNIT=SYSDA                            -
                     DISP=(SHR)                            -
                    PNODE)                                 -
                TO(DSN=&DSNADS                            -
                     DISP=(SHR)                            -
                     SNODE)
MEMBER NAME  AKBDLYTS
AKBDLYTS  PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=QUEUED     -
          SNODEID=(D060JDD1,d060jdd1) SNODE=u060jdd1
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
          EXIT
          EIF
STEP3   RUN TASK(PGM = UNIX)                                -
          SNODE                                             -
          SYSOPTS=&SCRIPT

MEMBER NAME  ARCHSTAT
ARCHSTAT PROCESS PNODE=primary.node                               -
                 SNODE=secondry.node                              -
                 PRTY=10                                          -
                 STARTT=(TODAY)                                   -
                 &EDSN=
ARC      COPY    FROM (DSN=&EDSN)                                 -
                 TO   (DSN=stat.archive.dsn(+1)                   -
                       DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                    -
                 DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=VB,LRECL=1604,BLKSIZE=28332) -
                       UNIT=CART                                  -
                       LABEL=(1,SL)          )
         IF       (ARC EQ 0) THEN
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMSTARRT,PARM=("&EDSN",                   -
                                       "stat.archive.dsn(+0)"))
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  ARCHSTA2
ARCHSTA2 PROCESS PNODE=primary.node                               -
                 SNODE=secondry.node                              -
                 PRTY=10                                          -
                 STARTT=(TODAY)                                   -
                 &EDSN=
ARC      COPY    FROM (DSN=&EDSN)                                 -
                 TO   (DSN=stat.archive.dsn(+1)                   -
                       DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                    -
                 DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=VB,LRECL=1604,BLKSIZE=28332) -
                       UNIT=CART                                  -
                       LABEL=(1,SL)          )
         IF       (ARC EQ 0) THEN
ARCNOT     RUN TASK (PGM=DMSTARRT,PARM=("&EDSN",                   -
                                       "stat.archive.dsn(+0)"))
         ELSE
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,
          PARM=('FAIL', CL44"ARCHIVAL OF STATS FAILED"))
          EXIT
         EIF
         IF       (ARCNOT EQ 0) THEN
          EXIT
         ELSE
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,
          PARM=('FAIL', CL44"ARCHIVAL OF STATS FAILED"))
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  ARCHSTRJ
ARCHSTRJ PROCESS PNODE=primary.node                               -
                 SNODE=secondry.node                              -
                 PRTY=10                                          -
                 STARTT=(TODAY)                                   -
                 &EDSN=
         RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTSUB,PARM=("jcl.dsn(ARCHJOB)",          -
                                     "DSNAME &EDSN"))

MEMBER NAME  CDCOMPPS
CDCOMPPS PROCESS SNODE=CD.OS390

             DISP=(SHR)    -
             SYSOPTS='PRECOMP=YES'   -
             PNODE)             -

MEMBER NAME  CDCOMPVS
CDCOMPVS  PROCESS SNODE=CD.OS390
STEP1  RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTAMS                                  -
                 PARM=(C'FREE=CLOSE,RETURN=(DD),SYSOUT=Z',    -
 C' DELETE ($CD.INPUT.KSDS.VSAM.FILE) CLUSTER PURGE  ', -
 C' DEFINE CLUSTER -', -
 C' (NAME($CD.INPUT.KSDS.VSAM.FILE)       -      ', -
 C' VOLUMES(USER19) -', -
 C' REUSE           -', -
 C' MODEL($CD.INPUT.KSDS.VSAM.FILE)            -      ', -
 C'                              )  ' )) SNODE
*******************************************************************************
STEP2  COPY  FROM                                    -
                ( PNODE                              -
                  DSN=$CD.INPUT.KSDS.VSAM.FILE.COMP  -
                  DISP=SHR                           -
                  SYSOPTS='PRECOMP=YES'   -
                )                                    -
             TO                                      -
                ( SNODE                              -
                  DISP=(RPL)                         -
                  DSN=$CD.INPUT.KSDS.VSAM.FILE -
                )
MEMBER NAME  CDPROCES
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */  00001000
/*                                                                  */  00002000
/*      C:D-OS/390 JES SPOOL TRANSFER FACILITY SAMPLE PROCESS       */  00003000
/*                                                                  */  00005000
/*   CHANGE $CD.PROC TO THE OS/390 PROC LIBRARY THAT YOU HAVE       */  00006000
/*   INSTALLED THE PROC GENER INTO.  THE Connect:DIRECT             */  00007000
/*   INSTALLATION LOADED THIS MEMBER INTO YOUR                      */  00007100
/*   Connect:DIRECT PROCESS LIBRARY.                                */  00008000
/*                                                                  */  00009100
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */  00009200
CDPROCES PROC   SNODE=&SNODE,                                 -         00010000
                &SUBNAME=,       /* SUBMITTERS NAME        */ -         00011000
                &JOBNM=,         /* JOB NAME               */ -         00012000
                &JOBID=,         /* JES ASSIGNED JOB ID    */ -         00013000
                &JPNAME=,        /* JOB PROGRAMMERS NAME   */ -         00013100
                &JROOM=,         /* JOB PROGRAMMERS ROOM   */ -         00013200
                &JACCT=,         /* JOB ACCOUNTING NUMBER  */ -         00013300
                &JSECL=,         /* SECURITY LABEL         */ -         00013400
                &JPROC=,         /* JOB PROC NAME          */ -         00013500
                &STEPNM=,        /* STEP NAME              */ -         00013600
                &STEPDD=,        /* STEP DDNAME            */ -         00013700
                &CLASS=,         /* OUTPUT CLASS           */ -         00014000
                &COPIES=,        /* OUTPUT NUMBER COPIES   */ -         00014100
                &HOLD=,          /* OUTPUT HOLD Y/N        */ -         00014200
                &DEST=,          /* OUTPUT DESTINATION     */ -         00015000
                &FORM=,          /* OUTPUT FORM            */ -         00016000
                &UCS=,           /* OUTPUT WTR UCS         */ -         00017000
                &FCB=,           /* OUTPUT WTR FCB         */ -         00018000
                &WTR=,           /* OUTPUT WTR NAME        */ -         00018100
                &ADDR1=,         /* ADDRESS LINE 1         */ -         00018200
                &ADDR2=,         /* ADDRESS LINE 1         */ -         00018300
                &ADDR3=,         /* ADDRESS LINE 1         */ -         00018400
                &ADDR4=,         /* ADDRESS LINE 1         */ -         00018500
                &BLDG=,          /* BUILDING               */ -         00018600
                &BURST=,         /* BURST=YES OR NO        */ -         00018700
                &CHARS=,         /* CHAR ARRANGEMENT TABLE */ -         00018800
                &CKPTL=,         /* CKPTLINE               */ -         00018900
                &CKPTP=,         /* CKPTPAGE               */ -         00019000
                &CKPTS=,         /* CKPTSEC                */ -         00019100
                &CMOD=,          /* COPY MODIFICATION MOD  */ -         00019200
                &CMTTC=,         /* COPY MODULE TABLE REF  */ -         00019300
                &CNTL=,          /* DEFAULT SPACING        */ -         00019400
                &COMPACT=,       /* COMPACTATION TABLE     */ -         00019500
                &COPYG=,         /* COPY GROUP(S)          */ -         00019600
                &DATCK=,         /* DATACK                 */ -         00019700
                &DEFAULT=,       /* DEFAULT                */ -         00019800
                &DEPT=,          /* DEPARTMENT             */ -         00019900
                &FLASH=,         /* FLASH FORMS OVERLAY    */ -         00020000
                &FLSCT=,         /* FLASH FORMS OVERLAY CNT*/ -         00020100
                &FMDEF=,         /* FORMDEF                */ -         00020200
                &GROUPID=,       /* GROUPID                */ -         00020300
                &INDEX=,         /* INDEX                  */ -         00020400
                &JESDS=,         /* JESDS                  */ -         00020500
                &LINDEX=,        /* LINDEX                 */ -         00020600
                &LINECT=,        /* LINES PER PAGE         */ -         00020700
                &NAME=,          /* NAME                   */ -         00020800
                &NOTIFY1=,       /* 1ST NOTIFY ID          */ -         00020900
                &NOTIFY2=,       /* 2ND NOTIFY ID          */ -         00021000
                &NOTIFY3=,       /* 3RD NOTIFY ID          */ -         00021100
                &NOTIFY4=,       /* 4TH NOTIFY ID          */ -         00021200
                &OPTCD=,         /* OPTCD=J SPECIFIED      */ -         00021300
                &PGDEF=,         /* PAGEDEF                */ -         00021400
                &PIMCT=,         /* PIMSG MSG-COUNT        */ -         00021500
                &PIMSG=,         /* PIMSG                  */ -         00021600
                &PRMODE=,        /* PRMODE                 */ -         00021700
                &PRTY=,          /* PRTY                   */ -         00021800
                &ROOM=,          /* ROOM                   */ -         00021900
                &THRES=,         /* THRESHLD               */ -         00022000
                &TITLE=,         /* TITLE                  */ -         00022100
                &TRC=,           /* TRC                    */ -         00022200
                &UDATA01=,       /*  1ST USERDATA          */ -         00022300
                &UDATA02=,       /*  2ND USERDATA          */ -         00022400
                &UDATA03=,       /*  3RD USERDATA          */ -         00022500
                &UDATA04=,       /*  4TH USERDATA          */ -         00022600
                &UDATA05=,       /*  5TH USERDATA          */ -         00022700
                &UDATA06=,       /*  6TH USERDATA          */ -         00022800
                &UDATA07=,       /*  7TH USERDATA          */ -         00022900
                &UDATA08=,       /*  8TH USERDATA          */ -         00023000
                &UDATA09=,       /*  9TH USERDATA          */ -         00023100
                &UDATA10=,       /* 10TH USERDATA          */ -         00023200
                &UDATA11=,       /* 11TH USERDATA          */ -         00023300
                &UDATA12=,       /* 12TH USERDATA          */ -         00023400
                &UDATA13=,       /* 13TH USERDATA          */ -         00023500
                &UDATA14=,       /* 14TH USERDATA          */ -         00023600
                &UDATA15=,       /* 15TH USERDATA          */ -         00023700
                &UDATA16=,       /* 16TH USERDATA          */ -         00023800
                &ULIB1=,         /*  1ST USERLIB LIBRARY   */ -         00023900
                &ULIB2=,         /*  2ND USERLIB LIBRARY   */ -         00024000
                &ULIB3=,         /*  3RD USERLIB LIBRARY   */ -         00024100
                &ULIB4=,         /*  4TH USERLIB LIBRARY   */ -         00024200
                &ULIB5=,         /*  5TH USERLIB LIBRARY   */ -         00024300
                &ULIB6=,         /*  6TH USERLIB LIBRARY   */ -         00024400
                &ULIB7=,         /*  7TH USERLIB LIBRARY   */ -         00024500
                &ULIB8=,         /*  8TH USERLIB LIBRARY   */ -         00024600
                &WRITER=,        /* WRITER                 */ -         00024700
                &VPSDSN=,        /* VPS PRINTER STAGED DSN */ -         00025000
                &OUTDSN=&SUBNAME..&JOBNM..&JOBID..&STEPNM..&STEPDD      00025100
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */  00025300
/*   COPY FILE                                                      */  00025400
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */  00025500
STEP01   COPY FROM(PNODE                                      -         00026000
                DSN=&VPSDSN                                   -         00030000
                DISP=SHR )                                    -         00040000
                CKPT=10M                                      -         00050000
                COMPRESS EXT                                  -         00060000
         TO(SNODE                                             -         00070000
           DSN=&SUBNAME..&JOBNM..&JOBID..&STEPNM..&STEPDD     -         00080000
                DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE) )                               00090000
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */  00090100
/*   DELETE VPS STAGE INPUT FILE                                    */  00090200
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */  00090300
STEP02   IF     (STEP01 = 0) THEN                                       00090400
STEP03   RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                                -         00091000
    PARM=(C"ALLOC DSN=&VPSDSN,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)"              -         00092000
    F'-1'                                                     -         00093000
    C"UNALLOC DSN=&VPSDSN"))                                            00094000
         EIF                                                            00094100
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */  00094200
/*   EXECUTE PROC GENER TO PRINT THE OUTPUT FILE                    */  00094300
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */  00094400
STEP04   RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTSUB                                -         00094500
    PARM=("DSN=$CD.PROC(GENER),DISP=SHR",                     -         00094600
     "JOB       &JOBNM",                                      -         00094700
     "CLASS     &CLASS",                                      -         00094800
     "COPIES    &COPIES",                                     -         00094900
     "DEST      &DEST",                                       -         00095000
     "INPUT     &OUTDSN",                                     -         00095100
         ))  SNODE                                                      00095200
         EXIT                                                           00096000
MEMBER NAME  CDTOJES
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */  00001000
/*                                                                  */  00002000
/*              * * *  S A M P L E   P R O C E S S  * * *           */  00002100
/*                                                                  */  00002200
/*       C:D-OS/390 JES SPOOL TRANSFER FACILITY SAMPLE PROCESS      */  00003000
/*                 INPUT FROM JES SPOOL TRANSFER FACILITY           */  00004000
/*                 OUTPUT TO VPS CONTROLLED PRINTER                 */  00004100
/*                                                                  */  00004200
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */  00009100
CDTOJES  PROC   SNODE=&SNODE,                                 -         00009200
                &SUBNAME=,       /* SUBMITTERS NAME        */ -         00009300
                &JOBNM=,         /* JOB NAME               */ -         00009400
                &JOBID=,         /* JES ASSIGNED JOB ID    */ -         00009500
                &JPNAME=,        /* JOB PROGRAMMERS NAME   */ -         00009600
                &JROOM=,         /* JOB PROGRAMMERS ROOM   */ -         00009700
                &JACCT=,         /* JOB ACCOUNTING NUMBER  */ -         00009800
                &JSECL=,         /* SECURITY LABEL         */ -         00009900
                &JPROC=,         /* JOB PROC NAME          */ -         00010000
                &STEPNM=,        /* STEP NAME              */ -         00011000
                &STEPDD=,        /* STEP DDNAME            */ -         00012000
                &CLASS=,         /* OUTPUT CLASS           */ -         00013000
                &COPIES=,        /* OUTPUT NUMBER COPIES   */ -         00014000
                &HOLD=,          /* OUTPUT HOLD Y/N        */ -         00014100
                &DEST=,          /* OUTPUT DESTINATION     */ -         00014200
                &FORM=,          /* OUTPUT FORM            */ -         00014300
                &UCS=,           /* OUTPUT WTR UCS         */ -         00014400
                &FCB=,           /* OUTPUT WTR FCB         */ -         00014500
                &WTR=,           /* OUTPUT WTR NAME        */ -         00014600
                &ADDR1=,         /* ADDRESS LINE 1         */ -         00014700
                &ADDR2=,         /* ADDRESS LINE 1         */ -         00014800
                &ADDR3=,         /* ADDRESS LINE 1         */ -         00014900
                &ADDR4=,         /* ADDRESS LINE 1         */ -         00015000
                &BLDG=,          /* BUILDING               */ -         00016000
                &BURST=,         /* BURST=YES OR NO        */ -         00017000
                &CHARS=,         /* CHAR ARRANGEMENT TABLE */ -         00018000
                &CKPTL=,         /* CKPTLINE               */ -         00018100
                &CKPTP=,         /* CKPTPAGE               */ -         00018200
                &CKPTS=,         /* CKPTSEC                */ -         00018300
                &CMOD=,          /* COPY MODIFICATION MOD  */ -         00018400
                &CMTTC=,         /* COPY MODULE TABLE REF  */ -         00018500
                &CNTL=,          /* DEFAULT SPACING        */ -         00018600
                &COMPACT=,       /* COMPACTATION TABLE     */ -         00018700
                &COPYG=,         /* COPY GROUP(S)          */ -         00018800
                &DATCK=,         /* DATACK                 */ -         00018900
                &DEFAULT=,       /* DEFAULT                */ -         00019000
                &DEPT=,          /* DEPARTMENT             */ -         00019100
                &FLASH=,         /* FLASH FORMS OVERLAY    */ -         00019200
                &FLSCT=,         /* FLASH FORMS OVERLAY CNT*/ -         00019300
                &FMDEF=,         /* FORMDEF                */ -         00019400
                &GROUPID=,       /* GROUPID                */ -         00019500
                &INDEX=,         /* INDEX                  */ -         00019600
                &JESDS=,         /* JESDS                  */ -         00019700
                &LINDEX=,        /* LINDEX                 */ -         00019800
                &LINECT=,        /* LINES PER PAGE         */ -         00019900
                &NAME=,          /* NAME                   */ -         00020000
                &NOTIFY1=,       /* 1ST NOTIFY ID          */ -         00020100
                &NOTIFY2=,       /* 2ND NOTIFY ID          */ -         00020200
                &NOTIFY3=,       /* 3RD NOTIFY ID          */ -         00020300
                &NOTIFY4=,       /* 4TH NOTIFY ID          */ -         00020400
                &OPTCD=,         /* OPTCD=J SPECIFIED      */ -         00020500
                &PGDEF=,         /* PAGEDEF                */ -         00020600
                &PIMCT=,         /* PIMSG MSG-COUNT        */ -         00020700
                &PIMSG=,         /* PIMSG                  */ -         00020800
                &PRMODE=,        /* PRMODE                 */ -         00020900
                &PRTY=,          /* PRTY                   */ -         00021000
                &ROOM=,          /* ROOM                   */ -         00021100
                &THRES=,         /* THRESHLD               */ -         00021200
                &TITLE=,         /* TITLE                  */ -         00021300
                &TOF=X'F1',      /* ASA TOP OF FORM        */ -         00021400
                &TRC=,           /* TRC                    */ -         00021500
                &UDATA01=,       /*  1ST USERDATA          */ -         00021600
                &UDATA02=,       /*  2ND USERDATA          */ -         00021700
                &UDATA03=,       /*  3RD USERDATA          */ -         00021800
                &UDATA04=,       /*  4TH USERDATA          */ -         00021900
                &UDATA05=,       /*  5TH USERDATA          */ -         00022000
                &UDATA06=,       /*  6TH USERDATA          */ -         00022100
                &UDATA07=,       /*  7TH USERDATA          */ -         00022200
                &UDATA08=,       /*  8TH USERDATA          */ -         00022300
                &UDATA09=,       /*  9TH USERDATA          */ -         00022400
                &UDATA10=,       /* 10TH USERDATA          */ -         00022500
                &UDATA11=,       /* 11TH USERDATA          */ -         00022600
                &UDATA12=,       /* 12TH USERDATA          */ -         00022700
                &UDATA13=,       /* 13TH USERDATA          */ -         00022800
                &UDATA14=,       /* 14TH USERDATA          */ -         00022900
                &UDATA15=,       /* 15TH USERDATA          */ -         00023000
                &UDATA16=,       /* 16TH USERDATA          */ -         00023100
                &ULIB1=,         /*  1ST USERLIB LIBRARY   */ -         00023200
                &ULIB2=,         /*  2ND USERLIB LIBRARY   */ -         00023300
                &ULIB3=,         /*  3RD USERLIB LIBRARY   */ -         00023400
                &ULIB4=,         /*  4TH USERLIB LIBRARY   */ -         00023500
                &ULIB5=,         /*  5TH USERLIB LIBRARY   */ -         00023600
                &ULIB6=,         /*  6TH USERLIB LIBRARY   */ -         00023700
                &ULIB7=,         /*  7TH USERLIB LIBRARY   */ -         00023800
                &ULIB8=,         /*  8TH USERLIB LIBRARY   */ -         00023900
                &WRITER=,        /* WRITER                 */ -         00024000
                &VPSDSN=,        /* VPS PRINTER STAGED DSN */ -         00024100
                &BANNER=,        /* WRITER BANNER PAGE     */           00025100
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */  00025200
/*   COPY FILE FROM VPS STAGED DATASET INTO JES SPOOL               */  00025300
/*        DESTINATION HAS BEEN CHANGED TO A VPS CONTROLLED PRINTER. */  00025400
/*        BANNER PAGE WILL BE PRODUCED.                             */  00025500
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */  00025600
STEP01   COPY FROM(                                    PNODE  -         00025700
                DSN=&VPSDSN                                   -         00025800
                DISP=SHR )                                    -         00025900
                CKPT=1M                                       -         00026000
                COMPRESS EXT                                  -         00026100
              TO(                                      SNODE  -         00026200
                SYSOUT=(CLASS=&CLASS,COPIES=&COPIES,DEST=&DEST -        00027000
                BANNER=(PROGRAMMER=&JPNAME,JOBNAME=&JOBNM,    -         00028000
                SUBMITTER=&SUBNAME,STEPNAME=&STEPNM,          -         00028100
                DDNAME=&STEPDD))                              -         00028200
                )                                                       00028300
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */  00029000
/*   DELETE VPS STAGE INPUT FILE                                    */  00030000
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */  00040000
STEP02   IF     (STEP01 = 0) THEN                                       00050000
STEP03   RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                                -         00060000
    PARM=(C"ALLOC DSN=&VPSDSN,DISP=(OLD,DELETE)"              -         00070000
    F'-1'                                                     -         00080000
    C"UNALLOC DSN=&VPSDSN"))                                            00090000
         EIF                                                            00091000
         EXIT                                                           00094900
MEMBER NAME  CDTORDR1
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */  00026703
/*                                                                  */  00026803
/*              * * *  S A M P L E   P R O C E S S  * * *           */  00026903
/*                                                                  */  00027003
/*          C:D-OS/390 JES SPOOL TRANSFER OPTION SAMPLE PROCESS     */  00028000
/*          USING SYSOPTS                                           */  00028100
/*                  INPUT FROM OS/390 PDS MEMBER                    */  00029000
/*                  OUTPUT TO JES READER                            */  00030000
/*                                                                  */  00040003
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */  00050003
/*                                                                  */  00060003
CDTORDR1 PROCESS  SNODE=                                                00061000
STEP01   COPY FROM(                                    PNODE  -         00070000
                    DSN=SAMPLE.JCL.LIB(JCL)                   -         00080003
                    DISP=SHR                                  -         00090003
                  )                                           -         00100003
                TO(                                    SNODE  -         00110003
                    SYSOPTS="OUTPUT=READER"                   -         00111003
                  )                                                     00130003
         EXIT                                                           00140003
MEMBER NAME  CDTORDR2
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */  00001000
/*                                                                  */  00002000
/*              * * *  S A M P L E   P R O C E S S  * * *           */  00002100
/*                                                                  */  00002200
