/*                 INPUT FROM OS/390 PDS MEMBER                     */  00002400
/*                 OUTPUT TO JES READER                             */  00002500
/*                                                                  */  00002600
/* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *  */  00002700
/*                                                                  */  00002800
CDTORDR2 PROCESS  SNODE=                                                00002900
STEP01   COPY FROM(                                    PNODE  -         00025400
                    DSN=SAMPLE.JCL.LIB(JCL)                   -         00025500
                    DISP=SHR                                  -         00025600
                  )                                           -         00025700
                TO(                                    SNODE  -         00025800
                    READER                                    -         00025900
                  )                                                     00026000
         EXIT                                                           00027000
MEMBER NAME  CDTRIGGE
CDTRIGGE PROCESS   SNODE=A060JDA2                             -
                   SNODEID=(CDUSER CDUSER)                -
                   PNODE=CD.D000
COPYIT   COPY      FROM ( PNODE                               -
                          DSN=D438804.L1                      -
                          DISP=SHR                    )       -
                   TO   ( SNODE                               -
                          DSN='DC43387/E3TRIGGER'             -
                          SYSOPTS="RECLEN(1) FILETYPE(*DATA)" -
                          DISP=NEW                    )
/*                                                               */
/*                 SNODEID=(DC43387  FEBBORO5)                -  */
MEMBER NAME  CDTRIGG2
CDTRIGG2 PROCESS   SNODE=S104C0ZM                             -
                   SNODEID=(DCOOK    GENERIC4)                -
                   PNODE=CD.D000
COPYIT   COPY      FROM ( PNODE                               -
                          DSN=D438804.L1                      -
                          DISP=SHR                    )       -
                   TO   ( SNODE                               -
                          DSN='DCOOK/E3TRIGGER'               -
                          SYSOPTS="RECLEN(1) FILETYPE(*DATA)" -
                          DISP=NEW                    )
/*                                                               */
MEMBER NAME  CD02LOG
CD02LOG   PROCESS PRTY=8 CLASS=4 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED       -
                         SNODE=N701CD02 SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops)
STEP1     COPY    FROM(    DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR SNODE)                -
                  TO  (    DSN=&DSN2 DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE) PNODE) -
                          CKPT=0K COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  CD400MVS
CD400MVS PROCESS   SNODE=S104C0ZM                 -                     00010006
                   SNODEID=(DCOOK GENERIC4)       -                     00011006
                   PNODE=CD.D000                                        00012008
COPYIT   COPY      FROM ( SNODE                               -         00040006
                          DSN='DCOOK/TEST02(TEST02)'          -         00041013
                          DISP=SHR                            -         00050015
                          SYSOPTS="TYPE(MBR)"         )       -         00051019
                   TO   ( PNODE                               -         00060006
                          DSN=D438804.L100                    -         00070020
                          DISP=(OLD,KEEP,KEEP)        )                 00080012
/*                                                               */     00091000
MEMBER NAME  CD400MV2
CD400MV2 PROCESS   SNODE=S104C0ZM                 -                     00010001
                   SNODEID=(DCOOK GENERIC4)       -                     00011000
                   PNODE=CD.D000                                        00012000
COPYIT   COPY      FROM ( SNODE                               -         00040000
                          DSN='E3SFMI/E3SXORH'                -         00041001
                          DISP=SHR                            -         00050000
                          SYSOPTS="TYPE(MBR)"         )       -         00051000
                   TO   ( PNODE                               -         00060000
                          DSN=D438804.ASR.E3SXORH(+1)         -         00070001
                          DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)             -         00080001
                          UNIT=(SYSDA,50)                     -         00090001
                          SPACE=(CYL,(50,10),RLSE)    )                 00090101
/*                                                               */     00091000
MEMBER NAME  CERTEGY
CERTEGY   PROCESS PRTY=10 CLASS=1 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED  -
                          SNODE=u060ftp1
STEP1     COPY    FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR)                -
                  TO  (SNODE DSN=&DSN2 DISP=RPL)                -
                             COMPRESS EXTENDED
   IF (STEP1=0) THEN
STEP2     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                             -
          SYSOPTS=\"\                                           -
                  \ncftpput -E -V -a -u BP0502 -p oxdzwtb \     -
                  \-d /XFER/log/PCMC012D.log 216.189.227.31 \   -
                  \BP0502/BP0502_NegDataFile/NegDataFile/ \     -
                  \/XFER/certegyout/PCMC012D.txt\               -
                  \"\
STEP3     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                             -
          SYSOPTS="/bin/rm -f /XFER/certegyout/PCMC012D.txt"
   EIF
MEMBER NAME  CLOGACCP
CLOGACCP  PROCESS  PRTY=10                                          -
                   CLASS=2                                          -
                   MAXDELAY=QUEUED                                  -
                   SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops)                      -
                   SNODE=N701CD02
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  CMCSEND
CMCSEND  PROCESS PRTY=8 CLASS=4 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED    -
                         SNODE=FMSPT12 SNODEID=(cdunix,cdunix123)
STEP1     COPY    FROM(      DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR)                -
                  TO  (      DSN=&DSN2 DISP=&DISP)              -
                             CKPT=0K COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  CMCTASKS
CMCTASKS  PROCESS PRTY=8 CLASS=4 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED   -
                         SNODE=FMSPT12 SNODEID=(cdunix,cdunix123)
STEP1     RUN TASK(PGM=UNIX) SNODE                              -
               SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS
MEMBER NAME  CONNECT1
CONNECT1  PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=4 SNODE=N060CON01       -
               SNODEID=(connect,direct) MAXDELAY=QUEUED
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  COPTDW17
COPTDW17  PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=4 SNODE=U060DW82 -
          MAXDELAY=QUEUED
  SYMBOL  &DIR=\file_land_dir\
  SYMBOL  &IPDSN2=\'\ || &DIR || \/ip_\ || &DSN2 || \'\
  SYMBOL  &SC=\"\ || &SCRIPT || \ \ || &DIR || \ \ || &DSN2 || \"\
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&IPDSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)           -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no:xlate=yes:")       -
                   CKPT=100K  COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
          EXIT
          EIF
STEP3   RUN TASK(PGM = UNIX)                                -
          SNODE                                             -
          SYSOPTS=&SC
MEMBER NAME  COPY
COPY      PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2))     -
                   &COMPRESS
MEMBER NAME  COPYA
COPYA     PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=3
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
            UNIT=SYSDA )                                            -
            CKPT=100K  COMPRESS EXT
          IF (STEP1 NE 0) THEN
STEP2  RUN TASK(PGM = DMNOTIFY,                            -
           PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DSN1..CALL.&MSG)) -
          PNODE
          EIF
/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND ANYWHERE */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                    */
/*                 PROC=COPYA SNODE=                           */
/*                 &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                           */
/*                 &DSN2=OUTPUTDSNAME                          */
/*                 &DISP1=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION1             */
/*                 &DISP2=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION2             */
/*                 &MSG='PHONE NUMBER'                         */
MEMBER NAME  COPYBLOC
COPYBLOC  PROCESS  PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=3 MAXDELAY=UNLIMITED
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                   DCB=(BLKSIZE=1570)                               -
                   UNIT=DLBLONLY) CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
/* THIS IS A SPECIAL PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND TO KING S.  */
/* AND BE RECEIVED ON DISK AT KING SOOPER'S                       */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                       */
/*                 PROC=COPYBLOC SNODE=NDM.KING                   */
/*                 &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                              */
/*                 &DSN2=OUTPUTDSNAME                             */
/*                 &DISP1=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION1                */
/*                 &DISP2=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION2                */
MEMBER NAME  COPYCAA1
COPYCAA1  PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=4 SNODE=U060CAA1        -
               MAXDELAY=QUEUED
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)         -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))    -
                   CKPT=100K  COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  COPYCAT1
COPYCAT1  PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=4 SNODE=U060CAT1        -
               MAXDELAY=QUEUED
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)         -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))    -
                   CKPT=100K  COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  COPYCD
COPYCD    PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE NOTIFY=%USER
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE                                      -
                        DISP=SHR                                   -
                        DSN=&DSN1                                  -
                        &FUNIT                                     -
                        &FVOLSER                                   -
                        LINK=&FLINK                                -
                        VSAMCAT=&FVCAT                             -
                        &SELECT                                    -
                        &FSYSOPT                                   -
                        &EXCLUDE                                   -
                        &NOREP                                     -
                       )                                           -
                   TO  (                                           -
                        DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)                       -
                        DSN=&DSN2                                  -
                        &TDCB=&TDCB                                -
                        &TUNIT                                     -
                        &TVOLSER                                   -
                        &TSYSOPT                                   -
                        LINK=&TLINK                                -
                        VSAMCAT=&TVCAT                             -
                       )                                           -
                   &COMPRESS
MEMBER NAME  COPYCDC
COPYCDC  PROCESS SNODEID=(D052002,NDMTASK1)
STEP1  COPY   FROM(DSN=&DSN1                  /* FROM DATA SET NAME  */-
                   DISP=SHR                   /* DISPOSITION         */-
                   &NODE    )                 /* FROM PNODE OR SNODE */-
              TO   (DSN=&DSN2                 /* TO DATA SET NAME    */-
                    DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2) -    /* OPEN AND CLOSE DISP */
                    SECMODEL=(#955897)) -
              COMPRESS EXT                   /* COMPRESSION OPTION  */
MEMBER NAME  COPYCF
COPYCF   PROCESS    &CP_FNOD=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_FDSN=,        -   /*  THIS IS THE "MODEL"    */
                    &CP_FUNT=,        -   /*  PROCESS USED BY THE    */
                    &CP_FVOL=,        -   /*  "COPY FILE" OPTION OF  */
                    &CP_FLNK=,        -   /*  THE IUI                */
                    &CP_FVCT=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_FDIR=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_FSEL=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_FEXC=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_FNOR=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_FTYP=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_FDCB=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_FLAB=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_FOPT=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_FMSV=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_FALI=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_FGRP=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_FSPA=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_FDAT=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_TDSP=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_TDSN=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_TDCB=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_TUNT=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_TVOL=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_TTYP=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_TLAB=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_TMSV=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_TOPT=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_TGRP=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_TSPA=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_TLNK=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_TVCT=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_TDAC=,        -   /*   I142075 DATACLAS      */
                    &CP_TSTC=,        -   /*   I142075 STORCLAS      */
                    &CP_TMGC=,        -   /*   I142075 MGMTCLAS      */
                    &CP_TAVR=,        -   /*   I142075 AVGREC        */
                    &CP_TDST=,        -   /*   I142075 DSNTYPE       */
                    &CP_TVSO=,        -   /*   I142075 RECORG        */
                    &CP_TKYL=,        -   /*   I142075 KEYLEN        */
                    &CP_TKYO=,        -   /*   I142075 KEYOFF        */
                    &CP_TLIK=,        -   /*   I142075 LIKE          */
                    &CP_TSEC=,        -   /*   I142075 SECMODEL      */
                    &CP_TPRO=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_TDAT=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_OLDD=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_CKPT=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_CMP1=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_CMP2=,        -   /*                         */
                    &CP_FSFDIR=,      -   /*  SFSDIR FROM      (VM)  */
                    &CP_TSFDIR=           /*  SFSDIR TO        (VM)  */
COPYSTEP COPY FROM (                  -   /*  FROM:                  */
                    &CP_FNOD          -   /*  NODE ID  (PNODE/SNODE) */
                    DISP=SHR          -   /*  FILE DISPOSITION (SHR) */
                    &CP_FUNT          -   /*  UNIT IDENTIFIER        */
                    &CP_FVOL          -   /*  VOLUME IDENTIFIER      */
                    &CP_FLNK          -   /*  LINK INFO         (VM) */
                    &CP_FVCT          -   /*  VSAMCAT INFO  (VSE/VM) */
                    &CP_FDIR          -   /*  PDS.DIR=      (YES/NO) */
                    &CP_FSEL          -   /*  SELECTION CRITERIA     */
                    &CP_FEXC          -   /*  EXCLUSION CRITERIA     */
                    &CP_FNOR          -   /*  NOREPLACE MEMBERS      */
                    &CP_FTYP          -   /*  TYPE IDENTIFIER        */
                    &CP_FDCB          -   /*  DCB INFO               */
                    &CP_FLAB          -   /*  LABEL INFO             */
                    &CP_FOPT          -   /*  SYSOPTS SPEC.          */
                    &CP_FMSV          -   /*  MSVGP SPEC.            */
                    &CP_FALI          -   /*  ALIAS=        (YES/NO) */
                    &CP_FGRP          -   /*  GROUP             (VM) */
                    &CP_FSPA          -   /*  SPACE            (VSE) */
                    &CP_FDAT          -   /*  DATAEXIT SPEC.   (VMS) */
                    &CP_FSFDIR        -   /*  SFSDIR           (VM)  */
                    &CP_FDSN          -   /*  DSN/FILE/GROUP SPEC.   */
                   )                  -   /*                         */
                &CP_OLDD              -   /*  OLDDATE                */
                &CP_CMP1 &CP_CMP2     -   /*  COMPRESS               */
                &CP_CKPT              -   /*  CHECKPOINT             */
               TO  (                  -   /*  TO:                    */
                    &CP_TDSP          -   /*  FILE DISPOSITION       */
                    &CP_TDCB          -   /*  DCB INFO               */
                    &CP_TUNT          -   /*  UNIT IDENTIFIER        */
                    &CP_TVOL          -   /*  VOLUME IDENTIFIER      */
                    &CP_TTYP          -   /*  TYPE SPEC.             */
                    &CP_TLAB          -   /*  LABEL SPEC.            */
                    &CP_TMSV          -   /*  MSVGP SPEC.            */
                    &CP_TOPT          -   /*  SYSOPTS SPEC           */
                    &CP_TSPA          -   /*  SPACE SPEC.            */
                    &CP_TLNK          -   /*  LINK INFO         (VM) */
                    &CP_TVCT          -   /*  VSAMCAT INFO  (VSE/VM) */
                    &CP_TDAC          -   /*   I142075 DATACLAS      */
                    &CP_TSTC          -   /*   I142075 STORCLAS      */
                    &CP_TMGC          -   /*   I142075 MGMTCLAS      */
                    &CP_TAVR          -   /*   I142075 AVGREC        */
                    &CP_TDST          -   /*   I142075 DSNTYPE       */
                    &CP_TVSO          -   /*   I142075 RECORG        */
                    &CP_TKYL          -   /*   I142075 KEYLEN        */
                    &CP_TKYO          -   /*   I142075 KEYOFF        */
                    &CP_TLIK          -   /*   I142075 LIKE          */
                    &CP_TSEC          -   /*   I142075 SECMODEL      */
                    &CP_TGRP          -   /*  GROUP             (VM) */
                    &CP_TPRO          -   /*  PROTECT (YES/NO)  (VM) */
                    &CP_TDAT          -   /*  DATAEXIT         (VMS) */
                    &CP_TSFDIR        -   /*  SFSDIR           (VM)  */
                    &CP_TDSN          -   /*  DSN/FILE/GROUP SPEC.   */
                   )
MEMBER NAME  COPYCNTL
COPYCNTL  PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=4 MAXDELAY=QUEUED
STEP1     COPY    FROM(      DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR)     -
                  TO  (      DSN=&DSN2 DISP=(&DISP1) -
                  SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(no)")        -
                  CKPT=100K   COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  COPYCVTP
COPYCVTP  PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=3
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
            UNIT=TAPE )                                            -
            CKPT=100K  COMPRESS EXT
          IF (STEP1 NE 0) THEN
STEP2  RUN TASK(PGM = DMNOTIFY,                            -
           PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DSN1..CALL.&MSG)) -
          PNODE
          EIF
/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND ANYWHERE */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                    */
/*                 PROC=COPYA SNODE=                           */
/*                 &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                           */
/*                 &DSN2=OUTPUTDSNAME                          */
/*                 &DISP1=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION1             */
/*                 &DISP2=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION2             */
/*                 &MSG='PHONE NUMBER'                         */
MEMBER NAME  COPYD
COPYD     PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                   UNIT=SYSDA) CKPT=100K                            -
                   COMPRESS EXT=(CMP=9,WIN=13,MEM=4)
          IF (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
       RUN TASK(PGM = DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',TRANSFER.FAILED)) -
          PNODE
       RUN TASK(PGM = DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',TRANSFER.FAILED)) -
          SNODE
          EIF
/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND ANYWHERE */
/* WITH MAXIMUM COMPRESSION.                                   */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                    */
/*                 PROC=COPYD SNODE=                           */
/*                 &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                           */
/*                 &DSN2=OUTPUTDSNAME                          */
/*                 &DISP1=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION1             */
/*                 &DISP2=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION2             */
MEMBER NAME  COPYDCC
COPYDCC   PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                   UNIT=SYSDA) CKPT=100K                            -
                   COMPRESS EXT=(CMP=9,WIN=13,MEM=4)
          IF (STEP1 > 4) THEN
STEP2         RUN JOB (DSN=&JOBFILE) PNODE
          EIF
/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND ANYWHERE */
/* WITH MAXIMUM COMPRESSION.                                   */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                    */
/*                 PROC=COPYD SNODE=                           */
/*                 &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                           */
/*                 &DSN2=OUTPUTDSNAME                          */
/*                 &DISP1=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION1             */
/*                 &DISP2=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION2             */
MEMBER NAME  COPYDCNT
COPYDCNT  PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=3 MAXDELAY=QUEUED     -
          SNODEID=(caller,mailgate)
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2))     -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
          IF (STEP1 NE 0) THEN
STEP2  RUN TASK(PGM = DMNOTIFY,                                     -
           PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DSN1..CALL.&MSG))                       -
          PNODE
          EIF
/* THIS IS A SPECIAL PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND TO DILLON'S */
/* OUTPUT IS TO AN NT  SERVER.                                    */
/* IF THE RC IS NOT EQ 0 FOR THE COPY STEP THAN A MSG IS SENT TO  */
/* THE MVS CONSOLE ON THE FM END TO INDICATE FAILURE.             */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                       */
/*                 PROC=COPYDCNT SNODE=NDM.DCDCNT                 */
/*                 CASE=YES                                       */
/*                 &DSN1=INPUT_DSNAME                             */
/*                 &DSN2=OUTPUT_DSNAME                            */
/*                 &DISP1=OUTPUT_DSNAME_DISPOSITION1              */
/*                 &DISP2=OUTPUT_DSNAME_DISPOSITION2              */
/*                 &MSG2=MSG_FOR_FM_CONOLE_ON_ERROR               */
MEMBER NAME  COPYDIL
COPYDIL   PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=3
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                   UNIT=DLBLONLY) CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
          IF (STEP1 EQ 0) THEN
STEP2     RUN JOB (DSN=J(&JOBFILE)) SNODE
          ELSE
       RUN TASK(PGM = DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',TRANSFER.FAILED)) -
          PNODE
          EIF
/* THIS IS A SPECIAL PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND TO DILLON'S */
/* OUTPUT IS TO DISK.                                             */
/* IF THE RC=0 FOR THE COPY STEP THAN A JOB IS SUBMITTED AT       */
/* DILLON'S TO SEND THE DATA TO A RS/6000                         */
/* ELSE A FAILED MESSAGE WILL BE SENT TO THE SECONDARY NODE.      */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                       */
/*                 PROC=COPYDIL SNODE=NDM.DCDCCOM                 */
/*                 &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                              */
/*                 &DSN2=OUTPUTDSNAME                             */
/*                 &DISP1=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION1                */
/*                 &DISP2=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION2                */
/*                 &COMPRESS='COMPRESS EXT'                       */
/*                 &JOBFILE=JOBNAMETOBESUBMITTEDATDILLONS         */
MEMBER NAME  COPYDPUL
COPYDPUL  PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2
STEP1     COPY     FROM( SNODE  DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR )           -
                   TO  ( PNODE  DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2) -
                   UNIT=SYSDA ) CKPT=100K                       -
                   COMPRESS EXT=(CMP=9,WIN=13,MEM=4)
/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO PULL FROM ANYWHERE */
/* WITH MAXIMUM COMPRESSION.                                   */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                    */
/*                 PROC=COPYDPUL SNODE=                           */
/*                 &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME <FROM SNODE>              */
/*                 &DSN2=OUTPUTDSNAME <TO PNODE>               */
/*                 &DISP1=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION1 <PNODE DISP>*/
/*                 &DISP2=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION2 <PNODE DISP>*/
MEMBER NAME  COPYDWBK
COPYDW17  PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=4 SNODE=U060DW17 -
          MAXDELAY=QUEUED
  SYMBOL  &DIR=\file_land_dir\
  SYMBOL  &IPDSN2=\'\  &DIR  \/ip_\  &DSN2  \'\
  SYMBOL  &SC=\"\  &SCRIPT  \ \  &DIR  \ \  &DSN2  \"\
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&IPDSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)           -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no:xlate=no:")        -
                   CKPT=100K  COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
          EXIT
          EIF
STEP3   RUN TASK(PGM = UNIX)                                -
          SNODE                                             -
          SYSOPTS=&SC
MEMBER NAME  COPYDWNE
COPYDWNE  PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=4 SNODE=U060DW01
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)        -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))   -
                   CKPT=100K  COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF (STEP1 NE 0) THEN
          EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN3   DISP=SHR)         -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN4   DISP=(&DISP1))    -
                   CKPT=100K  COMPRESS EXT
STEP4     IF (STEP3 GT 0) THEN
          EXIT
          EIF
STEP5   RUN TASK(PGM = UNIX)                                -
          SNODE                                             -
          SYSOPTS="strrcpt_bin/mainframe_complete11.ksh"

                   CKPT=100K  COMPRESS EXT

                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no:xlate=yes:")       -

MEMBER NAME  COPYEXT
COPYEXT   PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=3 MAXDELAY=UNLIMITED
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                   UNIT=DLBLONLY) CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
          IF (STEP1 EQ 0) THEN
STEP2     RUN JOB (DSN=J(J20AID30)) SNODE
          ELSE
       RUN TASK(PGM = DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',TRANSFER.FAILED)) -
          PNODE
          EIF
/*                 DCB=(DSORG=PS,LRECL=560,BLKSIZE=5600,RECFM=FB) */
/* THIS IS A SPECIAL PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND TO KING     */
/* SOOPER'S WITH SPECIAL DCB AND OUTPUT TO DISK.
/* IF THE RC=0 FOR THE COPY STEP THAN A JOB IS SUBMITTED AT       */
/* KING SOOPER'S                                                  */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                       */
/*                 PROC=COPYDIL SNODE=NDM.KING                    */
/*                 &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                              */
/*                 &DSN2=OUTPUTDSNAME                             */
/*                 &DISP1=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION1                */
/*                 &DISP2=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION2                */
/*                 &COMPRESS='COMPRESS EXT'                       */
MEMBER NAME  COPYEXTT
COPYEXTT  PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER
          SYMBOL   &DSN1=&HLQ || \.\ || &MLQ || \.\ || \KING.MAGIC\
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                   DCB=(DSORG=PS,LRECL=560,BLKSIZE=5600,RECFM=FB)   -
                   UNIT=DLBLONLY) &COMPRESS
MEMBER NAME  COPYEXTW
COPYEXT   PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=3
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                   UNIT=DLBLONLY) CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  COPYFRT
COPYFRT   PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=3 SNODE=CDRM03IP
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                   UNIT=&UNIT) CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
/*        IF (STEP1 EQ 0) THEN
STEP2     RUN JOB (DSN=J(&JOBFILE)) SNODE
          ELSE
       RUN TASK(PGM = DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',TRANSFER.FAILED)) -
          PNODE
          EIF
          IF(STEP1 = 0)THEN
NDMZEKE   RUN TASK(PGM = ZEKENDM, -
          PARM=(CL46'S=SSSI,D=&DSN2')) -
          SNODE
          EIF                */
MEMBER NAME  COPYFRY
COPYFRY   PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=3 SNODE=CDRM03IP
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                   UNIT=&UNIT) CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
          IF (STEP1 EQ 0) THEN
STEP2     RUN JOB (DSN=J(&JOBFILE)) SNODE
          ELSE
       RUN TASK(PGM = DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',TRANSFER.FAILED)) -
          PNODE
          EIF
/* THIS IS A SPECIAL PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND TO DILLON'S */
/* WITH VARIABLE UNIT (DLBLONLY OR TNOASGN).                      */
/* IF THE RC=0 FOR THE COPY STEP THAN A JOB IS SUBMITTED AT       */
/* DILLON'S TO SEND THE DATA TO A RS/6000                         */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                       */
/*                 PROC=COPYFRY SNODE=NDM.FRYS                    */
/*                 &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                              */
/*                 &DSN2=OUTPUTDSNAME                             */
/*                 &DISP1=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION1                */
/*                 &DISP2=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION2                */
/*                 &COMPRESS='COMPRESS EXT'                       */
/*                 &UNIT=OUTPUTUNIT (DLBLONLY OR NOASGN)          */
/*                 &JOBFILE=JOBNAME TO BE SUBMITTED AT FRYS       */
MEMBER NAME  COPYFRYJ
COPYFRYJ  PROCESS  PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=3 MAXDELAY=QUEUED      -
                   SNODE=CDRM03IP
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                    DCB=(BLKSIZE=1570)                              -
                   UNIT=DLBLONLY) CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
           IF (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
           EXIT
           ELSE
STEP2     RUN JOB (DSN=J(J60AFMYM)) SNODE
           EIF
/* THIS IS A SPECIAL PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND TO FRY'S    */
/* AND SUBMIT JOB AT THE FRY'S END.                               */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                       */
/*                 PROC=COPYFRY SNODE=NDM.FRYS                    */
/*                 &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                              */
/*                 &DSN2=OUTPUTDSNAME                             */
/*                 &DISP1=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION1                */
/*                 &DISP2=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION2                */
/*                 &COMPRESS='COMPRESS EXT'                       */
MEMBER NAME  COPYFRYS
COPYFRYS  PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=3 SNODE=CDRM03IP
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                   UNIT=&UNIT) CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
          IF (STEP1 EQ 0) THEN
STEP2     RUN JOB (DSN=J(&JOBFILE)) SNODE
          ELSE
       RUN TASK(PGM = DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',TRANSFER.FAILED)) -
          PNODE
          EIF
          IF(STEP1 = 0)THEN
NDMZEKE   RUN TASK(PGM = ZEKENDM, -
          PARM=(CL46'S=SSSI,D=&DSN2')) -
          SNODE
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  COPYFRYT
COPYFRYT  PROCESS  PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=3 SNODE=CDRM03IP
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                   UNIT=TNOASGN) CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT

                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1) PNODE)      -
                   CKPT=100K  COMPRESS EXT
  IF (STEP1=0) THEN
STEP2      RUN TASK(PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                 -
               SYSOPTS="rm /XFER/itradein/iTradeNetfmy.txt"
  ELSE
  EIF
MEMBER NAME  COPYFTPR
COPYFTPR  PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=4 SNODE=U060FTP1        -
               MAXDELAY=QUEUED
  SYMBOL &DELSCR=\rm\
  SYMBOL &DELDSN=\"\ || &DELSCR || \\ || &DSN1 || \"\
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR SNODE)           -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1) PNODE)      -
                   CKPT=100K  COMPRESS EXT
  IF (STEP1=0) THEN
STEP2      RUN TASK(PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                 -
               SYSOPTS=&DELDSN
  ELSE
  EIF

                   CKPT=100K  COMPRESS EXT

/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND ANYWHERE */
/* WITH MAXIMUM COMPRESSION.                                   */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                    */
/*                 PROC=COPYD SNODE=                           */
/*                 &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                           */
/*                 &DSN2=OUTPUTDSNAME                          */
/*                 &DISP1=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION1             */
/*                 &DISP2=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION2             */

                   UNIT=SYSDA) CKPT=100K                            -
                   COMPRESS EXT=(CMP=9,WIN=13,MEM=4)

STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
          GOTO STEP3
         ELSE
          EXIT
         EIF

   SYSOPTS=\'CMD(COPY E:\\data\\701\\ecf\\vlmhstdlyadj.ecf\           -
              \E:\\rws\\ecf\\vlmhstdlyadj.ecf)'\

           SNODE

/*                 PROC=COPYMPST SNODE=FITB.TEST.CIN              */
/*                 &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                              */
/*                 &DSN2=OUTPUTDSNAME                             */

MEMBER NAME  COPYNC
COPYNC    PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE
 /* PACCT='36F,371,36F,371,12345678' - */
 /* SACCT='36F,371,36F,371,12345678'   */
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&FNODE                                     -
                        &FDISP                                     -
                        DSN=&DSN1                                  -
                        &FDCB                                      -
                        &FUNIT                                     -
                        &FVOLSER                                   -
                        &FLINK                                     -
                        &FVCAT                                     -
                        &SELECT                                    -
                        &NOREP                                     -
                        &FSYSOPT                                   -
                        &FTYPE                                     -
                       )                                           -
                   TO  (&TNODE                                     -
                        &TDISP                                     -
                        DSN=&DSN2                                  -
                        &TDCB                                      -
                        &TUNIT                                     -
                        &TVOLSER                                   -
                        &TSPACE                                    -
                        &TLABEL                                    -
                        &TLINK                                     -
                        &TVCAT                                     -
                        &TSYSOPT                                   -
                        &TTYPE                                     -
                       )                                           -
                   &COMPRESS                                       -
                   &CKPT

          SNODEID=(caller,mailgate)

                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2))     -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT

STEP2  RUN TASK(PGM = DMNOTIFY,                                     -
           PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DSN1..CALL.&MSG))                       -
          PNODE
          EIF

                         SNODE=FMSPT12 SNODEID=(cdunix,cdunix123)

                  TO  (      DSN=&DSN2 DISP=RPL                   -
                             SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no:")         -
                             CKPT=0K COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  COPYPULL
COPYPULL  PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR SNODE)           -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                   UNIT=SYSDA PNODE) CKPT=100K                       -
                   COMPRESS EXT=(CMP=9,WIN=13,MEM=4)
/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO PULL FROM ANYWHERE */
/* WITH MAXIMUM COMPRESSION.                                   */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                    */
/*                 PROC=COPYPULL SNODE=                           */
/*                 &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME <FROM SNODE>              */
/*                 &DSN2=OUTPUTDSNAME <TO PNODE>               */
/*                 &DISP1=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION1 <PNODE DISP>*/
/*                 &DISP2=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION2 <PNODE DISP>*/

          EIF

MEMBER NAME  COPYRALF

                   DISP=SHR                   /* DISPOSITION         */-
                   DCB=(DSORG=VSAM)                                   -
                   &NODE    )                 /* FROM PNODE OR SNODE */-
              TO   (DSN=&DSN2                 /* TO DATA SET NAME    */-
                    DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      /* OPEN AND CLOSE DISP */-
                    UNIT=&UNIT                /* UNIT DESIGNATION    */-
                    VOL=SER=&TVOL             /* VOLUME SERIAL       */-
                    SECMODEL=(TSPKGRY))                                -
              COMPRESS EXT                   /* COMPRESSION OPTION  */

/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND ANYWHERE */
/* WITH MAXIMUM COMPRESSION.                                   */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                    */

MEMBER NAME  COPY01
COPY01 PROCESS
STEP1  COPY   FROM(DSN=&DSN1                  /* FROM DATA SET NAME  */-
                   DISP=SHR                   /* DISPOSITION         */-
                   &NODE    )                 /* FROM PNODE OR SNODE */-
              TO   (DSN=&DSN2                 /* TO DATA SET NAME    */-
                    DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      /* OPEN AND CLOSE DISP */-
                    UNIT=&UNIT                /* UNIT DESIGNATION    */-
                    VOL=SER=&TVOL      )      /* VOLUME SERIAL       */-
              &COMPRESS                       /* COMPRESSION OPTION  */
MEMBER NAME  COPY02
COPY02    PROCESS
STEP1  COPY   FROM(DSN=&DSN1                  /* FROM DATA SET NAME  */-
                   DISP=OLD                   /* DISPOSITION         */-
                   LABEL=(&FLABEL)            /* FROM LABEL INFO.    */-
                   UNIT=&FUNIT                /* FROM UNIT           */-
                   &NODE    )                 /* FROM PNODE OR SNODE */-
              TO   (DSN=&DSN2                 /* TO DATA SET NAME    */-
                    DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      /* OPEN AND CLOSE DISP */-
                    UNIT=&TUNIT               /* TO UNIT             */-
                    LABEL=(&TLABEL)    )      /* TO LABEL            */-
              &COMPRESS                       /* COMPRESSION OPTION  */
MEMBER NAME  COPY03
COPY03   PROCESS                         /* PROCESS NAME            */
STEP01   COPY                            /* STEP NAME               */ -
 /*                                                                 */ -
 /*               *** SOURCE DATA SET ATTRIBUTES ***                */ -
 /*                                                                 */ -
  FROM(                                                                -
   DSN=&FDSN                             /* DATA SET NAME           */ -
    DISP=(&FDISP)                        /* DISPOSITION             */ -
    DCB=(DSORG=&FDSORG,RECFM=&FRECFM,    /* DCB INFORMATION         */ -
         LRECL=&FLRECL,BLKSIZE=&FBLKSIZE)                              -
    LABEL=(&FLABEL)                      /* LABEL INFORMATION       */ -
    PNODE                                /* FROM NODE               */ -
    UNIT=&FUNIT                          /* UNIT DESIGNATION        */ -
    VOL=SER=&FVOL                        /* VOLUME SERIAL           */ -
    ALIAS=&FALIAS                        /* SEND ALIASES, Y OR N    */ -
    SELECT=(&FSEL1)                      /* PDS MEMBER SELECT LIST  */ -
    EXCLUDE=(&FEXC1)                     /* PDS MEMBER EXCLUDE LIST */ -
    &REPLACE                             /* REPLACE LIKE MEMBERS    */ -
    PDS.DIR=&FPDSD                       /* SEND DIRECT, INFO,Y OR N*/ -
      )                                                                -
                 &COMPRESS               /* COMPRESSION OPTION      */ -
 /*                                                                 */ -
 /*             *** DESTINATION DATA SET ATTRIBUTES ***             */ -
 /*                                                                 */ -
  TO  (                                                                -
   DSN=&TDSN                             /* DATA SET NAME           */ -
    DISP=(&TDISP)                        /* DISPOSITION             */ -
    DCB=(DSORG=&TDSORG,RECFM=&TRECFM,    /* DCB INFORMATION         */ -
         LRECL=&TLRECL,BLKSIZE=&TBLKSIZE)                              -
    SPACE=(&SPACE1)                      /* SPACE INFORMATION       */ -
    LABEL=(&TLABEL)                      /* LABEL INFORMATION       */ -
    SNODE                                /* TO NODE                 */ -
    UNIT=&TUNIT                          /* UNIT DESIGNATION        */ -
    VOL=SER=&TVOL                        /* VOLUME SERIAL           */ -
      )

               SYSOPTS="TYPE(FILE) DECMPR(*YES) TEXTFILE(*YES)"     -

          IF (STEP1 NE 0) THEN
STEP2  RUN TASK(PGM = DMNOTIFY,                            -
           PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DSN1..CALL.&MSG)) -
          PNODE
          EIF

STEP3   RUN TASK(PGM = UNIX)                                -
          SNODE                                             -
      SYSOPTS="/qsl/bin/sales_procprod.ss"

  IOEXIT=(DMDSSIOX,                                          -          00030000
  C'DS( INC(KSTIC1.SMSTEST.DMDSSU.COMP.OUTLIST) ) '  )       -          00040000
  DISP=SHR                                                   -          00050000
          )                                                  -          00060000
                 TO(SNODE                                    -          00070000
  IOEXIT=(DMDSSIOX,                                          -          00080000
  C'DS(INC(**)) -'                                           -          00090000
  C'OUTDYNAM(USER37) -'                                      -          00100000
  C'REP CAT SHARE -'                                         -          00110000
  C'RENAMEU( - '                                             -          00120000
  C'(KSTIC1.SMSTEST.DMDSSU.**,MWATL1.SMSTEST.DMDSSU3.**) - ' -          00130000
  C')')                                                      -          00140000
  DISP=RPL          )                                                   00150000
MEMBER NAME  DSSIOX2

                  SNODE=SC.MVS.KSTIC1 -                                 00020000
                  &DSN=kstic1.smstest.dmdssu.COMP.OUtlist               00030000
         SYMBOL &INC=INC(&DSN)                                          00040000
         SYMBOL &TOl=TOL(ENQF)                                          00050000
         SYMBOL &DS=DS(&INC)&TOl                                        00060000
         SYMBOL &A=&DS                                                  00070000
NOCOMP   COPY     FROM(PNODE  -                                         00080000
   ioexit=(DMDSSIOX, -                                                  00090000
   C'OPT(4) - ' -                                                       00100000
   C\'\&A\'\) -                                                         00110000
                       disp=shr -                                       00120000
                       )                                  -             00130000
                  TO(SNODE -                                            00140000
   ioexit=(DMDSSIOX,    -                                               00150000
         c'ds(inc(**)) -'  -                                            00160000
         c'outdynam(user37)           -'  -                             00170000
         c'rep cat -' -                                                 00180000
  c'renameu(                                      - '  -                00190000
  c'        (kstic1.smstest.dmdssu.**,kstic1.smstest.dmdssu1.**) - '    00200000
  C'                                              )') -                 00210000
             disp=shr )                                                 00220000

MEMBER NAME  GENER
//&JOB     JOB (00000),'PROGRAMMER NAME',PRTY=12,TIME=(10),
// REGION=4096K,MSGLEVEL=(1,1),MSGCLASS=X
//*
//STEP01   EXEC PGM=IEBGENER
//SYSPRINT  DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSIN     DD DUMMY
//SYSUT1    DD DSN=&INPUT,
//          DISP=(OLD,DELETE,KEEP)
//SYSUT2    DD SYSOUT=&CLASS,COPIES=&COPIES,DEST=&DEST
//
MEMBER NAME  GXSFTPI
/* USE THIS PROCESS TO RECEIVE DATA FROM FTP SERVER THAT GXS   */
/* HAS PUSHED DATA TO. (PRODUCTION VERSION)                    */
/* Process contains the following steps:                       */
/*                                                             */
/* MOVEFL - Moves all files from the '/gxsin' directory        */
/* (to gather all full files that GXS has pushed to our FTP    */
/* server thus allowing new data to be received) to the        */
/* '/gxsup' directory.                                         */
/*                                                             */
/* CUTFL - Files in the '/gxsup' directory are cut into 80     */
/* byte records (GXS sends data with a CR inserted after every */
/* 80 chars) and collected into a single file 'gxsall.dat' in  */
/* '/gxsdata' directory.                                       */
/*                                                             */
/* COPY -  Connect:Direct is used to pull the 'gxsall.dat'     */
/* file from the 'gxsdata' directory to the mainframe.         */
/*                                                             */
/* RMVUP - Clean up process, remove all files in the 'gxsup'   */
/* directory.                                                  */
/*                                                             */
/* RMVDATA - Clean up process, remove all files in the         */
/* 'gxsdata' directory.                                        */
/*                                                             */
GXSFTPI PROCESS HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10 SNODE=&SNODE
MOVEFL  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                           -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                         -
        \/bin/mv /XFER/gxsin/fmprod/* /XFER/gxsup/fmprod/  \ -
        \"\
        IF (MOVEFL = 0) THEN
CUTFL      RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                        -
           SYSOPTS=\"\                                      -
           \/bin/cut -c1-80 /XFER/gxsup/fmprod/* > \        -
           \   /XFER/gxsdata/fmprod/gxsall.dat \            -
           \"\
        IF (CUTFL = 0) THEN
COPY       COPY FROM (SNODE                                 -
                      DISP=SHR                              -
                      DSN=&DSNEDI)                          -
                      COMPRESS EXTENDED                     -
                TO   (PNODE                                 -
                      DSN=&DSNMVS                           -
                      DCB=&DCBMVS                           -
                      SPACE=&SPACE                          -
                      UNIT=(SYSDA)                          -
                      DISP=&DISPMVS)
        IF (COPY = 0) THEN
RMVUP      RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                        -
           SYSOPTS=\"\                                      -
           \rm /XFER/gxsup/fmprod/* \                       -
           \"\
        IF (COPY = 0) THEN
RMVDATA    RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                        -
           SYSOPTS=\"\                                      -
           \rm /XFER/gxsdata/fmprod/gxsall.dat \            -
           \"\
        EIF
        EIF
        EIF
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  GXSFTPIT
/* USE THIS PROCESS TO RECEIVE DATA FROM FTP SERVER THAT GXS   */
/* HAS PUSHED DATA TO. (TEST VERSION)                          */
/* Process contains the following steps:                       */
/*                                                             */
/* MOVEFL - Moves all files from the '/gxsin' directory        */
/* (to gather all full files that GXS has pushed to our FTP    */
/* server thus allowing new data to be received) to the        */
/* '/gxsup' directory.                                         */
/*                                                             */
/* CUTFL - Files in the '/gxsup' directory are cut into 80     */
/* byte records (GXS sends data with a CR inserted after every */
/* 80 chars) and collected into a single file 'gxsall.dat' in  */
/* '/gxsdata' directory.                                       */
/*                                                             */
/* COPY -  Connect:Direct is used to pull the 'gxsall.dat'     */
/* file from the 'gxsdata' directory to the mainframe.         */
/*                                                             */
/* RMVUP - Clean up process, remove all files in the 'gxsup'   */
/* directory.                                                  */
/*                                                             */
/* RMVDATA - Clean up process, remove all files in the         */
/* 'gxsdata' directory.                                        */
/*                                                             */
GXSFTPI PROCESS HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10 SNODE=&SNODE
MOVEFL  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                           -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                         -
        \/bin/mv /XFER/gxsin/fmtest/* /XFER/gxsup/fmtest/  \ -
        \"\
        IF (MOVEFL = 0) THEN
CUTFL      RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                        -
           SYSOPTS=\"\                                      -
           \/bin/cut -c1-80 /XFER/gxsup/fmtest/* > \        -
           \   /XFER/gxsdata/fmtest/gxsall.dat \            -
           \"\
        IF (CUTFL = 0) THEN
COPY       COPY FROM (SNODE                                 -
                      DISP=SHR                              -
                      DSN=&DSNEDI)                          -
                      COMPRESS EXTENDED                     -
                TO   (PNODE                                 -
                      DSN=&DSNMVS                           -
                      DCB=&DCBMVS                           -
                      SPACE=&SPACE                          -
                      UNIT=(SYSDA)                          -
                      DISP=&DISPMVS)
        IF (COPY = 0) THEN
RMVUP      RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                        -
           SYSOPTS=\"\                                      -
           \rm /XFER/gxsup/fmtest/* \                       -
           \"\
        IF (COPY = 0) THEN
RMVDATA    RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                        -
           SYSOPTS=\"\                                      -
           \rm /XFER/gxsdata/fmtest/gxsall.dat \            -
           \"\
        EIF
        EIF
        EIF
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  GXSFTPO
/* Use this process to C:D GXS data that was extracted out of  */
/* C:E Remote id: GXSOB to FTP server in a binary format.      */
/*           (Production Version)                              */
/* Process contains the following steps:                       */
/*                                                             */
/* COPY1 - Connect:Direct GXS extracted data to 'gxs.dat'      */
/* file in the 'gxsout/fmprod' directory on the FTP server     */
/* in a binary format.                                         */
/*                                                             */
/* CONV2 - Convert 'gxs.dat' file to 'gxsconv.dat' ascii file  */
/* in 'gxsout/fmprod' directory.                               */
/*                                                             */
/* PUSH3 - FTP 'gxsconv.dat' ascii file to Production          */
/* mailslot at GXS.                                            */
/*                                                             */
GXSFTPO PROCESS HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10 SNODE=&SNODE
COPY1      COPY FROM (PNODE                                 -
                      DSN=&FRMDSN                           -
                      DISP=SHR)                             -
                      COMPRESS EXTENDED                     -
                TO   (SNODE                                 -
                      DSN=&TODSN                            -
      SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=BINARY:XLATE=NO:STRIP.BLANKS=NO:"  -
                      DISP=(RPL))
        IF (COPY1 = 0) THEN
CONV2      RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                        -
           SYSOPTS=\"\                                      -
         \dd if=/XFER/gxsout/fmprod/gxs.dat \               -
         \      of=/XFER/gxsout/fmprod/gxsconv.dat \        -
         \conv=ascii \                                      -
           \"\
        IF (CONV2 = 0) THEN
PUSH3      RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                        -
           SYSOPTS=\"\                                      -
           \ncftpput -E -V -u adw05074 -p awhw7xtp \        -
          \-d /XFER/log/956edi.gxsftpo.log 198.133.250.19 /send/ \ -
           \/XFER/gxsout/fmprod/gxsconv.dat\                -
           \"\
        EIF
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  GXSFTPOT
/* Use this process to C:D GXS data that was extracted out of  */
/* C:E Remote id: GXSOB to FTP server in a binary format.      */
/*           (Production Version)                              */
/* Process contains the following steps:                       */
/*                                                             */
/* COPY1 - Connect:Direct GXS extracted data to 'gxs.dat'      */
/* file in the 'gxsout/fmtest' directory on the FTP server     */
/* in a binary format.                                         */
/*                                                             */
/* CONV2 - Convert 'gxs.dat' file to 'gxsconv.dat' ascii file  */
/* in 'gxsout/fmtest' directory.                               */
/*                                                             */
/* PUSH3 - FTP 'gxsconv.dat' ascii file to Production          */
/* mailslot at GXS.                                            */
/*                                                             */
GXSFTPOT PROCESS HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10 SNODE=&SNODE
COPY1      COPY FROM (PNODE                                 -
                      DSN=&FRMDSN                           -
                      DISP=SHR)                             -
                      COMPRESS EXTENDED                     -
                TO   (SNODE                                 -
                      DSN=&TODSN                            -
      SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=BINARY:XLATE=NO:STRIP.BLANKS=NO:"  -
                      DISP=(RPL))
        IF (COPY1 = 0) THEN
CONV2      RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                        -
           SYSOPTS=\"\                                      -
         \dd if=/XFER/gxsout/fmtest/gxs.dat \               -
         \      of=/XFER/gxsout/fmtest/gxsconv.dat \        -
         \conv=ascii \                                      -
           \"\
        IF (CONV2 = 0) THEN
PUSH3      RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                        -
           SYSOPTS=\"\                                      -
           \ncftpput -E -V -u adw05098 -p zbbpr4je \        -
          \-d /XFER/log/956edi.gxsftpo.log 198.133.250.19 /send/ \ -
           \/XFER/gxsout/fmtest/gxsconv.dat\                -
           \"\
        EIF
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  HLBMID
HLBMID    PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=4 MAXDELAY=QUEUED
STEP1     RUN TASK(PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                    -
          SYSOPTS=&script1
 IF (STEP1=0) THEN
STEP2     COPY    FROM(      DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR)      -
                  TO  (      DSN=&DSN2 DISP=(&DISP1)) -
                  CKPT=100K   COMPRESS EXT
 EIF
 IF (STEP2=0) THEN
STEP3     RUN TASK(PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                  -
              SYSOPTS=&script2
 EIF
MEMBER NAME  HLBPOST
HLBPOST   PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=4 MAXDELAY=QUEUED
STEP1     COPY    FROM(      DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR)      -
                  TO  (      DSN=&DSN2 DISP=(&DISP1)) -
                  CKPT=100K   COMPRESS EXT
 EIF
 IF (STEP1=0) THEN
STEP2     RUN TASK(PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                  -
              SYSOPTS=&script1
 EIF
MEMBER NAME  HLBPRE
HLBPRE    PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=4 MAXDELAY=QUEUED
STEP1     RUN TASK(PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                    -
          SYSOPTS=&script1
 IF (STEP1=0) THEN
STEP2     COPY    FROM(      DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR)      -
                  TO  (      DSN=&DSN2 DISP=(&DISP1)) -
                  CKPT=100K   COMPRESS EXT
 EIF
MEMBER NAME  HLBPULL
HLBPULL   PROCESS PRTY=8 CLASS=4 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED   -
                         SNODE=FMSPT12 SNODEID=(cdunix,cdunix123)
STEP1     COPY    FROM(      DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR  SNODE)         -
                  TO  (      DSN=&DSN2 DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)  -
                                                        PNODE)  -
                             CKPT=0K      COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  IPCCDP1
IPCCDP1   PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=&WAITTIME
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                   UNIT=SYSDA) CKPT=0K                             -
                   COMPRESS EXT
/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND ANYWHERE */
/* WITH MAXIMUM COMPRESSION.                                   */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                    */
/*               PROC=IPCCDP1 SNODE=                           */
/*               &DELAY=MAXDELAY-WAIT-TIME (WAIT FOR RETURN CD)*/
/*                         -- USE 'QUEUED TO DEFAULT TO 30 MINS*/
/*                         -- OR USE 'UNLIMITED' TO GET THE    */
/*                            RC FOR THE SUBMIT PROCESS ONLY.  */
/*                         -- ELSE, USE HH:MM:SS FORMAT        */
/*               &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                             */
/*               &DSN2=OUTPUTDSNAME                            */
/*               &DISP1=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION1               */
/*               &DISP2=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION2               */
MEMBER NAME  IPCCDP2
IPCCDP2   PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=&WAITTIME  -
          SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops) SNODE=N701CD02
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))     -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
/*                                                               */
/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND A FILE     */
/* DOWN TO THE LAN.  FOR IP JOBS, WE USE IT TO SEND FILES TO     */
/* THE SQL SERVER BOX (SAME BOX FOR ESSBASE FILES).              */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                      */
/*               &DELAY=MAXDELAY-WAIT-TIME (WAIT FOR RETURN CD)  */
/*                         -- USE QUEUED TO DEFAULT TO 30 MINS   */
/*                         -- OR USE 'UNLIMITED' TO GET THE      */
/*                            RC FOR THE SUBMIT PROCESS ONLY.    */
/*                         -- ELSE, USE 'HH:MM:SS' FORMAT, WITH  */
/*                            SINGLE QUOTES.                     */
/*               &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                               */
/*               &DSN2=LAN FILE NAME STRING                      */
/*               &DISP1=OUTPUT DS DISPOSITION1                   */
MEMBER NAME  IPCCDP3
IPCCDP3   PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=&WAITTIME  -
          SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops) SNODE=N701CD02
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))     -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
/*                                                               */
/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND A FILE     */
/* DOWN TO THE LAN.  FOR IP JOBS, WE USE IT TO SEND FILES TO     */
/* THE SQL SERVER BOX (SAME BOX FOR ESSBASE FILES).              */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                      */
/*               &DELAY=MAXDELAY-WAIT-TIME (WAIT FOR RETURN CD)  */
/*                         -- USE QUEUED TO DEFAULT TO 30 MINS   */
/*                         -- OR USE 'UNLIMITED' TO GET THE      */
/*                            RC FOR THE SUBMIT PROCESS ONLY.    */
/*                         -- ELSE, USE 'HH:MM:SS' FORMAT, WITH  */
/*                            SINGLE QUOTES.                     */
/*               &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                               */
/*               &DSN2=LAN FILE NAME STRING                      */
/*               &DISP1=OUTPUT DS DISPOSITION1                   */
MEMBER NAME  IPCCDP5
IPCCDP5   PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=&WAITTIME  -
          SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops) SNODE=N701CD02
STEP1     COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR SNODE)                 -
                   TO  ( DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1) PNODE           -
                   DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=126))                        -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
/*                                                               */
/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND A FILE     */
/* from the lan to the mainframe.                                */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                      */
/*               &DELAY=MAXDELAY-WAIT-TIME (WAIT FOR RETURN CD)  */
/*                         -- USE QUEUED TO DEFAULT TO 30 MINS   */
/*                         -- OR USE 'UNLIMITED' TO GET THE      */
/*                            RC FOR THE SUBMIT PROCESS ONLY.    */
/*                         -- ELSE, USE 'HH:MM:SS' FORMAT, WITH  */
/*                            SINGLE QUOTES.                     */
/*               &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                               */
/*               &DSN2=LAN FILE NAME STRING                      */
/*               &DISP1=OUTPUT DS DISPOSITION1                   */
MEMBER NAME  IPCCDP5B
IPCCDP5   PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=&WAITTIME  -
          SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops) SNODE=N701CD02
STEP1     COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR SNODE)                 -
                   TO  ( DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1) PNODE           -
                   DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=90))                        -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
/*                                                               */
/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND A FILE     */
/* from the lan to the mainframe.                                */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                      */
/*               &DELAY=MAXDELAY-WAIT-TIME (WAIT FOR RETURN CD)  */
/*                         -- USE QUEUED TO DEFAULT TO 30 MINS   */
/*                         -- OR USE 'UNLIMITED' TO GET THE      */
/*                            RC FOR THE SUBMIT PROCESS ONLY.    */
/*                         -- ELSE, USE 'HH:MM:SS' FORMAT, WITH  */
/*                            SINGLE QUOTES.                     */
/*               &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                               */
/*               &DSN2=LAN FILE NAME STRING                      */
/*               &DISP1=OUTPUT DS DISPOSITION1                   */
MEMBER NAME  IPCCDP5D
IPCCDP5   PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=&WAITTIME  -
          SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops) SNODE=N701CD02
STEP1     COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR SNODE)                 -
                   TO  ( DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1) PNODE           -
                   DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=126))                        -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF (STEP1 NE 0) THEN
          EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     RUN TASK (PGM=WINNT) SNODE                        -
          SYSOPTS=&SYSOPT1
          EXIT
/*                                                               */
/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND A FILE     */

          SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops) SNODE=N701CD02

                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF (STEP1 NE 0) THEN
          EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     RUN TASK (PGM=WINNT) SNODE                 -
          SYSOPTS=&SYSOPT1
          EXIT
/*                                                               */
/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND A FILE     */
/* from the lan to the mainframe.                                */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                      */
/*               &DELAY=MAXDELAY-WAIT-TIME (WAIT FOR RETURN CD)  */
/*                         -- USE QUEUED TO DEFAULT TO 30 MINS   */
/*                         -- OR USE 'UNLIMITED' TO GET THE      */
/*                            RC FOR THE SUBMIT PROCESS ONLY.    */
/*                         -- ELSE, USE 'HH:MM:SS' FORMAT, WITH  */
/*                            SINGLE QUOTES.                     */
/*               &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                               */
/*               &DSN2=LAN FILE NAME STRING                      */
/*               &DISP1=OUTPUT DS DISPOSITION1                   */
/* step 2 will check return code before going to step 3          */
/* step 3 will run the process found in delcheck.bat that will   */
/*        delete the checkreg.txt file on the jewelry server.    */
MEMBER NAME  IPCCDP7
IPCCDP7   PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=&WAITTIME  -
          SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops) SNODE=N701CD02
STEP1     COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR SNODE)                 -
                   TO  ( DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1) PNODE           -
                   DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=&RECL))                     -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
/*                                                               */
/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND A FILE     */
/* from the lan to the mainframe.                                */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                      */
/*               &DELAY=MAXDELAY-WAIT-TIME (WAIT FOR RETURN CD)  */
/*                         -- USE QUEUED TO DEFAULT TO 30 MINS   */
/*                         -- OR USE 'UNLIMITED' TO GET THE      */
/*                            RC FOR THE SUBMIT PROCESS ONLY.    */
/*                         -- ELSE, USE 'HH:MM:SS' FORMAT, WITH  */
/*                            SINGLE QUOTES.                     */
/*               &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                               */
/*               &DSN2=LAN FILE NAME STRING                      */
/*               &DISP1=OUTPUT DS DISPOSITION1                   */
/*               &LRECL=LENGTH OF RECORD ON MAINFRAME.           */
MEMBER NAME  IPCCDP7A
IPCCDP7   PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=&WAITTIME  -
          SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops) SNODE=N701CD02
STEP1     COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR SNODE)                 -
                   TO  ( DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1) PNODE           -
                   DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=&RECL))                     -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF (STEP1 NE 0) THEN
          EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     RUN TASK (PGM=WINNT) SNODE                        -
          SYSOPTS= \'CMD(C:\\DATA\\CDNT\\FIN\\Test_DELaud.bat)'\
          EXIT

MEMBER NAME  IPC165W
IPC165W   PROCESS  PRTY=10                                         -
          NOTIFY=%USER                                             -
          CLASS=2                                                  -
          SNODE=N701CD02                                           -
          SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops)                              -
          MAXDELAY=QUEUED
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR SNODE)          -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1) PNODE      -
                   DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=316))                       -
                   CKPT=100K
STEP2     IF (STEP1 NE 0) THEN
          EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     RUN TASK (PGM=WINNT) SNODE                 -
          SYSOPTS=&SYSOPT1
          EXIT
MEMBER NAME  ITEMDEAL
ITEMDEAL  PROCESS NOTIFY=%USER,PRTY=12 CLASS=1 MAXDELAY=UNLIMITED
SENDITEM  COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                   UNIT=SYSDA) CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
CHECK1    IF (SENDITEM GT 0) THEN
                   EXIT
          EIF
SENDDEAL     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN3   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN4   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                   UNIT=SYSDA) CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
CHECK2    IF (SENDDEAL GT 0) THEN
                   EXIT
          EIF
RUNJOB1   RUN JOB (DSN=D911.CDBSQ.CNTL(CDB5010)) SNODE
/* THIS IS A SPECIAL TWO STEP PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND TO */
/* KROGER.IF RC=0 FOR THE FIRST COPY STEP THAN A SECOND COPY STEP */
/* IS SUBMITTED. IF RC=0 ON SECOND COPY THAN A JOB IS SUBMITTED   */
/* AT KROGER.                                                     */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                       */
/*                 PROC=ITEMDEAL SNODE=CDRM51                     */
/*                 &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                              */
/*                 &DSN2=OUTPUTDSNAME                             */
/*                 &DSN3=SECONDSTEPOUTPUTDSNAME                   */
/*                 &DSN4=SECONDSTEPOUTPUTDSNAME                   */
/*                 &DISP1=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION                 */
/*                 &DISP2=OUTPUTDSNAMEDISPOSITION                 */
MEMBER NAME  IVRPULL
IVRPULL  PROCESS PRTY=8 CLASS=4 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED    -
                         SNODE=N706CD01 SNODEID=(connect,direct)
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR SNODE)           -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                   SPACE=(154,(50,10),RLSE)                         -
                   DCB=(DSORG=PS,LRECL=154,RECFM=VB)                -
                   PNODE                                            -
                   UNIT=(,9))                                       -
                   CKPT=0K COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  JDADAILY
JDADAILY  PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=QUEUED     -
          SNODEID=(D060JDD1,d060jdd1) SNODE=u060jdd1
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
          EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN3   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN4   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  JDAJDD1
JDAJDD1   PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=QUEUED     -
          SNODEID=(D060JDD1,d060jdd1) SNODE=u060jdd1
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  JDAMAIL
JDAMAIL   PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=QUEUED     -
          SNODEID=(D060JDD1,d060jdd1) SNODE=u060jdd1
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2..dat DISP=(&DISP1))         -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
 IF (STEP1=0) THEN
STEP2     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                -
          SYSOPTS="chmod 766 &DSN2..dat"
 EIF
 IF (STEP1=0) THEN
STEP3     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                -
           SYSOPTS="touch &DSN2..flg"
 EIF
 IF (STEP3=0) THEN
STEP4     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                -
          SYSOPTS="chmod 777 &DSN2..flg"
 EIF
 IF (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
       RUN TASK(PGM = DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',TRANSFER.FAILED))   -
          PNODE
 EIF
MEMBER NAME  JDARMASD
JDARMASD  PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=QUEUED     -
          SNODEID=(D060JDD1,d060jdd1) SNODE=u060jdd1
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
          RUN TASK(PGM = DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',TRANSFER.FAILED)) -
           PNODE
          EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN3   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN4   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
STEP4     IF (STEP3 GT 0) THEN
          RUN TASK(PGM = DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',TRANSFER.FAILED)) -
           PNODE
          EXIT
          EIF
STEP5     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN5   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN6   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
STEP6     IF (STEP5 GT 0) THEN
          RUN TASK(PGM = DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',TRANSFER.FAILED)) -
           PNODE
          EXIT
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  JDASEND
JDASEND   PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=QUEUED     -
          SNODEID=(D060JDD1,d060jdd1) SNODE=u060jdd1
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -

                   TO  (      DSN=&FLAG   DISP=(&DISP1))            -

 EIF

                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
 IF (STEP1=0) THEN
STEP2     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                -
           SYSOPTS="touch /ConnectXFer/Magic/repos/&FLAG.flg"
 EIF
 IF (STEP2=0) THEN
STEP3     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                -
          SYSOPTS="chmod 777 /ConnectXFer/Magic/repos/&FLAG.flg"
 EIF
