KEC22001  PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=&WAITTIME  -
          SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops) SNODE=N701CD02
STEP1     COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR SNODE)                 -
                   TO  ( DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1) PNODE           -
                   DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=100))                        -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF (STEP1 NE 0) THEN
          EXIT
          EIF
/*                                                               */
/*        SYSOPTS=&SYSOPT1
/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND A FILE     */
/* from the lan to the mainframe.                                */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                      */
/*               &DELAY=MAXDELAY-WAIT-TIME (WAIT FOR RETURN CD)  */
/*                         -- USE QUEUED TO DEFAULT TO 30 MINS   */
/*                         -- OR USE 'UNLIMITED' TO GET THE      */
/*                            RC FOR THE SUBMIT PROCESS ONLY.    */
/*                         -- ELSE, USE 'HH:MM:SS' FORMAT, WITH  */
/*                            SINGLE QUOTES.                     */
/*               &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                               */
/*               &DSN2=LAN FILE NAME STRING                      */
/*               &DISP1=OUTPUT DS DISPOSITION1                   */
MEMBER NAME  KEC22401
MIC22401  PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=QUEUED     -
          SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops) SNODE=N701CD02
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(RPL))     -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  KEM45001
kem45001  PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=QUEUED     -
          SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops) SNODE=N701CD02
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(RPL))     -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  KRGJLYAP
KRGJLYAP  PROCESS PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=1 MAXDELAY=UNLIMITED
STEP1     COPY    FROM(      DSN=&DSN1  DISP=SHR)            -
                  TO  (      DSN=&DSN2  DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2) -
                  UNIT=SYSDA) CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  KROGERGL
KROGERGL  PROCESS PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=UNLIMITED
STEP1     COPY    FROM(      DSN=&DSN1  DISP=SHR)            -
                  TO  (      DSN=&DSN2  DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2) -
                  UNIT=SYSDA) CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT

                     DISP=(NEW))                                        00031020

                  ACTIONS                                               00033021

               EIF                                                      00036021

                         SNODE=N060CD03 SNODEID=(connect,direct)
STEP1     COPY    FROM(      DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR)                -
                  TO  (      DSN=&DSN2 DISP=(&DISP1)            -
                  SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(no)")                   -
                  COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF (STEP1 NE 0) THEN
          EXIT
          EIF
STEP3    RUN TASK  (PGM=WINNT) SNODE                                  -
   SYSOPTS=\'CMD(COPY \                                               -
          \\\\\n060entnas012\\isp04\\data\\701\\ecf\\magicctz.ecf\    -
         \\\\\n060entnas012\\isp04\\rws\\ecf\\magicctz.ecf)'\

         )) PNODE

                  TO  (      DSN=&DSN2 DISP=(&DISP1) -
                  SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(BINARY)")        -
                  CKPT=100M   COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  MB#ADD01
MB#ADD01  PROCESS  SNODE=NODE.NAME                                -
   NOTIFY=&NOTIFY                  /* OPERATOR TO NOTIFY       */ -
   &FROMDSN='''FROM.DSN.NAME'''    /* DATA SOURCE FILE NAME    */ -
   &FILETYP=TEXT                   /* DATA SOURCE FILE TYPE    */ -
   &PROFDSN='''PROF.DSN.NAME'''    /* EXTRACT PROFILE DSN      */ -
   &PROFMEM=MEMBER                 /* EXTRACT PROFILE MEMBER   */ -
   &USER=%USER                     /* ORIGINATOR ID            */ -
   &SEQ=%NUM1                      /* UNIQUE NUMBER            */ -
   &RMTID=RMTID                    /* C:E BATCH RMTID          */ -
   &MBNAME=MB01                    /* C:E NAME                 */ -
   &LOCAPPL=LOCAL001               /* C:E LOCAL APPLID         */ -
   &MBAPPL=MBOX0001                /* C:E APPLID               */ -
   &LOGMODE=LOGMODE1               /* C:E LOG MODE TABLE       */ -
   &USERID=USERID                  /* C:E USERID               */ -
   &PASSWRD=PASS                   /* C:E PASSWORD             */ -
   &BATCHID='''BATCH.ID'''         /* C:E BATCH ID             */ -
   &BATCHNO=0                      /* C:E BATCH NUMBER         */ -
   &BUFSIZE=0                      /* VTAM BUFFER SIZE         */
*
   SYMBOL  &SEQ1=\T\ || &SEQ
   SYMBOL  &ADSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.INFILE.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &IDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.SYSIN.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &PDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.SYSPRINT.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &LDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.LOGFILE.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &SDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.SNAPOUT.\ || &SEQ1
*
* COPY FILE FROM SOURCE NODE
*
MBA$COPY COPY   FROM(SNODE DSN=&FROMDSN   DISP=SHR)          -
                TO  (      DSN=&ADSN      DISP=(RPL,CATLG)   -
                                          TYPE=&FILETYP)
*
 IF (MBA$COPY > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(ADD,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&FROMDSN",                               -
                   &RMTID,                                   -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBA$COPY,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
   EXIT
 EIF
*
*
* CREATE THE TEMPORARY FILE FOR USE BY ADD
*
MBA$CREI RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
          C' DCB=(RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=800)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBA$CREI > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(ADD,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&FROMDSN",                               -
                   &RMTID,                                   -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBA$CREI,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
   GOTO MBA$DELA
 EIF
*
MBA$CREP RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
       C' DCB=(RECFM=FBA,DSORG=PS,LRECL=133,BLKSIZE=2660)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBA$CREP > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(ADD,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&FROMDSN",                               -
                   &RMTID,                                   -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBA$CREP,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
   GOTO MBA$DELI
 EIF
*
MBA$CREL RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
        C' DCB=(RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=196,BLKSIZE=1960)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBA$CREL > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(ADD,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&FROMDSN",                               -
                   &RMTID,                                   -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBA$CREL,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
   GOTO MBA$DELP
 EIF
*
*
MBA$CRES RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
        C' DCB=(RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=196,BLKSIZE=1960)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBA$CRES > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(ADD,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&FROMDSN",                               -
                   &RMTID,                                   -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBA$CRES,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
   GOTO MBA$DELL
 EIF
*
*
* EXECUTE THE ADD TO Connect:Enterprise OS/390
*
MBA$STO0 RUN TASK (PGM=DMSTOUT0,                             -
                   PARM=(C'ADD'                              -
                         C"&PROFDSN"                         -
                         C'&PROFMEM'                         -
                         C"&IDSN"                            -
                         C"&PDSN"                            -
                         C"&ADSN"                            -
                         C"&LDSN"                            -
                         C'&SDSN'                            -
                         C'&RMTID'                           -
                         C'&BATCHID'                         -
                         C'&BATCHNO'                         -
                         C'&MBNAME'                          -
                         C'&LOCAPPL'                         -
                         C'&MBAPPL'                          -
                         C'&LOGMODE'                         -
                         C'&USERID'                          -
                         C'&PASSWRD'                         -
                         C'&BUFSIZE')) PNODE
*
  IF (MBA$STO0 > 4) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(ADD,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&FROMDSN",                               -
                   &RMTID,                                   -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBA$STO0,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
  ELSE
*
*
* NOTIFY ORIGINATOR OF SUCCESS
*
    RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
              PARM=(ADD,                                      -
                    GOOD,                                     -
                    "&FROMDSN",                               -
                    &RMTID,                                   -
                    "&BATCHID",                               -
                    MBA$STO0,                                 -
                    &NOTIFY)) PNODE
  EIF
*
* DELETE TEMPORARY FILES
*
MBA$DELS RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN")) PNODE
*
MBA$DELL RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN")) PNODE
*
MBA$DELP RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN")) PNODE
*
MBA$DELI RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN")) PNODE
*
MBA$DELA RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&ADSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&ADSN")) PNODE
*

MEMBER NAME  MB#ADD02
MB#ADD02  PROCESS  SNODE=NODE.NAME                                -
   NOTIFY=&NOTIFY                  /* OPERATOR TO NOTIFY       */ -
   &FROMDSN='''FROM.DSN.NAME'''    /* DATA SOURCE FILE NAME    */ -
   &FILETYP=TEXT                   /* DATA SOURCE FILE TYPE    */ -
   &PROFDSN='''PROF.DSN.NAME'''    /* EXTRACT PROFILE DSN      */ -
   &PROFMEM=MEMBER                 /* EXTRACT PROFILE MEMBER   */ -
   &USER=%USER                     /* ORIGINATOR ID            */ -
   &SEQ=%NUM1                      /* UNIQUE NUMBER            */ -
   &RMTID=RMTID                    /* C:E BATCH RMTID          */ -
   &MBNAME=MB01                    /* C:E NAME                 */ -
   &LOCAPPL=LOCAL001               /* C:E LOCAL APPLID         */ -
   &MBAPPL=MBOX0001                /* C:E APPLID               */ -
   &LOGMODE=LOGMODE1               /* C:E LOG MODE TABLE       */ -
   &USERID=USERID                  /* C:E USERID               */ -
   &PASSWRD=PASS                   /* C:E PASSWORD             */ -
   &CNFMFIL='''CONFIRM.FILE'''     /* CONFIRM FILE NAME        */ -
   &BATCHID='''BATCH.ID'''         /* C:E BATCH ID             */ -
   &BATCHNO=0                      /* C:E BATCH NUMBER         */ -
   &BUFSIZE=0                      /* VTAM BUFFER SIZE         */
*
   SYMBOL  &SEQ1=\T\ || &SEQ
   SYMBOL  &ADSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.INFILE.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &IDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.SYSIN.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &PDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.SYSPRINT.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &LDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.LOGFILE.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &SDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.SNAPOUT.\ || &SEQ1
*
* COPY FILE FROM SOURCE NODE
*
MBA$COPY COPY   FROM(SNODE DSN=&FROMDSN   DISP=SHR)          -
                TO  (      DSN=&ADSN      DISP=(RPL,CATLG)   -
                                          TYPE=&FILETYP)
*
 IF (MBA$COPY > 0) THEN
   EXIT
 EIF
*
*
* CREATE THE TEMPORARY FILE FOR USE BY ADD
*
MBA$CREI RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
          C' DCB=(RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=800)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBA$CREI > 0) THEN
   GOTO MBA$DELA
 EIF
*
MBA$CREP RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
       C' DCB=(RECFM=FBA,DSORG=PS,LRECL=133,BLKSIZE=2660)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBA$CREP > 0) THEN
   GOTO MBA$DELI
 EIF
*
MBA$CREL RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
        C' DCB=(RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=196,BLKSIZE=1960)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBA$CREL > 0) THEN
   GOTO MBA$DELP
 EIF
*
*
MBA$CRES RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
        C' DCB=(RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=196,BLKSIZE=1960)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBA$CRES > 0) THEN
   GOTO MBA$DELL
 EIF
*
*
* EXECUTE THE ADD TO Connect:Enterprise OS/390
*
MBA$STO0 RUN TASK (PGM=DMSTOUT0,                             -
                   PARM=(C'ADD'                              -
                         C"&PROFDSN"                         -
                         C'&PROFMEM'                         -
                         C"&IDSN"                            -
                         C"&PDSN"                            -
                         C"&ADSN"                            -
                         C"&LDSN"                            -
                         C'&SDSN'                            -
                         C'&RMTID'                           -
                         C'&BATCHID'                         -
                         C'&BATCHNO'                         -
                         C'&MBNAME'                          -
                         C'&LOCAPPL'                         -
                         C'&MBAPPL'                          -
                         C'&LOGMODE'                         -
                         C'&USERID'                          -
                         C'&PASSWRD'                         -
                         C'&BUFSIZE')) PNODE
*
* NOTIFY ORIGINATOR OF STATUS BY COPYING SYSPRINT FILE
*
MBA$CNFM COPY   FROM(      DSN=&PDSN      DISP=SHR)          -
                TO  (SNODE DSN=&CNFMFIL   DISP=(RPL,CATLG))
*
*
*
* DELETE TEMPORARY FILES
*
MBA$DELS RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN")) PNODE
*
MBA$DELL RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN")) PNODE
*
MBA$DELP RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN")) PNODE
*
MBA$DELI RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN")) PNODE
*
MBA$DELA RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&ADSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&ADSN")) PNODE
*

MEMBER NAME  MB#EXT01
MB$EXT01  PROCESS  SNODE=LOCAL     /* COPY DESTINATION         */ -
   NOTIFY=&NOTIFY                  /* OPERATOR TO NOTIFY       */ -
   &TODSN='''TO.DSN.NAME'''        /* DESTINATION FILE NAME    */ -
   &FILETYP=TEXT                   /* DESTINATION FILE TYPE    */ -
   &PROFDSN='''PROF.DSN.NAME'''    /* EXTRACT PROFILE DSN      */ -
   &PROFMEM=MEMBER                 /* EXTRACT PROFILE MEMBER   */ -
   &USER=%USER                     /* ORIGINATOR ID            */ -
   &SEQ=%NUM1                      /* UNIQUE NUMBER            */ -
   &RMTID=RMTID                    /* C:E BATCH RMTID          */ -
   &MBNAME=MB01                    /* C:E NAME                 */ -
   &LOCAPPL=LOCAL001               /* C:E LOCAL APPLID         */ -
   &MBAPPL=MBOX0001                /* C:E APPLID               */ -
   &LOGMODE=LOGMODE1               /* C:E LOG MODE TABLE       */ -
   &USERID=USERID                  /* C:E USERID               */ -
   &PASSWRD=PASS                   /* C:E PASSWORD             */ -
   &BATCHID='''BATCH.ID'''         /* C:E BATCH ID             */ -
   &BATCHNO=0                      /* C:E BATCH NUMBER         */ -
   &BUFSIZE=0                      /* VTAM BUFFER SIZE         */
*
   SYMBOL  &SEQ1=\T\ || &SEQ
   SYMBOL  &ODSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.OUTFILE.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &IDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.SYSIN.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &PDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.SYSPRINT.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &LDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.LOGFILE.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &SDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.SNAPOUT.\ || &SEQ1
*
*
* CREATE THE TEMPORARY FILES FOR USE BY EXTRACT
*
MBE$CREI RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
          C' DCB=(RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=800)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBE$CREI > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(EXT,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&TODSN",                                 -
                   &RMTID,                                   -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBE$CREI,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
   EXIT
 EIF
*
MBE$CREP RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
       C' DCB=(RECFM=FBA,DSORG=PS,LRECL=133,BLKSIZE=2660)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBE$CREP > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(EXT,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&TODSN",                                 -
                   &RMTID,                                   -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBE$CREP,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
   GOTO MBE$DELI
 EIF
*
MBE$CREL RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
        C' DCB=(RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=196,BLKSIZE=1960)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBE$CREL > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(EXT,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&TODSN",                                 -
                   &RMTID,                                   -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBE$CREL,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
   GOTO MBE$DELP
 EIF
*
MBE$CRES RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
        C' DCB=(RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=196,BLKSIZE=1960)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBE$CRES > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(EXT,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&TODSN",                                 -
                   &RMTID,                                   -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBE$CRES,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
   GOTO MBE$DELL
 EIF
*
MBE$CREO RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&ODSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(2,20))',             -
        C' DCB=(RECFM=VB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=255,BLKSIZE=3200)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&ODSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBE$CREO > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(EXT,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&TODSN",                                 -
                   &RMTID,                                   -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBE$CREO,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
   GOTO MBE$DELS
 EIF
*
*
* EXECUTE THE EXTRACT FROM Connect:Enterprise OS/390
*
MBE$STO0 RUN TASK (PGM=DMSTOUT0,                             -
                   PARM=(C'EXT',                             -
                         C"&PROFDSN"                         -
                         C'&PROFMEM'                         -
                         C"&IDSN"                            -
                         C"&PDSN"                            -
                         C"&ODSN"                            -
                         C"&LDSN"                            -
                         C'&SDSN'                            -
                         C'&RMTID'                           -
                         C'&BATCHID'                         -
                         C'&BATCHNO'                         -
                         C'&MBNAME'                          -
                         C'&LOCAPPL'                         -
                         C'&MBAPPL'                          -
                         C'&LOGMODE'                         -
                         C'&USERID'                          -
                         C'&PASSWRD'                         -
                         C'&BUFSIZE')) PNODE
*
 IF (MBE$STO0 > 4) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(EXT,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&TODSN",                                 -
                   &RMTID,                                   -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBE$STO0,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
 ELSE
*
*
* COPY FILE TO DESTINATION NODE
*
MBE$COPY COPY   FROM(PNODE DSN=&ODSN      DISP=SHR)          -
                TO  (      DSN=&TODSN     DISP=(RPL,CATLG)   -
                                          TYPE=&FILETYP)
*
  IF (MBE$COPY > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(EXT,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&TODSN",                                 -
                   &RMTID,                                   -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBE$COPY,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
  ELSE
*
*
* NOTIFY ORIGINATOR OF SUCCESS
*
MBE$GOOD RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                             -
                   PARM=(EXT,                                -
                         GOOD,                               -
                         "&TODSN",                           -
                         &RMTID,                             -
                         "&BATCHID",                         -
                         MBE$COPY,                           -
                         &NOTIFY)) PNODE
  EIF
 EIF
*
*
* DELETE TEMPORARY FILES
*
MBE$DELO RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&ODSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&ODSN")) PNODE
*
MBE$DELS RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN")) PNODE
*
MBE$DELL RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN")) PNODE
*
MBE$DELP RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN")) PNODE
*
MBE$DELI RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN")) PNODE
*

MEMBER NAME  MB#EXT02
MB$EXT02  PROCESS  SNODE=LOCAL     /* COPY DESTINATION         */ -
   NOTIFY=&NOTIFY                  /* OPERATOR TO NOTIFY       */ -
   &TODSN='''TO.DSN.NAME'''        /* DESTINATION FILE NAME    */ -
   &FILETYP=TEXT                   /* DESTINATION FILE TYPE    */ -
   &PROFDSN='''PROF.DSN.NAME'''    /* EXTRACT PROFILE DSN      */ -
   &PROFMEM=MEMBER                 /* EXTRACT PROFILE MEMBER   */ -
   &USER=%USER                     /* ORIGINATOR ID            */ -
   &SEQ=%NUM1                      /* UNIQUE NUMBER            */ -
   &RMTID=RMTID                    /* C:E BATCH RMTID          */ -
   &MBNAME=MB01                    /* C:E NAME                 */ -
   &LOCAPPL=LOCAL001               /* C:E LOCAL APPLID         */ -
   &MBAPPL=MBOX0001                /* C:E APPLID               */ -
   &LOGMODE=LOGMODE1               /* C:E LOG MODE TABLE       */ -
   &USERID=USERID                  /* C:E USERID               */ -
   &PASSWRD=PASS                   /* C:E PASSWORD             */ -
   &CNFMFIL='''CONFIRM.FILE'''     /* CONFIRM FILE NAME        */ -
   &BATCHID='''BATCH.ID'''         /* C:E BATCH ID             */ -
   &BATCHNO=0                      /* C:E BATCH NUMBER         */ -
   &BUFSIZE=0                      /* VTAM BUFFER SIZE         */
*
   SYMBOL  &SEQ1=\T\ || &SEQ
   SYMBOL  &ODSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.OUTFILE.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &IDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.SYSIN.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &PDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.SYSPRINT.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &LDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.LOGFILE.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &SDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.SNAPOUT.\ || &SEQ1
*
*
* CREATE THE TEMPORARY FILES FOR USE BY EXTRACT
*
MBE$CREI RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
          C' DCB=(RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=800)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBE$CREI > 0) THEN
   EXIT
 EIF
*
MBE$CREP RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
       C' DCB=(RECFM=FBA,DSORG=PS,LRECL=133,BLKSIZE=2660)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBE$CREP > 0) THEN
   GOTO MBE$DELI
 EIF
*
MBE$CREL RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
        C' DCB=(RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=196,BLKSIZE=1960)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBE$CREL > 0) THEN
   GOTO MBE$DELP
 EIF
*
MBE$CRES RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
        C' DCB=(RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=196,BLKSIZE=1960)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBE$CRES > 0) THEN
   GOTO MBE$DELL
 EIF
*
MBE$CREO RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&ODSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(2,20))',             -
        C' DCB=(RECFM=VB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=255,BLKSIZE=3200)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&ODSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBE$CREO > 0) THEN
   GOTO MBE$DELS
 EIF
*
*
* EXECUTE THE EXTRACT FROM Connect:Enterprise OS/390
*
MBE$STO0 RUN TASK (PGM=DMSTOUT0,                             -
                   PARM=(C'EXT',                             -
                         C"&PROFDSN"                         -
                         C'&PROFMEM'                         -
                         C"&IDSN"                            -
                         C"&PDSN"                            -
                         C"&ODSN"                            -
                         C"&LDSN"                            -
                         C'&SDSN'                            -
                         C'&RMTID'                           -
                         C'&BATCHID'                         -
                         C'&BATCHNO'                         -
                         C'&MBNAME'                          -
                         C'&LOCAPPL'                         -
                         C'&MBAPPL'                          -
                         C'&LOGMODE'                         -
                         C'&USERID'                          -
                         C'&PASSWRD'                         -
                         C'&BUFSIZE')) PNODE
*
 IF (MBE$STO0 > 4) THEN
   GOTO MBE$CNFM
 EIF
*
*
* COPY FILE TO DESTINATION NODE
*
MBE$COPY COPY   FROM(PNODE DSN=&ODSN      DISP=SHR)          -
                TO  (      DSN=&TODSN     DISP=(RPL,CATLG)   -
                                          TYPE=&FILETYP)
*
*
* NOTIFY ORIGINATOR OF STATUS BY COPYING SYSPRINT FILE
*
MBE$CNFM COPY   FROM(      DSN=&PDSN      DISP=SHR)          -
                TO  (SNODE DSN=&CNFMFIL   DISP=(RPL,CATLG))
*
*
*
* DELETE TEMPORARY FILES
*
MBE$DELO RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&ODSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&ODSN")) PNODE
*
MBE$DELS RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN")) PNODE
*
MBE$DELL RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN")) PNODE
*
MBE$DELP RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN")) PNODE
*
MBE$DELI RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN")) PNODE
*

MEMBER NAME  MB#LIS01
MB#LIS01  PROCESS  SNODE=NODE.NAME                                -
   NOTIFY=&NOTIFY                  /* OPERATOR TO NOTIFY       */ -
   &PROFDSN='''PROF.DSN.NAME'''    /* EXTRACT PROFILE DSN      */ -
   &PROFMEM=MEMBER                 /* EXTRACT PROFILE MEMBER   */ -
   &USER=%USER                     /* ORIGINATOR ID            */ -
   &SEQ=%NUM1                      /* UNIQUE NUMBER            */ -
   &RMTID=RMTID                    /* C:E BATCH RMTID          */ -
   &MBNAME=MB01                    /* C:E NAME                 */ -
   &LOCAPPL=LOCAL001               /* C:E LOCAL APPLID         */ -
   &MBAPPL=MBOX0001                /* C:E APPLID               */ -
   &LOGMODE=LOGMODE1               /* C:E LOG MODE TABLE       */ -
   &USERID=USERID                  /* C:E USERID               */ -
   &PASSWRD=PASS                   /* C:E PASSWORD             */ -
   &CNFMFIL='''CONFIRM.FILE'''     /* CONFIRM FILE NAME        */ -
   &BATCHID='''BATCH.ID'''         /* C:E BATCH ID             */ -
   &BATCHNO=0                      /* C:E BATCH NUMBER         */ -
   &BUFSIZE=0                      /* VTAM BUFFER SIZE         */
*
   SYMBOL  &SEQ1=\T\ || &SEQ
   SYMBOL  &ADSN=NULLFILE
   SYMBOL  &IDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.SYSIN.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &PDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.SYSPRINT.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &LDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.LOGFILE.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &SDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.SNAPOUT.\ || &SEQ1
*
* CREATE THE TEMPORARY FILE FOR USE BY LIS
*
MBL$CREI RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
          C' DCB=(RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=800)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBL$CREI > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(LIS,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&RMTID",                                 -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBL$CREI,                                 -
                   &BATCHNO,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
   EXIT
 EIF
*
MBL$CREP RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
       C' DCB=(RECFM=FBA,DSORG=PS,LRECL=133,BLKSIZE=2660)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBL$CREP > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(LIS,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&RMTID",                                 -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBL$CREP,                                 -
                   &BATCHNO,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
  GOTO MBL$DELI
 EIF
*
MBL$CREL RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
        C' DCB=(RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=196,BLKSIZE=1960)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBL$CREL > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(LIS,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&RMTID",                                 -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBL$CREL,                                 -
                   &BATCHNO,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
  GOTO MBL$DELP
 EIF
*
MBL$CRES RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
        C' DCB=(RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=196,BLKSIZE=1960)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBL$CRES > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(LIS,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&RMTID",                                 -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBL$CRES,                                 -
                   &BATCHNO,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
  GOTO MBL$DELL
 EIF
*
* EXECUTE THE LIS TO Connect:Enterprise OS/390
*
MBL$STO0 RUN TASK (PGM=DMSTOUT0,                             -
                   PARM=(C'LIS'                              -
                         C"&PROFDSN"                         -
                         C'&PROFMEM'                         -
                         C"&IDSN"                            -
                         C"&PDSN"                            -
                         C"&ADSN"                            -
                         C"&LDSN"                            -
                         C'&SDSN'                            -
                         C'&RMTID'                           -
                         C'&BATCHID'                         -
                         C'&BATCHNO'                         -
                         C'&MBNAME'                          -
                         C'&LOCAPPL'                         -
                         C'&MBAPPL'                          -
                         C'&LOGMODE'                         -
                         C'&USERID'                          -
                         C'&PASSWRD'                         -
                         C'&BUFSIZE')) PNODE
*
  IF (MBL$STO0 > 4) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(LIS,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&RMTID",                                 -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBL$STO0,                                 -
                   &BATCHNO,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
  ELSE
*
*
* NOTIFY ORIGINATOR OF SUCCESS
*
    RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
              PARM=(LIS,                                      -
                    GOOD,                                     -
                   "&RMTID",                                 -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                    MBL$STO0,                                 -
                   &BATCHNO,                                 -
                    &NOTIFY)) PNODE
  EIF
*
* NOTIFY ORIGINATOR OF STATUS BY COPYING SYSPRINT FILE
*
MBA$CNFM COPY   FROM(      DSN=&PDSN      DISP=SHR)          -
                TO  (SNODE DSN=&CNFMFIL   DISP=(RPL,CATLG))
*
* DELETE TEMPORARY FILES
*
MBL$DELS RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN")) PNODE
*
MBL$DELL RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN")) PNODE
*
MBL$DELP RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN")) PNODE
*
MBL$DELI RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN")) PNODE
*

MEMBER NAME  MB#STA01
MB#STA01  PROCESS  SNODE=NODE.NAME                                -
   NOTIFY=&NOTIFY                  /* OPERATOR TO NOTIFY       */ -
   &PROFDSN='''PROF.DSN.NAME'''    /* EXTRACT PROFILE DSN      */ -
   &PROFMEM=MEMBER                 /* EXTRACT PROFILE MEMBER   */ -
   &USER=%USER                     /* ORIGINATOR ID            */ -
   &SEQ=%NUM1                      /* UNIQUE NUMBER            */ -
   &RMTID=RMTID                    /* C:E BATCH RMTID          */ -
   &MBNAME=MB01                    /* C:E NAME                 */ -
   &LOCAPPL=LOCAL001               /* C:E LOCAL APPLID         */ -
   &MBAPPL=MBOX0001                /* C:E APPLID               */ -
   &LOGMODE=LOGMODE1               /* C:E LOG MODE TABLE       */ -
   &USERID=USERID                  /* C:E USERID               */ -
   &PASSWRD=PASS                   /* C:E PASSWORD             */ -
   &CNFMFIL='''CONFIRM.FILE'''     /* CONFIRM FILE NAME        */ -
   &BATCHID='''BATCH.ID'''         /* C:E BATCH ID             */ -
   &BATCHNO=0                      /* C:E BATCH NUMBER         */ -
   &BUFSIZE=0                      /* VTAM BUFFER SIZE         */ -
   &OFFFLAGS=OFFFLAGS              /* C:E TURN OFF FLAGS       */ -
   &ONFLAGS=ONFLAGS                /* C:E TURN ON FLAGS        */
*
   SYMBOL  &SEQ1=\T\ || &SEQ
   SYMBOL  &ADSN=NULLFILE
   SYMBOL  &IDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.SYSIN.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &PDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.SYSPRINT.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &LDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.LOGFILE.\ || &SEQ1
   SYMBOL  &SDSN=\&USER\ || \.STOUT0.SNAPOUT.\ || &SEQ1
*
* CREATE THE TEMPORARY SYSIN FILE FOR USE BY STA
*
MBS$CREI RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
          C' DCB=(RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=800)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBS$CREI > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(STA,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&RMTID",                                 -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBS$CREI,                                 -
                   &BATCHNO,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
   EXIT
 EIF
*
* CREATE THE TEMPORARY SYSPRINT FILE FOR USE BY STA
*
MBS$CREP RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
       C' DCB=(RECFM=FBA,DSORG=PS,LRECL=133,BLKSIZE=2660)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBS$CREP > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(STA,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&RMTID",                                 -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBS$CREP,                                 -
                   &BATCHNO,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
   GOTO MBS$DELI
 EIF
*
* CREATE THE TEMPORARY LOG FIE FOR USE BY STA
*
MBS$CREL RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
        C' DCB=(RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=196,BLKSIZE=1960)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBS$CREL > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(STA,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&RMTID",                                 -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBS$CREL,                                 -
                   &BATCHNO,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
   GOTO MBS$DELP
 EIF
*
* CREATE THE TEMPORARY SNAPOUT FIE FOR USE BY STA
*
MBS$CRES RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(NEW,CATLG)',               -
                         C' SPACE=(TRK,(1,1))',              -
        C' DCB=(RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS,LRECL=196,BLKSIZE=1960)',  -
                         C'UNIT=SYSDA',                      -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN")) PNODE
*
 IF (MBS$CRES > 0) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(STA,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&RMTID",                                 -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBS$CRES,                                 -
                   &BATCHNO,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
   GOTO MBS$DELL
 EIF
*
*
* EXECUTE STATFLAG change TO Connect:Enterprise OS/390
*
MBS$STO0 RUN TASK (PGM=DMSTOUT0,                             -
                   PARM=(C'STA',                             -
                         C"&PROFDSN",                        -
                         C'&PROFMEM',                        -
                         C"&IDSN",                           -
                         C"&PDSN",                           -
                         C"&ADSN",                           -
                         C"&LDSN",                           -
                         C'&SDSN',                           -
                         C'&RMTID',                          -
                         C'&BATCHID',                        -
                         C'&BATCHNO',                        -
                         C'&MBNAME',                         -
                         C'&LOCAPPL',                        -
                         C'&MBAPPL',                         -
                         C'&LOGMODE',                        -
                         C'&USERID',                         -
                         C'&PASSWRD',                        -
                         C'&BUFSIZE',                        -
                         C'&ONFLAGS',                        -
                         C'&OFFFLAGS')) PNODE
*
  IF (MBS$STO0 > 4) THEN
   RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
             PARM=(STA,                                      -
                   FAIL,                                     -
                   "&RMTID",                                 -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                   MBS$STO0,                                 -
                   &BATCHNO,                                 -
                   &NOTIFY)) PNODE
  ELSE
*
*
* NOTIFY ORIGINATOR OF SUCCESS
*
    RUN TASK (PGM=DMIONOTE,                                   -
              PARM=(STA,                                      -
                    GOOD,                                     -
                   "&RMTID",                                 -
                   "&BATCHID",                               -
                    MBS$STO0,                                 -
                   &BATCHNO,                                 -
                    &NOTIFY)) PNODE
  EIF
*
* NOTIFY ORIGINATOR OF STATUS BY COPYING SYSPRINT FILE
*
MBA$CNFM COPY   FROM(      DSN=&PDSN      DISP=SHR)          -
                TO  (SNODE DSN=&CNFMFIL   DISP=(RPL,CATLG))
*
*
* DELETE TEMPORARY FILES
*
MBS$DELS RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&SDSN")) PNODE
*
MBS$DELL RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&LDSN")) PNODE
*
MBS$DELP RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&PDSN")) PNODE
*
MBS$DELI RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTDYN                               -
                   PARM=(C'ALLOC',                           -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN"                       -
                         C' DISP=(OLD,DELETE)',              -
                         F'-1',                              -
                         C'UNALLOC',                         -
                         C" DSN=&IDSN")) PNODE
*

MEMBER NAME  MDSCOPY
/* **************************************************************** */
/* Step 1 sends the Kroger file to the mainframe                    */
/* **************************************************************** */
MDSCOPY   PROCESS PRTY=10 CLASS=1 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED   -
                          SNODE=U060FTP1
STEP1  COPY FROM(file=/XFER/fmmdsin/KROMDS.FMY    -
                    SNODE)                        -
        TO  (DSN=&DSN2                            -
             DISP=(&DISP2)  PNODE                 -
             DCB=(RECFM=&RECFM,LRECL=&LRECL,BLKSIZE=&BLKS))  -
                CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  MDSCOPY2
/* **************************************************************** */
/* This will pull a file from MDS inventory services.               */
/*    Secure shell transfer is used to encrypt the file during xfer */
/* Step 1 pulls the MDS inventory services to Kroger FTP server.    */
/*    The file is removed in MDS if xfer is ok.                     */
/* Step 2 sends the Kroger file to the mainframe                    */
/* Step 3 removes the file on the FTP machine                       */
/* **************************************************************** */
MDSCOPY2  PROCESS PRTY=10 CLASS=1 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED   -
                          SNODE=U060FTP1
STEP1  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                          -
       SYSOPTS=\"\                                        -
       \scp -v -Q -u fredmeyer@64.56.119.208:OUTBOUNDMDSTEST.txt\ -
       \/XFER/fmmdsin/KROMDS.FMY \                        -
        \>/XFER/log/mdsin701.log 2>&1 \                   -
               \"\
      IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
STEP2  COPY FROM(file=/XFER/fmmdsin/KROMDS.FMY    -
                    SNODE)                        -
        TO  (DSN=&DSN2                            -
             DISP=(&DISP2)  PNODE                 -
             DCB=(RECFM=&RECFM,LRECL=&LRECL,BLKSIZE=&BLKS))  -
                CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
    EIF
    IF (STEP2 = 0) THEN
STEP3  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                -
       SYSOPTS=\"\                              -
       \mv /XFER/fmmdsin/KROMDS.FMY /XFER/fmmdsin/MDSKRO.TXT \ -
               \"\
    EIF
MEMBER NAME  MDSCOPY3
/* **************************************************************** */
/* This will pull a file from MDS inventory services.               */
/*    Secure shell transfer is used to encrypt the file during xfer */
/* Step 1 pulls the MDS inventory services to Kroger FTP server.    */
/*    The file is removed in MDS if xfer is ok.                     */
/* Step 2 sends the Kroger file to the mainframe                    */
/* Step 3   moves the Kroger file to a backup                       */
/* **************************************************************** */
MDSCOPY3  PROCESS PRTY=10 CLASS=1 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED     -
                          SNODE=U060FTP1
STEP1  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                   -
       SYSOPTS=\"\                                                 -
       \scp -v -Q -u fredmeyer@64.56.119.208:OUTBOUNDMDSTEST.txt \ -
       \/XFER/mdsin/KRO005.txt \                                  -
       \>/XFER/log/mdsout701.log 2>&1 \                            -
               \"\
    IF (STEP1 =0) THEN
STEP2  COPY FROM(SNODE file=/XFER/mdsin/KRO005.txt DISP=SHR)     -
            TO  (PNODE DSN=&DSN2 DISP=&DISP2                      -
                 DCB=(RECFM=&RECFM,LRECL=&LRECL))                 -
               CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
    IF (STEP2 =0) THEN
STEP3  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                   -
       SYSOPTS=\"\                                                 -
       \/bin/mv /XFER/mdsin/KRO005.txt /XFER/mdsin/FMYBK1.txt \    -
       =\"\                                                        -
    EIF
    EIF
MEMBER NAME  MDSCOPY4
/* **************************************************************** */
/* This will send a file to MDS inventory services via Kroger FTP   */
/*    server. Secure shell transfer is used to encrypt the file     */
/*    during xfer to the services.                                  */
/* Step 1 sends the mainframe file to Kroger FTP server.            */
/* Step 2 sends the Kroger file to inventory services               */
/*    The file is removed on the FTP server if job completes        */
/*    successfully (code is -u in secure shell)                     */
/* **************************************************************** */
MDSCOPY4  PROCESS PRTY=10 CLASS=1 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED  -
                          SNODE=U060FTP1
STEP1  COPY  FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR)                     -
             TO  (SNODE file=/XFER/mdsin/KRO005.FMY DISP=(rpl)) -
             CKPT=00K COMPRESS EXT
    IF (STEP1 =0) THEN
STEP2  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                -
          SYSOPTS=\"\                                           -
         \scp -v -Q -u /XFER/mdsin/KRO005.FMY \                 -
         \fredmeyer@64.56.119.208:OUTBOUNDMDSTEST.txt \         -
           \>/XFER/log/mdsin701.log 2>&1 \                      -
               \"\
    EIF
MEMBER NAME  MDSCOPY6
/* **************************************************************** */
/* This will remove the log file on the ftp server.               */
/* **************************************************************** */
MDSCOPY6  PROCESS PRTY=10 CLASS=1 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED   -
                          SNODE=U060FTP1
STEP1  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                -
       SYSOPTS=\"\                              -
       \rm /XFER/log/mdsin701MV.log \           -
               \"\
MEMBER NAME  MDSCOPY7
/* **************************************************************** */
/* This will pull the file from MDS without removing it -(used for  */
/*    testing.)                                                     */
/* **************************************************************** */
MDSCOPY7  PROCESS PRTY=10 CLASS=1 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=01:15:00 -
                          SNODE=U060FTP1
STEP2  COPY FROM(file=/XFER/fmmdsin/KROMDS.FMY    -
                    SNODE)                        -
        TO  (DSN=&DSN2                            -
             DISP=(&DISP2)  PNODE                 -
             DCB=(RECFM=&RECFM,LRECL=&LRECL,BLKSIZE=&BLKS))  -
                CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT

MEMBER NAME  MDSCOPY8
/* **************************************************************** */
/* This will pull a file from MDS inventory services.               */
/*    Secure shell transfer is used to encrypt the file during xfer */
/* Step 1 pulls the MDS inventory services to Kroger FTP server.    */
/*    The file is removed in MDS if xfer is ok. (See log on FTP)    */
/* Step 2 sends the Kroger FTP file to the mainframe                */
/* Step 3 moves the file on the FTP machine and overlays the        */
/*      data from the last good run. (move is destructive)          */
/* **************************************************************** */
MDSCOPY8  PROCESS PRTY=10 CLASS=1 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=01:15:00 -
                          SNODE=U060FTP1
STEP1  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                 -
       SYSOPTS=\"\                                               -
       \scp -v -Q -u fredmeyer@64.56.119.208:MDSKRO \            -
       \/XFER/fmmdsin/KROMDS.FMY \                               -
        \>/XFER/log/mdsin701.log 2>&1 \                          -
               \"\
      IF (STEP1 < 1) THEN
STEP2  COPY FROM(file=/XFER/fmmdsin/KROMDS.FMY    -
                    SNODE)                        -
        TO  (DSN=&DSN2                            -
             DISP=(&DISP2)  PNODE                 -
             DCB=(RECFM=&RECFM,LRECL=&LRECL,BLKSIZE=&BLKS))  -
                CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
    EIF
    IF (STEP2 < 1) THEN
STEP3  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                -
       SYSOPTS=\"\                              -
       \mv /XFER/fmmdsin/KROMDS.FMY /XFER/fmmdsin/MDSKRO.TXT \ -
               \"\
    EIF
MEMBER NAME  MDSDWN1
MDSDWN1  PROCESS PRTY=10 CLASS=1 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED   -
                          SNODE=U060FTP1
STEP1  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                 -
          SYSOPTS=\"\                                            -
       \scp -v -Q  fredmeyer@64.56.119.208:INBOUNDMDSTEST.TXT \  -
        \/XFER/mdsin/KROFM701.txt \                              -
        \>/XFER/log/mdsup701.log 2>&1 \                          -
               \"\
       IF (STEP1 =0) THEN
STEP2     COPY    FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR)                 -
                  TO  (SNODE DSN=&DSN2 DISP=RPL)                 -
                  CKPT=00K COMPRESS EXT
      EIF

MEMBER NAME  MELITAPD
MELITAPD  PROCESS PRTY=8 CLASS=4 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED   -
                         SNODE=FMSPT12 SNODEID=(cdunix,cdunix123)
STEP1     COPY    FROM(      DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR)                -
                  TO  (      DSN=&DSN2 DISP=&DISP)              -
                             CKPT=0K COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  MELITART
MELITART PROCESS PRTY=8 CLASS=4 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED    -
                         SNODE=N706CD01 SNODEID=(CONNECT,DIRECT)
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR SNODE)           -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                   SPACE=(143,(50,10),RLSE)                         -
                   DCB=(DSORG=PS,LRECL=143,RECFM=VB)                -
                   PNODE                                            -
                   UNIT=(,9))                                       -
                   CKPT=0K COMPRESS EXT

MEMBER NAME  MGMSEND1
MGMSEND1  PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=QUEUED     -
          SNODEID=(cdunix,cdunix123) SNODE=FMSPT12
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
 IF (STEP1=0) THEN
STEP2     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                -
           SYSOPTS="touch /ConnectXFer/MGM/repos/&FLAG.flg"
 EIF
 IF (STEP2=0) THEN
STEP3     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                -
          SYSOPTS="chmod 777 /ConnectXFer/MGM/repos/&FLAG.flg"
 EIF

MEMBER NAME  MVS2WRLD
MVS2WRLD  PROCESS  SNODE=TCPNAME=204.214.3.37 SNODEID=(support)
STEP      COPY     FROM (DSN=X425727.A430DUMP.TERSE           -
                   DISP=SHR PNODE)                           -
                   TO                                        -
 (dsn='/support/direct/c12345.recfmfb.lrecl133.blk13300.spc50' -
 sysopts=":datatype=text:"                                    -
 disp=new snode ) COMPRESS
MEMBER NAME  MYCDPROC
MIKET PROCESS SNODE=CD.A430 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=00:00:10              00010012
CPY1  COPY FROM (DSN=D259172.T.JCLLIB(AIWW645W)) -                      00030012
                  TO (DSN=D259172.T.PROCLIB(TEST1) -                    00040011
                  DISP=RPL)                                             00050010
CHK1  IF (CPY1 LE 4) THEN -                                             00060012
RUNBAT    RUN TASK DSN=(JCL***)                                         00070012
CHK2      IF (RUNBAT GT 4) THEN -                                       00080012
             DMNOTIFY (CL4'FAIL')                                       00090012
      EIF                                                               00100012

          SNODEID=(connect,direct) SNODE=N060CON01
