MEMBER NAME  PBKC342D
PBKC342D PROCESS PRTY=8 CLASS=4 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED       -
                         SNODE=N060CD03 SNODEID=(connect,direct)
STEP1    RUN TASK  (PGM=WINNT) SNODE                               -
   SYSOPTS=\'CMD(COPY \                                            -
            \\\\n060gfc01\\SVSDailyActivity\\Inbox\\pay.\* \       -
            \\\\n060gfc01\\SVSDailyActivity\\Inbox\\webpay.txt'\
   IF (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
      EXIT
   EIF
STEP2     COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR SNODE)                -
                   TO  (DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)           -
                   SPACE=(63,(50,10),RLSE)                         -
                   DCB=(DSORG=PS,LRECL=63,RECFM=VB)                -
                   PNODE                                           -
                   UNIT=(,9))                                      -
                   CKPT=0K COMPRESS EXT
   IF (STEP2 GT 0) THEN
      EXIT
   EIF
STEP3    RUN TASK  (PGM=WINNT) SNODE                               -
   SYSOPTS=\'CMD(MOVE \                                            -
            \\\\n060gfc01\\SVSDailyActivity\\Inbox\\pay.\* \       -
            \\\\n060gfc01\\SVSDailyActivity\\Processed'\
   EXIT
MEMBER NAME  PBKC342T
PBKC342T PROCESS PRTY=8 CLASS=4 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED       -
          &FILE='\pay\*'  SNODE=N060CD03 SNODEID=(connect,direct)
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN1 SELECT=(pay*)  DISP=SHR SNODE)   -
                   TO  (DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)           -
                   SPACE=(63,(50,10),RLSE)                         -
                   DCB=(DSORG=PS,LRECL=63,RECFM=VB)                -
                   PNODE                                           -
                   UNIT=(,9))                                      -
                   CKPT=0K COMPRESS EXT
   IF (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
      EXIT
   EIF
STEP2    RUN TASK  (PGM=WINNT) SNODE                               -
   SYSOPTS=\'CMD(MOVE \                                            -
           (&DSN &FILE)\'desktop(no)'\                             -
            \\\\n060gfc01\\SVSDailyActivity\\Processed\' (&FILE)\'
   EXIT

                  \/opt/cyclone/common/data/efunds/frm_13.ret\  -
                  \"\
   EIF
MEMBER NAME  PCMC037D
PCMC037D PROCESS PRTY=8 CLASS=4 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED       -
                         SNODE=N706CD01 SNODEID=(connect,direct)
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR SNODE)                -
                   TO  (DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)           -
                   SPACE=(402,(100,100),RLSE)                      -
                   DCB=(DSORG=PS,LRECL=402,RECFM=FB,BLKSIZE=4020)  -
                   PNODE                                           -
                   UNIT=(,9))                                      -
                   CKPT=0K COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  PCMC038D
PCMC038D PROCESS PRTY=8 CLASS=4 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED       -
                         SNODE=u060ftp1
STEP1   RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                            -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                          -
           \ncftpget  -E -V -u &VNDUID -p &VNDPWS \          -
            \-d &FTPLOG &VNDISP &FTPPATH \                   -
             \&VNDPATH\                                      -
           \"\
   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
STEP2     COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR SNODE)                -
                   TO  (DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)           -
                   PNODE)                                          -
                   CKPT=0K COMPRESS EXT
   EIF

          SNODEID=(cduser,cduser123)

            SYSOPTS=&SYSOPT1

                 TO  ( DSN=D890254.PEB.CD.TEST1    -

          CLASS=2                                                  -

MEMBER NAME  PFMCC118

          NOTIFY=%USER -
          CLASS=2
STEP1     COPY     FROM(  DSN=&DSN1 -
                          DISP=SHR PNODE) -
                   TO  (  DSN=&DSN2 -
                          DISP=(&DISP1)  SNODE -
                          DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=1029)) -
                   CKPT=100K -
                   COMPRESS EXT=(CMP=9,WIN=13,MEM=4)
/*                        DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=1029,BLKSIZE=20580)) */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                    */
/*                 PROC=PFMCC118                               */
/*                 SNODE=                                      */
/*                 &DSN1=InputDSName                           */
/*                 &DSN2=OutputDSName                          */
/*                 &DISP1=OutputDSNameDisposition1             */
/*                 &DISP2=OutputDSNameDisposition2             */

            SNODE=A790P1 SNODEID=(xfr001,transfer)

                        DSN=&DSN1                                   -
                        DISP=SHR)                                   -
                   TO   (SNODE                                      -
                        DSN=&DSN2                                   -
                        SYSOPTS=\"TYPE(MBR)\                        -
                                \TEXTFILE(*YES)\                    -
                                \RCDLEN(&RCL2)"\                    -
                   DISP=&DISP2)
/*                                                                  */
/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND MVS FILES     */
/* TO THE AS400. THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                           */
/*                 PROC=JOBNAME                                     */
/*                 SNODE=A790P1 PROD, A790P2 TEST                   */
/*                 &DSN1= MVS FILE                                  */
/*                 &DSN2= AS400 FILE - MUST BE LOWER CASE           */
/*                 &RCL2= AS400 FILE RECORD LENGTH                  */
/*                 &DISP2= AS400 FILE DISPOSITION                   */
MEMBER NAME  PGLCK05A
PGLCK05A  PROCESS  PRTY=10                                         -
          NOTIFY=%USER                                             -
          CLASS=2                                                  -
          SNODE=U060FTP1                                           -
          MAXDELAY=QUEUED
STEP1     COPY FROM(SNODE          -
                 DISP=SHR       -
                 DSN=&DSN1)    -
                 COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
               TO  (PNODE          -
                 DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)  -
                 DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=485) -
                 SPACE=(CYL,(5,5),RLSE)    -
                 UNIT=SYSDA     -
                 DSN=&DSN2)
STEP2   IF  (STEP1 EQ 0) THEN
          RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE   -
            SYSOPTS="rm &DSN1"
        EIF

                         SNODE=FMSPT12 SNODEID=(cdunix,cdunix123)

                                             LRECL=104  PNODE)  -
                             CKPT=000K    COMPRESS EXT
 EIF
PHC19001  PROCESS PRTY=8 CLASS=4 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED   -
                         SNODE=FMSPT12 SNODEID=(cdunix,cdunix123)
 STEP1     COPY    FROM(    DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR)      -
                   TO  (    DSN=&DSN2 DISP=(&DISP1)) -
                   CKPT=00K COMPRESS EXT
  IF (STEP1=0) THEN
 STEP2     COPY    FROM(    DSN=&DSN3 DISP=SHR)      -
                   TO  (    DSN=&DSN4 DISP=(&DISP1)) -
                   CKPT=00K COMPRESS EXT
  IF (STEP2=0) THEN
 STEP3     DELETE  FROM(    DSN=&DSN1 DISP=(OLD,DELETE,DELETE)) =
                   CKPT=00K COMPRESS EXT
  EIF
  EIF
/*                                                           */
/*NOTES: DSN1 is the FLAG   file.                            */
/*       DSN3 is the DETAIL file.                            */
/*       DSN1 is to be DELETEd -only after- DSN3 has been    */
/*               successfully COPY'd.                        */
/*                                                           */

                                             LRECL=104  PNODE)  -
                             CKPT=000K    COMPRESS EXT
 EIF

MEMBER NAME  PHC19401
/* **************************************************************** */
/* This will pull a file from MDS inventory services.               */
/*    Secure shell transfer is used to encrypt the file during xfer */
/* Step 1 pulls the MDS inventory services to Kroger FTP server.    */
/*    The file is removed in MDS if xfer is ok. (See log on FTP)    */
/* Step 2 sends the Kroger FTP file to the mainframe                */
/* Step 3 moves the file on the FTP machine and overlays the        */
/*      data from the last good run. (move is destructive)          */
/* **************************************************************** */
MDSCOPY2  PROCESS PRTY=10 CLASS=1 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=01:15:00 -
                          SNODE=U060FTP1
STEP1  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                 -
       SYSOPTS=\"\                                               -
       \scp -v -Q -u fredmeyer@64.56.119.208:MDSKRO \            -
       \/XFER/fmmdsin/KROMDS.FMY \                               -
        \>/XFER/log/mdsin701.log 2>&1 \                          -
               \"\
      IF (STEP1 < 1) THEN
STEP2  COPY FROM(file=/XFER/fmmdsin/KROMDS.FMY    -
                    SNODE)                        -
        TO  (DSN=&DSN2                            -
             DISP=(&DISP2)  PNODE                 -
             DCB=(RECFM=&RECFM,LRECL=&LRECL,BLKSIZE=&BLKS))  -
                CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
    EIF
    IF (STEP2 < 1) THEN
STEP3  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                -
       SYSOPTS=\"\                              -
       \mv /XFER/fmmdsin/KROMDS.FMY /XFER/fmmdsin/MDSKRO.TXT \ -
               \"\
    EIF
MEMBER NAME  PHC19402
/* **************************************************************** */
/* Step 1 sends the Kroger file to the mainframe                    */
/* Step 2 moves the Kroger file to the backup file                  */
/* **************************************************************** */
PHC19402  PROCESS PRTY=10 CLASS=1 NOTIFY=%USER MAXDELAY=QUEUED   -
                          SNODE=U060FTP1
STEP1  COPY FROM(file=/XFER/fmmdsin/KROMDS.FMY    -
                    SNODE)                        -
        TO  (DSN=&DSN2                            -
             DISP=(&DISP2)  PNODE                 -
             DCB=(RECFM=&RECFM,LRECL=&LRECL,BLKSIZE=&BLKS))  -
                CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
    IF (STEP1 < 1) THEN
STEP2  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                -
       SYSOPTS=\"\                              -
       \mv /XFER/fmmdsin/KROMDS.FMY /XFER/fmmdsin/MDSKRO.TXT \ -
               \"\
    EIF

                CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT

                         SNODE=FMSPT12 SNODEID=(cdunix,cdunix123)

                  CKPT=00K COMPRESS EXT

          EXIT
          EIF

                  TO  (    DSN=&DSN4 DISP=(&DISP1)) -
                  CKPT=00K COMPRESS EXT

          EXIT

          EXIT

                  CKPT=00K COMPRESS EXT

          EXIT
          EIF

                  TO  (    DSN=&DSNC DISP=(&DISP1)) -
                  CKPT=00K COMPRESS EXT

/*                 &DISP2   = Signa File Disposition                */
MEMBER NAME  PJYJ251P
PJYJ251P  PROCESS  PRTY=10                             -
          NOTIFY=%USER                                 -
          CLASS=2                                      -
          MAXDELAY=QUEUED                              -
          SNODE=A790P1                                 -
          SNODEID=(xfr001,transfer)
STEP1     COPY     FROM (PNODE                         -
                        DSN=&DSN1                      -
                        DISP=SHR)                      -
                   TO   (SNODE                         -
                        DSN=&DSN2                      -
                        SYSOPTS=\"TYPE(MBR)\           -
                                \TEXTFILE(*YES)\       -
                                \RCDLEN(&RCL2)"\       -
                   DISP=&DISP2)
/*                                                                  */
/* This is a C:D Process that sends a file from MVS on the S/390    */
/* to an AS400. The Submit must specify:                            */
/*                 PROC=JobName                                     */
/*                 SNODE=A790P1 Prod, A790P2 Test                   */
/*                 &DSN1= MVS File                                  */
/*                 &DSN2= AS400 File - Must be lower case           */
/*                 &RCL2= AS400 File Record Length                  */
/*                 &DISP2= AS400 File Disposition                   */
MEMBER NAME  PJYJ252P
PJYJ252P  PROCESS  PRTY=10                       -
          NOTIFY=%USER                           -
          CLASS=2                                -
          MAXDELAY=QUEUED                        -
          SNODE=N701CD02                         -
          SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops)
STEP1     COPY     FROM(PNODE                    -
                       DSN=&DSN1                 -
                       DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (SNODE                    -
                       DSN=&DSN2                 -
                       DISP=(&DISP2)  -
                       SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(no)")
          IF (STEP1 EQ 0) THEN
STEP2     RUN TASK  (PGM=WINNT) SNODE            -
            SYSOPTS=&SYSOPT1
          EIF
/*                                                                  */
/* This Process transfers JLY Commission Period data from the S/390 */
/* to the JIS Server (n701sql04).                                   */
/*                 &DSN1    = MVS File                              */
/*                 &DSN2    = JIS File                              */
/*                 &DISP2   = JIS File Disposition                  */
/*                 &SYSOPT1 = Command to Run bat program            */
MEMBER NAME  PJYJ255P
PJYJ255P  PROCESS PRTY=8                   -
          NOTIFY=%USER                     -
          CLASS=4                          -
          MAXDELAY=QUEUED                  -
          SNODE=FMSPT12                    -
          SNODEID=(cdunix,cdunix123)
STEP1     COPY     FROM(PNODE              -
                       DSN=&DSNI1          -
                       DISP=SHR)           -
                   TO  (SNODE              -
                       DSN=&DSNO1          -
                       DISP=(&DISP1)       -
                       sysopts=":datatype=text:" )
 IF (STEP1=0) THEN
STEP2     COPY    FROM(PNODE                -
                       DSN=&DSNI2           -
                       DISP=SHR)            -
                  TO  (SNODE                -
                       DSN=&DSNO2           -
                       DISP=(&DISP2))
 EIF
 IF (STEP2=0) THEN
STEP3     COPY     FROM(PNODE              -
                       DSN=&DSNI3          -
                       DISP=SHR)           -
                   TO  (SNODE              -
                       DSN=&DSNO3          -
                       DISP=(&DISP3)       -
                       sysopts=":datatype=text:" )
 EIF
 IF (STEP3=0) THEN
STEP4     COPY    FROM(PNODE                -
                       DSN=&DSNI4           -
                       DISP=SHR)            -
                  TO  (SNODE                -
                       DSN=&DSNO4           -
                       DISP=(&DISP4))
 EIF

                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT

/*                                                                  */
/* This is a C:D Process that runs a job to clear the as/400 rmds   */
/* data transfer file.  Run job will specify:                       */
/*                 PROC=JobName                                     */
/*                 SNODE=A790P1 Prod, A790P2 Test                   */
/*                 &SYSOPT1=Program run command on AS400            */
MEMBER NAME  PROCESS1
LHAPP    PROCESS SNODE=CD.A430 -                                        00010000
         COPY    FROM (DSN=D397884.SPIN.JCLLIB(*) -                     00030001
                 TO   (DSN=D397884.SPIN.JCLLIB.COPY(*)                  00040001
                       DISP=(NEW,KEEP,DELETE)                           00050001
                       DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80))                         00060000
MEMBER NAME  PROC01
/*********************************************************************/ 00010000
/*                                                                   */ 00020000
/*  PROC01:                                                          */ 00030000
/*                                                                   */ 00040000
/*       SAMPLE PROCESS TO COPY AN EXISTING FILE TO A SAM FILE       */ 00050000
/*       THAT HAS ALREADY BEEN DEFINED.                              */ 00060000
/*                                                                   */ 00070000
/*       THE PROCESS IS GIVEN THE DEFAULT PRIORITY.  IT WILL BE HELD */ 00080000
/*       UNTIL RELEASED WITH THE CHANGE COMMAND.  THE FILE WILL BE   */ 00090000
/*       COMPRESSED AS IT IS SENT, USING A BLANK (X'40') AS THE      */ 00100000
/*       PRIME COMPRESSION CHARACTER.  (THREE OR MORE OCCURRENCES    */ 00110000
/*       OF OTHER CHARACTERS WILL BE COMPRESSED AUTOMATICALLY).      */ 00120000
/*                                                                   */ 00130000
/*  UTILIZATION:                                                     */ 00140000
/*                                                                   */ 00150000
/*       CHANGE "CD.NODE.A" TO YOUR PNODE; CHANGE "CD.NODE.B"        */ 00160000
/*       TO YOUR SNODE.                                              */ 00170000
/*                                                                   */ 00171000
/*       CHANGE ALL "$CD" TO THE HIGHLEVEL QUALIFIER SPECIFIED       */ 00172000
/*       IN THE PLANNING SECTION OF THE INSTALLATION AND PLANNING    */ 00173000
/*       GUIDE.                                                      */ 00180000
/*                                                                   */ 00190000
/*       CHANGE ALL "$FIL" TO THE INPUT DATASET NAME.                */ 00200000
/*                                                                   */ 00210000
/*********************************************************************/ 00220000
PROC01 PROCESS PNODE=CD.NODE.A SNODE=CD.NODE.B HOLD=YES                 00230000
       COPY    FROM(PNODE DSN=$FIL,                            -        00250000
                    DISP=SHR)                                  -        00260000
               COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                            -        00270000
               TO(SNODE DSN=$CD.SAM.SAMPLE1                    -        00280000
                    DISP=SHR)                                           00290000
MEMBER NAME  PROC02
/*********************************************************************/ 00010000
/*                                                                   */ 00020000
/*  PROC02:                                                          */ 00030000
/*                                                                   */ 00040000
/*       SAMPLE PROCESS TO COPY AN EXISTING FILE TO A NEW SAM FILE   */ 00050000
/*                                                                   */ 00060000
/*       THE PROCESS IS GIVEN A PRIORITY OF 10 AND IS SPECIFIED TO   */ 00070000
/*       BE EXECUTED ON (THE NEXT) WEDNESDAY AT NOON.                */ 00080000
/*       A SYMBOLIC PARAMETER (&DSN) IS USED TO SPECIFY THE INPUT    */ 00090000
/*       FILE DATASET NAME.                                          */ 00100000
/*                                                                   */ 00110000
/*  UTILIZATION:                                                     */ 00120000
/*                                                                   */ 00130000
/*       CHANGE "CD.NODE.A" TO YOUR PNODE; CHANGE "CD.NODE.B"        */ 00140000
/*       TO YOUR SNODE.                                              */ 00150000
/*                                                                   */ 00151000
/*       CHANGE ALL "$CD" TO THE HIGHLEVEL QUALIFIER SPECIFIED       */ 00152000
/*       IN THE PLANNING SECTION OF THE INSTALLATION AND PLANNING    */ 00153000
/*       GUIDE.                                                      */ 00160000
/*                                                                   */ 00170000
/*       CHANGE ALL "$VOL" TO THE SITE VOLUME SERIAL.                */ 00180000
/*                                                                   */ 00181000
/*       CHANGE ALL "$FIL" TO THE NAME OF AN EXISTING PS DATASET     */ 00182000
/*                                                                   */ 00190000
/*********************************************************************/ 00200000
PROC02 PROCESS PNODE=CD.NODE.A SNODE=CD.NODE.B PRTY=10            -     00210000
               &DSN=$FIL STARTT=(WEDNESDAY,NOON)                        00220000
       COPY    FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN)                               -     00230000
               TO(SNODE DSN=$CD.SAM.SAMPLE2                       -     00240000
                  DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                         -     00250000
                  DCB=(BLKSIZE=3156 RECFM=VBM DSORG=PS LRECL=255) -     00260000
                  SPACE=(3156,(100,10)) UNIT=SYSDA VOL=SER=$VOL)        00270000
MEMBER NAME  PROC03
/*********************************************************************/ 00010000
/*                                                                   */ 00020000
/*  PROC03:                                                          */ 00030000
/*                                                                   */ 00040000
/*                                                                   */ 00050000
/*       THE SAMPLE PROCESS WILL COPY AN EXISTING FILE TO A          */ 00060000
/*       SEQUENTIAL FILE AND THEN COPY THAT FILE BACK TO ANOTHER     */ 00070000
/*       SEQUENTIAL FILE ON THE PRIMARY NODE.                        */ 00080000
/*                                                                   */ 00090000
/*  UTILIZATION:                                                     */ 00100000
/*                                                                   */ 00110000
/*       CHANGE "CD.NODE.A" TO YOUR PNODE; CHANGE "CD.NODE.B"        */ 00120000
/*       TO YOUR SNODE.                                              */ 00130000
/*                                                                   */ 00131000
/*       CHANGE ALL "$CD" TO THE HIGHLEVEL QUALIFIER SPECIFIED       */ 00132000
/*       IN THE PLANNING SECTION OF THE INSTALLATION AND PLANNING    */ 00133000
/*       GUIDE.                                                      */ 00140000
/*                                                                   */ 00150000
/*       CHANGE ALL "$FIL" TO THE EXISTING DATASET NAME              */ 00160000
/*                                                                   */ 00161000
/*       CHANGE ALL "$VOL" TO THE SITE VOLUME SERIAL.                */ 00162000
/*                                                                   */ 00170000
/*********************************************************************/ 00180000
PROC03 PROCESS PNODE=CD.NODE.A SNODE=CD.NODE.B                          00190000
       COPY    FROM(PNODE DSN=$FIL)                  -                  00210000
               TO(SNODE DSN=$CD.SAM.SAMPLE3          -                  00220000
                  UNIT=SYSDA                         -                  00230000
                  VOL=SER=$VOL)                                         00240000
       COPY    FROM(SNODE DSN=$CD.SAM.SAMPLE3)       -                  00250000
               TO(PNODE DSN=$CD.SAM.SAMPLE4          -                  00260000
                  VOL=SER=$VOL)                                         00270000
MEMBER NAME  PROC04
/*********************************************************************/
/*                                                                   */
/*  PROC04:                                                          */
/*                                                                   */
/*       SAMPLE PROCESS TO SHOW DIFFERENT WAYS TO USE TAPE FILES.    */
/*                                                                   */
/*********************************************************************/
PROC04   PROCESS PNODE=CD.NODE.A SNODE=CD.NODE.B
/*********************************************************************/
/*                                                                   */
/*  STEP01:                                                          */
/*                                                                   */
/*       THE UNIT PARAMETER SHOWS THE WAY TO ALLOCATE TWO DRIVES     */
/*       FOR THE OUTPUT FILE.                                        */
/*                                                                   */
/*********************************************************************/
STEP01   COPY    FROM(PNODE DSN=CATLG.INPUT.TAPE)                      -
                 TO(        DSN=NEW.OUTPUT.TAPE                        -
                            DCB=(LRECL=80 BLKSIZE=32000 RECFM=FB       -
                                 DSORG=PS)                             -
                            DISP=(,CATLG)                              -
                            UNIT=(3400-6,2)                            -
                            LABEL=(,SL,RETPD=30) )
/*********************************************************************/
/*                                                                   */
/*  STEP02:                                                          */
/*                                                                   */
/*       THE INPUT FILE IS UNCATALOGED.  THREE UNITS WILL BE         */
/*       ALLOCATED FOR THE INPUT FILE.                               */
/*                                                                   */
/*********************************************************************/
STEP02   COPY    FROM(PNODE DSN=OLD.INPUT.TAPE                         -
                            DISP=OLD                                   -
                            UNIT=(3400-6,P)                            -
                            LABEL=(1,SL)                               -
                            VOL=SER=(VOL001,VOL002,VOL003))            -
                 TO(        DSN=NEW.OUTPUT.TAPE                        -
                            DCB=(LRECL=80 BLKSIZE=32000 RECFM=FB       -
                                 DSORG=PS)                             -
                            DISP=(,KEEP)                               -
                            UNIT=(3400-6,2)                            -
                            LABEL=(,SL,RETPD=30) )
/*********************************************************************/
/*                                                                   */
/*  STEP03:                                                          */
/*                                                                   */
/*       THE INPUT DATA SET IS THE FOURTH FILE ON A 1600 BPI VOLUME  */
/*                                                                   */
/*********************************************************************/
STEP03   COPY    FROM(PNODE DSN=OLD.BPI1600.TAPE                       -
                            DISP=OLD                                   -
                            UNIT=3400-4    /* 1600/800 BPI DEVICE */   -
                            LABEL=(4,SL)                               -
                            VOL=SER=VOL001)                            -
                 TO(        DSN=NEW.OUTPUT.TAPE                        -
                            DCB=(LRECL=80 BLKSIZE=32000 RECFM=FB       -
                                 DSORG=PS)                             -
                            DISP=(,KEEP)                               -
                            UNIT=(3400-6)                              -
                            LABEL=(,SL,RETPD=30) )
MEMBER NAME  PROC05
/*********************************************************************/ 00010000
/*                                                                   */ 00020000
/*  PROC05:                                                          */ 00030000
/*                                                                   */ 00040000
/*      SAMPLE PROCESS TO COPY AN EXISTING FILE TO A NEW SAM FILE    */ 00050000
/*      USING THE TYPE DATA SET DEFAULTS TO ALLOCATE THE DESTINATION */ 00051000
/*      FILE.   THE TYPE MEMBER IS CALLED 'ALLOCATE' AND HAS THE     */ 00060000
/*      FOLLOWING ATTRIBUTES:                                        */ 00061000
/*                                                                   */ 00062000
/*             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                               */ 00062100
/*             DCB=(BLKSIZE=3156 RECFM=VBM DSORG=PS LRECL=255)       */ 00062200
/*             SPACE=(3156,(100,10)) UNIT=SYSDA VOL=SER=$VOL)        */ 00062300
/*                                                                   */ 00063000
/*      THIS COPY STATEMENT WILL ACHIEVE THE SAME AS IN EXAMPLE      */ 00064000
/*      PROCESS 'PROC02'.                                            */ 00065000
/*                                                                   */ 00066000
/*      THE PROCESS IS GIVEN A PRIORITY OF 10 AND IS SPECIFIED TO    */ 00070000
/*      BE EXECUTED ON (THE NEXT) WEDNESDAY AT NOON.                 */ 00080000
/*      A SYMBOLIC PARAMETER (&DSN) IS USED TO SPECIFY THE INPUT     */ 00090000
/*      FILE DATASET NAME.                                           */ 00100000
/*                                                                   */ 00110000
/*  UTILIZATION:                                                     */ 00120000
/*                                                                   */ 00130000
/*     CHANGE "CD.NODE.A" TO YOUR PNODE; CHANGE "CD.NODE.B"          */ 00140000
/*     TO YOUR SNODE.                                                */ 00150000
/*                                                                   */ 00151000
/*     CHANGE ALL "$CD" TO THE HIGHLEVEL QUALIFIER SPECIFIED         */ 00152000
/*     IN THE PLANNING SECTION OF THE INSTALLATION AND PLANNING      */ 00153000
/*     GUIDE.                                                        */ 00160000
/*                                                                   */ 00170000
/*     CHANGE ALL "$FIL" TO THE INPUT DATASET NAME.                  */ 00180000
/*                                                                   */ 00181000
/*     CHANGE ALL "$VOL" TO THE SITE VOLUME SERIAL.                  */ 00182000
/*                                                                   */ 00190000
/*********************************************************************/ 00200000
PROC05 PROCESS PNODE=CD.NODE.A SNODE=CD.NODE.B PRTY=10            -     00210000
               &DSN=$FIL STARTT=(WEDNESDAY,NOON)                        00220000
       COPY    FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN)                               -     00230000
               TO(SNODE DSN=$CD.SAM.SAMPLE2                       -     00240000
                  TYPE=ALLOCATE)                                        00250000
MEMBER NAME  PROTEAN
PROTEAN   PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2                       -
          SNODEID=(connect,direct)                                  -
          &DSN2=                                                    -
 '\\n060pap01\marcam\interfaces\foodinterface\import\infood.txt'
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                   SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)")                        -
                   CKPT=100K  COMPRESS EXT
          IF (STEP1 EQ 0) THEN
STEP2 RUN TASK (PGM="NT") SNODE                                     -
SYSOPTS=                                                          -
\'CMD(\\70.14.0.15\\marcam\\interfaces\\foodinterface\\application\   -
   \Fdimport.exe) DESKTOP(YES)'\
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  PRRC820W
PSAC853W  PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=UNLIMITED  -
            SNODE=A790P1 SNODEID=(xfr001,transfer)
STEP1     COPY     FROM (PNODE                                      -
                        DSN=&DSN1                                   -
                        DISP=SHR)                                   -
                   TO   (SNODE                                      -
                        DSN=&DSN2                                   -
                        SYSOPTS=\"TYPE(MBR)\                        -
                                \TEXTFILE(*YES)\                    -
                                \RCDLEN(&RCL2)"\                    -
                   DISP=&DISP2)
/*                                                                  */
/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND MVS FILES     */
/* TO THE AS400. THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                           */
/*                 PROC=JOBNAME                                     */
/*                 SNODE=A790P1 PROD, A790P2 TEST                   */
/*                 &DSN1= MVS FILE                                  */
/*                 &DSN2= AS400 FILE - MUST BE LOWER CASE           */
/*                 &RCL2= AS400 FILE RECORD LENGTH                  */
/*                 &DISP2= AS400 FILE DISPOSITION                   */
MEMBER NAME  PRRC821W
PRRC821W  PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=QUEUED     -
          SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops) SNODE=N701CD02
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT

                     SPACE=(44,(600,150),RLSE)                      -
                     DCB=(DSORG=PS,LRECL=44,RECFM=F)                -
                     PNODE                                          -
                     UNIT=(,9))                                     -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT

MEMBER NAME  PSAC269D
PSAC269D  PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=4 SNODE=U060QSL2        -
               MAXDELAY=QUEUED
STEP1     COPY     FROM (DSN=&DSN1                                  -
                         DISP=SHR)                                  -
                   TO   (DSN=&DSN2                                  -
                         DISP=(&DISP1)                              -
                         SYSOPTS="strip.blanks(no)")                -
                         CKPT=100K   COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF (STEP1 NE 0) THEN
          EXIT
          EIF
STEP3   RUN TASK(PGM = UNIX)                                -
          SNODE                                             -
      SYSOPTS="/qsl/bin/fred_load.ss"

                         SNODE=u060bbpd1 SNODEID=(cdunix,cdunix123)

MEMBER NAME  PSNC611W
PSNC611W  PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=QUEUED     -
          SNODEID=(cdunix,cdunix123) SNODE=FMSPT12
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
 IF (STEP1=0) THEN
STEP2     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                -
           SYSOPTS="touch /ConnectXFer/Magic/repos/GSH.flg"
 EIF
 IF (STEP2=0) THEN
STEP3     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                -
          SYSOPTS="chmod 777 /ConnectXFer/Magic/repos/GSH.flg"
 EIF
MEMBER NAME  PSNC612W
PSNC612W  PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=QUEUED     -
          SNODEID=(cdunix,cdunix123) SNODE=FMSPT12
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
 IF (STEP1=0) THEN
STEP2     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                -
           SYSOPTS="touch /ConnectXFer/Magic/repos/NPDH.flg"
 EIF
 IF (STEP2=0) THEN

          SYSOPTS="chmod 777 /ConnectXFer/Magic/repos/NPDH.flg"
 EIF

MEMBER NAME  PTYC142V
PTYC142V  PROCESS  PRTY=10            -
          NOTIFY=%USER                -
          CLASS=2                     -
          MAXDELAY=QUEUED             -
          SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops) -
          SNODE=N701CD02
STEP1     COPY FROM( DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR      )     -
               TO  ( DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1) )     -
               CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF (STEP1 NE 0) THEN
          EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     RUN TASK (PGM=WINNT) SNODE                 -
          SYSOPTS=&SYSOPT1
          EXIT
MEMBER NAME  PUAC754D
PUAC754D  PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=QUEUED     -
          SNODEID=(cdunix,cdunix123) SNODE=FMSPT12
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -

          SYSOPTS="chmod 777 /ConnectXFer/Magic/repos/Vestcomdone.flg"
 EIF
MEMBER NAME  PULACPHR
PULACPHR  PROCESS  PRTY=10                                         -
          NOTIFY=%USER                                             -
          CLASS=2                                                  -
          SNODE=N701CD02                                           -
          SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops)                              -
          MAXDELAY=QUEUED
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR SNODE)          -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1) PNODE      -
                   DCB=(RECFM=VB,LRECL=104))                       -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  PVMC451D
PVMC451D  PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=4 SNODE=N060FTC15       -
               MAXDELAY=QUEUED SNODEID=(connect,direct)
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)         -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))    -
                   CKPT=100K  COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  PVMC451F
PVMC451F  PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=4 SNODE=N060CD03        -
               MAXDELAY=QUEUED SNODEID=(connect,direct)
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)         -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))    -
                   CKPT=100K  COMPRESS EXT
/*                                                               */
STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
          GOTO STEP3
         ELSE
          EXIT
         EIF
/*                                                               */
STEP3    RUN TASK  (PGM=WINNT) SNODE                                  -
   SYSOPTS=\'CMD(COPY \                                               -
          \\\\\n060entnas012\\isp04\\data\\701\\ecf\\vlmsales.ecf\    -
          \\\\\n060entnas012\\isp04\\rws\\ecf\\vlmsales.ecf)'\
MEMBER NAME  PVMC451N
PVMC451N  PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=4 SNODE=N060FTC15       -
               MAXDELAY=QUEUED SNODEID=(connect,direct)
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)         -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))    -
                   CKPT=100K  COMPRESS EXT

          GOTO STEP3
         ELSE
          EXIT
         EIF

   SYSOPTS=\'CMD(COPY E:\\data\\701\\ecf\\vlmsales.ecf\               -
              \E:\\rws\\ecf\\vlmsales.ecf)'\

MEMBER NAME  SRFPROC
/*********************************************************************/ 00010000
/*                                                                   */ 00020000
/*  SRFPROC:                                                         */ 00030000
/*                                                                   */ 00040000
/*       SAMPLE PROCESS TO COPY AN EXISTING FILE TO A SAM FILE       */ 00050000
/*       THAT HAS ALREADY BEEN DEFINED.                              */ 00060000
/*                                                                   */ 00070000
/*       THE PROCESS IS GIVEN THE DEFAULT PRIORITY.  IT WILL BE HELD */ 00080000
/*       UNTIL RELEASED WITH THE CHANGE COMMAND.  THE FILE WILL BE   */ 00090000
/*       COMPRESSED AS IT IS SENT, USING A BLANK (X'40') AS THE      */ 00100000
/*       PRIME COMPRESSION CHARACTER.  (THREE OR MORE OCCURRENCES    */ 00110000
/*       OF OTHER CHARACTERS WILL BE COMPRESSED AUTOMATICALLY).      */ 00120000
/*                                                                   */ 00130000
/*  UTILIZATION:                                                     */ 00140000
/*                                                                   */ 00150000
/*       CHANGE "CD.NODE.A" TO YOUR PNODE; CHANGE "CD.NODE.B"        */ 00160000
/*       TO YOUR SNODE.                                              */ 00170000
/*                                                                   */ 00171000
/*       CHANGE ALL "$CD" TO THE HIGHLEVEL QUALIFIER SPECIFIED       */ 00172000
/*       IN THE PLANNING SECTION OF THE INSTALLATION AND PLANNING    */ 00173000
/*       GUIDE.                                                      */ 00180000
/*                                                                   */ 00190000
/*       CHANGE ALL "$FIL" TO THE INPUT DATASET NAME.                */ 00200000
/*                                                                   */ 00210000
/*********************************************************************/ 00220000
PROC01 PROCESS PNODE=CD.NODE.A SNODE=CD.NODE.B HOLD=YES                 00230000
       COPY    FROM(PNODE DSN=$FIL,                            -        00250000
                    DISP=SHR)                                  -        00260000
               COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                            -        00270000
               TO(SNODE DSN=$CD.SAM.SAMPLE1                   -         00280000
                    DISP=SHR)                                           00290000
MEMBER NAME  SSC906T
SSC906T   PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=4 SNODE=U060DW82 -
          MAXDELAY=QUEUED
  SYMBOL  &DIR=\file_land_dir\
  SYMBOL  &IPDSN2=\'\ || &DIR || \/ip_\ || &DSN2 || \'\
  SYMBOL  &SC=\"\ || &SCRIPT || \ \ || &DIR || \ \ || &DSN2 || \"\
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&IPDSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)           -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no:xlate=no:")        -
                   CKPT=100K  COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
          EXIT
          EIF
STEP3   RUN TASK(PGM = UNIX)                                -
          SNODE                                             -
          SYSOPTS=&SC

/*                                                                  *
/* This is a C:D Process that sends a file from MVS on the S/390    *
/* to an AS400. The Submit must specify:                            *
/*                 PROC=JobName                                     *

/*                 &RCL2= AS400 File Record Length                  *

MEMBER NAME  TPORTA
TPORTA   PROCESS PNODE=NODEA                                    -       00010000
               SNODE=NODEB                                      -       00020000
               &CLASS=A  &JOB=TPRTPNOD                          -       00020100
               &RPTNAME=RPT                                     -       00020200
               &PS=USERA.SEQ.PNODE                              -       00020300
               &PP=USERA.PDSE.PNODE                             -       00020400
               &SS=USERB.SEQ.SNODE                              -       00020500
               &SP=USERB.PDSE.SNODE                                     00020600
*                                                                       00021000
*        RUN THE IEWTPORT UTILITY ON THE PNODE (SENDING) SIDE           00022000
*        TO CONVERT A PDSE PROGRAM OBJECT FILE INTO A SEQUENTIAL        00023000
*        FILE.  THE IEWTPRTP JOB WILL EXEC THE UTILITY IN STEP          00024000
*        ONE AND THEN EXEC DMBATCH IN STEP TWO TO SUBMIT A              00025000
*        PROCESS TO COPY THE SEQ. FILE CREATED BY IEWTPORT.             00026000
*                                                                       00026100
*        IN THE SYMBOLICS ABOVE,                                        00027000
*        PS= PNODE'S SEQUENTIAL FILE NAME                               00028000
*        PP= PNODE'S PDSE FILE NAME                                     00028100
*        SS= SNODE'S SEQUENTIAL FILE NAME                               00028200
*        SP= SNODE'S PDSE FILE NAME                                     00028300
*                                                                       00029000
*        THIS IS THE ONLY PROCESS THAT HAS TO BE SUBMITTED.  IT         00030000
*        WILL CAUSE THE OTHER JOBS AND PROCESSES TO RUN AND WILL        00040000
*        PASS THE DATASET NAMES TO THE OTHER JOBS AND PROCESSES.        00050000
*        THE USER ONLY NEEDS TO CHANGE THE NAMES OF THE SEQUENTIAL      00060000
*        AND PDSE DATASETS ABOVE, ON THE PROCESS STATEMENT AND          00061000
*        SUBMIT THIS PROCESS TO GET THE PDSE COPIED TO THE OTHER        00062000
*        NODE.                                                          00063000
*                                                                       00064000
STEP1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTSUB -                                           00070000
        PARM=('-#', -                                                   00080000
              'DSN=USERA.JCL.CNTL(TPORTJBA),DISP=SHR', -                00090000
              "PS         &PS", -                                       00100000
              "PP         &PP", -                                       00101000
              "SP         &SP", -                                       00102000
              "SS         &SS", -                                       00103000
              "JOB        &JOB", -                                      00110000
              "CLASS      &CLASS", -                                    00120000
              "RPTNAME    &RPTNAME")) PNODE                             00130000
MEMBER NAME  TPORTB
TPORTB   PROCESS PNODE=NODEA                                    -       00010000
               SNODE=NODEB                                      -       00020000
               &CLASS=A  &JOB=TPRTSNOD                          -       00021000
               &RPTNAME=RPT                                     -       00022000
               &PS=&DSNF                                        -       00023000
               &SS=&DSNT                                        -       00025000
               &SP=&PDSE                                                00026000
*                                                                       00030000
*  STEP1 TRANSFERS THE SEQUENTIAL FILE CREATED BY IEWTPORT              00040000
*        FROM PNODE TO SNODE.                                           00041000
*                                                                       00042000
STEP1  COPY    FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSNF                             -       00042100
                    DISP=SHR)                                   -       00042200
               TO(SNODE DSN=&DSNT                               -       00042300
                   DISP=(RPL,CATLG))                                    00042400
*                                                                       00042500
*  STEP2 RUNS THE IEWTPORT UTILITY ON THE SNODE (RECIEVING) SIDE        00042600
*        TO CONVERT THE SEQUENTIAL FILE INTO A PDSE PROGRAM OBJECT      00042700
*        FILE                                                           00042800
*                                                                       00042900
STEP2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTSUB -                                           00045000
        PARM=('-#', -                                                   00046000
              'DSN=USERB.JCL.CNTL(TPORTJBB),DISP=SHR', -                00047000
              "SP         &SP", -                                       00051000
              "SS         &SS", -                                       00060000
              "JOB        &JOB", -                                      00070000
              "CLASS      &CLASS", -                                    00080000
              "RPTNAME    &RPTNAME")) SNODE                             00090000

        &GOODMSG='ZAKWMS OLP015 ELGX PODATA XMIT COMPLETED'      -
        &FAILMSG1='ZAKWMS OLP015 ELGX COPY TO DES FAILED'        -

                 TO (DSN="/XFER/elogexout/elogex.div015.podata"  -
                     DISP=(RPL)                                  -
                     SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                 -

        RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG1)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

            SYSOPTS=\"\                                                -
             \echo `date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S`>/XFER/elogexout/olp015.dttm;\  -
             \DTTM=`cat /XFER/elogexout/olp015.dttm`;\                 -
             \scp -v -Q -u /XFER/elogexout/elogex.div015.podata \      -
             \kroger@170.224.103.52:new/$DTTM.olp015 \                 -
             \> /XFER/log/elogex.d015.log 2>&1  \                      -
             \"\

            SYSOPTS=\"\                                                -
             \DTTM=`cat /XFER/elogexout/olp015.dttm`;\                 -
             \cp /XFER/log/elogex.d015.log \                           -
             \/XFER/log/elogex.d015.err.$DTTM \                        -
             \"\
        EXIT
        EIF

            SYSOPTS=\"\                                                -
             \DTTM=`cat /XFER/elogexout/olp015.dttm`;\                 -
             \scp -v -Q /XFER/CONTROLFILE \                            -
             \kroger@170.224.103.52:new/$DTTM.olp015.done \            -
             \>> /XFER/log/elogex.d015.log 2>&1 \                      -
             \"\

             \/XFER/log/elogex.d015.err.$DTTM \                        -
             \"\

          \\\\\n060entnas011\\isp01\\rws\\ecf\\vlmtests.fmy)'\
          EXIT
MEMBER NAME  VSE09TW
VSE09TW   PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  ( DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
MEMBER NAME  $SCPDIP
SCPDIP PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE                                           -
             DSN=&FRDSN                                            -
             DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                                  -
             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=&LRECL,BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE) -
             )                                                     -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                     -
             TO (SNODE                                             -
             DSN=&TODSN                                            -
             DISP=RPL)
         IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
         ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
         EXIT
         EIF
STEP02  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE               -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                             -
        \scp -v -Q -u \                         -
        \/XFER/dpiout/istr703.txt \             -
        \ wekroger@206.107.75.50:istr703.txt \  -
        \>/XFER/log/dpi.log 2>&1\               -
        \"\
         IF  (STEP02 = 0) THEN
NOTFY03 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
         ELSE
NOTFY04 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
         EXIT
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  CAOADJX
CAOADJX PROCESS  CLASS=1 HOLD=NO PRTY=10
STEP0010  COPY FROM (PNODE                                       -
               DSN=&DSNCDC                                       -
               DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                              -
               UNIT=(SYSDA)                                      -
                  )                                              -
               COMPRESS EXTENDED                                 -
               CKPT=0K                                           -
               TO (SNODE                                         -
               DSN=&DSNKMA                                       -
               DISP=(MOD)                                        -
               SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")

STEP0020  IF (STEP0010 GT 0) THEN
          RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                         -
          PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG1)) PNODE
          EXIT
          EIF

STEP0030  IF (STEP0010 EQ 0) THEN
          RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                      -
          SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  CAOCSTR
CAOCSTR  PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                              -
                 PNODE=&PNODE
STEP1 COPY FROM (DSN=&FROM                                 -
                     DISP=(SHR)                            -
                     PNODE)                                -
           COMPRESS EXT                                    -
           TO (DSN=&TO                                     -
                     DCB=(DSORG=PS                         -
                     RECFM=FB                              -
                     LRECL=&TOLRECL                        -
                     BLKSIZE=&TOBLKSZ)                     -
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY                         -
                     SNODE)
STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIFY1   RUN JOB (DSN=J(&JOBKMA)) SNODE
         ELSE
NOTIFY2   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
          PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
         EIF

                        PNODE                               -           00021000

MEMBER NAME  CAPTFTP
CAPTFTP PROCESS SNODE=U060FTP1                                         -
        &GOODMSG='CAPACITY XMIT COMPLETED'                             -
        &FAILMSG1='CAPACITY COPY TO DES FAILED'                        -
        &FAILMSG2='CAPACITY ELGX SECURE COPY FAILED'                   -
        &FAILMSG3='CAPACITY ELGX SCP CONFIRM FAILED'
STEP10   COPY  FROM (DSN='D911.EPSSQ.PDETAIL.EPSE005.INBCAP(0)'        -
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=32000,LRECL=400,RECFM=FB)            -
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY                                     -
                     DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                                  -
                 TO (DSN="/XFER/elogexout/elogex.cap000"               -
                     DISP=(RPL)                                        -
                     SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                       -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
CHEK10  IF  (STEP10 > 0) THEN
        RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG1)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP20  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                      -
            SYSOPTS=\"\                                                -
             \echo `date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S`>/XFER/elogexout/cap000.dttm;\  -
             \DTTM=`cat /XFER/elogexout/cap000.dttm`;\                 -
             \scp -v -Q -u /XFER/elogexout/elogex.cap000 \             -
             \kroger@168.75.196.206:new/$DTTM.cap000 \                 -
             \> /XFER/log/elogex.cap000.log 2>&1 \                     -
             \"\

        RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                      -

             \/XFER/log/elogex.cap000.err.$DTTM \                      -
             \"\
        EXIT
        EIF

             \DTTM=`cat /XFER/elogexout/cap000.dttm`;\                 -

                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP)                     -           00000080
                        UNIT=(SYSDA))                       -           00000090
                   COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                     -           00000100
                   TO  (SNODE                               -           00000110
                        DSN=&DSNKMA                         -           00000120
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=27930                     -        00000130
                             DSORG=PS                          -        00000140
                             LRECL=133                         -        00000150
                             RECFM=FB)                         -        00000160
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP)                        -        00000170
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)                                  00000180
STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                            00000190
NOTIFY1  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -            00000200
         PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&DSN1')) SNODE                                00000230
         ELSE                                                           00000210
NOTIFY2  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -            00000220
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&DSN1')) SNODE                                00000230
         EIF                                                            00000240

MEMBER NAME  CCS100D1
CCS100D1 PROCESS snodeid=(connect,direct)

STEP01   COPY  FROM (PNODE                   -
               DSN=S.CCS100AA                -
               DISP=SHR)                     -
               COMPRESS EXTENDED             -
               TO (SNODE                     -
               DSN='\\n703dprod133\actccs\in\ccs100aa.dat')

STEP02   COPY  FROM (PNODE                   -
               DSN=S.CCS100BB                -
               DISP=SHR)                     -
               COMPRESS EXTENDED             -
               TO (SNODE                     -
               DSN='\\n703dprod133\actccs\in\ccs100bb.dat')

MEMBER NAME  CCS115UP
CCS115UP PROCESS

         DSN='\\N703DPROD133\ACTCCS\OUT\CCS115AA.DAT')   -
         TO (PNODE                                       -
         DSN=G.CCS115AB(+1),                             -
         DISP=(NEW,CATLG)                                -
         UNIT=SYSDA                                      -
         SPACE=(CYL,(5,5),RLSE)                          -
         DCB=(LRECL=088,BLKSIZE=27984,DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB))
MEMBER NAME  CDBDIV
COPY      PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF       (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN3   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN4   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP4     IF       (STEP3 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP5     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN5   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN6   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP6     IF       (STEP5 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP7     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN7   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN8   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP8     IF       (STEP7 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP9     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX)                                       -
                   SNODE                                            -
                   SYSOPTS="&SCRIPT1"
STEP10    RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX)                                       -
                   SNODE                                            -
                   SYSOPTS="&SCRIPT2"

MEMBER NAME  CDB1020C
CDB1020C PROCESS HOLD=NO SNODE=&SNODE
STEP02  COPY FROM (SNODE                                    -
                  DSN=&FRMDSN                               -
                  DISP=SHR                                  -
                  SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=BINARY:")              -
                  COMPRESS EXTENDED                         -
             TO  (PNODE                                     -
                  DSN='D911.CDBSQ.PDETAIL.STOCKTON.CRP(+1)' -
                  UNIT=(SYSDA)                              -
                  AVGREC=K                                  -
                  DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                   -
                  SPACE=(73,(200,20),RLSE)                  -
                  DCB=(GDG.MODEL                            -
                       DSORG=PS                             -
                       LRECL=73                             -
                       RECFM=FB)                            -
                  )
         IF (STEP02 EQ 0) THEN
STEP03      RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                       -
            SYSOPTS=\"\                                     -
            \mv //opt/cyclone/in/cswg/&FRMDSN2 \            -
            \   //opt/cyclone/in/cswg/&BKPDSN  \            -
                    \"\
         ELSE
CDERR       RUN TASK                                        -
            (PGM=DMNOTFY2,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FRMDSN,#911311)) PNODE
         EIF

CDB2020C PROCESS HOLD=NO SNODE=&SNODE
STEP02  COPY FROM (SNODE                                    -
                  DSN=&FRMDSN                               -
                  DISP=SHR                                  -
                  SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=BINARY:")              -
                  COMPRESS EXTENDED                         -
             TO  (PNODE                                     -
                  DSN='D911.CDBSQ.PDETAIL.STOCKTON.WMS(+1)' -
                  UNIT=(SYSDA)                              -
                  AVGREC=K                                  -
                  DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                   -
                  SPACE=(139,(200,20),RLSE)                 -
                  DCB=(GDG.MODEL                            -
                       DSORG=PS                             -
                       LRECL=139                            -
                       RECFM=FB)                            -
                  )
         IF (STEP02 EQ 0) THEN
STEP03      RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                       -
            SYSOPTS=\"\                                     -
            \mv //opt/cyclone/in/cswg/&FRMDSN2 \            -
            \   //opt/cyclone/in/cswg/&BKPDSN  \            -
                    \"\
         ELSE
CDERR   RUN TASK                                            -
       (PGM=DMNOTFY2,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FRMDSN,#911311)) PNODE
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  CDCNDMOD
//SKPPWHLL JOB ,P911SKPPWHLL,REGION=0K,CLASS=1,                         00010000
//   MSGCLASS=M,ROLL=NO                                                 00020000
//********************************************************************* 00030000
//* STEP0040 -  TRANSMIT FILE TO WMS VIA NDM                          * 00040000
//********************************************************************* 00050000
//STEP0040 EXEC PGM=DMBATCH,PARM=(YYSLYNN),                             00060000
//             COND=(8,LT)                                              00070000
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D955.NDM.LINKLIB,                                    00080000
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00090000
//DMNETMAP DD  DSN=D955.NDM.NETMAP,                                     00100000
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00110000
//DMPUBLIB DD  DSN=D955.NDM.PROCESS.LIB,                                00120004
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00130000
//*MPUBLIB DD  DSN=#911441.JCL3.CNTL,                                   00130104
//*            DISP=SHR                                                 00130204
//*        DD  DSN=D955.NDM.PROCESS.LIB,                                00131004
//*            DISP=SHR                                                 00132004
//DMMSGFIL DD  DSN=D955.NDM.MSG,                                        00140000
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00150000
//DMPRINT  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00160000
//SYSUDUMP DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00170000
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00180000
//NDMCMDS  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00190000
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=#911441.CAO.CNTL(SKPCAO3),                           00203009
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00210000
//*                                                                     00235307
//********************************************************************* 00236000
//*         E N D   O F   P R O C E D U R E   S K P P W H L           * 00240000
//********************************************************************* 00250000
MEMBER NAME  CDJES2
CDJES2    PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)         -
                   TO  (DSN=NULLFILE                        -
                        SYSOPTS="(SYSOUT=(CLASS=X))"        -
                        )
MEMBER NAME  CDTEST
CDTEST    PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
MEMBER NAME  CMWAPOS
CMWAPOS   PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF       (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN3   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN4   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP4     IF       (STEP3 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP5     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX)                                       -
                   SNODE                                            -
                   SYSOPTS="&SCRIPT"
MEMBER NAME  CMWCCM
CMWCCM    PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -

                   COMPRESS EXT

MEMBER NAME  CMWCDB
CMWCDB    PROCESS
  SYMBOL  &DIR=\file_land_dir\
  SYMBOL  &IPDSN2=\'\ || &DIR || \/ip_\ || &DSN2 || \'\
  SYMBOL  &IPDSN4=\'\ || &DIR || \/ip_\ || &DSN4 || \'\
  SYMBOL  &SC1=\"\ || &SCRIPT1 || \ \ || &DIR || \ \ || &DSN2 || \"\
  SYMBOL  &SC2=\"\ || &SCRIPT1 || \ \ || &DIR || \ \ || &DSN4 || \"\
STEP1     COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&IPDSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)           -
                      SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                   -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF       (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=UNIX) SYSOPTS=&SC1
STEP4     IF       (STEP3 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP5     COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN3   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&IPDSN4   DISP=(&DISP1)           -
                      SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                   -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP6     IF       (STEP5 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP7     RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=UNIX) SYSOPTS=&SC2
MEMBER NAME  CMWDFND
CMWDFND   PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (SNODE DSN=&DSN2                             -
                              DISP=(NEW,CATLG)                      -
                              UNIT=&UNIT2                           -
                              DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=&LRECL2, -
                                   BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE2) )             -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF       (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN3                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (SNODE DSN=&DSN4                             -
                              DISP=(NEW,CATLG)                      -
                              UNIT=&UNIT4                           -
                              DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=&LRECL4, -
                                   BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE4) )             -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP4     IF       (STEP3 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP5     COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN5                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (SNODE DSN=&DSN6                             -
                              DISP=(NEW,CATLG)                      -
                              UNIT=&UNIT6                           -
                              DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=&LRECL6, -
                                   BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE6) )             -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP6     IF       (STEP5 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP7     COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN7                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (SNODE DSN=&DSN8                             -
                              DISP=(NEW,CATLG)                      -
                              UNIT=&UNIT8                           -
                              DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=&LRECL8, -
                                   BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE8) )             -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP8     IF       (STEP7 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP9     RUN JOB (DSN=J(OCKRFIND))SNODE
MEMBER NAME  CMWDWPRC
CMWDWPRC    PROCESS
  SYMBOL  &DSN2=\'\ || &DSN2NQ || \.\ || &NUM || \'\
  SYMBOL  &F1=&DSN2NQ || \.\ || &NUM
  SYMBOL  &F2=&DSN2NQ || \.dat.\ || &NUM
  SYMBOL  &SCRIPT=\"mv \ || &F1 || \ \ || &F2 || \"\
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2  DISP=(&DISP1))      -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF       (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX)                                       -
                   SNODE                                            -
                   SYSOPTS=&SCRIPT

  SYMBOL  &IPDSN2=\'\ || &DIR || \/ip_\ || &DSN2 || \'\
  SYMBOL  &SC1=\"\ || &SCRIPT || \ \ || &DIR || \ \ || &DSN2 || \"\
STEP1     COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1  DISP=SHR)                -
                   TO  (      DSN=&IPDSN2  DISP=(&DISP1))         -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF       (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
                     EXIT
          EIF
STEP3    RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=UNIX) SYSOPTS=&SC1
MEMBER NAME  CMWICB
CMWICB   PROCESS
  SYMBOL  &DIR=\file_land_dir\
  SYMBOL  &IPDSN2=\'\ || &DIR || \/ip_\ || &DSN2 || \'\
  SYMBOL  &IPDSN4=\'\ || &DIR || \/ip_\ || &DSN4 || \'\
  SYMBOL  &SC1=\"\ || &SCRIPT1 || \ \ || &DIR || \ \ || &DSN2 || \"\
  SYMBOL  &SC2=\"\ || &SCRIPT1 || \ \ || &DIR || \ \ || &DSN4 || \"\
STEP1    COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)        -
                  TO  (      DSN=&IPDSN2   DISP=(RPL)     -
                     SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")          -
                  COMPRESS EXT
STEP2    IF       (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
                      EXIT
         EIF
STEP3    RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=UNIX) SYSOPTS=&SC1
STEP4    IF       (STEP3 GT 0) THEN
                      EXIT
         EIF
STEP5    COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN3   DISP=SHR)        -
                  TO  (      DSN=&IPDSN4   DISP=(RPL)     -
                     SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")          -
                  COMPRESS EXT
STEP6    IF       (STEP5 GT 0) THEN
                      EXIT
         EIF
STEP7    RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=UNIX) SYSOPTS=&SC2

                   &PNAME=CM07LI                                        00000030

                        DISP=(SHR,KEEP)                     -           00000080
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY                       -           00000090
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=13300                  -           00000040
                             DSORG=PS                       -           00000050

                  SYSOPTS="CMD(CALL CCDI002A &PNAME)"                   00000230
         EIF                                                            00000240
MEMBER NAME  COPYBIN

MEMBER NAME  COPYNDM
COPYNDM   PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE NOTIFY=%USER
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE                                      -
                        DISP=SHR                                   -
                        DSN=&DSN1                                  -
                        &FUNIT                                     -
                        &FVOLSER                                   -
                        LINK=&FLINK                                -
                        VSAMCAT=&FVCAT                             -
                        &SELECT                                    -
                        &FSYSOPT                                   -
                        &EXCLUDE                                   -
                        &NOREP                                     -
                       )                                           -
                   TO  (                                           -
                        DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)                       -
                        DSN=&DSN2                                  -
                        &TDCB=&TDCB                                -
                        &TUNIT                                     -
                        &TVOLSER                                   -
                        &TSYSOPT                                   -
                        LINK=&TLINK                                -
                        VSAMCAT=&TVCAT                             -
                       )                                           -
                   &COMPRESS
MEMBER NAME  COPYNEX
COPYNEX  PROCESS CLASS=1 HOLD=NO PRTY=10                                00010008
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE                                         -      00020008
               DSN=&DSNCDC                                       -      00021008
               DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                              -      00022008
               DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=VB,LRECL=084)    -                   00023008
                  )                                              -      00024008
               COMPRESS EXTENDED                                 -      00025008
               CKPT=0K                                           -      00026008
               TO (SNODE                                         -      00027008
               DSN=&DSDKMA                                       -      00028008
               DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=VB,LRECL=084,BLKSIZE=27998)   -      00028108
               DISP=&DISP                                        -      00028208
               SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")                              00028308
STEP2    IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN                                            00028408

         PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSGFAIL')) PNODE                             00028608
         EIF                                                            00028708
