MEMBER NAME  CRPCENT
CRPCENT   PROCESS  SNODE=,PNODE=CDRM51                      -
                   &LRECL=110                               -
                   &BLKSIZE=23430
STEP1     COPY     FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                        -
                        PNODE                               -
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                   COMPRESS EXT                             -
                   TO  (SNODE                               -
                        DSN=&DSNKMA                         -
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE               -
                        LRECL=&LRECL                        -
                        RECFM=FB)                           -
                        DISP=(RPL,KEEP)                     -
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)
STEP2    IF (STEP1 ^= 0) THEN
NOTIFY2   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
          PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  CSI0700
CSI0700  PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=CDRM09                            -
               &BLKSIZE=27960                                         -
               &LRECL=120                                             -
               &RECFM=FB                                              -
               &MEM2=DSS1741                                          -
               &SLIB=J
STEP010  COPY  FROM (DSN=&DSN1                                        -
                     PNODE                                            -
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE                            -
                          DSORG=PS                                    -
                          LRECL=&LRECL                                -
                          RECFM=&RECFM)                               -
                     DISP=(SHR,KEEP)                                  -
                     UNIT=(SYSDA))                                    -
               COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                                   -
               TO   (DSN=&DSN2                                        -
                     SNODE                                            -
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=23476                               -
                          DSORG=PS                                    -
                          LRECL=580                                   -
                          RECFM=VB)                                   -
                     DISP=(OLD,KEEP)                                  -
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY)
         IF (STEP010 = 0) THEN
STEP020  RUN JOB (DSN=&DSN3) PNODE
         EIF
         IF (STEP010 = 0) THEN
STEP030  RUN JOB (DSN=&SLIB(&MEM2)) SNODE
         EIF
         IF (STEP010 = 0) THEN
STEP040  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&DSN1')) SNODE
         EIF
         IF (STEP010 > 0) THEN
STEP050  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&DSN1')) SNODE
         EIF

               &BLKSIZE=27960                                         -
               &LRECL=120                                             -
               &RECFM=FB                                              -
               &MEM2=DSS1750                                          -
               &SLIB=J

                     PNODE                                            -
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE                            -
                          DSORG=PS                                    -
                          LRECL=&LRECL                                -
                          RECFM=&RECFM)                               -

                     SNODE                                            -
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=6120                                -
                          DSORG=PS                                    -
                          LRECL=120                                   -
                          RECFM=FB)                                   -
                     DISP=(OLD,KEEP)                                  -
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY)

         EIF
         IF (STEP010 = 0) THEN

         EIF

         IF (STEP010 > 0) THEN

                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE                            -
                          DSORG=PS                                    -
                          LRECL=&LRECL                                -
                          RECFM=&RECFM)                               -
                     DISP=(SHR,KEEP)                                  -
                     UNIT=(SYSDA))                                    -
               COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                                   -
               TO   (DSN=&DSN2                                        -
                     SNODE                                            -
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=23476                               -
                          DSORG=PS                                    -
                          LRECL=560                                   -
                          RECFM=VB)                                   -
                     DISP=(OLD,KEEP)                                  -
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY)
         IF (STEP010 = 0) THEN
STEP020  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&DSN1')) SNODE
         EIF
         IF (STEP010 > 0) THEN
STEP030  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&DSN1')) SNODE
         EIF

               DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                              -      00022000
               DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=27920)    -      00023000
                  )                                              -      00024000
               COMPRESS EXTENDED                                 -      00025000
               CKPT=0K                                           -      00026000
               TO (SNODE                                         -      00027000
               DSN=&DSDKMA                                       -      00028000
               DISP=MOD                                          -      00029000
               SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")                              00030000
STEP2    IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN                                            00040001
NOTIFY1  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                  -      00050001
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSGFAIL')) PNODE                             00060001
         EIF                                                            00070001

MEMBER NAME  DSDPRESC
DSDPRESC PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=u060bbpd1                               0010
Copy1   RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                           -
             SYSOPTS=\"\                                    -
  \cat /opt/cyclone/in/prescient/bino.*     \               -
  \ > /opt/cyclone/in/prescient/prescient.txt  \            -
             \"\
       IF (Copy1 = 0) THEN
STEP010  COPY    FROM (DSN=&DSNNT                                     -     0040
                       SNODE                                          -     0050
                       DISP=(OLD,DELETE,KEEP)                         -     0080
                       SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(YES)")                   -     0050
                 COMPRESS EXTENDED                                    -     0090
                 TO   (DSN=&DSNCDC                                    -
                       PNODE                                          -     0110
                       DCB=(GDG.MODEL                                 -     0120
                            DSORG=PS                                  -     0130
                            LRECL=220                                 -     0140
                            BLKSIZE=27940                             -     0140
                            RECFM=FB)                                 -     0150
                       DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                        -     0160
                       AVGREC=K                                       -     0160
                       SPACE=(220,(10,10),RLSE)                       -     0160
                       UNIT=SYSDA)                                          0180
         IF  (STEP010 = 0) THEN
STEP2     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                      -
              SYSOPTS=\"\                                -
              \/bin/rm /opt/cyclone/in/prescient/bino.*      \  -
              \"\
         EIF
       EIF

MEMBER NAME  EDICOST
EDICOST   PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE PNODE=&PNODE                             00010001
STEP1 COPY FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                               -            00020000
                     PNODE                                 -            00021000

                     RECFM=FB)                             -            00025000
                     DISP=(OLD,KEEP)                       -            00026000
                     UNIT=(SYSDA))                         -            00026100
           COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                            -
           TO  (DSN=&DSNKMA                                -            00026400
                SNODE                                      -
                VSAMCAT=&KMACAT                            -            00026800
                DCB=(DSORG=VSAM)                           -
                DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                                        00027200

         PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&DSNCDC)) SNODE                                00027600
         ELSE                                                           00028000
NOTIFY2  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -            00029000
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DSNCDC)) SNODE                                00030000
         EIF                                                            00040000

                     PNODE                                 -            00021000

MEMBER NAME  EDIWIND2
EDIWIND2 PROCESS
STEP1   COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSNCDC                         -
                       PNODE                               -
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                  TO  (DSN="&PATHWIN/&DSNWIN"              -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no"          -
                       SNODE)                              -
                  COMPRESS EXT

* if the copy failed, put message to console for netview
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

* if the copy worked, then run the task on unix to copy the downloaded
* file to a mq series queue
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIFY2 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                          -
        SYSOPTS="&PATHPGM/&WIN D &LTR N wmshostq -q &QUEUE -m &DSNWIN"
        EIF

* if the unix task failed, put message to console for netview
STEP4   IF (NOTIFY2 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY3 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EIF

MEMBER NAME  ED880KMS
ED880KMS PROCESS  PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=A060EDI1 HOLD=NO            -      00010099
                 CLASS=1 PRTY=10 SNODEID=(CDUSER,CDUSER)                00020099
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=(SHR)                              -      00026999
             DSN=&DSNCDC)                                        -      00027177
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                   -      00027573
             TO   (SNODE DISP=MOD                                -      00028099
             DSN="PRODUCTION/KE880KSF(&S)"                       -      00030099
             SYSOPTS="TYPE(MBR)")                                       00040078
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN                                             00040199
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,                           -             00040299
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL',"&MSG1")) PNODE                                 00040399
        EXIT                                                            00040499
        EIF                                                             00040599
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                             00050099
STEP4   RUN TASK (PGM=AS400) SNODE                         -            00060099
        SYSOPTS="CMD(RNMM FILE(PRODUCTION/KE880KSF) MBR(&S) NEWMBR(&R))"00070099
        EIF                                                             00090099
STEP5   IF (STEP4 > 0) THEN                                             00100099
NOTIFY2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,                           -             00110099
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL',"&MSG1")) PNODE                                 00111099
        EIF                                                             00120088

MEMBER NAME  EGCS2V2
EGC2SVS   PROCESS  HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=SHR                                -
             DSN=&DSNCDC)                                        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                   -
             TO (SNODE DISP=(NEW)                                -
             SYSOPTS=\"'SET TYPE U'        \||                   -
                     \'SET CODE 101'       \||                   -
                     \'SET BLOCK 2048'     \||                   -
                     \'SET EXT (100,100)'  \||                   -
                     \'SET BUFFERED'       \||                   -
                     \'SET XLATE YES'"  \                        -
             DSN=&DSNSVS)
MEMBER NAME  EGC2SVS
EGC2SVS   PROCESS  HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=SHR                                -
             DSN=&DSNCDC)                                        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                   -
             TO (SNODE DISP=(NEW)                                -
             SYSOPTS=\"'SET TYPE U'         \||                  -
                     \'SET CODE 101'        \||                  -
                     \'SET BLOCK 4096'      \||                  -
                     \'SET EXT (1000,500)'  \||                  -
                     \'SET MAXEXTENTS 200'  \||                  -
                     \'SET BUFFERED'        \||                  -
                     \'SET XLATE YES'"  \                        -
             DSN=&DSNSVS)

                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)                                  00026800

         PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&MSG1')) PNODE                                00027100

MEMBER NAME  EMSR
EMSR   PROCESS
STEP1     COPY FROM (DSN=D958.MARSQ.PEMSMOVE.KMA011  -
                    DISP=SHR
                    DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=VB,BLKSIZE=27004,LRECL=270)  -
                    PNODE)  -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED -
                TO  (DSN=/transfer/emsdata       -
                      sysopts="strip.blanks=no:"  -
                      SNODE)
MEMBER NAME  EPSE050N
EPSE050N PROCESS PNODE=&PNODE SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN1)        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN1)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&TODSN1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DSN1MSG)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP02  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN2)        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN2)
        IF (STEP02 = 0) THEN
NOTFY03 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&TODSN2)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY04 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DSN2MSG)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP03  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN3)        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN3)
        IF (STEP03 = 0) THEN
NOTFY05 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&TODSN3)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY06 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DSN3MSG)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP04  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN4)        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN4)
        IF (STEP04 = 0) THEN
NOTFY07 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&TODSN4)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY08 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DSN4MSG)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP05  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                    -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                                  -
           \ncftpput -E -V -u krogeftp -p 3luS9egi \                 -
           \-d /XFER/log/gnxdsn1.log 209.225.42.75 . \               -
           \/XFER/gnxout/KROGER_LOCATIONS_PID_SEQUENCE.csv \         -
           \"\

        ELSE

        EXIT
        EIF

        SYSOPTS=\"\                                                  -

           \"\

        ELSE

        EXIT
        EIF

        SYSOPTS="rm /XFER/gnxout/*.*"

        ELSE

MEMBER NAME  EPS2OLP
EPS2OLP PROCESS PNODE=&PNODE                    -
                SNODE=&SNODE
STEP1   COPY    FROM(DSN=&FDSN                  -
                     PNODE                      -
                     UNIT=&FUNIT                -
                     DCB=&FDCB                  -
                     DISP=&FDISP)      -
                COMPRESS EXTENDED               -
                TO  (DSN=&TDSN                  -
                     SNODE                      -
                     UNIT=&TUNIT                -
                     DCB=&TDCB                  -
                     DISP=(&TDISP))
STEP2   IF  (STEP1 = 0) THEN
        RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
        ELSE
        RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'BAD ',&FAILMSG)) PNODE
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  ESCCHRG
ESCCHRG  PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                              -            00010001
                 PNODE=&PNODE                                           00010001
STEP1 COPY FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                               -            00020000
                     PNODE                                 -            00021000
                     DCB=(DSORG=PS                         -            00022000
                     LRECL=&LRECL                          -            00024000
                     RECFM=FB)                             -            00025000
                     DISP=(SHR)                            -            00026000
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY)                        -            00026000
           COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                            -
           TO (DSN=&DSNKMA                                 -            00026400
                     SYSOPTS="TYPE(MBR)"                   -            00022000
                     DISP=(RPL)                            -            00027200
                     SNODE)
         IF (STEP1 <= 4) THEN
STEP2    RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=AS400)                        -
             SYSOPTS="CMD(CALL CCDI002A &PNAME)"
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  ESIDNLD
ESIDNLD PROCESS  CLASS=1 HOLD=NO PRTY=10                                00010000
STEP3   COPY FROM (PNODE                                         -      00026900
               DSN=&DSNCDC                                       -      00027000
               DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                              -      00027100
               UNIT=(SYSDA)                                      -      00027200
                  )                                              -      00027300
               COMPRESS EXTENDED                                 -      00027400
               CKPT=0K                                           -      00027500
               TO (SNODE                                         -      00028000
               DSN=&DSNKMA                                       -      00030000
               DISP=(MOD)                                        -      00031000
               SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")                              00040000
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE FOR NETVIEW                00050000
STEP4   IF (STEP3 > 0) THEN                                             00060000
NOTIFY3 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -             00070000
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE                                 00080000
        EIF                                                             00090000

MEMBER NAME  ESPSCAO
ESPSCAO  PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                              -
                 PNODE=&PNODE
STEP0010 COPY FROM (DSN=&FROM                                 -
                     DISP=(SHR)                            -
                     PNODE)                                -
           COMPRESS EXT                                    -
           TO (DSN=&TO                                     -
                     DCB=(DSORG=PS                         -
                     RECFM=FB                              -
                     LRECL=&TOLRECL                        -
                     BLKSIZE=&TOBLKSZ)                     -
                     DISP=(&DISP)                          -
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY                         -
                     SNODE)

STEP0020  IF (STEP0010 GT 4) THEN
          GOTO ABEND
          EIF
          EXIT

ABEND    RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTSUB -
          PARM=("DSN=SYS4.CD.PDS.CNTL(CDERROR),DISP=SHR", -
          "FILE SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SPSNCAO)",          -
          "JOBNAME CAOCDERR",                             -
          "ZEKEADD '''ZADD EV 4801 REBUILD'''"            -
          )) PNODE

                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10

             DISP=RPL            -
             DSN=&TDSN           -

MEMBER NAME  FCBIDCD
FCBIDCD   PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF       (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
                     EXIT
          EIF

                   SNODE                                            -
                   SYSOPTS="&SCRIPT"
MEMBER NAME  FCBINVIN
FCBINVIN PROCESS HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
LIST     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                  -
             SYSOPTS=&LIST
FORMAT   RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                  -
             SYSOPTS=&CMD1
CHECK1   IF  (FORMAT = 0) THEN
COPY2MVS COPY                                       -
         FROM (SNODE                                -
               DISP=SHR                             -
               DSN=&FRMDSN)                         -
               COMPRESS EXTENDED                    -
         TO (PNODE                                  -
             DISP=&DISP                             -
             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=90)                -
             DSN=&TODSN)
         ELSE
CHECK2   IF  (FORMAT = 1) THEN
              EXIT
         ELSE
NOTIFY1  COPY                                       -
         FROM (SNODE                                -
               DISP=SHR                               -
               FILE=&ERRFL)                      -
         TO (PNODE                                  -
             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                -
             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80)   -
             DSN=&FMTDSN)
              EXIT
         EIF
         EIF
CHECK3   IF  (COPY2MVS = 0) THEN
CLEANUP  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                  -
             SYSOPTS=&CMD2
         ELSE
NOTIFY2  COPY                                       -
         FROM (SNODE                                -
               DISP=SHR                             -
               DSN=&ERRFL)                         -
         TO (PNODE                                  -
             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                -
             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80)   -
             DSN=&CPYDSN)
              EXIT
         EIF
         EXIT

   HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10

          DISP=SHR -
          DSN=&DSN1) -
      TO (PNODE -
          DSN=&DSN2 -
          DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE) -
          DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=300))
 IF (STEP01=0) THEN
STEP02 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE -
    SYSOPTS="&SCRIPT"
 EIF

        SYSOPTS=\"\ -                           BELOW ARE COMMENTS ONLY:
        \NCFTPPUT -E -V -U KROGER -P GR0CER \   -NCFTPPUT -E  -V  (REQUIRED)
                                               -U T.P ASSIGNED USERID
                                                -P T.P. PASSWORD
        \-D /XFER/LOG/CDRETEKC.LOG \ -            -D DIRECTORY/LOGFILE
        \207.170.30.55 \ -                    T.P IP ADDRESS
        \IMPORT/ADDISP/ \  -                 T.P. ASSIGNED DIRECTORY
        \/XFER/RETEKOUT/AD.OVR\ -                KROGER DIRECTORY/FILENAME
        \"\

MEMBER NAME  HBMCD
HBMCD     PROCESS  SNODE=N060CD03,PNODE=CDRM51                          00010001
STEP1     COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSN1                          -           00020000
                        PNODE                               -           00030000
                        DCB=(                               -           00040002
                        LRECL=90                            -           00050004
                        RECFM=FB)                           -           00060000
                        DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                   -           00070000
                        UNIT=(SYSDA))                       -           00080000
                   TO  (SNODE                               -           00090000
                        DSN=&DSN2                           -           00100000
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=6160                   -           00110000
                        LRECL=80                            -           00120003
                        RECFM=FB)                           -           00130000
                        DISP=RPL                            -           00140000
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)                                  00150000
STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                            00160000
NOTIFY1  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTFY2,                           -             00170000
         PARM=(CL4'GOOD')) PNODE                                        00180006
         ELSE                                                           00190000
NOTIFY2  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTFY2,                           -             00200000
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG2',#955317)) PNODE                        00210000
         EIF                                                            00220000
MEMBER NAME  INBAFTP
INBAFTP PROCESS PNODE=&PNODE SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP03  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                            -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                          -
           \ncftpput -E -V -u Cs506101 -p KrogCass2 \        -
           \-d /XFER/log/cassinfo.log ftp.cassinfo.com to_cass/ \-
           \/XFER/cass2out/cass2.txt\                        -
           \"\
MEMBER NAME  INBDEDI
INBDEDI PROCESS  PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=A060EDI1 HOLD=NO             -      00010099
                 CLASS=1 PRTY=10 SNODEID=(CDUSER,CDUSER)                00020099
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=(SHR)                              -      00026999
             DSN=&DSNCDC)                                        -      00027177
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                   -      00027573
             TO   (SNODE DISP=MOD                                -      00028099
             DSN="PRODUCTION/KEINPF(&S)"                         -      00030099
             SYSOPTS="TYPE(MBR)")                                       00040078
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN                                             00040199
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,                           -             00040299
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL',"&MSG1")) PNODE                                 00040399
        EXIT                                                            00040499
        EIF                                                             00040599
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                             00050099
STEP4   RUN TASK (PGM=AS400) SNODE                         -            00060099
        SYSOPTS="CMD(RNMM FILE(PRODUCTION/KEINPF) MBR(&S) NEWMBR(&R))"  00070099
        EIF                                                             00090099
STEP5   IF (STEP4 > 0) THEN                                             00100099
NOTIFY2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,                           -             00110099
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL',"&MSG1")) PNODE                                 00111099
        EIF                                                             00120088

          TO   (DSN=&DSNKMA                                 -
                DISP=NEW                                    -
                DCB=(RECFM=VBM,LRECL=137,BLKSIZE=4110)      -
                SNODE)

MEMBER NAME  JDELD45Z
JDELD45Z PROCESS
*
*        -----------------------------------------------
*        If this process abends it will kickoff job
*        JDECDERR. RETRANSMIT BY RESTARTING JOB JDELD45 at
*        step JDELD45Z.
*        -----------------------------------------------
*
*
JDELD45Z COPY FROM (PNODE                                          -
                    DSN=FM.PR.F59RP45P                             -
                    DISP=SHR )                                     -
              TO   (SNODE                                          -
                    DSN='\\N703DPROD188\PERIMG\HOST\F59RP45.001'   -
                    SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)" )
*
         IF (JDELD45Z <> 0) THEN
             GOTO ABEND
         EIF
*
*        ------------
*        Exit process
*        ------------
*
         EXIT
*
*        -----------------------------------------------
*        Execute job JDECDERR to indicate Connect:Direct
*        file transfer error
*        -----------------------------------------------
*
ABEND    RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTSUB -
         PARM=("DSN=PROD.JCLSPC(CDERROR),DISP=SHR", -
         "FILE    PROD.CNTRLIB(JDELD45Z)", -
         "JOBNAME JDECDERR", -
         "ZEKEADD '''ZADD JOB JDECDERR REBUILD'''" -
         )) PNODE

*
*        -----------------------------------------------

*        JDECDERR. RETRANSMIT BY RESTARTING JOB JDELD51 at
*        step JDELD51Y.
*        -----------------------------------------------
*
*

                    DSN=G.FMPR.F59RP51(0)                          -
                    DISP=SHR )                                     -
              TO   (SNODE                                          -
              DSN='\\N703SRV006\PERCOMP$\RALPHS\UPDATE\F59RP51.001' -

         IF (JDELD51Y <> 0) THEN
             GOTO ABEND
         EIF
*
*        ------------
*        Exit process
*        ------------
*
         EXIT

*        -----------------------------------------------
*        Execute job JDECDERR to indicate Connect:Direct
*        file transfer error
*        -----------------------------------------------
*

         PARM=("DSN=PROD.JCLSPC(CDERROR),DISP=SHR", -

                     DCB=(LRECL=140,RECFM=FB,BLKSIZE=27860)) -
                TO  (DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)        -

                     &COMPRESS

       EIF

                 DSN=&DSN2                                         -    00030000

MEMBER NAME  KACMAXDN

                 MAXDELAY=UNLIMITED                        -
                 PNODE=&PNODE

                     UNIT=SYSDA                            -
                     DISP=(SHR)                            -
                    PNODE)                                 -
                TO(DSN=&DSNADS                            -
                     DISP=(SHR)                            -
                     SNODE)

                 MAXDELAY=UNLIMITED                        -
                 PNODE=&PNODE

                     DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                     -
                     SNODE)                                -
                TO(DSN=&DSNCDC                             -
                     UNIT=SYSDA                            -
                     DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)               -
                     SPACE=(CYL,(10,5),RLSE)               -
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE                 -
                          RECFM=FB                         -
                          LRECL=&LRECL)                    -
                    PNODE)

MEMBER NAME  KAC2WAY
KAC2WAY PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE                              -            00010003
                 MAXDELAY=UNLIMITED                        -            00020000
                 PNODE=&PNODE                                           00030000
STEP1  COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSNADS                           -            00040000
                     DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                     -            00050000
                     SNODE)                                -            00060000
                TO(DSN=&DSNCDC                             -            00070000
                     UNIT=SYSDA                            -            00080000
                     DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)               -            00090000
                     SPACE=(CYL,(10,5),RLSE)               -            00100000
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE                 -            00110000
                          RECFM=FB                         -            00120000
                          LRECL=&LRECL)                    -            00130000
                    PNODE)                                              00140000
STEP2  IF       (STEP1 EQ 0) THEN                                       00150002
       COPY      FROM(DSN=&DSNCDC2                         -            00160000
                      UNIT=SYSDA                           -            00170000
                      DISP=(SHR)                           -            00180000
                     PNODE)                                -            00190000
                 TO(DSN=&DSNADS                            -            00200000
                      DISP=(SHR)                           -            00210000
                      SNODE)                                            00220000
       EIF                                                              00230000
MEMBER NAME  KAP05NDM
KAP05NDM  PROCESS  SNODE=,PNODE=CDRM51
STEP1     COPY     FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                        -
                        PNODE                               -
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                   COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                     -
                   TO  (SNODE                               -
                        DSN=&DSNKMA                         -
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=2660                   -
                        LRECL=133                           -
                        RECFM=FB)                           -
                        DISP=(RPL,KEEP)                     -
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)
STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIFY1  RUN TASK(PGM=ZEKENDM,                              -
         PARM=(CL46"S=SSSI,D=&DSNKMA")) SNODE
NOTIFY2  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
         PARM=(CL4'GOOD',"ZACK COMPLETED &DSNKMA ")) SNODE
         ELSE
NOTIFY3  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL',"NY NDM &MSG1")) PNODE
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  KATNDMP

                   PNODE=CDRM51                             -           00011000
                   &LRECL=208                               -           00020000
                   &BLKSIZE=23296                                       00030000

                        PNODE                               -           00050000
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -           00060000
                   COMPRESS EXT                             -           00070000
                   TO  (SNODE                               -           00080000
                        DSN=&DSNKMA                         -           00090000
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE               -           00100000
                        LRECL=&LRECL                        -           00110000
                        RECFM=FB)                           -           00120000
                        DISP=RPL                            -           00130000
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)                                  00140000

          PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE                               00170000
         EIF                                                            00180000

                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE               -           00020000

MEMBER NAME  KATRALPH
KATRALPH  PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE                                   -     00010003
                   PNODE=&PNODE                                   -     00020003
                   CLASS=1                                              00030003
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN1                                 -     00040003
                        PNODE                                     -     00050003
                        DISP=SHR)                                 -     00060003
                   TO  (DSN=&DSN2                                 -     00070003
                        SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT) STRIP.BLANKS(NO)" -     00080003
                        SNODE                                     -     00090003
                        DISP=(&DISP))                             -     00100003
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                                    00110003
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE FOR NETVIEW                00120003
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN                                             00130003
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                    -     00140003
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE                                 00150003
        EXIT                                                            00160003
        EIF                                                             00170003
MEMBER NAME  KATSFTP
KATSFTP PROCESS PNODE=&PNODE SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    - 000001
             TO (SNODE            - KATSFT
             DISP=(RPL)           - 000002
             DSN=&TODSN)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP03  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE           - 000006
        SYSOPTS=\"\                   -
           \scp -v -Q -u \      - 000007
           \/XFER/prgkatsout/kats2.txt \   -
           \ KRO0079@ftp.prgx.com:kats2.txt \  -
           \>/XFER/log/kats.log 2>&1\     -
           \"\

                        PNODE                               -           00050000
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -           00060000
                   COMPRESS EXT                             -           00070000
                   TO  (SNODE                               -           00080000
                        DSN=&DSNKMA                         -           00090000
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE               -           00100000
                        LRECL=&LRECL                        -           00110000
                        RECFM=FB)                           -           00120000
                        DISP=(RPL,KEEP)                     -           00130000
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)                                  00140000
STEP2    IF (STEP1 ^= 0) THEN                                           00150000
NOTIFY2   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -          00180000
          PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE                               00190000
         EIF                                                            00200000

                PNODE=&PNODE                                            00010001

                 DISP=(SHR)                                -            00026000
                 PNODE)                                    -            00021000
           COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                            -
           TO (DSN=&DSNOWS                                 -            00026400
               DCB=(DSORG=PS                               -            00022000

MEMBER NAME  KCCNN01
KCCNN01   PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSNMVS DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSNNT  DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
MEMBER NAME  KCLPULL1
* THIS CALL COPIES DATA FROM A LAN AND, IF SUCCESSFUL, COPIES A DUMMY
* BACK.  ALSO, THE CATALOG OF DSN2 WILL KICK OFF JOB KCLR010.
*
KCLPULL1  PROCESS
STEP01    COPY     FROM(SNODE DSN=&DSN1                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (PNODE DSN=&DSN2                             -
                        AVGREC=U                                    -
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=27900                          -
                             DSORG=PS                               -
                             LRECL=300                              -
                             RECFM=FB)                              -
                        DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                     -
                        SPACE=(CYL,(1,5),RLSE)                      -
                        UNIT=(SYSDA))                               -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
     IF  (STEP01 = 0) THEN
STEP02    COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN='D966.KCLSQ.PDETAIL.KCLDUMMY'     -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (SNODE DSN=&DSN1                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
     EIF
MEMBER NAME  KCLPUSH1
KCLPUSH1  PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (SNODE DSN=&DSN2                             -
                              DISP=(&DISP))                         -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
MEMBER NAME  KDPCD2K
KDPCD2K  PROC  PNODE=CDRM52 SNODE="cs_dev"                            -
               &DSN1=D966.KDPSQ.PDETAIL.KDPD0045                      -
               &BLKSIZE=23612                                         -
               &LRECL=454                                             -
               &RECFM=VB
STEP010  COPY  FROM (DSN=&DSN1                                        -
                     PNODE                                            -
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE                            -
                          DSORG=PS                                    -
                          LRECL=&LRECL                                -
                          RECFM=&RECFM)                               -
                     DISP=(SHR,KEEP)                                  -
                     UNIT=(SYSDA))                                    -
               TO   (dsn="/usr/zadall/rdm/xfer/kdpfiles/kdpdn"        -
                     snode                                            -
      sysopts=":datatype=text:permiss=666:strip.blanks=no:")          -
               COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'
STEP020  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                    -
                 sysopts="/usr/zadall/rdm/bin/kzkdpdate.ss"

         EIF
         IF (STEP010 = 0) THEN

         EIF
         IF (STEP010 > 0) THEN
STEP050  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&DSN1')) SNODE
         EIF

                     PNODE                                            -

                     UNIT=(SYSDA))                                    -
               COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                                   -
               TO   (DSN=&DSN2                                        -
                     SNODE                                            -

                     UNIT=DLBLONLY)

         EIF
         IF (STEP010 > 0) THEN
STEP030  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&DSN1')) SNODE
         EIF

                   PNODE=&PNODE                    -
                   CLASS=1

                        SNODE                      -
                        DISP=SHR)                  -
                   TO  (DSN=&DSN1                  -
                        PNODE                      -
                        DISP=SHR)                  -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
STEP2     IF  (STEP1 = 0) THEN
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
          ELSE
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) PNODE
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  LKP0960A
LKP0960A  PROCESS
*
STEP1 COPY FROM(&NODE  DSN=D999.LKP.LKPKMANM.DSNTIAUL    DISP=SHR)    - 00000060
      TO (DSN='/usr/dbutil/db2/xfer/rcv/lkp.lkpkmanm.dsntiaul'        - 00000070
            DISP=(&DISP1)    SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=BINARY" )             -
                   COMPRESS EXT

* if the copy failed, put message to console for netview
CHECK1  IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                        -
   PARM=(CL4'FAIL','DW ERROR: LKP0960A FAILED-LKPKMANM FILE')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

* if the copy worked, then run the task on unix to note the ndm
* process worked
STEP2 IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIFY2 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                     -
        SYSOPTS="/usr/dbutil/scripts/lkp0960a.goodeoj.ss"
        EIF

* if the unix task failed, put message to console for netview
STEP3  IF (NOTIFY2 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY3 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -
   PARM=(CL4'FAIL','DW ERROR: LKP0960A FAILED-UNIX SCRIPT ERROR')) PNODE
        EIF

             DSN=&TODSNC)

        ELSE

        EXIT

MEMBER NAME  MVS2VSE
DATAXVSE  PROCESS  PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE                     -      00010001
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10                                 00020000
STEP1   COPY TO (SNODE DISP=(RPL,KEEP,KEEP)                      -      00021000
             DSN=&DSNKMA                                         -      00022000
             UNIT=DLBLONLY                                       -      00023000
             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=256,BLKSIZE=256))      -      00024000
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                   -      00025000
             FROM (PNODE DISP=(OLD,DELETE,KEEP)                  -      00026000
             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=256,BLKSIZE=256)                -      00027000
             DSN=&DSNCDC)                                               00028000
STEP2 IF (STEP1=0) THEN                                                 00029000
     RUN JOB PNODE (DSN=&DSNNT)                                         00030000
  EIF                                                                   00040000
MEMBER NAME  NDMCITY
NDMCITY  PROCESS PNODE=CDRM52 SNODE=HOST10
STEP010  COPY  FROM (DSN=U080.PEYSQ.DILLION.CITY                      -
                     PNODE                                            -
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=                                    -
                          DSORG=PS                                    -
                          LRECL=                                      -
                          RECFM=      )                               -
                     DISP=(SHR,KEEP)                                  -
                     UNIT=(SYSDA))                                    -
               COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                                   -
               TO   (DSN=KROGER2.CITY                                 -
                     SNODE                                            -
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=                                    -
                          DSORG=PS                                    -
                          LRECL=                                      -
                          RECFM=  )                                   -
                     DISP=(OLD,KEEP)                                  -
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY)
         IF (STEP010 = 0) THEN
STEP020  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&DSN1')) SNODE
         EIF
         IF (STEP010 > 0) THEN
STEP030  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&DSN1')) SNODE
         EIF

                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED

MEMBER NAME  NDMPIDPR
NDMPIDPR PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                              -            00010001
                 PNODE=&PNODE                                           00010001
STEP1 COPY FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                               -            00020000
                     DISP=(SHR)                            -            00026000
                     PNODE)                                -            00021000
           COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                            -
           TO (DSN=&DSNOWS                                 -            00026400
                     DCB=(DSORG=PS                         -            00022000
                     RECFM=FB                              -            00025000
                     LRECL=200                             -            00024000
                     BLKSIZE=32600)                        -            00024000
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY                         -            00026100
                     SNODE)
      IF (STEP1=0) THEN
STEP2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY                               -            00020000
      PARM=(CL4'GOOD',CL44'&MEMG'))                        -            00020000
      PNODE                                                             00020000
STEP3 RUN TASK (PGM=ZEKENDM,                               -            00020000
      PARM=(CL44'&ZEKEDSN'))                               -            00020000
      SNODE                                                             00020000
      ELSE
STEP4 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY                               -            00020000
      PARM=(CL4'FAIL',CL44'&MEMB'))                        -            00020000
      PNODE                                                             00020000
      EIF

MEMBER NAME  NDMTAPE
NDMTAPE  PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                              -            00010001
                 SNODEID=(SUPERUSR,SUPERUSR)               -            00010001
                 PNODE=&PNODE                                           00010001
STEP1 COPY FROM (DSN=&PDSN                                 -            00020000
                     PNODE                                 -            00021000
                     DCB=(&PDCB)                           -            00022000
                     DISP=(OLD)                            -            00026000
                     UNIT=(SYSDA))                         -            00026100
           COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                            -
           TO (DSN=&SDSN                                   -            00026400
                     DCB=(&SDCB)                           -            00022000
                     DISP=(RPL)                            -            00027200
                     UNIT=(TNOASGN)                        -            00026100
                     SNODE)
STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                            00027400
NOTIFY1  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -            00027500
         PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&SDSN)) SNODE                                  00027600
         ELSE                                                           00028000
NOTIFY2  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -            00029000
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&SDSN)) SNODE                                  00030000
         EIF                                                            00040000

MEMBER NAME  NDMTOTRP
NDMTOTRP  PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE                                   -
                   PNODE=&PNODE                                   -
                   CLASS=1
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN1                                 -
                        PNODE                                     -
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=27930                        -
                        LRECL=133                                 -
                        RECFM=FBA)                                -
                        DISP=SHR)                                 -
                   ckpt=0k                                        -
                   TO  (DSN=&DSN2                                 -
                        SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT):STRIP.BLANKS(NO)" -
                        SNODE                                     -
                        DISP=(&DISP))                             -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE FOR NETVIEW
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                    -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  NDMTRP
NDMTRP  PROCESS HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10 SNODE=&SNODE
MOVEFL  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                           -
             SYSOPTS=\"\                                    -
       \mv /opt/cyclone/in/tradepoint/D911*     \           -
       \/opt/cyclone/work/tradepoint/inbound/   \           -
             \"\
         IF (MOVEFL = 0) THEN
CATFL   RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                           -
         SYSOPTS=\"\                                        -
  \cat /opt/cyclone/work/tradepoint/inbound/*  \            -
  \ > /opt/cyclone/work/tradepoint/combine/prsdata.txt   \  -
             \"\
         IF (CATFL = 0) THEN
COPY    COPY FROM (SNODE                                    -
                  DISP=SHR                                  -
       SYSOPTS=":STRIP.BLANKS=NO:DATATYPE=TEXT:XLATE=YES:"  -
                  DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=200,BLKSIZE=27800)    -
                  DSN=&DSNEDI)                              -
                  COMPRESS EXTENDED                         -
             TO  (PNODE                                     -
                  DSN=&DSNMVS                               -
                  DCB=&DCBMVS                               -
                  SPACE=&SPACE                              -
                  UNIT=(SYSDA)                              -
                  DISP=&DISPMVS)
         IF (COPY = 0) THEN
RMVUP        RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                      -
             SYSOPTS=\"\                                    -
             \rm //opt/cyclone/work/tradepoint/inbound/*  \           -
             \"\
         EIF
         EIF
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  NDMZEKE
NDMZEKE  PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                              -            00010001
                 SNODEID=(SUPERUSR,SUPERUSR)               -            00010001
                 PNODE=&PNODE                                           00010001
STEP1 COPY FROM (DSN=&PDSN                                 -            00020000
                     PNODE                                 -            00021000
                     DCB=(&PDCB)                           -            00022000
                     DISP=(OLD)                            -            00026000
                     UNIT=(SYSDA))                         -            00026100
           COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                            -
           TO (DSN=&SDSN                                   -            00026400
                     DCB=(&SDCB)                           -            00022000
                     DISP=(RPL)                            -            00027200
                     UNIT=(DLBLONLY)                       -            00026100
                     SNODE)
STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                            00027400
NOTIFY1  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -            00027500
         PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&SDSN)) SNODE                                  00027600
         ELSE                                                           00028000
NOTIFY2  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -            00029000
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&SDSN)) SNODE                                  00030000
         EIF                                                            00040000
STEP3    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                            00027400
         RUN TASK(PGM=ZEKENDM,                            -             00027500
         PARM=(CL46'S=SSSI,D=&SDSN')) SNODE                             00027600
         EIF                                                            00040000
MEMBER NAME  NDMZEK2
NDMZEK2  PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                              -            00010001
                 SNODEID=(SUPERUSR,SUPERUSR)               -            00010001
                 PNODE=&PNODE                                           00010001
STEP1 COPY FROM (DSN=&PDSN                                 -            00020000
                     PNODE                                 -            00021000
                     DISP=(SHR)                            -            00026000
                     UNIT=(SYSDA))                         -            00026100
           COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                            -
           TO (DSN=&SDSN                                   -            00026400
                     DISP=(RPL)                            -            00027200
                     SNODE)
STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                            00027400
NOTIFY1  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -            00027500
         PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&SDSN)) SNODE                                  00027600
         ELSE                                                           00028000
NOTIFY2  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -            00029000
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&SDSN)) SNODE                                  00030000
         EIF                                                            00040000
STEP3    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                            00027400
         RUN TASK(PGM=ZEKENDM,                            -             00027500
         PARM=(CL46'S=SSSI,D=&SDSN')) SNODE                             00027600
         EIF                                                            00040000
MEMBER NAME  NETINFO
NETINFO  PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=3
STEP1    COPY   FROM(DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                TO  (DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)      -
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY)                        -
                     &COMPRESS
       IF (STEP1 EQ 0) THEN
STEP2     RUN JOB(DSN=J(&JOBFILE)) SNODE
       ELSE
          RUN JOB(DSN=J(DSJEMAIL)) SNODE
       EIF

MEMBER NAME  NETTEST
//#910197J JOB  ,T910197PROWS,REGION=0K,NOTIFY=#910197,
//      MSGCLASS=X,MSGLEVEL=(1,1),CLASS=T
//*   SEND NETINFO DATASET TO DILLON VIA CONNECT DIRECT                 01563008
//*                                                                     01564008
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*01565008
//STEPCD  EXEC PGM=DMBATCH,PARM=(YYSLYNN)                               01566008
//*                                                                     01566008
//*TEPLIB   DD DSN=D955.NDM18.LINKLIB,                                  01567008
//STEPLIB   DD DSN=D955.NDM.LINKLIB,                                    01567008
//             DISP=SHR                                                 01568008
//DMMSGFIL  DD DSN=D955.NDM.MSG,                                        01567008
//             DISP=SHR                                                 01568008
//DMNETMAP  DD DSN=D955.NDM.NETMAP,                                     01567008
//             DISP=SHR                                                 01568008
//*MPUBLIB  DD DSN=D955.NDM.PROCESS.LIB,                                01567008
//DMPUBLIB  DD DSN=#910197.NDM.PROCESS.LIB,                             01567008
//             DISP=SHR                                                 01568008
//NDMCMDS   DD SYSOUT=*                                                 01569508
//DMPRINT   DD SYSOUT=*                                                 01569508
//SYSPRINT  DD SYSOUT=*                                                 01569508
//SYSUDUMP  DD SYSOUT=*                                                 01569008
//SYSIN     DD DSN=#910197.CTLLIB(CRJE660),                             01569108
//*YSIN     DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(C&FILE),                          01569108
//             DISP=SHR                                                 01569208
MEMBER NAME  NETWRUP
NETWRUP   PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
MEMBER NAME  NEXSPLIT
COPYNEX  PROCESS CLASS=1 HOLD=NO PRTY=10                                00001000
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE                                         -      00002000
               DSN=&DSNCDC                                       -      00003000
               DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                              -      00004000
               DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=VB,LRECL=084)    -                   00005000
                  )                                              -      00006000
               COMPRESS EXTENDED                                 -      00007000
               CKPT=0K                                           -      00008000
               TO (SNODE                                         -      00009000
               DSN=&DSDKMA                                       -      00009100
               DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=VB,LRECL=084,BLKSIZE=27998)   -      00009200
               DISP=&DISP                                        -      00009300
               SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")                              00009400
STEP2    IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN                                            00009500
NOTIFY1  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                  -      00009600
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSGFAIL')) PNODE                             00009700
         EIF                                                            00009800
STEP3    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                            00009900
SPLIT    RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                              -       00010000
         SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS                                               00011000
         EIF                                                            00012000
MEMBER NAME  NTPSWD01
NTPSWD01  PROCESS  SNODEID=(&USERID,&PSWORD)
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
MEMBER NAME  OLDMVST
OLPMVST PROCESS PNODE=CDRM33 SNODE=CDRM52                             -
STEP01  RUN TASK(PGM=ZEKENDM,PARM=(CL10'D=&PARM')) SNODE
STEP02  IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NTIFYG1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) SNODE
NTIFYG2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
        ELSE
NTIFYF1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) SNODE
NTIFYF2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  OLPCOPY
OLPCOPY   PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE                    -
                   PNODE=&PNODE                    -
                   CLASS=1                         -
                   SNODEID=(CONNECT,DIRECT)
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN1                  -
                        PNODE                      -
                        DISP=SHR)                  -
                   TO  (DSN=&DSN2                  -
                        SNODE                      -
                        DISP=(&DISP))              -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
STEP2     IF  (STEP1 = 0) THEN
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
          ELSE
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) PNODE
          EXIT
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  OLPFLAN
OLPNT     PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE                    -
                   PNODE=&PNODE                    -
                   CLASS=1                         -
                   HOLD=NO
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&FDSN                  -
                        SNODE                      -
                        DISP=&FDISP)               -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED               -
                   CKPT=0K                         -
                   TO  (DSN=&TDSN                  -
                        PNODE                      -
                        UNIT=(SYSDA)               -
                        DCB=&TDCB                  -
                        DISP=&TDISP)
STEP2     IF  (STEP1 = 0) THEN
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
          ELSE
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'BAD ',&BADMSG)) PNODE
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  OLPFMVS
OLPFMVS PROCESS PNODE=&PNODE                    -
                SNODE=&SNODE
STEP1   COPY    FROM(DSN=&FDSN                  -
                     PNODE                      -
                     UNIT=&FUNIT                -
                     DCB=&FDCB                  -
                     DISP=&FDISP)      -
                COMPRESS EXTENDED               -
                TO  (DSN=&TDSN                  -
                     SNODE                      -
                     UNIT=&TUNIT                -
                     DCB=&TDCB                  -
                     DISP=(&TDISP))
STEP2   IF  (STEP1 = 0) THEN
        RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
        ELSE
        RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'BAD ',&BADMSG)) PNODE
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  OLPMRS
OLPMRS    PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE                     -
                   PNODE=&PNODE                     -
                   CLASS=1
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&FDSN1                  -
                        PNODE                       -
                        DISP=SHR)                   -
                   TO  (DSN=&TDSN1                  -
                        SNODE                       -
                        DISP=(&DISP)                -
                        SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)") -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
          RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                 -
              SYSOPTS="&COMPLETE"
STEP2     IF  (STEP1 = 0) THEN
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
          ELSE
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) PNODE
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  OLPMSG
OLPMSG  PROCESS  SNODE=,PNODE=CDRM51
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,                              -
                  PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&ZACKMSG))                 -
                  PNODE
NOTIFY2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,                              -
                  PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG))                 -
                  SNODE
MEMBER NAME  OLPMVST
OLPMVST PROCESS SNODE=,PNODE=CDRM51
STEP01  RUN TASK(PGM=ZEKENDM,PARM=(CL10"D=&PARM")) PNODE
STEP02  IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NTIFYG1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) SNODE
NTIFYG2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
        ELSE
NTIFYF1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) SNODE
NTIFYF2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  OLPPC
OLPPC PROCESS SNODE=,PNODE=CDRM51
STEP01 COPY  FROM(PNODE                               -
                  DSN=&DSN1                           -
                  DISP=SHR)                           -
               COMPRESS EXTENDED                      -
               TO(SNODE                               -
                  DSN=&DSN2                           -
                  DISP=(&DISP1))
STEP02  IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NTIFYG1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
        ELSE
NTIFYF1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  OLPPCB
OLPPCB   PROC
STEP01   COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN3                                    -
                       SNODE)                                       -
                  TO  (DSN=&DSN4                                    -
                       DISP=(SHR,KEEP)                              -
                       DCB=(BLKSIZE=8000,LRECL=80,RECFM=FB,DSORG=PS)-
                       PNODE)
STEP02   IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
STEP03   COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN1                                    -
                       SNODE)                                       -
                  TO  (DSN=&DSN2                                    -
                       UNIT=SYSDA,                                  -
                       SPACE=&SPACE,                                -
                       AVGREC=K                                     -
                       DISP=&DISP,                                  -
                       DCB=&DCB,                                    -
                       PNODE)
         ELSE
NOTIFY1  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                     -
             PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DSN2)) PNODE
         EIF
STEP04   IF (STEP03 = 0) THEN
STEP05   COPY          FROM(DSN=&DSN5                               -
                           DISP=(SHR)                               -
                           PNODE)                                   -
                       TO  (DSN=&DSN1                               -
                           DISP=(SHR)                               -
                           SNODE)
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  OLPTMVS
OLPTMVS PROCESS SNODE=,PNODE=CDRM51
STEP01  RUN TASK(PGM=ZEKENDM,PARM=(CL10"D=&PARM")) PNODE
STEP02  IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NTIFYG1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) SNODE
NTIFYG2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
        ELSE
NTIFYF1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) SNODE
NTIFYF2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  OLPTUNX
OLPTUNX PROCESS SNODE=,PNODE=CDRM33
STEP01 RUN TASK(PGM=UNIX) SNODE SYSOPTS= -
  \"/HOME/WINDB/WINDB/KROGER_SCRIPTS/RUNRGTI.SS\ -
  \ /HOME/WINDB/WINDB/KROGER_SCRIPTS/WINBATCH1.SS BOHUPLOAD ALL"\
STEP02  IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NTIFYG1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) SNODE
NTIFYG2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
        ELSE
NTIFYF1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) SNODE
NTIFYF2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  OLPUNXT
OLPUNXT PROCESS SNODE=,PNODE=CDRM33
STEP01 RUN TASK(PGM=UNIX) SNODE SYSOPTS= -
  \"/HOME/WINDB/WINDB/KROGER_SCRIPTS/RUNRGTI.SS\ -
  \ /HOME/WINDB/WINDB/KROGER_SCRIPTS/WINBATCH1.SS BOHUPLOAD ALL"\
STEP02  IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NTIFYG1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) SNODE
NTIFYG2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
        ELSE
NTIFYF1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) SNODE
NTIFYF2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  PCRMVSUB
PCRMVSUB  PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                      SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                   -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
MEMBER NAME  PCRMVSUX
PCRMVSUX  PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                      SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                   -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
CHECK1    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
          RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                 -
            SYSOPTS="&SCRIPT"
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  PEYABCA
PEYABCA PROCESS                                          -

STEP0010 COPY FROM (DSN="&ZWINDSN1.&ZWINDSN2"            -
                    SNODE)                               -
                TO (DSN=&ZMVSDSN                         -
                    DCB=(DSORG=PS,                       -
                         RECFM=FB,                       -
                         LRECL=&LRECL,                   -
                         BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE)               -
                    SPACE=(TRK,(30,10,))                 -
                    DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)              -
                    PNODE)                               -
              COMPRESS EXT

*  if the copy failed, put a message to the console for netview
*  and exit the process
       IF (STEP0010 GT 0) THEN
STEP0020  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                         -
            PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG1)) PNODE
          EXIT
       EIF

*  if the copy was ok, then rename the file
STEP0030  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                      -
            SYSOPTS=\"mv &ZWINDSN1.&ZWINDSN2\            -
                  \ &ZWINDSN1.&ZWINDSN2..sent"\

*  if the delete failed, put a message to the console for netview
       IF (STEP0030 GT 0) THEN
STEP0040  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                         -
            PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
       EIF
MEMBER NAME  PEYABCW
PEYABCW PROCESS                                          -

STEP0010 COPY FROM (DSN="&ZWINDSN1.&ZWINDSN2"            -
                    SNODE)                               -
                TO (DSN=&ZMVSDSN                         -
                    DCB=(DSORG=PS,                       -
                         RECFM=FB,                       -
                         LRECL=&LRECL,                   -
                         BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE)               -
                    SPACE=(TRK,(30,10,))                 -
                    DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)              -
                    PNODE)                               -
              COMPRESS EXT

*  if the copy failed, put a message to the console for netview
*  and exit the process
       IF (STEP0010 GT 0) THEN
STEP0020  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                         -
            PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG1)) PNODE
          EXIT
       EIF

*  if the copy was ok, then rename the file
STEP0030  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                      -
            SYSOPTS=\"mv &ZWINDSN1.&ZWINDSN2\            -
                  \ &ZWINDSN1.&ZWINDSN2..sent"\

*  if the delete failed, put a message to the console for netview
       IF (STEP0030 GT 0) THEN
STEP0040  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                         -
            PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
       EIF
MEMBER NAME  PEYABC81
* THIS PROCESS IS SUBMITTED BY PEYTON CORP. IF PROBLEMS OCCUR THEN
* CALL THE PEYTON DP SUPERVISOR
*
PEYABC81     PROCESS                                                  -
             PNODE=CDRM51                                             -
             SNODE=CDRM40                                             -
             SNODEID=(CONNECT,DIRECT)                                 -
             HOLD=NO
STEP1        COPY  FROM(PNODE  DSN=U080.AIR1)                         -
                   TO(                                                -
                     DSN=ABC.AIRBORNE.FILE.A                          -
                     SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"                         -
                     DISP=(RPL))                                      -
                     COMPRESS EXTENDED
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY OPERATOR
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIF2P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
   PARM=(CL4'FAIL','PEYABC81 FAILED, CONTACT PEYTON DP SUPERVISOR'))  -
         PNODE
        EIF
* IF STEP1 WORKED THEN RUN PROCESS ON VSE
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
SUBPROC  RUN JOB (DSN=J(AIR181)) SNODE
        EIF
*

* THIS PROCESS IS SUBMITTED BY PEYTON CORP. IF PROBLEMS OCCUR THEN
* CALL THE PEYTON DP SUPERVISOR

             PNODE=CDRM51                                             -
             SNODE=CDRM40                                             -

                   TO(                                                -
                     DSN=ABC.AIRBORNE.FILE.A7                         -
                     SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"                         -
                     DISP=(RPL))                                      -
                     COMPRESS EXTENDED
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY OPERATOR
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIF2P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
   PARM=(CL4'FAIL','PEYABC87 FAILED, CONTACT PEYTON DP SUPERVISOR'))  -
         PNODE
        EIF
* IF STEP1 WORKED THEN RUN PROCESS ON VSE
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
SUBPROC  RUN JOB (DSN=J(AIR087)) SNODE
        EIF
*
