MEMBER NAME  PEYFRYS
PEYFRYS   PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
         TO  ( DSN=&DSN2                                  -
               DCB=(DSORG=PS                              -             00022000
                    BLKSIZE=8880                          -
                    LRECL=222                             -             00024000
                    RECFM=FB)                             -             00025000
               UNIT=&UNIT1                                -
               DISP=(&DISP1))                             -
               COMPRESS EXTENDED
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY OPERATOR
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIF2P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
   PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&FAILMSG'))  PNODE
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  PEYGAG
PEYGAG       PROCESS
STEP1        COPY  FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1)                              -
                   TO(                                                -
                     DSN=&DSN2                                        -
                     SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"                         -
                     DISP=(RPL))                                      -
                     COMPRESS EXTENDED
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIF2P RUN TASK(PGM=D955WTO,                             -
        PARM=(&FAILMSG))
        EIF
*
* IF THE COPY WORKED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND START GAGNON PROCESS
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIF3P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&GOODMSG')) PNODE
COPYGOOD     COPY  FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN3)                              -
                   TO(                                                -
                     DSN=&DSN4                                        -
                     SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"                         -
                     DISP=(RPL))                                      -
                     COMPRESS EXTENDED
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  PEYGAGSR
PEYGAGSR     PROCESS
STEP1        COPY  FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1)                              -
                   TO(                                                -
                     DSN=&DSN2                                        -
                     SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"                         -
                     DISP=(RPL))                                      -
                     COMPRESS EXTENDED
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY UNIX OPERATOR
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIF2P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&FAILRPL')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
*
* IF THE COPY WORKED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
*
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIF3P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&GOODRPL')) PNODE
CPYGOOD1     COPY  FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN3)                              -
                   TO(                                                -
                     DSN=&DSN4                                        -
                     SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"                         -
                     DISP=(RPL))                                      -
                     COMPRESS EXTENDED
        EIF
STEP4        COPY  FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN5)                              -
                   TO(                                                -
                     DSN=&DSN6                                        -
                     SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"                         -
                     DISP=(RPL))                                      -
                     COMPRESS EXTENDED
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY UNIX OPERATOR
*
STEP5   IF (STEP4 > 0) THEN
NOTIF5P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&FAILSTK')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
*
* IF THE COPY WORKED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND START GAGNON PROCESS
*
STEP6   IF (STEP4 = 0) THEN
NOTIF6P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&GOODSTK')) PNODE
CPYGOOD2     COPY  FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN7)                              -
                   TO(                                                -
                     DSN=&DSN8                                        -
                     SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"                         -
                     DISP=(RPL))                                      -
                     COMPRESS EXTENDED
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  PEYJHSH

* CALL THE PEYTON DP SUPERVISOR
*

             PNODE=CDRM51                                             -
             SNODE=CDRM40                                             -

   PARM=(CL4'FAIL','PEYJHSH FAILED, CONTACT PEYTON DP SUPERVISOR'))   -
         PNODE
        EIF

STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN

MEMBER NAME  PEYNDM

MEMBER NAME  PEYNDM2
********************************************************************
** THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS USED BY PEYTON TO COPY A FILE FROM   **
** MVS TO PEYTON LAN BOX AND THEN SUBMIT A VSE JOB.               **
** THIS JOB IS TRIGGERED FROM A PEYTON VSE JOB.                   **
**                                                                **
********************************************************************
PEYNDM2      PROCESS
STEP1        COPY  FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1)                              -
                   TO(                                                -
                     DSN=&DSN2                                        -
                     SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"                         -
                     DISP=(RPL))                                      -
                     COMPRESS EXTENDED
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY UNIX OPERATOR
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIF2P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&FAILMSG')) PNODE
        EIF
*
* IF STEP1 WORKED THEN RUN PROCESS ON VSE
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
SUBPROC  RUN JOB (DSN=J(&VSEJOB)) SNODE
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  PEYNDM4
PEYNDM    PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                   SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT) STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")       -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY OPERATOR
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIF2P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
   PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&FAILMSG'))  PNODE
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  PEYPOMS
PEYOMS       PROCESS
STEP1        COPY  FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1)                              -
                   TO(                                                -
                     DSN=&DSN2                                        -
                     SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"                         -
                     DISP=(RPL))                                      -
                     COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY UNIX OPERATOR
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIF2P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&FAILMSG')) PNODE
        EIF
*
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
STEP4      COPY  FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN3)                              -
                   TO(                                                -
                     DSN=&DSN4                                        -
                     SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"                         -
                     DISP=(RPL))                                      -
                     COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'
        EIF
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY UNIX OPERATOR
STEP5   IF (STEP4 > 0) THEN
NOTIF5P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&FAILMSG')) PNODE
        EIF
*
* IF THE COPY WORKED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
STEP6   IF (STEP4 = 0) THEN
NOTIF6P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&GOODMSG')) PNODE
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  PEYRETUR
PEYRETUR PROCESS
STEP0010 COPY   FROM (PNODE -
                      DSN=&DSNCDC -
                      DISP=(SHR) -
                      DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE -
                           DSORG=PS -
                           LRECL=&LRECL -
                           RECFM=&RECFM)) -
                TO   (SNODE -
                      DSN=&DSNUNIX -
                      DISP=(RPL) -
                      SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)") -
                      COMPRESS EXTENDED
MEMBER NAME  PEYSCAN
PEYSCAN      PROCESS
STEP1        COPY  FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1)                              -
                   TO(                                                -
                     DSN=&DSN2                                        -
                     SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"                         -
                     DISP=(RPL))                                      -
                     COMPRESS EXTENDED
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY UNIX OPERATOR
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIF2P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','PEYSCAN STEP1 FAILED')) PNODE
        EIF
*
* IF THE COPY WORKED, DO NEXT COPY
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
STEP4      COPY  FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN3)                              -
                   TO(                                                -
                     DSN=&DSN4                                        -
                     SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"                         -
                     DISP=(RPL))                                      -
                     COMPRESS EXTENDED
        EIF
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY UNIX OPERATOR
STEP5   IF (STEP4 > 0) THEN
NOTIF5P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','PEYSCAN STEP4 FAILED')) PNODE
        EIF
* IF THE COPY WORKED, DO NEXT COPY
STEP6   IF (STEP4 = 0) THEN
STEP7      COPY  FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN5)                              -
                   TO(                                                -
                     DSN=&DSN6                                        -
                     SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"                         -
                     DISP=(RPL))                                      -
                     COMPRESS EXTENDED
        EIF
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY UNIX OPERATOR
STEP8   IF (STEP7 > 0) THEN
NOTIF8P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','PEYSCAN STEP7 FAILED')) PNODE
        EIF
STEP10  IF (STEP7 = 0) THEN
STEP11  COPY  FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN7)                              -
                   TO(                                                -
                     DSN=&DSN8                                        -
                     SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"                         -
                     DISP=(RPL))                                      -
                     COMPRESS EXTENDED
        EIF
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY UNIX OPERATOR
STEP12  IF (STEP11 > 0) THEN
NOTIF13 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','PEYSCAN STEP11 FAILED')) PNODE
        EIF
STEP14  IF (STEP11 = 0) THEN
STEP15  COPY  FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN9)                              -
                   TO(                                                -
                     DSN=&DSN10                                       -
                     SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"                         -
                     DISP=(RPL))                                      -
                     COMPRESS EXTENDED
        EIF
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY UNIX OPERATOR
STEP16  IF (STEP15 > 0) THEN
NOTIF17 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','PEYSCAN STEP15 FAILED')) PNODE
        EIF
* IF THE COPY WORKED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND START GAGNON PROCESS
STEP18  IF (STEP15 = 0) THEN
NOTIF18 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'GOOD','PEYSCAN SUCCESSFUL')) PNODE
        EIF

MEMBER NAME  PEYVSE1
PEYVSE1  PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                              -
                 PNODE=&PNODE
STEP1 COPY FROM (DSN=&FROM                                 -
                     DISP=(SHR)                            -
                     PNODE)                                -
           COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                            -
           TO (DSN=&TO                                     -
                     DCB=(DSORG=PS                         -
                     RECFM=FB                              -
                     LRECL=&TOLRECL                        -
                     BLKSIZE=&TOBLKSZ)                     -
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY                         -
                     SNODE)
MEMBER NAME  PEYVSE2
PEYVSE2  PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                              -
                 PNODE=&PNODE
STEP1 COPY FROM (DSN=&FROM                                 -
                     DISP=(SHR)                            -
                     PNODE)                                -
           COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                            -
           TO (DSN=&TO                                     -
                     DCB=(DSORG=PS                         -
                     RECFM=FB                              -
                     LRECL=&TOLRECL                        -
                     BLKSIZE=&TOBLKSZ)                     -
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY                         -
                     SNODE)
STEP3 IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
SUBPROC   RUN TASK (PGM=ZEKENDM,         -
            PARM=(CL44'&ZEKEDSN')) SNODE
          EXIT
       EIF

MEMBER NAME  PEY0F0A
PI0F0A    PROCESS  SNODE=S1022680 PNODE=CDRM51              -           00010000
                   &PNAME=PI0F0A                                        00020000
STEP01    COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSNCDC                         -           00030000
                        DISP=(SHR,KEEP)                     -           00040000
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY                       -           00050000
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=23541                  -           00060000
                             LRECL=133                      -           00070000
                             RECFM=FB)                      -           00080000
                        PNODE)                              -           00090000
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                        -           00100000
                   TO  (DSN='QS36F/PIZWRK01(PIZWRK01)'      -           00110000
                        SYSOPTS="TYPE(MBR)"                 -           00120000
                        DISP=(RPL)                          -           00130000
                        SNODE)                                          00140000
         IF (STEP01 <= 4) THEN                                          00150000
STEP02   RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=AS400)                         -           00160000
                  SYSOPTS="CMD(CALL CCDI002A &PNAME)"                   00170000
         EIF                                                            00180000
MEMBER NAME  PEY1495
PEY1495   PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE                    -
                   PNODE=&PNODE                    -
                   CLASS=1
*
* SEND THE PROCUREMENT FILE TO THE LAN SERVER
*
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSNI1                 -
                        PNODE                      -
                        DISP=SHR)                  -
                   TO  (DSN=&DSNO1                 -
                        SNODE                      -
                        DISP=(&DISP))              -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY OPERATOR
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIF2P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
   PARM=(CL4'FAIL','PEY1495# FAILED, CONTACT PEYTON DP SUPERVISOR'))  -
         PNODE
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  PEY4401G
PEY4401G PROCESS SNODE=,PNODE=cdrm51
STEP1   COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSNCDC                         -
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP)                     -
                       PNODE)                              -
                  TO  (DSN="&DSNWHS"                       -
                       DISP=(rpl)                          -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no"          -
                       SNODE)                              -
                  COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'
*
* if the copy failed, put message to console
* and notify Unix operator
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIF2P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&FAILMSG')) PNODE
NOTIF2S RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                          -
        SYSOPTS="&GAGFAIL"
        EXIT
        EIF
*
* if the copy worked, put message to console
* and start Gagnon process
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIF3P RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&GOODMSG')) PNODE
NOTIF3S RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                          -
        SYSOPTS="&GAGPRC"
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  PEY7589B
PEY7589B  PROCESS
STEP0010  COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                   SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT) STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")       -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY OPERATOR
STEP0020  IF (STEP0010 = 0) THEN
             EXIT
          EIF
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, TRY AGAIN
*
STEP0030  COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                   SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT) STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")       -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
*
STEP0040  IF (STEP0030 = 0) THEN
             EXIT
          EIF
STEP0050  COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                   SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT) STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")       -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
STEP0060  IF (STEP0050 = 0) THEN
             EXIT
          EIF
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, TRY AGAIN
*
STEP0070  COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                   SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT) STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")       -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
STEP0080  IF (STEP0070 = 0) THEN
             EXIT
          EIF
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY OPERATOR
STEP0990 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
   PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&FAILMSG'))  PNODE
MEMBER NAME  PEY8155
PEY8155   PROCESS  SNODE=,PNODE=CDRM51
STEP1     COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSNCDC                        -
                        PNODE                               -
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                   COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                     -
                   TO  (SNODE                               -
                        DSN=&DSNKMA                         -
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=20400                  -
                        LRECL=102                           -
                        RECFM=FB)                           -
                        DISP=(RPL,KEEP)                     -
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)
STEP2    IF (STEP1 ^= 0) THEN
NOTIFY1  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) SNODE
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  PIDENDMP
PIDENDMP  PROCESS                                                       00010000
STEP1     COPY     FROM (DSN=&CDCDSN                        -           00020000
                        PNODE                               -           00021000
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSZFR               -           00022001
                        LRECL=&LRECL                        -           00023001
                        RECFM=FB)                           -           00024000
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP)                     -           00025000
                        UNIT=SYSDA)                         -           00026001
                   COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                     -           00026100
                   TO  (SNODE                               -           00026200
                        DSN=&KMADSN                         -           00026300
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSZTO               -           00026401
                        LRECL=&LRECL                        -           00026501
                        RECFM=FB)                           -           00026600
                        DISP=(NEW,KEEP)                     -           00026700
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)                                  00026800
STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                            00026900
NOTIFY1  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -           00027000
         PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&MSG1')) PNODE                                00028000
         ELSE                                                           00029000

         PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE                                00040000
         EIF                                                            00050000
MEMBER NAME  PIDGNRC1
PIDGNRC1  PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE                                   -
                   PNODE=&PNODE                                   -
                   CLASS=1
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN1                                 -
                        PNODE                                     -
                        DISP=SHR)                                 -

                        SYSOPTS="datatype(text) strip.blanks(no)" -
                        SNODE                                     -
                        DISP=(&DISP))                             -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
* if the copy failed, put message to console for netview
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                    -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  PIDNWMS
PIDNWMS   PROCESS  SNODE=,PNODE=CDRM51

* Beginning with Goddard, the following vary by WIN site:
*   SYMBOL &PGM1 = \/home/windb/windb/kroger_scripts/runrgti.ss \
*   SYMBOL &PGM2 = \/home/windb/windb/kroger_scripts/pidwincompare.ss\
* Beginning with Goddard, the following three variables are added:
*   &ENV &REDIRECT &PARMLIST

STEP1     COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSNCDC                        -
                        PNODE                               -
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                   TO  (DSN="&PATHKMA/&DSNKMA"              -
                        SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no"          -
                        SNODE)                              -
                        COMPRESS EXT

* if the copy worked, then run the task on unix to do the compare
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIFY2 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                          -
        SYSOPTS="&PGM1 &ENV &REDIRECT &PARMLIST &PGM2"
        EIF

STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN

        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  PIDPCBND
PIDPCB23 PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE HOLD=NO -
                CLASS=1 PRTY=10 -
                  SNODEID=(connect,direct)

             DSN=&DSNCDC) -

             TO   (SNODE DISP=MOD -
             DSN=&DSNKMA   -
             SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")

        COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=(SHR)  -
             DSN=&DSNCDC2) -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED -
             TO   (SNODE DISP=MOD -

             SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")
         ELSE

         PARM=(CL4'FAIL',"NY NDM &MSG1")) PNODE
         EIF

MEMBER NAME  PIDSTWGT

                  DSN=&FRMDSN                               -
                  DISP=SHR                                  -

             TO  (PNODE                                     -

                  SPACE=(80,(200,20),RLSE)                  -
                  DCB=(DSORG=PS                             -
                       LRECL=80                             -
                       RECFM=FB)                            -
                  )
         IF (STEP02 EQ 0) THEN

            SYSOPTS=\"\                                     -
            \mv //opt/cyclone/in/cswg/&FRMDSN2 \            -
            \   //opt/cyclone/in/cswg/&BKPDSN  \            -
                    \"\
         ELSE
CDERR       RUN TASK                                        -
            (PGM=DMNOTFY2,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FRMDSN,#958665)) PNODE
         EIF

MEMBER NAME  PIDTOCL2

                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10

             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRM011)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TO011)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN

        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

MEMBER NAME  PIDTOUS2
PIDTOUS2 PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRM025)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TO025)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP02  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRM706)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TO706)
        IF (STEP02 = 0) THEN
NOTFY03 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY04 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

PIDWESCO  PROCESS  CLASS=1 HOLD=NO

                        DSN=&DSNMVS           -
                        DISP=SHR)                         -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                         -
                   TO  (SNODE                               -
     SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=TEXT:XLETE=YES:STRIP.BLANKS=NO:"    -
                        DISP=(NEW)                        -
                        DSN=&DSNAIX)
         IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY1   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&DSNAIX)) PNODE
         ELSE
NOTFY2   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG)) PNODE
         EXIT
         EIF

                        PNODE                               -           00021004

                        LRECL=400                           -           00024004
                        RECFM=FB)                           -           00025004

                        DCB=(DSORG=VSAM)                    -           00026604
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                                00026704

         PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&DSN1')) SNODE                                00027004

MEMBER NAME  PID4100
PID4100   PROCESS
  SYMBOL  &DIR=\file_land_dir\
  SYMBOL  &IPDSN2=\'\ || &DIR || \/ip_\ || &DSN2 || \'\
  SYMBOL  &SC=\"\ || &SCRIPT || \ \ || &DIR || \ \ || &DSN2 || \"\
STEP1     COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&IPDSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)           -
                      SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no:xlate=no:")         -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF       (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=UNIX) SYSOPTS=&SC

MEMBER NAME  PID6050
PID6050 PROCESS
STEP1   COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSNCDC                         -
                       PNODE                               -
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                  TO  (DSN="&PATHKMA/&DSNKMA"              -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no"          -
                       SNODE)                              -
                  COMPRESS EXT

* if the copy failed, put message to console for netview
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

* if the copy worked, then run the task on unix to apply the downloaded
* file to informix
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIFY2 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                          -
   SYSOPTS="&PATHPGM/&PGMNAME &EN &RD &PL pidupc &PATHKMA/&DSNKMA 1000"
        EIF

* if the unix task failed, put message to console for netview
STEP4   IF (NOTIFY2 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY3 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  PID6060
PID6060   PROCESS
STEP1    COPY  FROM( PNODE  DSN=D911.PIDSQ.PDETAIL.PID6060.EMPTY ) -
                 TO( SNODE  DSN=&DSNFMY  DISP=(MOD,DELETE) )          -
           COMPRESS EXTENDED
*
* IF THE DELETE FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE AND NOTIFY OPERATOR
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&FAILMSG'))  PNODE
        EIF
*
* IF THE DELETE WORKED, THEN COPY THE NEW FILE
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
COPY1     COPY  FROM( PNODE  DSN=&DSNCDC  DISP=SHR )                -
                  TO( SNODE  DSN=&DSNFMY  DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE) ) -
            COMPRESS EXTENDED
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE AND NOTIFY OPERATOR
          IF (COPY1 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY2     RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
            PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&FAILMSG'))  PNODE
          EIF
        EIF

MEMBER NAME  PRINTRPT
//AS400PRT  JOB ,P900ROANOKE,CLASS=B,REGION=512K,MSGCLASS=M,
//    ROLL=NO                                                           00000015
//TAPEDUP       EXEC PGM=SORT                                           00000020
//SYSOUT  DD  SYSOUT=*                                                  00000025
//SORTIN DD DSN=XXXXX.YYYYY.ZZZZZ,DISP=SHR
//SORTOUT DD SYSOUT=(A,,TEST),DEST=RMT0
//SYSIN  DD  DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SORTCOPY),DISP=SHR                  00000090
MEMBER NAME  PRSNDMP
PRSNDMP PROCESS PNODE=&PNODE                    -                       00010001
                SNODE=&SNODE                                            00020001
STEP1   COPY    FROM(DSN=&FDSN                  -                       00030001
                     PNODE                      -                       00040001
                     UNIT=&FUNIT                -                       00050001
                     DCB=&FDCB                  -                       00060001
                     DISP=&FDISP)      -                                00070001
                COMPRESS EXTENDED               -                       00080001
                TO  (DSN=&TDSN                  -                       00090001
                     SNODE                      -                       00100001
                     UNIT=&TUNIT                -                       00110001
                     DCB=&TDCB                  -                       00120001
                     DISP=(&TDISP))                                     00130001
STEP2   IF  (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                            00140001
        RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE         00150001
        ELSE                                                            00160001
        RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'BAD ',&FAILMSG)) PNODE         00170001
        EIF                                                             00180001
MEMBER NAME  PULL400
PULL400 PROCESS  PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=A060EDI1 HOLD=NO             -      00010099
                 CLASS=1 PRTY=10 SNODEID=(CDUSER,CDUSER)                00020085
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=(SHR)                              -      00026977
             DSN=&DSNCDC)                                        -      00027177
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                   -      00027573
             TO   (SNODE DISP=MOD                                -      00028099
             DSN='PRODUCTION/KEINPF(KEINPF)'                     -      00030099
             SYSOPTS="TYPE(MBR)")                                       00040078
STEP2   IF (STEP1 NE 0) THEN                                            00050096
STEP4   RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,                           -             00110099
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL',"&MSG1")) PNODE                                 00111099
        EIF                                                             00120088
MEMBER NAME  PWPPCB1
PWPPCB1 PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE,PNODE=CDRM51
STEP01 COPY  FROM(DSN=&DSN1                           -
                  DISP=(SHR,KEEP)                     -
                  PNODE)                              -
               COMPRESS EXTENDED                      -
               TO(DSN=&DSN2                           -
                  DISP=(&DISP2)                       -
                  SNODE)
STEP02  IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NTIFYG1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
        ELSE
NTIFYF1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  PWPPCB2
PWPPCB2 PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE,PNODE=CDRM51
STEP10 COPY  FROM(DSN=&DSNAOK               -
                  DISP=&DISPAOK             -
                  SNODE)                    -
               TO(DSN=&DSNDMY               -
                  DISP=&DISPDMY             -
                  DCB=(&DCBDMY)             -
                  UNIT=&UNITDMY             -
                  SPACE=&SPACEDMY           -
                  PNODE)
       IF (STEP10 > 0) THEN
                  EXIT
       EIF
STEP20 COPY  FROM(DSN=&DSN1                 -
                  DISP=&DISP1               -
                  SNODE)                    -
               COMPRESS EXTENDED            -
               TO(DSN=&DSN2                 -
                  DISP=&DISP2               -
                  DCB=(&DCB2)               -
                  UNIT=SYSDA                -
                  SPACE=&SPACE2             -
                  PNODE)
 IF (STEP20 = 0) THEN
STEP30 COPY FROM(DSN=&DSN3                  -
                 DISP=&DISP3                -
                 PNODE)                     -
              TO(DSN=&DSN4                  -
                 DISP=&DISP4                -
                 SNODE)
 EIF
MEMBER NAME  PWPTCYC
PWPTCYC   PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE                    -
                   PNODE=&PNODE                    -
                   CLASS=1
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&MVSDSN                -
                        PNODE                      -
                        DISP=&MVSDISP)             -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED               -
                   TO  (DSN=&CYCDSN                -
                        SNODE                      -
                        SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS           -
                        DISP=(&CYCDISP))
STEP2     IF  (STEP1 > 0) THEN
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) PNODE
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  RMATEST
RMATEST   PROCESS
          SYMBOL   &DSNCDC=RMA || &DIV
          SYMBOL   &DSNKMA=rma || &DIV
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMAACCID)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmaaccid.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMACARRI)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmacarri.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMACLAIM)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmaclaim.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMACLMDS)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmaclmds.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMACLMNT)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmaclmnt.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMAEMPLO)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmaemplo.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMALDAYS)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmaldays.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMALTIME)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmaltime.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMARESER)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmareser.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMATRANS)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmatrans.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMAVHCLE)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmavhcle.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMASTORE)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmastore.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMAJOURN)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmajourn.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")
STEP2     IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIFYG   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                    -
          PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
          ELSE
NOTIFYF   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                    -
          PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  RMATRNS
RMATRNS   PROCESS
          SYMBOL   &DSNCDC=RMA || &DIV
          SYMBOL   &DSNKMA=rma || &DIV
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMAACCID)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmaaccid.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMACARRI)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmacarri.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMACLAIM)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmaclaim.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMACLMDS)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmaclmds.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMACLMNT)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmaclmnt.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMAEMPLO)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmaemplo.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMALDAYS)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmaldays.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMALTIME)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmaltime.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMARESER)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmareser.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMATRANS)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmatrans.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMAVHCLE)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmavhcle.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMASTORE)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmastore.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMAJOURN)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/sqlsource/&DSNKMA/rmajourn.&DIV"      -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIFYG   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                    -
          PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
          ELSE
NOTIFYF   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                    -
          PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  RMATRNS2
RMATRNS2  PROCESS
          SYMBOL   &DSNCDC=RMA || &DIV
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMAACCID)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/transfer/klaim/rmaaccid.&DIV" -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT

                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMACLAIM)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/transfer/klaim/rmaclaim.&DIV" -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -

                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -

                   TO  (DSN="/transfer/klaim/rmaclmnt.&DIV" -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -

                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT

                   TO  (DSN="/transfer/klaim/rmaldays.&DIV" -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMALTIME)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/transfer/klaim/rmaltime.&DIV" -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMARESER)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/transfer/klaim/rmareser.&DIV" -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMATRANS)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/transfer/klaim/rmatrans.&DIV" -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMAVHCLE)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/transfer/klaim/rmavhcle.&DIV" -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMASTORE)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/transfer/klaim/rmastore.&DIV" -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
          COPY     FROM(DSN=D966.DB2SQ.PDETAIL.&DSNCDC..RMAJOURN)   -
                   TO  (DSN="/transfer/klaim/rmajourn.&DIV" -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                  -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIFYG   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                    -
          PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
          ELSE
NOTIFYF   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                    -
          PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  RMA0B43
RM0B43    PROCESS  SNODE=S1022680 PNODE=CDRM52              -           00000010
                   &PNAME=RM0B43                                        00000030
STEP01    COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSNCDC                         -           00000020
                        DISP=(SHR,KEEP)                     -           00000080
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY                       -           00000090
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=13300                  -           00000040
                             DSORG=PS                       -           00000050
                             LRECL=133                      -           00000060
                             RECFM=FB)                      -           00000070
                        PNODE)                              -           00000030
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                        -           00000030
                   TO  (DSN='QS36F/RMZWRK98(RMZWRK98)'      -           00000110
                        SYSOPTS="TYPE(MBR)"                 -           00000120
                        DISP=(RPL)                          -           00000130
                        SNODE)                                          00000140
         IF (STEP01 <= 4) THEN                                          00000190
STEP02   RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=AS400)                         -           00000200
                  SYSOPTS="CMD(CALL CCDI002A &PNAME)"                   00000230
         EIF                                                            00000240
MEMBER NAME  RMA0B53
RM0B53    PROCESS  SNODE=S1022680 PNODE=CDRM52              -           00000010
                   &PNAME=RM0B53                                        00000030
STEP01    COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSNCDC2                        -           00000020
                        DISP=(SHR,KEEP)                     -           00000080
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY                       -           00000090
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=13300                  -           00000040
                             DSORG=PS                       -           00000050
                             LRECL=133                      -           00000060
                             RECFM=FB)                      -           00000070
                        PNODE)                              -           00000030
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                        -           00000030
                   TO  (DSN='QS36F/RMZWRK99(RMZWRK99)'      -           00000110
                        SYSOPTS="TYPE(MBR)"                 -           00000120
                        DISP=(RPL)                          -           00000130
                        SNODE)                                          00000140
         IF (STEP01 <= 4) THEN                                          00000190
STEP02   RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=AS400)                         -           00000200
                  SYSOPTS="CMD(CALL CCDI002A &PNAME)"                   00000230
         EIF                                                            00000240
MEMBER NAME  RMSUNIX
RMSUNIX   PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
MEMBER NAME  RMSUNIXD
RMSUNIXD  PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                              DCB=&DCB    UNIT=&UNIT                -
                              SPACE=&SPACE )                        -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
STEP2   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
STEP3   RUN TASK(PGM=UNIX) SNODE SYSOPTS= -
       "rm /cdtrans/acct/D966.RMSSQ.PDETAIL.RMS2300 "
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  RTKADDS
RTKADDS PROCESS PNODE=&PNODE SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&TODSN)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&ADMSGF)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP02  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN2)        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN2)
        IF (STEP02 = 0) THEN
NOTFY03 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&TODSN2)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY04 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DSPMSGF)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP03  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSNC)        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSNC)
        IF (STEP02 = 0) THEN
NOTFY05 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&TODSNC)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY06 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&CMPMSGF)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP04  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                               -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                             -
           \ncftpput -E -V -u kroger -p gr0cer \                -
           \-d /XFER/log/982retek.log 64.238.67.53 import/addisp/ \ -
           \/XFER/retekout/ad.ovr\                              -
           \"\
        IF  (STEP04 = 0) THEN
NOTFY07 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&TODSN)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY08 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&ADMSGF)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP05  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                               -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                             -
           \ncftpput -E -V -u kroger -p gr0cer \                -
           \-d /XFER/log/982retek.log 64.238.67.53 import/addisp/ \ -
           \/XFER/retekout/display.ovr\                         -
           \"\
        IF  (STEP05 = 0) THEN
NOTFY09 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&TODSN2)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY10 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DSPMSGF)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP06  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                               -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                             -
           \ncftpput -E -V -u kroger -p gr0cer \                -
           \-d /XFER/log/982retek.log 64.238.67.53 import/addisp/ \ -
           \/XFER/retekout/complete\                            -
           \"\
        IF  (STEP06 = 0) THEN
NOTFY11 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&TODSNC)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY12 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&CMPMSGF)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP07  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                 -
        SYSOPTS="rm /XFER/retekout/*.*"
        IF  (STEP07 = 0) THEN
NOTFY13 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD','CLEANUP')) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY14 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DELMSGF)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  RTKADSP
RTKADSP   PROCESS   SNODEID=(&USER,&PSWD) HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=SHR                               -
             DSN=&FRMDSN1)                                      -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                  -
             TO (SNODE DISP=(RPL)                               -
             DSN=&TODSN1)
        IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&TODSN1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&ADMSGF)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP2   COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=SHR                               -
             DSN=&FRMDSN2)                                      -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                  -
             TO (SNODE DISP=(RPL)                               -
             DSN=&TODSN2)
        IF (STEP2 = 0) THEN
NOTFY03 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&TODSN2)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY04 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DSPMSGF)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP3   COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=SHR                               -
             DSN=&FRMDSNC)                                      -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                  -
             TO (SNODE DISP=(RPL)                               -
             DSN=&TODSNC)
        IF (STEP3 = 0) THEN
NOTFY05 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&TODSNC)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY06 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&CMPMSGF)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  RTKITM
RTKITM    PROCESS   SNODEID=(&USER,&PSWD) HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=SHR                               -
             DSN=&FRMDSN1)                                      -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                  -
             TO (SNODE DISP=(RPL)                               -
             DSN=&TODSN1)
        IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&TODSN1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&ITMMSGF)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP2   COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=SHR                               -
             DSN=&FRMDSN2)                                      -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                  -
             TO (SNODE DISP=(RPL)                               -
             DSN=&TODSN2)
        IF (STEP2 = 0) THEN
NOTFY03 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&TODSN2)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY04 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&CMPMSGF)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  RTKMSK
RTKMSK    PROCESS   SNODEID=(&USER,&PSWD) HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=SHR                               -
             DSN=&FRMDSN1)                                      -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                  -
             TO (SNODE DISP=(RPL)                               -
             DSN=&TODSN1)
        IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&TODSN1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&ITMMSGF)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP2   COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=SHR                               -
             DSN=&FRMDSN2)                                      -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                  -
             TO (SNODE DISP=(RPL)                               -
             DSN=&TODSN2)
        IF (STEP2 = 0) THEN
NOTFY03 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&TODSN2)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY04 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&CMPMSGF)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

MEMBER NAME  RTKRNM
RTKRNM    PROCESS   HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10                             00010002
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=SHR                                -      00026900
             DSN=&DSNIN)                                        -       00027100
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                   -      00027500
             TO (SNODE DISP=(RPL)                    -                  00028000
             DSN=&DSNTMP)                                               00030000
        IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                             00040000
MOVE2   RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE   -                                   00050000
        SYSOPTS="mv &DSNTMP &DSNOUT"                                    00051001
        IF (MOVE2 = 0) THEN                                             00052000
NOTFY11 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&DSNOUT)) PNODE          00053000
        ELSE                                                            00054000
NOTFY12 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSGF)) PNODE            00055000
        EIF                                                             00057000
        ELSE                                                            00060000
NOTFY13 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSGF)) PNODE            00070000
        EXIT                                                            00080000
        EIF                                                             00090000

        IF (MOVE2 = 0) THEN                                             00052000
NOTFY11 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&DSNOUT)) PNODE          00053000
        ELSE                                                            00054000

        EIF                                                             00057000
        ELSE                                                            00060000

        EXIT                                                            00080000
        EIF                                                             00090000

MEMBER NAME  SCNDITM
SCNDITM   PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (SNODE DSN=&DSN2                             -
                              DISP=(NEW,CATLG)                      -
                              UNIT=DLBLONLY                         -
                              DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=88,      -
                                   BLKSIZE=27984) )                 -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF       (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     RUN JOB (DSN=J(&JOBNM))SNODE

* Revisions
* 10/10/02 mm  changed commented out section for 625 to 708 step 14
*

                   COMPRESS EXT

  PARM=(CL4'FAIL','DW ERROR: SCN0960A FAILED-SCNKITMV 011 FILE')) PNODE

MEMBER NAME  SCTFCYC
SCTFCYC  PROCESS  CLASS=1
STEP01  COPY TO  (PNODE                               -
                  DSN=&DSNMVS                         -
                  DCB=&DCBMVS                         -
                  SPACE=(CYL,(01,01),RLSE)            -
                  UNIT=(SYSDA)                        -
                  DISP=&DISPMVS)                      -
                  COMPRESS EXTENDED                   -
             FROM(SNODE                               -
                  SYSOPTS="strip.blanks(no)"          -
                  DSN=&DSNAIX)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY1  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&DSNAIX)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY2  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  SCTTMEM
SCTTMEM  PROCESS PNODE=&PNODE                    -
                SNODE=&SNODE
STEP1   COPY    FROM(DSN=&FDSN                  -
                     PNODE                      -
                     UNIT=&FUNIT                -
                     DCB=&FDCB                  -
                     DISP=&FDISP)      -
                COMPRESS EXTENDED               -
                TO  (DSN=&TDSN                  -
                     SNODE                      -
                     UNIT=&TUNIT                -
                     DCB=&TDCB                  -
                     DISP=(&TDISP))
STEP2   IF  (STEP1 = 0) THEN
        COPY    FROM(DSN=&FDSN                  -
                     PNODE                      -
                     UNIT=&FUNIT                -
                     DCB=&FDCB                  -
                     DISP=&FDISP)      -
                COMPRESS EXTENDED               -
                TO  (DSN=&TDSNDONE              -
                     SNODE                      -
                     UNIT=&TUNIT                -
                     DCB=&TDCB                  -
                     DISP=(&TDISP))
         EIF
STEP3   IF  (STEP2 = 0) THEN
        RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) SNODE
        ELSE
        RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'BAD ',&BADMSG)) SNODE
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  SHEAKLEY
SHEAKLEY PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=U060FTP1    -                       00000100
   HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10                                              00000200
STEP01 COPY FROM (PNODE -                                               00000300
      DISP=SHR -                                                        00000400
      DSN='D922.KHRSQ.PTEMP.KHRD0507') -                                00000500
      COMPRESS EXTENDED -                                               00000600
      TO (SNODE -                                                       00000700
          DISP=(RPL) -                                                  00000800
          DSN='/XFER/talxout/KR000418.TXT')                             00000900
 IF (STEP01=0) THEN                                                     00001000
STEP02 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE -                                      00001100
     SYSOPTS=\"\ -                                                      00001200
     \ncftpput -E -V -u KRO -p N0L0ng3r1nSL\ -                          00001300
     \-d /XFER/log/922TALX.LOG 12.104.201.150 .\ -                      00001400
     \/XFER/talxout/KR000418.TXT\ -                                     00001500
     \"\                                                                00001600
 EIF                                                                    00001700
MEMBER NAME  SKB31NGN
  SIGNON USERID=(D052002,NDMTASK1) ESF=YES
  SIGNOFF
MEMBER NAME  SKPARJE
SKPARJE   PROCESS
STEP0010  COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                   SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT) STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")       -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY OPERATOR
STEP0020  IF (STEP0010 = 0) THEN
             EXIT
          EIF
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, TRY AGAIN
*
STEP0030  COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                   SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT) STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")       -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
*
STEP0040  IF (STEP0030 = 0) THEN
             EXIT
          EIF
STEP0050  COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                   SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT) STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")       -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
STEP0060  IF (STEP0050 = 0) THEN
             EXIT
          EIF
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, TRY AGAIN
*
STEP0070  COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                   SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT) STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")       -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
STEP0080  IF (STEP0070 = 0) THEN
             EXIT
          EIF
*
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE
* AND NOTIFY OPERATOR
STEP0990 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
   PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&FAILMSG'))  PNODE
MEMBER NAME  SKPBEG2D
SKPBEG2D PROCESS

  SYMBOL &CPYUNIX = \'\ || \/\ || &PTHNT1 ||      -
        \/\ || &PTHNT2 || \/\ || &DSNNT || \'\

STEP1   COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSNCDC                         -
                       PNODE                               -
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                  TO  (DSN=&CPYUNIX                        -
                       SNODE                               -
                       DISP=(&SNDISP))                     -
                  COMPRESS EXT


* if the copy failed, put message to console for netview
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

MEMBER NAME  SKPBMI1D
SKPBMI1D PROCESS

  SYMBOL &CPYUNIX = \'\ || \\\\ || \\\\ || &PTHNT1 || \\\\ || -
         &PTHNT2 || \\\\ || &PTHNT3 || \\\\ || &DSNNT || \'\

STEP1   COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSNCDC                         -
                       PNODE                               -
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                  TO  (DSN=&CPYUNIX                        -
                       SNODE                               -
                       DISP=(&SNDISP))                     -
                  COMPRESS EXT


* if the copy failed, put message to console for netview
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

MEMBER NAME  SKPCTC
SKPCTC    PROCESS  SNODE=S1022680 PNODE=CDRM52              -
                   &PNAME=SKPCTC
STEP01    COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSNCDC                         -
                        DISP=(SHR,KEEP)                     -
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY                       -
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=27920                  -
                             LRECL=80                       -
                             RECFM=FB)                      -
                        PNODE)                              -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                        -           00000030
                   TO  (DSN='QS36F/MTCWRK06(MTCWRK06)'      -
                        SYSOPTS="TYPE(MBR)"                 -
                        DISP=(RPL)                          -
                        SNODE)
         IF (STEP01 <= 4) THEN
STEP02   RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=AS400)                         -
                  SYSOPTS="CMD(CALL CCDI002A &PNAME)"
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  SKPDBA
SKPDBA    PROCESS  SNODE=,PNODE=CDRM51
STEP1     COPY     FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                        -
                        PNODE                               -
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                        -
                   TO  (SNODE                               -
                        DSN=&DSNKMA                         -
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE               -
                        LRECL=&LRECL                        -
                        RECFM=&RECFM)                       -
                        DISP=(&DISP1,&DISP2)                -
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)
STEP2    IF (STEP1 ^= 0) THEN
NOTIFY1  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL',"DBA SKPDBA  &MSG1")) PNODE
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  SKPDFCTR
DFCTRNS   PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE,PNODE=&PNODE                            00010004

                        PNODE                               -           00021000

                        LRECL=200                           -           00023000
                        RECFM=FB)                           -           00024000

                        UNIT=(SYSDA))                       -           00026000

                        DSN=&DSNKMA                         -           00026200
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=27800                  -           00026301
                        LRECL=200                           -           00026401
                        RECFM=FB)                           -           00026500
                        DISP=(MOD,KEEP)                     -           00026600
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)                                  00026700
STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                            00026800

         PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&MSG1')) PNODE                                00027000
         ELSE                                                           00028000
NOTIFY2  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -            00029000
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG2')) PNODE                                00030000
         EIF                                                            00040000

                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)                                  00027000

         PARM=('&MSG2')) SNODE                                          00027300

MEMBER NAME  SKPESMN
//*********************************************************************
//* THIS PROC IS USED TO NDM OUTPUT DATA FROM THE CDC(MVS) PLATFORM   *
//* TO THE KMA(UNIX) PLATFORM.  A REXX PROCEDURE IS EXECUTED TO       *
//* CREATE A UNIQUE UNIX FILE NAME FOR USE IN THE NDM STEP.           *
//*                                                                   *
//* NDM FOR ESM FILES                                                 *
//*                                                                   *
//*  DATE    INIT  CHANGE                                             *
//* 08/02/04  RWB  CREATED                                            *
//*********************************************************************
//*
//*********************************************************************
//* THIS PROCEDURE EXECUTES THE FOLLOWING STEPS:                      *
//*                                                                   *
//* STEP0020 - BUILD THE NDM CTLLIB MEMBER WITH UNIQUE OUTPUT DSN     *
//* STEP0030 - NDM DATA TO KMA UNIX PLATFORM                          *
//*                                                                   *
//*********************************************************************
//*
//SKPESNB PROC
//*
//*********************************************************************
//* STEP0020 - BUILD THE NDM CTLLIB MEMBER WITH UNIQUE OUTPUT DSN     *
//*********************************************************************
//STEP0020 EXEC PGM=IKJEFT01,
//             COND=(8,LT)
//SYSPROC  DD  DSN=&NCTLESM1,                                           01890075
//             DISP=SHR                                                 01900075
//SYSTSIN  DD  DSN=&NCTLESM2,
//             DISP=SHR
//SYSTSPRT DD  SYSOUT=*
//NDMCTL   DD  DSN=&GRP..SKPSQ.&ENV.DATA.NDMESM&TYPE&GEN,
//             DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,CATLG),
//             SPACE=(80,(50,5),RLSE),AVGREC=U,
//             UNIT=SYSDA
//*
//*********************************************************************
//* STEP0030 - NDM DATA TO KMA UNIX PLATFORM                          *
//*********************************************************************
//STEP0060 EXEC PGM=DMBATCH,PARM=(YYSLYNN),
//             COND=(8,LT)
//STEPLIB  DD  DSN=D955.NDM.LINKLIB,
//             DISP=SHR
//DMNETMAP DD  DSN=D955.NDM51.NETMAP,
//             DISP=SHR
//DMPUBLIB DD  DSN=D955.NDM.PROCESS.LIB,
//             DISP=SHR
//DMMSGFIL DD  DSN=D955.NDM.MSG,
//             DISP=SHR
//DMPRINT  DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSUDUMP DD  SYSOUT=D
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*
//NDMCMDS  DD  SYSOUT=*
//SYSIN    DD  DSN=&GRP..SKPSQ.&ENV.DATA.NDMESM&TYPE&GEN,
//             DISP=SHR
//*
MEMBER NAME  SKPESMVC
SKPESMVC  PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE,PNODE=&PNODE                            00010000
STEP1     COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSNCDC                        -           00020000
                        PNODE                               -           00021000
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=27900                  -           00022000
                        LRECL=225                           -           00023000
                        RECFM=FB)                           -           00024000
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP)                     -           00025000
                        UNIT=(SYSDA))                       -           00026000
                   TO  (SNODE                               -           00026100
                        DSN=&F                              -           00026200
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=27900                  -           00026300
                        LRECL=225                           -           00026400
                        RECFM=FB)                           -           00026500
                        DISP=(RPL,KEEP)                     -           00026600
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)                                  00026700

                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))            -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED

             EXIT
          EIF

          EXIT                                                          00470008
       EIF                                                              00480008

*  and continue with ZACK message                                       00540008

       EIF                                                              00580008

MEMBER NAME  SKPPRISM
SKPPRISM PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                               -
                SNODEID=(CDUSER,CDUSER)                    -
                PNODE=&PNODE
STEP1  COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSNCDC                           -
                     DISP=(SHR)                            -
                     DCB=(DSORG=PS                         -
                          RECFM=FB                         -
                          LRECL=&LRECL)                    -
                     PNODE)                                -
                TO  (DSN=&DSNTRIAL                         -
                     SYSOPTS="TYPE(MBR)"                   -
                     DISP=(RPL)                            -
                    SNODE)
STEP2  RUN TASK (PGM=AS400)                                -
                SNODE                                      -
                SYSOPTS=\"\                                -
                        \CMD(\                             -
                        \CALL PGM(KPCO030C)\               -
                        \PARM(&DSNMBR &ENV)\               -
                        \)\                                -
                        \"\
MEMBER NAME  SKPP301
SKPP301 PROCESS
STEP1   COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSNCDC                         -
                       PNODE                               -
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                  TO  (DSN="&PATHKMA/&DSNKMA"              -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no"          -
                       SNODE)                              -
                  COMPRESS EXT

STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 4) THEN
          GOTO ABEND
        EIF

STEP3   IF (STEP1 < 5) THEN
NOTIFY1   RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                        -
          SYSOPTS=                                         -
          "&PATHPGM/win_wrapper.ss D &PARAM N orderverify &DSNKMA"
        EIF

STEP4   IF (NOTIFY1 < 5) THEN
          EXIT
        EIF

STEP5   IF (NOTIFY1 > 4) THEN
          GOTO ABEND
        EIF

ABEND   RUN TASK(PGM=DMRTSUB,                              -
        PARM=("DSN=SYS4.CD.PDS.CNTL(CDERROR),DISP=SHR",    -
        "FILE SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SKPP301&DIVCHAR)",        -
        "JOBNAME SKPCDERR",                                -
        "ZEKEADD '''ZADD EV 4161 REBUILD'''"               -
        )) PNODE
MEMBER NAME  SKPP305
SKPP305   PROCESS                                                       00010000
                                                                        00011000
STEP1     COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSNCDC                        -           00020000
                        PNODE                               -           00021000
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -           00026000
                   COMPRESS EXT                             -           00026201
                   TO  (SNODE                               -           00026300
                        DSN=&DSNKMA                         -           00026400
                        VSAMCAT=(&VSAMCAT)                  -           00026500
                        DCB=(DSORG=VSAM)                    -           00026600
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                                00026700
                                                                        00028000
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE FOR NETVIEW                00050000
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN                                             00060000
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -            00070000
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE                                 00080000
        EXIT                                                            00090000
        EIF                                                             00100000
MEMBER NAME  SKPP320
SKPP320   PROCESS  SNODE=,PNODE=CDRM52
STEP1     COPY     FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                        -
                        PNODE                               -
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                        -
                   TO  (SNODE                               -
                        DSN=&DSNKMA                         -
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=5300                   -
                        LRECL=53                            -
                        RECFM=FB)                           -
                        DISP=(RPL,KEEP)                     -
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)
STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIFY1  RUN TASK(PGM=ZEKENDM,PARM=(CL46"D=&DSNKMA")) SNODE
         ELSE
NOTIFY2  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL',"NY NDM &MSG1")) PNODE
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  SKPR400

STEP2    IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN                                            00028005
NOTIFY   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY, -                                       00029003
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE                                00030003
         EIF                                                            00040003
