MEMBER NAME  SKPU920
SKPU920 PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE HOLD=NO -
                CLASS=1 PRTY=10 SNODEID=(CONNECT,DIRECT)
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=(SHR)  -
             DSN=&DSNCDC) -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED -
             TO   (SNODE DISP=MOD -
             DSN=&DSNKMA   -
             SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")
STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
        COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=(SHR)  -
             DSN=&DSNCDC2) -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED -
             TO   (SNODE DISP=MOD -
             DSN=&DSNKMA2  -
             SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")
         ELSE
NOTIFY2  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL',"NY NDM &MSG1")) PNODE
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  SKPU920A
SKPU920A PROCESS -
&PNODE=CDRM51 -
                PNODE=&PNODE SNODE=&SNODE HOLD=NO -
                CLASS=1 PRTY=10 SNODEID=(connect,direct)
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=(SHR)  -
             DSN=&DSNCDC) -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED -
             TO   (SNODE DISP=MOD -
             DSN=&DSNKMA   -
             SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")
STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
        COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=(SHR)  -
             DSN=&DSNCDC2) -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED -
             TO   (SNODE DISP=MOD -
             DSN=&DSNKMA2  -
             SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")
         ELSE
NOTIFY2  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL',"NY NDM &MSG1")) PNODE
         EIF

                       PNODE                               -            00040000
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -            00050000
                  TO  (DSN="&PATHKMA/&DSNKMA"              -            00060000
                       SYSOPTS=":STRIP.BLANKS=NO"          -            00070000
                       SNODE)                              -            00080000
                  COMPRESS EXT                                          00090000
                                                                        00100000
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE FOR NETVIEW                00110000
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN                                             00120000
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -            00130000
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE                                 00140000
        EXIT                                                            00150000
        EIF                                                             00160000
                                                                        00170000
* IF THE COPY WORKED, THEN RUN THE TASK ON UNIX TO COPY THE DOWNLOADED  00180000
* FILE TO A MQ SERIES QUEUE                                             00190000
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                             00200000
NOTIFY2 RUN TASK(PGM=UNIX) SNODE SYSOPTS= -                             00210000
        "&PATHPGM &PATHPGM1 &PGMNAME &DSNKMA &DIR1 &DMD &AOK"           00220000
        EIF                                                             00230000
                                                                        00240000
* IF THE UNIX TASK FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE FOR NETVIEW           00250000
STEP4   IF (NOTIFY2 > 0) THEN                                           00260000
NOTIFY3 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -             00270000
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE                                 00280000
        EIF                                                             00290000

MEMBER NAME  SKPW300
SKPW300  PROC  SNODE=,PNODE=CDRM51
STEP1     COPY     FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                        -
                        PNODE                               -
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                        -
                   TO  (SNODE                               -
                        DSN=&DSNKMA                         -
                        DISP=(&DISP)                        -
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)
STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIFY1  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
         PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&MSG1')) PNODE
         ELSE
NOTIFY2  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG2')) PNODE
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  SKP2NT
MVS2NT    PROCESS  PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=NCDCFTC6 HOLD=NO           -      00010000
                SNODEID=(connect,direct) CLASS=1 PRTY=10                00020000
STEP1   COPY TO (SNODE DISP=MOD                                  -      00026900
             DSN=&DSNKMA                                         -      00027100
             SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")                         -      00027200
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                   -      00027500
             FROM (PNODE DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                    -      00028000
             DSN=&DSNCDC)                                               00030000
MEMBER NAME  SKP2OLP
SKP2OLP PROCESS PNODE=&PNODE                    -
                SNODE=&SNODE
STEP1   COPY    FROM(DSN=&FDSN                  -
                     PNODE                      -
                     UNIT=&FUNIT                -
                     DCB=&FDCB                  -
                     DISP=&FDISP)      -
                COMPRESS EXTENDED               -
                TO  (DSN=&TDSN                  -
                     SNODE                      -
                     UNIT=&TUNIT                -
                     DCB=&TDCB                  -
                     DISP=(&TDISP))
STEP2   IF  (STEP1 = 0) THEN
        RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
        ELSE
        RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'BAD ',&FAILMSG)) PNODE
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  SONCHRG
SONCHRG  PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                              -            00010001
                 PNODE=&PNODE                                           00010001
STEP1 COPY FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                               -            00020000
                     PNODE                                 -            00021000
                     DCB=(DSORG=PS                         -            00022000
                     LRECL=200                             -            00024000
                     RECFM=FB)                             -            00025000
                     DISP=(SHR)                            -            00026000
                     UNIT=(SYSDA))                         -            00026000
           COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                            -
           TO (DSN=&DSNKMA                                 -            00026400
                     SYSOPTS="TYPE(MBR)"                   -            00022000
                     DISP=(RPL)                            -            00027200
                     SNODE)
         IF (STEP1 <= 0) THEN
STEP2    RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=AS400)                        -
             SYSOPTS="CMD(CALL CCDI002A &PNAME)"
         EIF

MEMBER NAME  SONTEST
//#910197N JOB  ,T910197PROWS,REGION=0K,NOTIFY=#910197,
//      MSGCLASS=X,MSGLEVEL=(1,1),CLASS=T
//*   SEND NETINFO DATASET TO DILLON VIA CONNECT DIRECT                 01563008
//*                                                                     01564008
//*--------------------------------------------------------------------*01565008
//STEPCD  EXEC PGM=DMBATCH,PARM=(YYSLYNN)                               01566008
//*                                                                     01566008
//*TEPLIB   DD DSN=D955.NDM18.LINKLIB,                                  01567008
//STEPLIB   DD DSN=D955.NDM.LINKLIB,                                    01567008
//             DISP=SHR                                                 01568008
//DMMSGFIL  DD DSN=D955.NDM.MSG,                                        01567008
//             DISP=SHR                                                 01568008
//DMNETMAP  DD DSN=D955.NDM.NETMAP,                                     01567008
//             DISP=SHR                                                 01568008
//DMPUBLIB  DD DSN=#910197.NDM.PROCESS.LIB,                             01567008
//             DISP=SHR                                                 01568008
//NDMCMDS   DD SYSOUT=*                                                 01569508
//DMPRINT   DD SYSOUT=*                                                 01569508
//SYSPRINT  DD SYSOUT=*                                                 01569508
//SYSUDUMP  DD SYSOUT=*                                                 01569008
//SYSIN     DD DSN=#910197.CTLLIB(SONCOL),                              01569108
//             DISP=SHR                                                 01569208
MEMBER NAME  TEC0960A
TEC0960A  PROCESS
*
STEP1 COPY FROM(&NODE  DSN=D999.TECSQ.PEXTRACT.SUBSET.TECCODES        - 00000060
                                                         DISP=SHR)    -
      TO (DSN='/usr/dbutil/db2/xfer/rcv/tec.subset.teccodes.dsntiaul' - 00000070
            DISP=(&DISP1)    SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=BINARY" )             -
                   COMPRESS EXT

* if the copy failed, put message to console for netview
CHECK1  IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
  PARM=(CL4'FAIL','DW ERROR: TEC0960A FAILED-TECCODES FILE')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

* if the copy worked, then run the task on unix to note the ndm
* process worked
STEP2 IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIFY2 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                          -
        SYSOPTS="/usr/dbutil/scripts/tec0960a.goodeoj.ss"
        EIF

* if the unix task failed, put message to console for netview
STEP3  IF (NOTIFY2 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY3 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -
  PARM=(CL4'FAIL','DW ERROR: TEC0960A FAILED-UNIX SCRIPT ERROR')) PNODE
        EIF

        \> /XFER/iosin/VPS031.CONCAT \         -
        \"\
COMBIN2 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                    -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                  -
        \/bin/cut -c1-400 /XFER/iosin/REMOVE.*.FIL \ -
        \> /XFER/iosin/VPS030.CONCAT \         -
        \"\
COMBIN3 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                    -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                  -
        \/bin/cut -c1-400 /XFER/iosin/VPS*.CONCAT \ -
        \> /XFER/iosin/IOSFILE.CONCAT \         -
        \"\
STEP01  COPY FROM (SNODE          -
             DISP=(OLD,KEEP,KEEP)  -
             DSN=&FROMDSN)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (PNODE            -
             DISP=(MOD,KEEP,KEEP) -
             DSN=&TODSN)
DELET01 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                               -
        SYSOPTS="rm -f /XFER/iosin/KDEDUCT.*.FIL"
DELET02 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                               -
        SYSOPTS="rm -f /XFER/iosin/REMOVE.*.FIL"
DELET03 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                               -
        SYSOPTS="rm -f /XFER/iosin/*.CONCAT"
MEMBER NAME  VPSIOSR
VPSIOSR PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN1)        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN1)
STEP02  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN2)        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN2)
STEP03  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN3)        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN3)
STEP04  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN4)        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN4)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY1A RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
        IF (STEP02 = 0) THEN
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY2A RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
        IF (STEP03 = 0) THEN
NOTFY03 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY3A RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
        IF (STEP04 = 0) THEN
NOTFY04 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY4A RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  VPSIOS2
VPSIOS2 PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  VPSIPAY1
VPSIPAY1 PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (SNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (PNODE            -
             DSN=&TODSN           -
             DCB=(DSORG=PS,LRECL=400,RECFM=FB      -
                  BLKSIZE=28000)                   -
             DISP=(NEW)                            -
             UNIT=(SYSDA))
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP02  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE               -
        SYSOPTS="rm &FRMDSN"
MEMBER NAME  VPSIPAY2
VPSIPAY2 PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP02  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                               -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                             -
           \ncftpput -E -V -u c0000102 -p j76rt33x \            -
           \-d /XFER/log/vpsipay.log 64.79.162.169 . \ -
           \&TODSN \                                   -
           \"\
        IF  (STEP02 = 0) THEN
NOTFY03 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY04 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP03  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE               -
        SYSOPTS="rm &TODSN"
MEMBER NAME  VPSLRI01
* THIS CALL COPIES DATA FROM A LAN AND IF SUCESSFUL COPIES A DUMMY
* BACK.  ALSO, THE CALTG OF DSN2 WILL KICK OFF JOB VPSPSHI(*).
*
*     D966.VPSSQ.PDETAIL.RASC.INHIBIT = VPSPSHI1
*     D966.VPSSQ.PDETAIL.CALM.INHIBIT = VPSPSHI2
*
VPSLRI01  PROCESS
STEP01    COPY     FROM(SNODE DSN=&DSN1                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (PNODE DSN=&DSN2                             -
                              DISP=(&DISP))                         -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
     IF  (STEP01 = 0) THEN
STEP02    COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN='D966.VPSSQ.PDETAIL.LANCHECK'     -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (SNODE DSN=&DSN1                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
     EIF
MEMBER NAME  VPSLR01H
VPSLR01H  PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(SNODE DSN=&DSN1                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (PNODE DSN=&DSN2                             -
                              DCB=(DSORG=PS,LRECL=401,RECFM=FB      -
                                   BLKSIZE=27669)                   -
                              DISP=(&DISP)                          -
                              UNIT=(SYSDA))                         -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
MEMBER NAME  VPSLR01I
VPSLR01I  PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (SNODE DSN=&DSN2                             -
                              DISP=(&DISP))                         -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED

STEP1     COPY     FROM(SNODE DSN=&DSN1                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (PNODE DSN=&DSN2                             -
                              DCB=(DSORG=PS,LRECL=400,RECFM=FB      -
                                   BLKSIZE=27600)                   -
                              DISP=(&DISP)                          -
                              UNIT=(SYSDA))                         -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED

                              DISP=(&DISP))                         -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED

* THIS CALL COPIES DATA FROM MAINFRAME TO LAN
*
VPSLR04   PROCESS

                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (SNODE DSN=&DSN2                             -
                        DISP=RPL)                                   -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED

                   TO  (SNODE DSN=&DSNKMA                           -
                              DISP=(&DISP))                         -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
MEMBER NAME  VPSNDMCK
VPSNDMCK PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                                -
                 PNODE=&PNODE
STEP1 COPY FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                                 -
                     PNODE                                   -
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=27625                      -
                     LRECL=425                               -
                     RECFM=FB)                               -
                     DISP=(SHR)                              -
                     UNIT=(SYSDA))                           -
           COMPRESS EXT                                      -
           TO (DSN=&DSNNDM                                   -
              DCB=(DSORG=PS,LRECL=425,RECFM=FB               -
              BLKSIZE=27625)                                 -
              UNIT=DLBLONLY                                  -
              SNODE)
MEMBER NAME  VPSNDMVN
VPSNDMVN PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                                -
                 PNODE=&PNODE
STEP1 COPY FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                                 -
                     PNODE                                   -
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=23200                      -
                     LRECL=400                               -
                     RECFM=FB)                               -
                     DISP=(SHR)                              -
                     UNIT=(SYSDA))                           -
           COMPRESS EXT                                      -
           TO (DSN=&DSNNDM                                   -
              DCB=(DSORG=PS,LRECL=400,RECFM=FB               -
              BLKSIZE=23200)                                 -
              DISP=RPL                                       -
              UNIT=(DLBLONLY)                                 -
              SNODE)
MEMBER NAME  VPSNDMV2
VPSNDMV2 PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                                -
                 PNODE=&PNODE
STEP1 COPY FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                                 -
                     PNODE                                   -
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=23200                      -
                     LRECL=400                               -
                     RECFM=FB)                               -
                     DISP=(SHR)                              -
                     UNIT=(SYSDA))                           -
           COMPRESS EXT                                      -
           TO (DSN=&DSNNDM                                   -
              DCB=(DSORG=PS,LRECL=400,RECFM=FB               -
              BLKSIZE=23200)                                 -
              DISP=RPL                                       -
              UNIT=(SYSDA)                                   -
              SNODE)
MEMBER NAME  VPSPEYVN
VPSPEYVN PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE PNODE=&PNODE
STEP01 COPY   FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                                    -
                    DISP=SHR                                       -
                    DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,DSORG=PS)               -
                    PNODE)                                         -
               COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                                -
              TO  (DSN=&DSNNDM                                     -
                   UNIT=DLBLONLY                                   -
                   DISP=SHR                                        -
                   DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=8000,DSORG=PS)   -
                   SNODE)
      IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01     RUN JOB (DSN=J(CSJQVPS1)) SNODE
      ELSE
NOTFY02     RUN JOB (DSN=J(CSJQVPS2)) SNODE
      EXIT
      EIF
MEMBER NAME  VPSPULL1
* THIS CALL COPIES DATA FROM A LAN AND IF SUCESSFUL COPIES A DUMMY
* BACK.  ALSO, THE CALTG OF DSN2 WILL KICK OFF JOB VPSPUSH(*).
*
*     D966.VPSSQ.PDETAIL.NDM.CASH060 = VPSPUSH1
*     D966.VPSSQ.PDETAIL.NDM.CWD060  = VPSPUSH2
*
VPSPULL1  PROCESS
STEP01    COPY     FROM(SNODE DSN=&DSN1                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (PNODE DSN=&DSN2                             -
                        AVGREC=U                                    -
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=27669                          -
                             DSORG=PS                               -
                             LRECL=401                              -
                             RECFM=FB)                              -
                        DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                     -
                        SPACE=(CYL,(1,5),RLSE)                -
                        UNIT=(SYSDA))                         -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
     IF  (STEP01 = 0) THEN
STEP02    COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN='D966.VPSSQ.PDETAIL.LANCHECK'     -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (SNODE DSN=&DSN1                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
     EIF
MEMBER NAME  VPSPULL3
* THIS CALL COPIES DATA FROM A LAN AND IF SUCESSFUL COPIES A DUMMY
* BACK.  ALSO, THE CALTG OF DSN2 WILL KICK OFF JOB VPSPUSH(*).
*
*     D966.VPSSQ.PDETAIL.NDM.CASHMFG = VPSPUSH3
*
VPSPULL3  PROCESS
STEP01    COPY     FROM(SNODE DSN=&DSN1                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (PNODE DSN=&DSN2                             -
                        AVGREC=U                                    -
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=27600                          -
                             DSORG=PS                               -
                             LRECL=400                              -
                             RECFM=FB)                              -
                        DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                     -
                        SPACE=(CYL,(1,5),RLSE)                -
                        UNIT=(SYSDA))                         -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
     IF  (STEP01 = 0) THEN
STEP02    COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN='D966.VPSSQ.PDETAIL.LANCHECK'     -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (SNODE DSN=&DSN1                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
     EIF

                     UNIT=(SYSDA))                           -

              DCB=(DSORG=PS,LRECL=133,RECFM=FBA              -
              BLKSIZE=27930)                                 -
              UNIT=SYSDA                                     -
              SNODE)

                 PNODE=&PNODE
STEP1 COPY FROM (DSN=&FRMDSN                                 -
                     PNODE                                   -
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=24000                      -
                     LRECL=400                               -
                     RECFM=FB)                               -
                     DISP=(SHR)                              -
                     UNIT=(SYSDA))                           -
           COMPRESS EXT                                      -
           TO (DSN=&TODSN                                    -
              DCB=(DSORG=PS,LRECL=400,RECFM=FB               -
              BLKSIZE=24000)                                 -
              DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE)                    -
              UNIT=SYSDA                                     -
              SNODE)

                 PNODE=&PNODE

                     DISP=(SHR)                              -

           TO (DSN=&DSNNDM                                   -
              SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO) DATATYPE(TEXT) XLATE(YES)" -
              DCB=(DSORG=PS,LRECL=400,RECFM=FB               -
              BLKSIZE=27600)                                 -
              DISP=RPL                                       -
              UNIT=(SYSDA)                                   -
              SNODE)

MEMBER NAME  VR05CA
VR05CA    PROCESS  SNODE=S1022680 PNODE=CDRM52              -           00000010
                   &PNAME=VR05CA                                        00000030
STEP01    COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSNCDC                         -           00000020
                        DISP=(SHR,KEEP)                     -           00000080
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY                       -           00000090
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=27930                  -           00000040
                             DSORG=PS                       -           00000050
                             LRECL=133                      -           00000060
                             RECFM=FB)                      -           00000070
                        PNODE)                              -           00000030
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                        -           00000030

MEMBER NAME  WMS0960A
WMS0960A  PROCESS
*
STEP1 COPY FROM(&NODE  DSN=D999.WMSSQ.PCONVERT.SUBSET.WMSHIST         - 00000060
                                                         DISP=SHR)    -
      TO (DSN='/usr/dbutil/db2/xfer/rcv/wms.delta.wmshist.output'     - 00000070
            DISP=(&DISP1)    SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=BINARY" )             -
                   COMPRESS EXT

* if the copy failed, put message to console for netview
CHECK1  IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
  PARM=(CL4'FAIL','DW ERROR: WMS0960A FAILED-WMSHIST FILE')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

      IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
STEP2 COPY FROM(&NODE  DSN=D999.WMSSQ.PEXTRACT.SUBSET.WMSITEM,        - 00000060
                                                         DISP=SHR)    -
      TO (DSN='/usr/dbutil/db2/xfer/rcv/wms.subset.wmsitem.dsntiaul'  - 00000070
            DISP=(&DISP1)    SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=BINARY" )             -
                   COMPRESS EXT
      EIF

* if the copy failed, put message to console for netview
CHECK2  IF (STEP2 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY2 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
  PARM=(CL4'FAIL','DW ERROR: WMS0960A FAILED-WMSITEM FILE')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

* if the copy worked, then run the task on unix to note the ndm
* process worked
STEP3 IF (STEP2 = 0) THEN
NOTIFY3 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                          -
        SYSOPTS="/usr/dbutil/scripts/wms0960a.goodeoj.ss"
        EIF

* if the unix task failed, put message to console for netview
STEP4  IF (NOTIFY3 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY4 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -
  PARM=(CL4'FAIL','DW ERROR: WMS0960A FAILED-UNIX SCRIPT ERROR')) PNODE
        EIF

MEMBER NAME  UNIXLS

           SYSOPTS=\"\                                             -
           \ls -l /opt/cyclone/in/usbank/arp/*      \              -
           \ > /opt/cyclone/in/usbank/arp/usbankLST.txt \          -
           \"\
         IF (LST = 0) THEN
CPY        COPY                                                    -
             FROM (SNODE DISP=SHR                                  -
                 SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=TEXT:XLATE=YES:"               -
                 DSN='/opt/cyclone/in/usbank/arp/usbankLST.txt')   -
                 COMPRESS EXTENDED                                 -
             TO (PNODE                                             -
                 DSN='D966.TEST.LSOUTPUT.USBANK1'                  -
                 DISP=(RPL))

             SYSOPTS=\"\                                           -
             \rm /opt/cyclone/in/usbank/arp/usbankLST.txt \        -
             \"\
         EIF

                  DISP=SHR                                  -
                  )                                         -
                  COMPRESS EXTENDED                         -
             TO   (SNODE                                    -
                  DSN=&DS2                                  -
                  )
         IF (STEP02 EQ 0) THEN
         ELSE
CDERR       RUN TASK                                        -
            (PGM=DMNOTFY2,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DS1,PID999C)) PNODE
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  PID9486
PID9486 PROCESS HOLD=NO SNODE=&SNODE

                  DSN=&DS1                                  -
                  DISP=SHR                                  -
                  )                                         -
                  COMPRESS EXTENDED                         -
             TO   (SNODE                                    -
                  DSN=&DS2                                  -
                  )
         IF (STEP02 EQ 0) THEN
         ELSE
CDERR       RUN TASK                                        -

MEMBER NAME  SCTTNAVS
SCTTNAVS PROCESS PNODE=&PNODE                   -
                SNODE=&SNODE
STEP1   COPY    FROM(DSN=&FDSN                  -
                     PNODE                      -
                     UNIT=&FUNIT                -
                     DCB=&FDCB                  -
                     DISP=&FDISP)      -
                COMPRESS EXTENDED               -
                TO  (DSN=&TDSN                  -
                     SNODE                      -
                     UNIT=&TUNIT                -
                     DCB=&TDCB                  -
                     DISP=(&TDISP))
STEP2   IF  (STEP1 = 0) THEN
        RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) SNODE
        ELSE
        RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'BAD ',&BADMSG)) SNODE
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  DSDCDER1
//DSDCDER1 JOB 3850X10,DISTRBUT,MSGCLASS=X,                             00000100
//         CLASS=P,REGION=2M                                            00000200
//*                                                                     00000300
//*                                                                     00000400
//**********************************************************************00000500
//* !!! CONTACT DSD HOST SUPPORT VIA E-MAIL !!!                        *00000600
//* EMAIL ADDRESS: 'CORP DSD HOST SUPPORT/FIN/CORP/KROGERCO@KROGERCO'  *00000700
//* !!!                                !!!                             *00000800
//**********************************************************************00000900
//*                                                                    *00001000
//* ONE OF THE CONNECT-DIRECT JOBS SUBMITTED BY THE DSD4000 JOB FAILED.*00001100
//* PLEASE SEND AN E-MAIL TO THE DSD-HOST MAILBOX NOTIFYING THEM OF    *00001200
//* THIS PROBLEM!                                                      *00001300
//* THIS FAILURE IS NOT CRITICAL ENOUGH TO CALL THE PROGRAMMER,        *00001400
//* BUT IT IS NECESSARY TO SEND AN E-MAIL TO THE DSD-HOST MAILBOX.     *00001500
//*                                                                    *00001600
//* CHECK THE CONNECT-DIRECT JOB IN JESYSMSG FOR THE FILE THAT HAS     *00001700
//* FAILED THE TRANSFER STEP.                                          *00001800
//*                                                                    *00001900
//**********************************************************************00002000
//*                                                                     00002100
//*                                                                     00002200
//********************************************************************* 00002300
//*  CREATE A NEW GENERATION OF THE SYS4.CD.CDERROR.DSDCDER1 FILE       00002400
//*  EVERY TIME ANY OF THE CONNECT:DIRECT COPY STEPS IN THE DSD4000     00002500
//*  JOB GETS A RETURN CODE > 4.                                        00002600
//********************************************************************* 00002700
//STEP01   EXEC PGM=IEBGENER                                            00002800
//*                                                                     00002900
//SYSIN    DD  DUMMY                                                    00003000
//SYSPRINT DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00003100
//SYSOUT   DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00003200
//*                                                                     00003300
//SYSUT1   DD  DSN=SYS4.CD.CDERROR.DSDCDER1(0),                         00003400
//             DISP=SHR                                                 00003500
//*                                                                     00003600
//SYSUT2   DD  SYSOUT=*                                                 00003700
//*                                                                     00003800
//*                                                                     00003900
//********************************************************************* 00004000
//* THIS STEP CREATES A U0866 ABEND.                                    00004100
//* THIS STEP WILL BE EXECUTED BY ZEKE TO NOTIFY COMPUTER OPERATIONS    00004200
//* THAT A CONNECT-DIRECT TRANSMISSION OR RETRIEVAL HAS FAILED.         00004300
//* JCL SHOULD INCLUDE THE JOB NAME, DATASET & WHOM TO CONTACT          00004400
//********************************************************************* 00004500
//ABEND866 EXEC CD866                                                   00004600
//*                                                                     00004700
//*                                                                     00004800
//                                                                      00004900
MEMBER NAME  PID6460
PID6460   PROCESS
STEP1    COPY  FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1)  -
         TO(  -
           DSN=&DSN2  -
           SNODE      -
           SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"     -
           DISP=(RPL))    -
           COMPRESS EXTENDED
MEMBER NAME  SKPVOC
SKPVOC    PROCESS                                                       00010008
STEP1   COPY     FROM (DSN=&DSN1                            -           00020001
                       PNODE                                -           00020101
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                     -           00040001
                 COMPRESS EXTENDED                          -           00050010
                 TO   (SNODE                                -           00060001
                       DSN=&DSN2                            -           00070009
                       DCB=(BLKSIZE=310                     -           00071001
                       LRECL=310                            -           00072001
                       RECFM=FB)                            -           00073001
                       DISP=(&DISP,KEEP)                    -           00074006
                       UNIT=DLBLONLY)                                   00075001
                                                                        00090001
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 4) THEN                                             00090002
          GOTO STEP7
        ELSE
STEP3   RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&DSN1)) PNODE            00090003
        EIF                                                             00090004
STEP4   COPY     FROM (DSN=&DSN3                            -           00090009
                       PNODE                                -           00090010
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                     -           00090011
                 COMPRESS EXTENDED                          -           00090012
                 TO   (SNODE                                -           00090013
                       DSN=&DSN4                            -           00090014
                       DCB=(BLKSIZE=310                     -           00090015
                       LRECL=310                            -           00090016
                       RECFM=FB)                            -           00090017
                       DISP=(&DISP,KEEP)                    -           00090020
                       UNIT=DLBLONLY)                                   00090030
                                                                        00090040
STEP5   IF (STEP4 > 4) THEN                                             00090041
          GOTO STEP10
        ELSE
STEP6   RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&DSN3)) PNODE            00090050
        EXIT                                                            00090080
        EIF                                                             00090060
STEP7   COPY     FROM (DSN=&DSN1                            -           00020001
                       PNODE                                -           00020101
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                     -           00040001
                 COMPRESS EXTENDED                          -           00050010
                 TO   (SNODE                                -           00060001
                       DSN=&DSN2                            -           00070009
                       DCB=(BLKSIZE=310                     -           00071001
                       LRECL=310                            -           00072001
                       RECFM=FB)                            -           00073001
                       DISP=(&DISP,KEEP)                    -           00074006
                       UNIT=DLBLONLY)                                   00075001
                                                                        00090001
STEP8   IF (STEP7 > 4) THEN                                             00090002
          GOTO STEP13
        ELSE
STEP9   RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&DSN1)) PNODE            00090003
        EIF                                                             00090004
STEP10  COPY     FROM (DSN=&DSN3                            -           00090009
                       PNODE                                -           00090010
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                     -           00090011
                 COMPRESS EXTENDED                          -           00090012
                 TO   (SNODE                                -           00090013
                       DSN=&DSN4                            -           00090014
                       DCB=(BLKSIZE=310                     -           00090015
                       LRECL=310                            -           00090016
                       RECFM=FB)                            -           00090017
                       DISP=(&DISP,KEEP)                    -           00090020
                       UNIT=DLBLONLY)                                   00090030
                                                                        00090040
STEP11  IF (STEP10 > 4) THEN                                            00090041
          GOTO STEP16
        ELSE
STEP12  RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&DSN3)) PNODE            00090050
        EXIT                                                            00090080
        EIF                                                             00090060
STEP13  COPY     FROM (DSN=&DSN1                            -           00020001
                       PNODE                                -           00020101
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                     -           00040001
                 COMPRESS EXTENDED                          -           00050010
                 TO   (SNODE                                -           00060001
                       DSN=&DSN2                            -           00070009
                       DCB=(BLKSIZE=310                     -           00071001
                       LRECL=310                            -           00072001
                       RECFM=FB)                            -           00073001
                       DISP=(&DISP,KEEP)                    -           00074006
                       UNIT=DLBLONLY)                                   00075001
                                                                        00090001
STEP14  IF (STEP13 > 4) THEN                                            00090002
          GOTO SKPABEND
        ELSE
STEP15  RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&DSN1)) PNODE            00090003
        EIF                                                             00090004
STEP16  COPY     FROM (DSN=&DSN3                            -           00090009
                       PNODE                                -           00090010
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                     -           00090011
                 COMPRESS EXTENDED                          -           00090012
                 TO   (SNODE                                -           00090013
                       DSN=&DSN4                            -           00090014
                       DCB=(BLKSIZE=310                     -           00090015
                       LRECL=310                            -           00090016
                       RECFM=FB)                            -           00090017
                       DISP=(&DISP,KEEP)                    -           00090020
                       UNIT=DLBLONLY)                                   00090030
                                                                        00090040
STEP17  IF (STEP16 > 4) THEN                                            00090041
          GOTO SKPABEND
        ELSE
STEP18  RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&DSN3)) PNODE            00090050
        EXIT                                                            00090080
        EIF                                                             00090060
SKPABEND RUN TASK(PGM=DMRTSUB,                              -
         PARM=("DSN=SYS4.CD.PDS.CNTL(CDERROR),DISP=SHR",    -
         "FILE SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(&MSG1)",        -
         "JOBNAME SKPCDERR",                                -
         "ZEKEADD '''ZADD EV 4161 REBUILD'''"               -
         )) PNODE
         EXIT
MEMBER NAME  NEXSPLT2
COPYNEX  PROCESS CLASS=1 HOLD=NO PRTY=10                                00000100
*                                                                       00000200
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE                                         -      00000300
               DSN=&DSNCDC                                       -      00000400
               DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                              -      00000500
               DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=166)                 -      00000600
                  )                                              -      00000700
               COMPRESS EXTENDED                                 -      00000800
               CKPT=0K                                           -      00000900
               TO (SNODE                                         -      00001000
               DSN=&DSDKMA                                       -      00001100
               DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=VB,LRECL=170,BLKSIZE=27998)   -      00001200
               DISP=&DISP                                        -      00001300
               SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(YES)")                             00001400
*                                                                       00001500
*  THE COPY STEP WORKED                                                 00001600
STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                            00001700
SPLIT    RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                               -      00001800
         SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS                                               00001900
         EIF                                                            00002000
*                                                                       00002100
*  THE COPY STEP WORKED                                                 00002200
STEP3    IF (STEP1 = 1) THEN                                            00002300
SPLITB   RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                               -      00002400
         SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS                                               00002500
         EIF                                                            00002600
*                                                                       00002700
*  THE COPY STEP WORKED                                                 00002800
STEP4    IF (STEP1 = 2) THEN                                            00002900
SPLITC   RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                               -      00003000
         SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS                                               00003100
         EIF                                                            00003200
*                                                                       00003300
*  THE COPY STEP WORKED                                                 00003400
STEP5    IF (STEP1 = 3) THEN                                            00003500
SPLITD   RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                               -      00003600
         SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS                                               00003700
         EIF                                                            00003800
*                                                                       00003900
*  THE COPY STEP WORKED                                                 00004000
STEP6    IF (STEP1 = 4) THEN                                            00004100
SPLITE   RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                               -      00004200
         SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS                                               00004300
         EIF                                                            00004400
*                                                                       00004500
*  THE COPY STEP FAILED                                                 00004600
STEP7    IF (STEP1 > 4) THEN                                            00004700
         GOTO ABEND                                                     00004800
         EIF                                                            00004900
*                                                                       00005000
*  EXIT THE PROCESS                                                     00005100
   EXIT                                                                 00005200
*                                                                       00005300
*                                                                       00005400
*---------------------------------------------------------------------  00005500
* WHEN THERE IS A PROBLEM TRANSFERRING THE FILE USING CONNECT:DIRECT    00005600
* IN STEP1, THIS PROCESS CALLS 'ABEND' BELOW TO EXECUTE PROGRAM DMRTSUB.00005700
* PROGRAM DMRTSUB KICKS OFF A SERIES OF EVENTS TO (ULTIMATELY) NOTIFY   00005800
* THE DSD GROUP THAT THERE WAS A PROBLEM WITH ONE OF THE SUBMITTED      00005900
* CONNECT:DIRECT JOBS.                                                  00006000
*---------------------------------------------------------------------  00006100
* PROGRAM DMRTSUB CALLS THE COMMON JOB 'SYS4.CD.PDS.CNTL(CDERROR)'      00006200
* TO NOTIFY DSD, PASSING IT A UNIQUE PARM STATEMENT.  THIS JOB          00006300
* TAKES FILE 'SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(DSD4000E)' AND JUST COPIES IT          00006400
* TO A NEW GENERATION OF THE 'SYS4.CD.CDERROR.DSDCDER1(+1)' FILE.       00006500
* IT ALSO EXECUTES THE ZEKE COMMAND SPECIFIED, WHICH, IN THIS CASE,     00006600
* IS TO ADD ZEKE EVENT 14963.  THIS ZEKE EVENT 14963 TELLS OPERATIONS   00006700
* THAT THERE WAS A JOB FAILURE AND TO GO INVESTIGATE THE PROBLEM.       00006800
*                                                                       00006900
* 'SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(DSD4000E)' IS JUST A FILE THAT CONTAINS WORDING   00007000
* THAT WE WANT THE OPERATIONS PERSON TO READ WHEN AN ABEND OCCURS.      00007100
* THIS FILE IS COPIED TO A NEW GENERATION OF THE                        00007200
* 'SYS4.CD.CDERROR.DSDCDER1(+1)' FILE.  (THIS IS THE ACTUAL FILE THAT   00007300
* OPERATIONS LOOKS AT TO TELL THEM WHAT TO DO ABOUT THE FAILED CD STEP).00007400
*                                                                       00007500
* DSDCDER1 IS USED TO CREATE THE NAME OF THE DATASET THAT OPERATIONS    00007600
* IS SUPPOSED TO LOOK AT WHEN AN ABEND OCCURS                           00007700
* ('SYS4.CD.CDERROR.DSDCDER1(+1)).                                      00007800
*                                                                       00007900
* DSDCDER1 IS ALSO THE JOB NAME PASSED TO THE ZEKE EVENT 14963.         00008000
*                                                                       00008100
* WHEN THE CONNECT:DIRECT COPY STATEMENT FAILS, OPERATIONS KNOWS TO     00008200
* LOOK IN THE 'SYS4.CD.CDERROR.DSDCDER1(+1) FILE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON    00008300
* HOW TO HANDLE THE ABEND.  IN THIS FILE, THEY ARE INSTRUCTED TO SEND   00008400
* AN E-MAIL TO THE DSD HOST MAILBOX NOTIFYING DSD PROGRAMMERS OF THE    00008500
* ERROR.                                                                00008600
*---------------------------------------------------------------------  00008700
*                                                                       00008800
*                                                                       00008900
ABEND    RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTSUB                           -              00009000
         PARM=("DSN=SYS4.CD.PDS.CNTL(CDERROR),DISP=SHR", -              00009100
         "FILE SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(DSD4000E)",            -              00009200
         "JOBNAME DSDCDER1",                             -              00009300
         "ZEKEADD '''ZADD EV 14963 REBUILD'''"           -              00009400
         )) PNODE                                                       00009500
*                                                                       00009600
MEMBER NAME  SKPPWINA
SKPPWIN PROCESS
STEP1   COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSNCDC                         -
                       PNODE                               -
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                  TO  (DSN="&PATHKMA/&DSNKMA"              -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no"          -
                       SNODE)                              -
                  COMPRESS EXT

STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 4) THEN
          GOTO STEP6
        EIF

STEP3     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                          -
          SYSOPTS="&PATHPGM &SRCID &PRCTYPE &DSNKMA"

STEP4   IF (STEP3 > 4) THEN
          GOTO STEP8
        EIF

STEP5   IF (STEP3 < 5) THEN
          EXIT
        EIF

STEP6   COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSNCDC                         -
                       PNODE                               -
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                  TO  (DSN="&PATHKMA/&DSNKMA"              -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no"          -
                       SNODE)                              -
                  COMPRESS EXT

STEP7   IF (STEP6 > 4) THEN
          GOTO STEP11
        EIF

STEP8     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                          -
          SYSOPTS="&PATHPGM &SRCID &PRCTYPE &DSNKMA"

STEP9   IF (STEP8 > 4) THEN
          GOTO STEP13
        EIF

STEP10  IF (STEP8 < 5) THEN
          EXIT
        EIF

STEP11  COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSNCDC                         -
                       PNODE                               -
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                  TO  (DSN="&PATHKMA/&DSNKMA"              -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no"          -
                       SNODE)                              -
                  COMPRESS EXT

STEP12  IF (STEP11 > 4) THEN
          GOTO SKPABEND
        EIF

STEP13    RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                          -
          SYSOPTS="&PATHPGM &SRCID &PRCTYPE &DSNKMA"

STEP14  IF (STEP13 > 4) THEN
          GOTO WINABEND
        EIF

STEP15  IF (STEP13 < 5) THEN
          EXIT
        EIF

SKPABEND RUN TASK(PGM=DMRTSUB,                              -
         PARM=("DSN=SYS4.CD.PDS.CNTL(CDERROR),DISP=SHR",    -
         "FILE SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(&JOBNAME)",        -
         "JOBNAME SKPCDERR",                                -
         "ZEKEADD '''ZADD EV 4161 REBUILD'''"               -
         )) PNODE
         EXIT

WINABEND RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE

                       PNODE                               -
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -

                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no"          -
                       SNODE)                              -
                  COMPRESS EXT

STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 4) THEN
          GOTO STEP6
        EIF

STEP3     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                          -
          SYSOPTS="&PATHPGM &SRCID &PRCTYPE &DSNKMA"

STEP4   IF (STEP3 > 4) THEN
          GOTO STEP8
        EIF

STEP5   IF (STEP3 < 5) THEN
          EXIT
        EIF

                       PNODE                               -
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -

                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no"          -

        EIF

                       PNODE                               -

                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no"          -
                       SNODE)                              -
                  COMPRESS EXT

STEP12  IF (STEP11 > 4) THEN
          GOTO SKPABEND
        EIF

          GOTO WINABEND

          EXIT
        EIF

         PARM=("DSN=SYS4.CD.PDS.CNTL(CDERROR),DISP=SHR",    -
         "FILE SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(&JOBNAME)",        -
         "JOBNAME SKPCDERR",                                -
         "ZEKEADD '''ZADD EV 4161 REBUILD'''"               -
         )) PNODE
         EXIT

         PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
MEMBER NAME  CDCRP1
CDCRP1    PROCESS  SNODE=S1022680 PNODE=CDRM51              -           00000010
                   &PNAME=CBFMRCVS                                      00000030
STEP01    COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSNCDC                         -           00000020
                        DISP=(SHR,KEEP)                     -           00000080
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY                       -           00000090
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=27750                  -           00000040
                             DSORG=PS                       -           00000050
                             LRECL=250                      -           00000060
                             RECFM=FB)                      -           00000070
                        PNODE)                              -           00000030
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                        -           00000030
                   TO  (DSN='QS36F/CBZWRK02(CBZWRK02)'      -           00000110
                        SYSOPTS="TYPE(MBR)"                 -           00000120
                        DISP=(RPL)                          -           00000130
                        SNODE)                                          00000140
         IF (STEP01 <= 4) THEN                                          00000190

                  SYSOPTS="CMD(CALL CCDI002A &PNAME)"                   00000230
         EIF                                                            00000240
MEMBER NAME  PID9200N
PID9200N PROCESS  CLASS=1 HOLD=NO PRTY=10
STEP0010  COPY FROM (PNODE                                       -
               DSN=&DSNCDC                                       -
               DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                              -
               UNIT=(SYSDA)                                      -
                  )                                              -
               COMPRESS EXTENDED                                 -
               CKPT=0K                                           -
               TO (SNODE                                         -
               DSN=&DSNKMA                                       -
               DISP=(RPL)                                        -
               SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")

          IF (STEP0010 EQ 0) THEN
NOTFY01   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&DSNCDC')) PNODE
          ELSE
NOTFY02   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&DSNCDC')) PNODE
          EXIT
          EIF

          IF (STEP0010 EQ 0) THEN
STEP0020  RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                      -
          SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS
          EIF

          IF (STEP0020 EQ 0) THEN
NOTFY03   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&SYSOPTS')) PNODE
          ELSE
NOTFY04   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&SYSOPTS')) PNODE
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  PID9210N
PID9210N PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=CDRM09                            -
               &BLKSIZE=27920                                         -
               &LRECL=80                                              -
               &RECFM=FB                                              -
               &MEM2=DSS1757                                          -
               &SLIB=J
STEP010  COPY  FROM (DSN=&DSN1                                        -
                     PNODE                                            -
                     DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                             -
                     UNIT=(SYSDA))                                    -
               COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                                   -
               TO   (DSN=&DSN2                                        -
                     SNODE                                            -
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE                            -
                          DSORG=PS                                    -
                          LRECL=&LRECL                                -
                          RECFM=&RECFM)                               -
                     DISP=(OLD,KEEP)                                  -
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY)

         IF (STEP010 = 0) THEN
STEP020  RUN JOB (DSN=&SLIB(&MEM2)) SNODE
         EIF

         IF (STEP010 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&DSN1')) PNODE
         ELSE
NOTFY02  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&DSN1')) PNODE
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  PID9240N
PID9240N PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=CDRM09                        -
               &BLKSIZE=27920                                     -
               &LRECL=80                                          -
               &RECFM=FB                                          -
               &SLIB=J
STEP010  COPY  FROM (DSN=&DSN1                                    -
                     PNODE                                        -
                     DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                         -
                     UNIT=(SYSDA))                                -
               COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                               -
               TO   (DSN=&DSN2                                    -
                     SNODE                                        -
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE                        -
                          DSORG=PS                                -
                          LRECL=&LRECL                            -
                          RECFM=&RECFM)                           -
                     DISP=(OLD,KEEP)                              -
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY)

         IF (STEP010 EQ 0) THEN
NOTFY01  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&DSN1')) PNODE
         ELSE
NOTFY02  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&DSN1')) PNODE
         EIF

                  )                                              -      00024000

                     PNODE                              -
                     DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                   -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                    -

                DISP=NEW                                -

                MAXDELAY=UNLIMITED

                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1) SNODE)      -
                   COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  A857SPLT
COPY857  PROCESS CLASS=1 HOLD=NO PRTY=10                                00000100
*                                                                       00000200
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE                                         -      00000300
               DSN=&DSNCDC                                       -      00000400
               DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                              -      00000500
               DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=166)                 -      00000600
                  )                                              -      00000700
               COMPRESS EXTENDED                                 -      00000800
               CKPT=0K                                           -      00000900
               TO (SNODE                                         -      00001000
               DSN=&DSDKMA                                       -      00001100
               DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=VB,LRECL=170,BLKSIZE=27998)   -      00001200
               DISP=&DISP                                        -      00001300
               SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(YES)")                             00001400
*                                                                       00001500
*  THE COPY STEP WORKED                                                 00001600
STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                            00001700
SPLIT    RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                               -      00001800
         SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS                                               00001900
         EIF                                                            00002000
*                                                                       00002100
*  THE COPY STEP WORKED                                                 00002200
STEP3    IF (STEP1 = 1) THEN                                            00002300
SPLITB   RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                               -      00002400
         SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS                                               00002500
         EIF                                                            00002600
*                                                                       00002700
*  THE COPY STEP WORKED                                                 00002800
STEP4    IF (STEP1 = 2) THEN                                            00002900
SPLITC   RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                               -      00003000
         SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS                                               00003100
         EIF                                                            00003200
*                                                                       00003300
*  THE COPY STEP WORKED                                                 00003400
STEP5    IF (STEP1 = 3) THEN                                            00003500
SPLITD   RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                               -      00003600
         SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS                                               00003700
         EIF                                                            00003800
*                                                                       00003900
*  THE COPY STEP WORKED                                                 00004000
STEP6    IF (STEP1 = 4) THEN                                            00004100
SPLITE   RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                               -      00004200
         SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS                                               00004300
         EIF                                                            00004400
*                                                                       00004500
*    EVENTUALLY UNCOMMENT THIS STEP7 OUT !!                             00004510
*                                                                       00004520
*****  THE COPY STEP FAILED                                             00004600
*****STEP7    IF (STEP1 > 4) THEN                                       00004700
*****         GOTO ABEND                                                00004800
*****         EIF                                                       00004900
*                                                                       00005000
*  EXIT THE PROCESS                                                     00005100
   EXIT                                                                 00005200
*                                                                       00005300
*                                                                       00005400
*---------------------------------------------------------------------  00005500
* WHEN THERE IS A PROBLEM TRANSFERRING THE FILE USING CONNECT:DIRECT    00005600
* IN STEP1, THIS PROCESS CALLS 'ABEND' BELOW TO EXECUTE PROGRAM DMRTSUB.00005700
* PROGRAM DMRTSUB KICKS OFF A SERIES OF EVENTS TO (ULTIMATELY) NOTIFY   00005800
* THE DSD GROUP THAT THERE WAS A PROBLEM WITH ONE OF THE SUBMITTED      00005900
* CONNECT:DIRECT JOBS.                                                  00006000
*---------------------------------------------------------------------  00006100
* PROGRAM DMRTSUB CALLS THE COMMON JOB 'SYS4.CD.PDS.CNTL(CDERROR)'      00006200
* TO NOTIFY DSD, PASSING IT A UNIQUE PARM STATEMENT.  THIS JOB          00006300
* TAKES FILE 'SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(DSD4060E)' AND JUST COPIES IT          00006400
* TO A NEW GENERATION OF THE 'SYS4.CD.CDERROR.DSDCDER2(+1)' FILE.       00006500
* IT ALSO EXECUTES THE ZEKE COMMAND SPECIFIED, WHICH, IN THIS CASE,     00006600
* IS TO ADD ZEKE EVENT XXXXX.  THIS ZEKE EVENT XXXXX TELLS OPERATIONS   00006700
* THAT THERE WAS A JOB FAILURE AND TO GO INVESTIGATE THE PROBLEM.       00006800
*                                                                       00006900
* 'SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(DSD4060E)' IS JUST A FILE THAT CONTAINS WORDING   00007000
* THAT WE WANT THE OPERATIONS PERSON TO READ WHEN AN ABEND OCCURS.      00007100
* THIS FILE IS COPIED TO A NEW GENERATION OF THE                        00007200
* 'SYS4.CD.CDERROR.DSDCDER2(+1)' FILE.  (THIS IS THE ACTUAL FILE THAT   00007300
* OPERATIONS LOOKS AT TO TELL THEM WHAT TO DO ABOUT THE FAILED CD STEP).00007400
*                                                                       00007500
* DSDCDER2 IS USED TO CREATE THE NAME OF THE DATASET THAT OPERATIONS    00007600
* IS SUPPOSED TO LOOK AT WHEN AN ABEND OCCURS                           00007700
* ('SYS4.CD.CDERROR.DSDCDER2(+1)').                                     00007800
*                                                                       00007900
* DSDCDER2 IS ALSO THE JOB NAME PASSED TO THE ZEKE EVENT XXXXX.         00008000
*                                                                       00008100
* WHEN THE CONNECT:DIRECT COPY STATEMENT FAILS, OPERATIONS KNOWS TO     00008200
* LOOK IN THE 'SYS4.CD.CDERROR.DSDCDER2(+1)' FILE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON   00008300
* HOW TO HANDLE THE ABEND.  IN THIS FILE, THEY ARE INSTRUCTED TO SEND   00008400
* AN E-MAIL TO THE DSD HOST MAILBOX NOTIFYING DSD PROGRAMMERS OF THE    00008500
* ERROR.                                                                00008600
*---------------------------------------------------------------------  00008700
*                                                                       00008800
*                                                                       00008900
*****ABEND    RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTSUB                           -         00009000
*****         PARM=("DSN=SYS4.CD.PDS.CNTL(CDERROR),DISP=SHR", -         00009100
*****         "FILE SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(DSD4060E)",            -         00009200
*****         "JOBNAME DSDCDER2",                             -         00009300
*****         "ZEKEADD '''ZADD EV XXXXX REBUILD'''"           -         00009400
*****         )) PNODE                                                  00009500
*                                                                       00009600
MEMBER NAME  DSD1305S
DSD1305S PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=N706CD00                                0010
STEP010  COPY    FROM (DSN=&DSNNT                                     -     0040
                       SNODE                                          -     0050
                       DISP=(SHR)                                     -     0080
                       SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")                    -     0050
                 COMPRESS EXTENDED                                    -     0090
                 TO   (DSN=&DSNCDC                                    -
                       PNODE                                          -     0110
                       DCB=(GDG.MODEL                                 -     0120
                            DSORG=PS                                  -     0130
                            LRECL=180                                 -     0140
                            BLKSIZE=27900                             -     0140
                            RECFM=FB)                                 -     0150
                       DISP=(,CATLG)                                  -     0160
                       SPACE=(180,(5000,500),RLSE)                    -     0160
                       UNIT=SYSDA)                                          0180

                MAXDELAY=UNLIMITED
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR PNODE)           -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1) SNODE)      -
                   COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  $FTPPROC

                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE                                           -
             DSN=&DSN1                                             -
             DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                                  -
             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=&LRECL,BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE) -
             )                                                     -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                     -
             TO (SNODE                                             -
             DSN=&DSN2                                             -
             DISP=RPL)
         IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
         ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
         EXIT
         EIF

        \/XFER/dpiout/istr703.txt \             -
        \ wekroger@206.107.75.50:istr703.txt \  -
        \>/XFER/log/dpi.log 2>&1\               -
        \"\
         IF  (STEP02 = 0) THEN

         ELSE

         EXIT
         EIF

                 PARM=('DSN=K(ADDA0355)', -

        ELSE

        EIF

CD512FM   PROCESS PRTY=8 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2                       -
                MAXDELAY=UNLIMITED
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR PNODE)           -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1) SNODE)      -
                   COMPRESS EXT
MEMBER NAME  INFNDMF2
INFNDMF2 PROC  SNODE=,SNODEID=(connect,direct),PNODE=CDRM51
STEP010  COPY  FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                        -
                     PNODE                              -
                     DISP=(old,KEEP))                   -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                    -
          TO   (DSN=&DSNKMA                             -
                DISP=shr                                -

MEMBER NAME  PID6013
PID6013N  PROCESS                                                       00010001
STEP1    COPY  FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1)  -                                 00020000
         TO(  -                                                         00030000
           DSN=&DSN2  -                                                 00040000
           SNODE      -                                                 00050000

MEMBER NAME  EDIWINDM
EDIWINDM PROCESS
STEP1   COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSNCDC                         -
                       PNODE                               -
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                  TO  (DSN="&PATHWIN/&DSNWIN"              -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no"          -
                       SNODE)                              -
                  COMPRESS EXT

* if the copy failed, put message to console for netview
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

* if the copy worked, then run the task on unix to copy the downloaded
* file to a mq series queue
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIFY2 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                          -
        SYSOPTS="&PATHPGM/winrun.ss &WHSNUM ASNIN &DSNWIN"
        EIF

* if the unix task failed, put message to console for netview
STEP4   IF (NOTIFY2 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY3 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  VPSCARLO
VPSCARLO PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN1)        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN1)
STEP02  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN2)        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN2)
STEP03  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN3)        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN3)
STEP04  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN4)        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN4)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY1A RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
        IF (STEP02 = 0) THEN
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY2A RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
        IF (STEP03 = 0) THEN
NOTFY03 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY3A RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
        IF (STEP04 = 0) THEN
NOTFY04 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY4A RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

VPSLR06O PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN1)        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN1)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY1A RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

MEMBER NAME  PID2411N
