                   PNODE=&PNODE                                   -     00020001
                   CLASS=1                                              00030001
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN1                                 -     00040001
                        PNODE                                     -     00050001
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=0                            -     00060001
                        LRECL=080                                 -     00070001
                        RECFM=FB)                                 -     00080001
                        DISP=SHR)                                 -     00090001
                   CKPT=0K                                        -     00100001
                   TO  (DSN=&DSN2                                 -     00110001
                        SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT):STRIP.BLANKS(NO)" -     00120001
                        SNODE                                     -     00130001
                        DISP=(&DISP))                             -     00140001
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                                    00150001
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE FOR NETVIEW                00160001
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN                                             00170001

        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE                                 00190001
        EXIT                                                            00200001
        EIF                                                             00210001

MEMBER NAME  DILLROLL
DILLROLL PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                                -
                 SNODEID=(SUPERUSR,SUPERUSR)               -
                 PNODE=&PNODE

                     PNODE                                   -
                     DCB=(DSORG=PS                           -
                     LRECL=100                               -
                     RECFM=FB)                               -
                     DISP=(SHR)                              -
                     UNIT=(SYSDA))                           -

              DCB=(DSORG=PS                         -
              BLKSIZE=0                        -
              LRECL=100                             -
              RECFM=FB)                             -
              DISP=(RPL)                            -
              UNIT=(DLBLONLY)                       -
              SNODE)
       IF (STEP1 EQ 0) THEN

       ELSE
          RUN JOB(DSN=J(DSJEMAIL)) SNODE
       EIF

                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10                                 00002001
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -                                     00003001
             DISP=SHR             -                                     00004001
             DSN=&FRMDSN1)        -                                     00005001
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -                                     00006001
             TO (SNODE            -                                     00007001
             DSN=/opt/cyclone/out/market6/&TODSN1          -            00008001
             SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"  -                                00009001
             DISP=(RPL))                                                00009101
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN                                            00009201
NOTFY1A RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE         00009301
        ELSE                                                            00009401
NOTFY1B RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&ERRMSG1)) PNODE         00009501
        EXIT                                                            00009601
        EIF                                                             00009701
STEP02  COPY FROM (PNODE          -                                     00009801
             DISP=SHR             -                                     00009901
             DSN=&FRMDSN2)        -                                     00010001
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -                                     00010101
             TO (SNODE            -                                     00010201
             DSN=/opt/cyclone/out/market6/&TODSN2          -            00010301
             SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"  -                                00010401
             DISP=(RPL))                                                00010501
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN                                            00010601
NOTFY2A RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE         00010701
        ELSE                                                            00010801
NOTFY2B RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&ERRMSG2)) PNODE         00010901
        EXIT                                                            00011001
        EIF                                                             00011101
STEP03  COPY FROM (PNODE          -                                     00011201
             DISP=SHR             -                                     00011301
             DSN=&FRMDSN3)        -                                     00011401
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -                                     00011501
             TO (SNODE            -                                     00011601
             DSN=/opt/cyclone/out/market6/&TODSN3          -            00011701
             SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"  -                                00011801
             DISP=(RPL))                                                00011901
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN                                            00012001
NOTFY3A RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE         00012101
        ELSE                                                            00012201
NOTFY3B RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&ERRMSG3)) PNODE         00012301
        EXIT                                                            00012401
        EIF                                                             00012501
MEMBER NAME  PID8744U
PID8744U PROCESS HOLD=NO SNODE=&SNODE
STEP02  COPY FROM (SNODE                                    -
                  DSN=&FRMDSN                               -
                  DISP=SHR)                                 -
                  COMPRESS EXTENDED                         -
             TO  (PNODE                                     -
                  DSN='D911.PIDSQ.PDETAIL.DIV708.POM805'    -
                  UNIT=(SYSDA)                              -
                  AVGREC=K                                  -
                  DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                   -
                  SPACE=(80,(200,20),RLSE)                  -
                  DCB=(BLKSIZE=27985,DSORG=PS,LRECL=29,     -
                       RECFM=FB))
         IF (STEP02 EQ 0) THEN
         ELSE
CDERR       RUN TASK                                        -
            (PGM=DMNOTFY2,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FRMDSN,PID8744)) PNODE
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  SKBMKT6A
SKBMKTA PROCESS
STEP1   COPY  FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                             -
                    PNODE                                   -
                    DISP=SHR)                               -
                    COMPRESS EXTENDED                       -
                TO (DSN="&PATHKMA/&DSNKMA"                  -
                    DISP=(RPL)                              -
                    SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"                -
                    SNODE)

CHEK2   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
          RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
        ELSE
          RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&ERRMSG)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

MEMBER NAME  PID6003
//*********************************************************************
//*                                                                   *
//*   GENERATE THE TRM UPDATES FOR PID'S PIDPDTCA, COLUMNS            *
//*    TRP_CLS_CD AND PTC_LVL_CD                                      *
//*                                                                   *
//*   SIR 4140 SETUP PROC                                             *
//*   TEMPORARY PROCESS UNTIL PROGRAMMING COMPLETE TO SET VALUES      *
//*    ON ITEM ADD IN PID6000/PTC1 BASED ON DEFAULTS ON PIDSBCOM      *
//*                                                                   *
//*********************************************************************
//*
//PID6003  PROC
//*
//EXTRACT  EXEC PGM=IKJEFT1B,DYNAMNBR=20
//STEPLIB  DD DSN=DB2P.DB2.DSNEXIT,DISP=SHR
//         DD DSN=DB2P.DB2.DSNLOAD,DISP=SHR
//SYSTSIN  DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SQLTIAUP),DISP=SHR
//**SIN    DD DSN=#911811.TRMPID.CNTL(BY@COMM),DISP=SHR
//SYSIN    DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(PID6003P),DISP=SHR
//SYSREC00 DD DSN=&&SYSREC00,DISP=(NEW,PASS,DELETE),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(60,15),RLSE)
//SYSREC01 DD DSN=&&SYSREC01,DISP=(NEW,PASS,DELETE),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(60,15),RLSE)
//SYSREC02 DD DSN=&&SYSREC02,DISP=(NEW,PASS,DELETE),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(60,15),RLSE)
//SYSREC03 DD DSN=&&SYSREC03,DISP=(NEW,PASS,DELETE),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(60,15),RLSE)
//SYSREC04 DD DSN=&&SYSREC04,DISP=(NEW,PASS,DELETE),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(60,15),RLSE)
//SYSREC05 DD DSN=&&SYSREC05,DISP=(NEW,PASS,DELETE),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(60,15),RLSE)
//SYSREC06 DD DSN=&&SYSREC06,DISP=(NEW,PASS,DELETE),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(60,15),RLSE)
//SYSREC07 DD DSN=&&SYSREC07,DISP=(NEW,PASS,DELETE),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(60,15),RLSE)
//SYSREC08 DD DSN=&&SYSREC08,DISP=(NEW,PASS,DELETE),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(60,15),RLSE)
//SYSREC09 DD DSN=&&SYSREC09,DISP=(NEW,PASS,DELETE),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(60,15),RLSE)
//SYSREC10 DD DSN=&&SYSREC10,DISP=(NEW,PASS,DELETE),
//            UNIT=SYSDA,SPACE=(TRK,(60,15),RLSE)
//SYSPUNCH DD DUMMY
//SYSTSPRT DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSPRINT DD SYSOUT=*
//SYSUDUMP DD SYSOUT=*
//*
//FORMAT   EXEC PGM=SORT
//SYSOUT   DD SYSOUT=*
//SORTIN   DD DSN=&&SYSREC00,DISP=(OLD,DELETE,DELETE)
//         DD DSN=&&SYSREC01,DISP=(OLD,DELETE,DELETE)
//         DD DSN=&&SYSREC02,DISP=(OLD,DELETE,DELETE)
//         DD DSN=&&SYSREC03,DISP=(OLD,DELETE,DELETE)
//         DD DSN=&&SYSREC04,DISP=(OLD,DELETE,DELETE)
//         DD DSN=&&SYSREC05,DISP=(OLD,DELETE,DELETE)
//         DD DSN=&&SYSREC06,DISP=(OLD,DELETE,DELETE)
//         DD DSN=&&SYSREC07,DISP=(OLD,DELETE,DELETE)
//         DD DSN=&&SYSREC08,DISP=(OLD,DELETE,DELETE)
//         DD DSN=&&SYSREC09,DISP=(OLD,DELETE,DELETE)
//         DD DSN=&&SYSREC10,DISP=(OLD,DELETE,DELETE)
//SORTOUT  DD  DSN=D911.PIDSQ.PINPUT.PID6000(+1),
//             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE),
//             UNIT=SYSDA,
//             SPACE=(CYL,(10,10),RLSE),
//             DCB=(GDG.MODEL,LRECL=166,BLKSIZE=27888,RECFM=FB)
//*YSIN    DD DSN=#911811.TRMPID.CNTL(GEN@MTCF),DISP=SHR
//SYSIN    DD DSN=SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(PID6003S),DISP=SHR
MEMBER NAME  VPSCKTRP
VPSCKTRP PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE                                   -
                  PNODE=&PNODE                                   -
                  CLASS=1
STEP1    COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN1                                 -
                       PNODE                                     -
                       DCB=(BLKSIZE=27820                        -
                       LRECL=260                                 -
                       RECFM=FB)                                 -
                       DISP=SHR)                                 -
                  ckpt=0k                                        -
                  TO  (DSN=&DSN2                                 -
                       SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT):STRIP.BLANKS(NO)" -
                       SNODE                                     -
                       DISP=(&DISP))                             -
                  COMPRESS EXTENDED
STEP2    COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN3                                 -
                       PNODE                                     -
                       DCB=(BLKSIZE=27820                        -
                       LRECL=260                                 -
                       RECFM=FB)                                 -
                       DISP=SHR)                                 -
                  ckpt=0k                                        -
                  TO  (DSN=&DSN4                                 -
                       SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT):STRIP.BLANKS(NO)" -
                       SNODE                                     -
                       DISP=(&DISP))                             -
                  COMPRESS EXTENDED
STEP3   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                    -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP4   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY2 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                    -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG2')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  SMAC019C
CDMF7MSA PROCESS
STEP1    COPY    FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                    -
                 TO  (DSN=/XFER/msaout/msa_cig019.dat DISP=(RPL)     -
                     SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                      -
                 COMPRESS EXT
STEP2    IF      (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
                      EXIT
         EIF
STEP3    RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                    -
         SYSOPTS=\"\                                                  -
     \dos2unix -D /XFER/msaout/msa_cig019.dat \                       -
     \"\
STEP4    IF       (STEP3 GT 0) THEN
                      EXIT
         EIF
STEP5    RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                    -
         SYSOPTS=\"\                                                  -
     \scp -v -Q /XFER/msaout/msa_cig019.dat \                         -
 /*                                                             */    -
 /* The following line must have MSA.COM in columns 25-31. The  */    -
 /* file sequence number must be in columns 45-49. If this is   */    -
 /* changed, program SMA0788 must also be changed.              */    -
 /*                                                             */    -
 /* NOTE: Do not reset the sequence number without discussing   */    -
 /*       it with MSA!!                                         */    -
 /*                                                             */    -
     \00626001@www.SFTP.MSA.COM:/00243001-CG00302P.ftp \              -
     \>/XFER/log/msa.log 2>&1 \                                       -
     \"\
MEMBER NAME  SMAC028C
CDMF7MSA PROCESS
STEP1    COPY    FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                    -
                 TO  (DSN=/XFER/msaout/msa_cig028.dat DISP=(RPL)     -
                    SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                      -
                 COMPRESS EXT
STEP2    IF      (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
                     EXIT
         EIF
STEP3    RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                    -
         SYSOPTS=\"\                                                  -
     \dos2unix -D /XFER/msaout/msa_cig028.dat \                       -
     \"\
STEP4    IF       (STEP3 GT 0) THEN
                      EXIT
         EIF
STEP5    RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                    -
         SYSOPTS=\"\                                                  -
     \scp -v -Q /XFER/msaout/msa_cig028.dat \                         -
 /*                                                             */    -
 /* The following line must have MSA.COM in columns 25-31. The  */    -
 /* file sequence number must be in columns 45-49. If this is   */    -
 /* changed, program SMA0788 must also be changed.              */    -
 /*                                                             */    -
 /* NOTE: Do not reset the sequence number without discussing   */    -
 /*       it with MSA!!                                         */    -
 /*                                                             */    -
     \00626001@www.SFTP.MSA.COM:/00243002-CG00273P.ftp \              -
     \>/XFER/log/msa.log 2>&1 \                                       -
     \"\
MEMBER NAME  INFMCROS
INFMCROS PROC  SNODE=,SNODEID=(connect,direct),PNODE=CDRM51
STEP010  COPY  FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                        -
                     PNODE                               -
                     DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                   COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                     -
          TO   (DSN=&DSNKMA                                 -
                DISP=MOD                                    -
                DCB=(RECFM=VBM,LRECL=137,BLKSIZE=4110)      -
                SNODE)
MEMBER NAME  PIDNWMSM
PIDNWMSM  PROCESS  SNODE=,PNODE=CDRM51

STEP1     COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSNCDC                        -
                        PNODE                               -
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                   TO  (DSN="&PATHKMA/&DSNKMA"              -
                        SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no"          -
                        SNODE)                              -
                        COMPRESS EXT

* if the copy worked, then run the task on unix to do the compare
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIFY2 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                          -
        SYSOPTS="&PGM1 &SRC &PGM2"
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  PID6050M
PID6050M PROCESS
STEP1   COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSNCDC                         -
                       PNODE                               -
                       DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                  TO  (DSN="&PATHKMA/&DSNKMA"              -
                       SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no"          -
                       SNODE)                              -
                  COMPRESS EXT

* if the copy failed, put message to console for netview
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

* if the copy worked, then run the task on unix to apply the downloaded
* file to informix
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIFY2 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                          -
   SYSOPTS="&PATHPGM/&PGMNAME &SRC PIDUPC"
        EIF

* if the unix task failed, put message to console for netview
STEP4   IF (NOTIFY2 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY3 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  ARWPNCCA
ARWPNCCA PROCESS PNODE=&PNODE SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEPDEL  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                  -
                SYSOPTS="rm /XFER/pnccustin/lbx.644459ca.out"
STEP01  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                   -
    SYSOPTS=\"\                                                     -
      \ncftpget -E -V -u krogr01 -p k5462795 \                      -
      \    -d /XFER/log/pnc.log tagvpn.pnc.com /XFER/pnccustin/ \   -
      \lbx.644459ca.out\                                            -
      \"\
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
STEP02  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                            -
    SYSOPTS="rm /XFER/pnccustin/cust.concat"
STEP03  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                             -
    SYSOPTS=\"\                                               -
            \cat /XFER/pnccustin/lbx.644459ca.out \           -
            \> /XFER/pnccustin/cust.concat \                  -
            \"\
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
STEP04  COPY FROM (SNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (PNODE            -
             DISP=(MOD,CATLG,DELETE)  -
             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=6160) -
             SPACE=(CYL,(5,5),RLSE)   -
             UNIT=SYSDA               -
             DSN=&TODSN)
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EIF

MEMBER NAME  PID5620
PID5620   PROCESS    SNODE=&SNODE -
                     &SEQ=%NUM1  -
                     &DATE=%JDATE -
                     &TIME=%SUBTIME
             SYMBOL &T=.t || &TIME
             SYMBOL &D=.d || &DATE
             SYMBOL &V1=Kroger.com
             SYMBOL &V2=Share
             SYMBOL &V3=Corp
             SYMBOL &V4=GO
             SYMBOL &V5=ISS
             SYMBOL &V6=KDASHARE
             SYMBOL &V7=DataMan
             SYMBOL &V8=Xfer
             SYMBOL &V9=pid_autodisco_err
             SYMBOL &V10=.txt
             SYMBOL &VAR3=\'\ || \\\\\\   || &V1 || \\\\ || &V2 || -
                     \\\\ || &V3 ||  \\\\ || &V4 || \\\\ || &V5 || -
                     \\\\ || &V6 ||  \\\\ || &V7 || \\\\ || &V8 || -
                     \\\\ || &V9 ||  &D   || &T  || &V10 || \'\

*

MBE$COPY COPY FROM(PNODE DSN = &DSN1 ) -
                TO   (SNODE DSN=&VAR3 DISP=(RPL,CATLG))

* ----------------------------------------------------------------------00000800

'\\KROGER.COM\APPS\CORP\GO\DEFERREDBENEFITS\UPLOAD\VEST209.TXT' -       01180105
                    DISP=(SHR) -                                        01181004
                    SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)") -                       01182004
                    COMPRESS EXTENDED -                                 01183004
              TO   (PNODE -                                             01184004
                    DSN='D922.KHRSQ.PINPUT.VEST209' -                   01185007
                    UNIT=SYSDA -                                        01186004
                    AVGREC=K -                                          01187004
                    DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE) -                           01188004
                    SPACE=(080,(20,2),RLSE) -                           01189004
                    DCB=(BLKSIZE=27920 -                                01189104
                         DSORG=PS -                                     01189204
                         LRECL=080 -                                    01189304
                         RECFM=FB))                                     01189404
         EIF                                                            01190004
MEMBER NAME  NTWPF02
NTWPF02   PROCESS                                                       00010001
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   )                 -           00020004
                   TO  (DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1) PNODE)    -           00030004
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                                    00041000
*                  SYSOPTS='DATATYPE(BINARY) XLATE(NO)')            -   00042002
*                                                                       00050000
*        IF (STEP1 > 4) THEN                                            00060000
*           GOTO ABEND                                                  00070000
*        EIF                                                            00080000
*                                                                       00090000
*  ------------                                                         00100000
*  EXIT PROCESS                                                         00110000
*  ------------                                                         00120000
*                                                                       00130000
         EXIT                                                           00140000
*                                                                       00150000
*        -----------------------------------------------                00160000
*        Execute job CDERROR  to indicate Connect:Direct                00170000
*        file transfer error                                            00180000
*        -----------------------------------------------                00190000
*                                                                       00200000
ABEND    RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTSUB -                                        00210000
         PARM=("DSN=SYS4.CD.PDS.CNTL(PEYCDER1),DISP=SHR", -             00220000
         "FILE SYS4.CD.CS.TESTLIB($DMRTSUB)",            -              00230000
         "JOBNAME PEYCDER1",                             -              00240000
         "ZEKEADD '''ZADD EV 7684 REBUILD'''"     -                     00250000
         )) PNODE                                                       00260000
*                                                                       00270000
*BEND    RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTSUB -                                        00280000
*        PARM=("DSN=PROD.JCLSPC(CDERROR),DISP=SHR", -                   00290000
*        "FILE    PROD.CNTRLIB(SIX850CD)", -                            00300000
*        "JOBNAME SIXCDERR", -                                          00310000
*        "ZEKEADD '''ZADD JOB SIXCDERR REBUILD'''" -                    00320000
*        )) PNODE                                                       00330000
*        "ZEKEADD '''ZADD EV 4801 REBUILD'''"     -                     00340000
MEMBER NAME  FCB2E40
FCB2E40   PROCESS
  SYMBOL  &DIR=\/e40/e40fileshare/files/fcbin\
  SYMBOL  &IPDSN2=\'\ || &DIR || \/\ || &DSN2 || \'\
  SYMBOL  &SC=\"\ || &SCRIPT || \ \ || &DIR || \ \ || &DSN2 || \"\
STEP1     COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)              -
                   TO  (      DSN=&IPDSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)        -
                      SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no")                -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF       (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
                      EXIT
          EIF
STEP3    RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=UNIX) SYSOPTS=&SC
MEMBER NAME  MVS2VCOM
MVS2VCOM  PROC  SNODE=NCDCFTC2 PNODE=CDRM51                   -         00010000
                SNODEID=(connect,direct)                                00020000
STEP01  COPY    FROM (DSN=&DSN2                               -         00021001
                      DISP=SHR                                -         00021002
                      PNODE)                                  -         00021003
                TO   (DSN=&DSN1                               -         00021004
                      DISP=RPL                                -         00021005
                      SNODE)                                  -         00021006
                      COMPRESS EXTENDED                                 00021007
         IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN                                           00021008
         RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&DSN1')) PNODE          00021009
         ELSE                                                           00021010
         RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DSN1)) PNODE            00021011
         EXIT                                                           00021012
         EIF                                                            00021013
STEP05  COPY    FROM (DSN=&DSN3                               -         00021020
                      DISP=SHR                                -         00021021
                      PNODE)                                  -         00021022
                TO   (DSN=&DSN4                               -         00021023
                      DISP=RPL                                -         00021024
                      SNODE)                                  -         00021025
                      COMPRESS EXTENDED                                 00021026
         IF (STEP05 = 0) THEN                                           00021027
STEP10   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&DSN4')) PNODE          00021028
         ELSE                                                           00021029
         RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DSN4)) PNODE            00021030
         EIF                                                            00021040

         PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&MSG2')) SNODE

         PARM=(CL4'FAIL',"NY NDM &MSG1")) PNODE
         EIF

MEMBER NAME  VPSMAXUP
VPSMAXUP PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                              -
                 MAXDELAY=UNLIMITED                        -
                 PNODE=&PNODE
STEP01 COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSNADS                           -
                     DISP=(OLD,DELETE)                     -
                     SYSOPTS="RCDLEN(400)"                 -
                     SNODE)                                -
                TO(DSN=&DSNCDC                             -
                     UNIT=SYSDA                            -
                     DISP=(MOD,CATLG,DELETE)               -
                     SPACE=(CYL,(10,5),RLSE)               -
                     DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE                 -
                          RECFM=FB                         -
                          LRECL=&LRECL)                    -
                    PNODE)
 IF (STEP01=0) THEN
STEP02 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE -
     SYSOPTS="rm -f /opt/cyclone/in/carolina/VPS-INFEED.DAT"
 EIF

MEMBER NAME  DSSFMVS
DSSFMVS PROCESS PNODE=&PNODE                    -
                SNODE=&SNODE
STEP1   COPY    FROM(DSN=&FDSN                  -
                     PNODE                      -
                     UNIT=&FUNIT                -
                     DCB=&FDCB                  -
                     DISP=&FDISP)      -
                COMPRESS EXTENDED               -
                TO  (DSN=&TDSN                  -
                     SNODE                      -
                     UNIT=&TUNIT                -
                     DCB=&TDCB                  -
                     DISP=(&TDISP))
STEP2   IF  (STEP1 = 0) THEN
        RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
        ELSE
        RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'BAD ',&BADMSG)) PNODE
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  DSSTLAN
DSSTLAN   PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE                    -
                   PNODE=&PNODE                    -
                   CLASS=1
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN1                  -
                        PNODE                      -
                        DISP=SHR)                  -
                   TO  (DSN=&DSN2                  -
                        SNODE                      -
                        DISP=(&DISP))              -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
STEP2     IF  (STEP1 = 0) THEN
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
          ELSE
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) PNODE
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  DSSTMVS
DSSTMVS PROCESS SNODE=,PNODE=CDRM51
STEP01  RUN TASK(PGM=ZEKENDM,PARM=(CL10"D=&PARM")) PNODE
STEP02  IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NTIFYG1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) SNODE
NTIFYG2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
        ELSE
NTIFYF1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) SNODE
NTIFYF2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  NDMFM02
NDMFM01   PROCESS  PRTY=10 NOTIFY=%USER CLASS=2 MAXDELAY=QUEUED  -
          SNODEID=(L999005,Bee3Glops) SNODE=N791CD01
STEP1     COPY     FROM(      DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1))     -
                   CKPT=100K COMPRESS EXT
/*                                                               */
/* THIS IS A GENERIC PROCESS THAT CAN BE USED TO SEND A FILE     */
/* DOWN TO THE FM LAN, USING THE S: DRIVE.                       */
/* THE SUBMIT MUST SPECIFY:                                      */
/*               &DSN1=INPUTDSNAME                               */
/*               &DSN2=LAN FILE NAME STRING                      */
/*               &DISP1=OUTPUT DS DISPOSITION1                   */
MEMBER NAME  VPSBANKU
VPSBANKU PROCESS HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10 SNODE=&SNODE                   00000100
RMVUP1  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                           -           00000200
          SYSOPTS=\"\                                       -           00000300
       \rm //opt/cyclone/in/usbank7515/fswork/* \           -           00000400
                   \"\                                                  00000500
MOVEFL  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                           -           00000600
             SYSOPTS=\"\                                    -           00000700
       \mv /opt/cyclone/in/usbank7515/* \                   -           00000800
       \/opt/cyclone/in/usbank7515/fswork/         \        -           00000900
             \"\                                                        00001000
         IF (MOVEFL < 3) THEN                                           00001010
CATFL   RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                           -           00001100
             SYSOPTS=\"\                                    -           00001200
  \cat /opt/cyclone/in/usbank7515/fswork/* \                -           00001300
  \ > /opt/cyclone/in/usbank7515/fswork/usbchk.vps \        -           00001400
             \"\                                                        00001500
         IF (CATFL = 0) THEN                                            00001600
COPY    COPY FROM (SNODE                                    -           00001610
                  DISP=SHR                                  -           00001700
       SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=TEXT:XLATE=YES:"                  -           00001800
                  DSN=&FRMDSN)                              -           00001900
                  COMPRESS EXTENDED                         -           00002000
             TO  (PNODE                                     -           00002100
                  DSN=&TODSN                                -           00002200
                  UNIT=(SYSDA)                              -           00002300
                  DISP=(MOD,CATLG,DELETE)                   -           00002400
                  SPACE=(CYL,(2,2),RLSE)                    -           00002500
                  DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE                     -           00002600
                       DSORG=PS                             -           00002700
                       LRECL=&LRECL                         -           00002800
                       RECFM=&RECFM))                                   00002900
         IF (COPY = 0) THEN                                             00002910
RMVUP2  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                           -           00003000
          SYSOPTS=\"\                                       -           00003100
       \rm //opt/cyclone/in/usbank7515/fswork/* \           -           00003200
                   \"\                                                  00003300
         EIF                                                            00003600
         EIF                                                            00003610
         EIF                                                            00003700
MEMBER NAME  VPSJPBNK
VPSJPBNK PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN1)        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN1)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY1A RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  VPSUSBNK
VPSUSBNK PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN1)        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN1)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY1A RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  PID8851C
PID8851C PROCESS HOLD=NO SNODE=&SNODE
STEP02  COPY FROM (SNODE                                    -
                  DSN=&FRMDSN                               -
                  DISP=SHR)                                 -
                  COMPRESS EXTENDED                         -
             TO  (PNODE                                     -
                  DSN=&TODSN                                -
                  UNIT=(SYSDA)                              -
                  AVGREC=K                                  -
                  DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                   -
                  SPACE=(80,(5,5),RLSE)                     -
                  DCB=(DSORG=PS                             -
                       LRECL=80                             -
                       RECFM=FB)                            -
                  )
         IF (STEP02 EQ 0) THEN
         ELSE
CDERR       RUN TASK                                        -

                TO (DSN="&PATHKMA/&DSNKMA"                  -
                    DISP=(RPL)                              -
                    SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no"              -
                    SNODE)                                  -
              COMPRESS EXT

CHEK2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
          RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

STEP3   RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                          -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                        -
         \echo 'date +%Y%m%d%H%M%S'>/XFER/delmonteout/SKOPE1.dttm;\ -
         \TS='cat /XFER/delmonteout/SKOPE1.dttm';\         -
         \scp -v -Q -u /XFER/delmonteout/010_SCH_014.csv \ -
      \kroger_ent@209.34.240.61:inbound/inbox/010_SCH_014.csv\ -
         \> /XFER/log/010_SCH_014.csv.log 2>&1 \           -
        \"\

CHEK4   IF (STEP3 > 0) THEN
          RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG2')) PNODE
          RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                   -
            SYSOPTS=\"\                               -
            \TS='cat /XFER/delmonteout/SKOPE1.dttm';\ -
            \cp /XFER/log/010_SCH_014.csv.log \       -
            \/XFER/Log/010_SCH_014.csv.err \          -
            \"\
        EXIT
        EIF

STEP5   RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                       -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                     -
         \TS='cat /XFER/delmonteout/SKOPE1.dttm';\      -
         \scp -v -Q   /XFER/CONTROLFILEDM \             -

         \>> /XFER/log/010_SCH_014.csv.log 2>&1 \       -
        \"\

        RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG3)) PNODE

          \"\
        EXIT
        EIF

CHEK2   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
          RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
        ELSE
          RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&ERRMSG)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

MEMBER NAME  INFONDMR
INFONDMR PROC  SNODE=,SNODEID=(CONNECT,DIRECT),PNODE=CDRM51
STEP010  COPY  FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                        -
                     PNODE                               -
                     DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                   COMPRESS PRIME=X'40'                     -
          TO   (DSN=&DSNKMA                                  -
                DISP=MOD                                          -
                DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=133,BLKSIZE=2660,DSORG=PS)    -
                SNODE)
MEMBER NAME  PWPFCYC
PWPFCYC  PROCESS  CLASS=1
STEP10  RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=unix) -
        SYSOPTS="rm &IPATHW/inbound/*"
STEP20  RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=unix) -
        SYSOPTS= -
        "mv &IPATHI/* &IPATHW/inbound"
        IF (STEP20 > 0) THEN
STEP30  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG4)) PNODE
        EXIT
        ELSE
STEP40  RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=unix)                          -
        SYSOPTS="cat &IPATHW/inbound/* > &IPATHW/combine/itradein.txt"
        EIF
        IF (STEP40 > 0) THEN
STEP50  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG3)) PNODE
        EXIT
        ELSE
STEP60  COPY TO  (PNODE                                    -
                  DSN=&DSNMVS1                             -
                  DCB=&DCBMVS                              -
                  SPACE=(CYL,(01,01),RLSE)                 -
                  UNIT=(SYSDA)                             -
                  DISP=&DISPMVS1)                          -
                  COMPRESS EXTENDED                        -
             FROM(SNODE                                    -
                  SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)"               -
                  DSN="&IPATHW/combine/itradein.txt")
        EIF
        IF (STEP60 = 0) THEN
STEP70  COPY TO  (PNODE                                    -
                  DSN=&DSNMVS2                             -
                  DCB=&DCBMVS                              -
                  SPACE=(CYL,(01,01),RLSE)                 -
                  UNIT=(SYSDA)                             -
                  DISP=&DISPMVS2)                          -
                  COMPRESS EXTENDED                        -
             FROM(SNODE                                    -
                  SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)"               -
                  DSN="&IPATHW/combine/itradein.txt")
        EIF
        IF (STEP70 = 0) THEN
STEP80  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        EXIT
        ELSE
STEP90  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

                       EXIT

MEMBER NAME  OLPNDM
OLPNDM  PROCESS  SNODE=,PNODE=CDRM51
STEP01  COPY   FROM (DSN=&KMADSN                                      -
                     SNODE                                            -
                     DCB=&KMADCB                                      -
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY                                    -
                     DISP=&KMADISP)                                   -
               COMPRESS EXTENDED                                      -
               TO   (DSN=&MVSDSN                                      -
                     PNODE                                            -
                     DCB=&MVSDCB                                      -
                     SPACE=&MVSSPACE                                  -
                     UNIT=SYSDA                                       -
                     DISP=&MVSDISP)
STEP02  IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NTIFYG1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) SNODE
NTIFYG2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
        ELSE
NTIFYF1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) SNODE
NTIFYF2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  CONNOLLB
PRGSHULC  PROCESS
STEP010   COPY     FROM(( DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                -
                   SYSOPTS="DATATYPE=BINARY")                  -
                   TO  ( DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                   SYSOPTS="datatype=binary:xlate=no:")        -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
MEMBER NAME  CONNOLLC
CONNOLLY  PROCESS  &DATE=%JDATE                              -
                   &TIME=%SUBTIME                            -
                   &DSN1='FV99868.I9.TEST'                   -
                   &DISP1=RPL
                   SYMBOL &D=D || &DATE
                   SYMBOL &T=T || &TIME
                   SYMBOL &V1=n060wpf01.kroger.com
                   SYMBOL &V3=FMImages
                   SYMBOL &V4=.bin
 SYMBOL &VAR2=\'\\\ || &V1 || \\\\ || &V3 || \\\\ || -
                      &D ||  &T || &V4 \'\
STEP1     COPY FROM(&NODE DSN=D922.KHRSQ.FMOAM.CONVERT(0),DISP=SHR) -
                   TO  (DSN=&VAR2 DISP=RPL                          -
                   SYSOPTS='DATATYPE(BINARY) XLATE(NO)')            -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
CONNOLLY  PROCESS
STEP010   COPY     FROM(( DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                -
                   SYSOPTS="DATATYPE=BINARY")                  -
                   TO  ( DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                   SYSOPTS="datatype=binary:xlate=no:")        -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
MEMBER NAME  SKB1NETA
SKB1NETA PROCESS
STEP1   COPY  FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                             -
                    PNODE                                   -
                    DISP=SHR)                               -
                    COMPRESS EXTENDED                       -
                TO (DSN="&PATHKMA/&DSNKMA"                  -
                    DISP=(RPL)                              -
                    SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"                -
                    SNODE)

CHEK2   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
          RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
        ELSE
          RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&ERRMSG)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

                   &DSN1='IMS0.DSD.PUNLOAD.DSDPDA01(0)'      -
*                  &DSN1='SYS4.IMS0.DSDFILE'                 -
                   &DISP1=RPL
                   SYMBOL &D=&DATE
                   SYMBOL &V1=/IntServicesLZ/test/tim
                   SYMBOL &V3=/ConnollyDSDVendItem_
                   SYMBOL &V4=.bin
 SYMBOL &VAR2=&V1 || &V3 || &D || &V4
STEP010   COPY     FROM(( DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                -
                   SYSOPTS="DATATYPE=BINARY")                  -
                   TO  ( DSN=&VAR2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                   SYSOPTS="datatype=binary:xlate=no:")        -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
MEMBER NAME  ERCTEST2
ERCTEST2  PROCESS
STEP1     COPY FROM (DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)      -
              TO   (DSN=&DSN2 DISP=RPL)
STEP2     RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                      -
                  SYSOPTS=\"\                            -
                  \/BIN/RM /TMP/TEST.090\                -
                  \"\

MEMBER NAME  SKPISPFA

STEP1     COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSNCDC                        -           00020000
                        PNODE                               -           00030000
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=1000                   -           00040000
                        LRECL=1000                          -           00050000
                        RECFM=FB)                           -           00060000
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP)                     -           00070000
                        UNIT=(SYSDA))                       -           00080000
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                        -           00090000
                   TO  (DSN="&DSNKMA"                       -           00100000
                        DISP=(RPL,KEEP)                     -           00101001
                        SNODE                               -           00110001
                        SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)")                       00120000
STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                            00170000
NOTIFY1  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -            00180000
         PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&MSG2')) PNODE                                00190000
         ELSE                                                           00200000
NOTIFY2  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -            00210000
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE                                00220000
         EIF                                                            00230000
MEMBER NAME  VPSLR05
*
* THIS CALL COPIES DATA FROM A RALPH LAN
*
VPSLR05   PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE
STEP01    COPY     FROM(SNODE DSN=&DSN1                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (PNODE DSN=&DSN2                             -
                        AVGREC=U                                    -
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=28000                          -
                             DSORG=PS                               -
                             LRECL=400                              -
                             RECFM=FB)                              -
                        DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                     -
                        SPACE=(CYL,(1,5),RLSE)                      -
                        UNIT=(SYSDA))                               -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
STEP02    COPY     FROM(SNODE DSN=&DSN3                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (PNODE DSN=&DSN4                             -
                        AVGREC=U                                    -
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=28000                          -
                             DSORG=PS                               -
                             LRECL=400                              -
                             RECFM=FB)                              -
                        DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                     -
                        SPACE=(CYL,(1,5),RLSE)                      -
                        UNIT=(SYSDA))                               -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
     IF  (STEP01 = 0) THEN
STEP03  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE SYSOPTS=&DELDSN1
     EIF
     IF  (STEP02 = 0) THEN
STEP04  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE SYSOPTS=&DELDSN2
     EIF
MEMBER NAME  VPSLR09
VPSLR09   PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE
STEP01    COPY     FROM(SNODE DSN=&DSN1                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (PNODE DSN=&DSN2                             -
                        AVGREC=U                                    -
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=32000                          -
                             DSORG=PS                               -
                             LRECL=80                               -
                             RECFM=FB)                              -
                        DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                     -
                        SPACE=(CYL,(1,5),RLSE)                      -
                        UNIT=(SYSDA))                               -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
     IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
RMVUP1  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE SYSOPTS=&DELDSN1                      00310016
     EIF                                                                00330014

MEMBER NAME  KCLADDRS
KCLADDRS  PROCESS
STEP1     COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSNCDC                           -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (SNODE DSN=&DSDKMA                           -
                              DISP=(&DISP))                         -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
MEMBER NAME  KIEN700I
KIEN700I  PROCESS  &DATE=%JDATE                              -
                   &TIME=%SUBTIME
                   SYMBOL &D=_d || &DATE
                   SYMBOL &T=_t || &TIME
                   SYMBOL &V1=n092rascsrv01
                   SYMBOL &V2=APPS
                   SYMBOL &V3=PAYROLL
                   SYMBOL &V4=DOWNLOAD
                   SYMBOL &V5=UNION
                   SYMBOL &V6=memdues
                   SYMBOL &V7=.txt
        SYMBOL &VAR2='&V1 || &V3 || &D || &T || &V4'
             SYMBOL &VAR3=\'\ || \\\\\\   || &V1 || \\\\ || &V2 || -
                     \\\\ || &V3 ||  \\\\ || &V4 || \\\\ || &V5 || -
   \\\\ || &V6 || &D ||  \\   || &T || \\   || &V7 || \'\
STEP010   COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                -
                   TO  ( DSN=&VAR3   DISP=(RPL,CATLG))
MEMBER NAME  VPSTHOMI
*
* THIS CALL COPIES DATA FROM A TAX DEPT
*
VPSTHOMI  PROCESS
STEP01  COPY FROM (SNODE                                    -           00180014
                  DISP=SHR                                  -           00190014
                  DSN=&FRMDSN)                              -           00210014
                  COMPRESS EXTENDED                         -           00220014
             TO  (PNODE                                     -           00230014
                  DSN=&TODSN                                -           00240014
                  UNIT=(SYSDA)                              -           00250014
                  DISP=(MOD,CATLG,DELETE)                   -           00260014
                  SPACE=(CYL,(2,2),RLSE)                    -           00270014
                  DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE                     -           00280014
                       DSORG=PS                             -           00290014
                       LRECL=&LRECL                         -           00300014
                       RECFM=&RECFM))                                   00310014
     IF  (STEP01 = 0) THEN
STEP02 COPY  FROM(DSN=&COPYDSN                              -
                  UNIT=SYSDA                                -
                  DISP=(SHR)                                -
                  PNODE)                                    -
             TO(DSN=&FRMDSN                                 -
                    DISP=(SHR)                              -
                    SNODE)
     EIF
MEMBER NAME  VPSXLATN
VPSXLATN PROCESS CLASS=1 HOLD=NO PRTY=10
STEP0010 COPY FROM (PNODE -
                    DISP=SHR -
                    DSN=&DSN1 -
                    SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(YES)") -
                    COMPRESS EXTENDED -
                    TO (SNODE -
                    DISP=(RPL) -
                    SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(YES)" -
                    DSN=&DSN2)
MEMBER NAME  ARHBILCD
*
* THIS CALL COPIES DATA FROM A RALPH LAN
*
ARHBILCD  PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE
STEP01    COPY     FROM(SNODE DSN=&DSN1                             -
                              DISP=SHR)                             -
                   TO  (PNODE DSN=&DSN2                             -
                        AVGREC=U                                    -
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=10500                          -
                             DSORG=PS                               -
                             LRECL=150                              -
                             RECFM=FB)                              -
                        DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                     -
                        SPACE=(CYL,(1,5),RLSE)                      -
                        UNIT=(SYSDA))                               -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
     IF  (STEP01 = 0) THEN
STEP02 COPY  FROM(DSN=&COPYDSN                                      -
                  UNIT=SYSDA                                        -
                  DISP=(SHR)                                        -
                  PNODE)                                            -
             TO(DSN=&DSN1                                           -
                    DISP=(SHR)                                      -
                    SNODE)
     EIF

                              DISP=SHR)                             -

MEMBER NAME  PEYIWIRX
PEYIWIRX PROCESS PNODE=&PNODE SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

MEMBER NAME  CONNOLLA
CONNOLLY  PROCESS  &DATE=%SUBDATE1                           -
                   &DSN1='SYS4.APIMAGE.OUTPUT'               -
*                  &DSN1='SYS4.IMS0.DSDFILE'                 -
                   &DISP1=RPL
                   SYMBOL &D=&DATE
                   SYMBOL &V1=/IntServicesLZ/test/tim
                   SYMBOL &V3=/ConnollyAPIMAGEItem_
                   SYMBOL &V4=.bin
 SYMBOL &VAR2=&V1 || &V3 || &D || &V4
STEP010   COPY     FROM(( DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                -
                   SYSOPTS="DATATYPE=BINARY")                  -
                   TO  ( DSN=&VAR2   DISP=(&DISP1)             -
                   SYSOPTS="datatype=binary:xlate=no:")        -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED

    SYSOPTS=\"\                                                     -
      \ncftpget -E -V -u krogr01 -p k5462795 \                      -
      \    -d /XFER/log/pnc.log tagvpn.pnc.com /XFER/pnccustin/ \   -

      \"\

    SYSOPTS="rm /XFER/pnccustin/cust.concath"

    SYSOPTS=\"\                                               -
            \cat /XFER/pnccustin/lbx.911487ca.out \           -
            \> /XFER/pnccustin/cust.concath \                 -
            \"\

   EIF

             SYSOPTS=\"\                                    -
             \/bin/cut -c1-80 /XFER/diverter/*/* \          -
             \> /XFER/diverter/divcomb.txt\                 -
             \"\

             DISP=SHR                                       -
             DSN=&FRMDSN)                                   -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                              -
             TO (PNODE                                      -
             SPACE=(CYL,(25,5),RLSE)                        -
             UNIT=SYSDA                                     -
             DCB=(DSORG=PS,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=6160,RECFM=FB)  -
             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                        -
             DSN=&TODSN)
REMOVE   IF (COPY2MVS = 0) THEN
             RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                      -
             SYSOPTS=\"\                                    -
             \rm -f /XFER/diverter/*/* \                    -
             \"\
         EIF

        ELSE
NOTFY1B RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&ERRMSG1)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  DSDM6VI
DSDM6VI  PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN1)        -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DSN=&TODSN1          -
             SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT)"  -
             DISP=(RPL))
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY1A RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY1B RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&ERRMSG1)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF

                        PNODE                               -
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -

                   TO  (SNODE                               -
                        DSN=&DSNKMA                         -
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=3200                   -
                        LRECL=32                            -
                        RECFM=FB)                           -
                        DISP=(RPL,KEEP)                     -
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)

NOTIFY1  RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -
         PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&MSG2')) SNODE
         ELSE

         PARM=(CL4'FAIL',"NY NDM &MSG1")) PNODE
         EIF

MEMBER NAME  OLPUCS
OLPUCS  PROCESS  SNODE=,PNODE=CDRM51
STEP01  COPY   FROM (DSN=&KMADSN                                      -
                     SNODE                                            -
                     DCB=&KMADCB                                      -
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY                                    -
                     DISP=&KMADISP)                                   -
               COMPRESS EXTENDED                                      -
               TO   (DSN=&MVSDSN1                                     -
                     PNODE                                            -
                     DCB=&MVSDCB                                      -
                     SPACE=&MVSSPACE                                  -
                     UNIT=SYSDA                                       -
                     DISP=&MVSDISP)
STEP02  COPY   FROM (DSN=&KMADSN                                      -
                     SNODE                                            -
                     DCB=&KMADCB                                      -
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY                                    -
                     DISP=&KMADISP)                                   -
               COMPRESS EXTENDED                                      -
               TO   (DSN=&MVSDSN2                                     -
                     PNODE                                            -
                     DCB=&MVSDCB                                      -
                     SPACE=&MVSSPACE                                  -
                     UNIT=SYSDA                                       -
                     DISP=&MVSDISP)
STEP03  IF (STEP01 > 0) THEN
NTIFYF1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG1)) SNODE
NTIFYF2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG1)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP04  IF (STEP02 > 0) THEN
NTIFYF3 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG2)) SNODE
NTIFYF4 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP05  COPY   FROM(DSN=&MVSDSN3                                 -
                  DISP=(SHR)                                     -
                  PNODE)                                         -
              TO  (DSN=&KMADSN2                                  -
                   DCB=&KMADCB                                   -
                  DISP=(RPL,KEEP)                                -
                  UNIT=DLBLONLY                                  -
                  SNODE)
STEP06  IF (STEP05 > 0) THEN
NTIFYF5 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG3)) SNODE
NTIFYF6 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG3)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
        RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMESG)) SNODE
        RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMESG)) PNODE

                   PNODE=&PNODE                    -

                        PNODE                      -

          ELSE

MEMBER NAME  CAOADJN1
CAOADJN1 PROCESS  CLASS=1 HOLD=NO PRTY=10
STEP0010  COPY FROM (PNODE                                       -
               DSN=&DSNCDC                                       -
               DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                              -
               UNIT=(SYSDA)                                      -
                  )                                              -
               COMPRESS EXTENDED                                 -
               CKPT=0K                                           -
               TO (SNODE                                         -
               DSN=&DSNKMA                                       -
               DISP=(RPL)                                        -
               SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")

STEP0020  IF (STEP0010 GT 4) THEN
          GOTO ABEND
          EIF

STEP0030  IF (STEP0010 EQ 0) THEN
          RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                      -
          SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS
          EXIT
          EIF

          PARM=("DSN=SYS4.CD.PDS.CNTL(CDERROR),DISP=SHR", -
          "FILE SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(CAONDM1)",          -
          "JOBNAME SKPCDERR",                             -
          "ZEKEADD '''ZADD EV 4161 REBUILD'''"            -
          )) PNODE

             SYSOPTS=\"\                                    -
             \rm /opt/cyclone/in/usbank/arp/* \             -
             \"\
         EIF
