MEMBER NAME  PID9210W
PID9210W  PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE                                   -
                   PNODE=&PNODE                                   -
                   CLASS=1
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN1                                 -
                        PNODE                                     -
                        DISP=SHR)                                 -
                   TO  (DSN=&DSN2                                 -
                        SYSOPTS="datatype(text) strip.blanks(no)" -
                        SNODE                                     -
                        DISP=(&DISP))                             -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
* if the copy failed, put message to console for netview
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                    -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  MVS2FTP
MVS2FTP PROCESS HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10               -
                 MAXDELAY=UNLIMITED
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE                              -
                   DISP=SHR                           -
                   DSN=&FRMDSN)                       -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                  -
             TO (SNODE                                -
                   DISP=(RPL)                         -
                   DSN=&TODSN)
MEMBER NAME  FCBIRC
* April 2011 - no need to send notify because its possible IRC will
*              not have a file.  FCB extracts twice a week.
*

FCBIRC PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=U060BBPD1                 -
   HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
COP01  COPY FROM (SNODE                                     -           00140000
                  DISP=SHR                                  -           00150000
          SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=TEXT:XLATE=YES:"               -           00160000
                  DSN=&DSN1)                                -           00170000
                  COMPRESS EXTENDED                         -           00180000
             TO  (PNODE                                     -           00190000
                  DSN=&DSN2                                 -           00200000
                  DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                   -           00230000
                  DCB=(RECFM=FB                             -           00250000
                       DSORG=PS                             -           00260000
                       LRECL=150))                                      00270000

        IF (COP01 = 0) THEN                                             00290000
RMVUP        RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                      -           00300000
             SYSOPTS=\"\                                    -           00310000
             \rm  &DSN1 \                                   -
             \"\                                                        00330000
        EXIT                                                            00340000
        EIF                                                             00340000

MEMBER NAME  PRGSLNEW
PRGSLNEW  PROCESS  &DATE=%SUBDATE1                           -
*                  &DSN1='IMS0.DSD.PUNLOAD.DSDPDA01(0)'      -
                   &DSN1='D915.ZIP390.DSD.ZIP'               -
                   &DISP1=RPL
                   SYMBOL &D=&DATE
                   SYMBOL &V1=/IntServicesLZ/cyclone/out/prgschultz
                   SYMBOL &V3=/PRGShultzDSDVendItem_
                   SYMBOL &V4=.bin.gz
 SYMBOL &VAR2=&V1 || &V3 || &D || &V4
STEP010   COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                -
                   TO  ( DSN=&VAR2   DISP=(&DISP1)            -
                SYSOPTS=":datatype=binary:xlate=no:") -
                   COMPRESS NONE
MEMBER NAME  PID0341
PID0341   PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE                    -
                   PNODE=&PNODE                    -
                   CLASS=1                         -
                   HOLD=NO
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&FDSN                  -
                        SNODE                      -
                        DISP=&FDISP)               -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED               -
                   CKPT=0K                         -
                   TO  (DSN=&TDSN                  -
                        PNODE                      -
                        UNIT=(SYSDA)               -
                        DCB=&TDCB                  -
                        DISP=&TDISP)
STEP2     IF  (STEP1 = 0) THEN
          RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                 -
          SYSOPTS="rm &FDSN"
         EIF
STEP3     IF  (STEP1 = 0) THEN
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
          ELSE
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'BAD ',&BADMSG)) PNODE
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  PID0342
PID0342   PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE                    -
                   PNODE=&PNODE                    -
                   HOLD=NO                         -
                   CLASS=1
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN1                  -
                        PNODE                      -
                        DISP=SHR)                  -
                   TO  (DSN=&DSN2                  -
                        SNODE                      -
                        DISP=(&DISP))              -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
STEP2     IF  (STEP1 = 0) THEN
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
          ELSE
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) PNODE
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  KAC2VEN
KAC2VEN  PROC  PNODE=CDRM51
STEP010  COPY  FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                        -
                     PNODE                              -
                     DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                   -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                    -
          TO   (DSN=&DSNKMA                             -
                DISP=NEW                                -
                DCB=(RECFM=FB,LRECL=247,BLKSIZE=27776,DSORG=PS) -
                SNODE)
MEMBER NAME  SKPTA01
SKPTA01 PROCESS SNODE=,PNODE=CDRM51
STEP1     COPY     FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                        -
                        PNODE                               -
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                        -
                   TO  (SNODE                               -
                        DSN=&DSNKMA                         -
                        DISP=(&DISP)                        -
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)
STEP2    IF (STEP1 > 4) THEN
           GOTO STEP5
         EIF
STEP3    RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
         PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&MSG1')) PNODE
STEP4    IF (STEP3 < 5) THEN
           EXIT
         ELSE
           GOTO STEP7
         EIF
STEP5     COPY     FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                        -
                        PNODE                               -
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                        -
                   TO  (SNODE                               -
                        DSN=&DSNKMA                         -
                        DISP=(&DISP)                        -
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)
STEP6    IF (STEP5 > 4) THEN
           GOTO STEP9
         EIF
STEP7    RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
         PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&MSG1')) PNODE
STEP8    IF (STEP7 < 5) THEN
           EXIT
         ELSE
           GOTO STEP11
         EIF
STEP9     COPY     FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                        -
                        PNODE                               -
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                        -
                   TO  (SNODE                               -
                        DSN=&DSNKMA                         -
                        DISP=(&DISP)                        -
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)
STEP10   IF (STEP9 > 4) THEN
           GOTO STEP13
         EIF
STEP11   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
         PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&MSG1')) PNODE
STEP12   IF (STEP11 < 5) THEN
           EXIT
         ELSE
           GOTO STEP15
         EIF
STEP13    COPY     FROM (DSN=&DSNCDC                        -
                        PNODE                               -
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP))                    -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                        -
                   TO  (SNODE                               -
                        DSN=&DSNKMA                         -
                        DISP=(&DISP)                        -
                        UNIT=DLBLONLY)
STEP14   IF (STEP13 > 4) THEN
           GOTO TRKABEND
         EIF
STEP15   RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
         PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&MSG1')) PNODE
STEP16   IF (STEP15 < 5) THEN
           EXIT
         EIF
TRKABEND RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                             -
         PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG2')) PNODE
         EXIT
MEMBER NAME  VPSDMPL
NDMVPTRP  PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE                                   -
                   PNODE=&PNODE                                   -
                   CLASS=1
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN1                                 -
                        PNODE                                     -
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=0                            -
                        LRECL=256                                 -
                        RECFM=FB)                                 -
                        DISP=SHR)                                 -
                   ckpt=0k                                        -
                   TO  (DSN=&DSN2                                 -
                        SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT):STRIP.BLANKS(NO)" -
                        SNODE                                     -
                        DISP=(&DISP))                             -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE FOR NETVIEW
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                    -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  PNCTOVPS
PNCTOVPS PROCESS PNODE=&PNODE SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEPDEL  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                  -
                SYSOPTS="rm /XFER/pncvpsin/arp.1028906212.out"
STEP01  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                   -
    SYSOPTS=\"\                                                     -
      \ncftpget -E -V -u krogr07 -p icMkqf!8 \                      -
      \    -d /XFER/log/pncvpn.log tagvpn.pnc.com /XFER/pncvpsin/ \-
       \arp.1028906212.out\                                          -
      \"\
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
STEP02  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                            -
    SYSOPTS="rm /XFER/pncvpsin/recon.concat"
STEP03  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                             -
    SYSOPTS=\"\                                               -
            \cat /XFER/pncvpsin/arp.1028906212.out \          -
            \> /XFER/pncvpsin/recon.concat \                  -
            \"\
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
STEP04  COPY FROM (SNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (PNODE            -
             DISP=(MOD,CATLG,DELETE)  -
             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=80,BLKSIZE=4800) -
             SPACE=(CYL,(5,5),RLSE)   -
             UNIT=SYSDA               -
             DSN=&TODSN)
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  VPSTOPNC
VPSTOPNC PROCESS PNODE=&PNODE SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEPDEL  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                -
                SYSOPTS="rm /XFER/pncvpsout/ppp.1028906212.in"
STEP01   COPY TO (SNODE DISP=&SDISP                               -
             SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO) DATATYPE(TEXT) XLATE(YES)" -
             DSN=&DSNTO)                                         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                   -
             FROM (PNODE DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                    -
             DSN=&DSNFROM)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
STEP02  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                   -
    SYSOPTS=\"\                                                     -
      \ncftpput -F -a -V -u krogr07 -p 'icMkqf!8' \              -
      \-d /XFER/log/pncvpn.log TAGVPN.pnc.com \              -
      \/krogr07 /XFER/pncvpsout/ppp.1028906212.in \            -
      \"\
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  METLIFE
METLIFE   PROCESS
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&DSN1)           -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=BINARY" -
             DISP=(&DISP2)        -
             DSN=&DSN2)
         IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
STEP02   RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE     -
         SYSOPTS=\"\                   -
         \scp -v -Q \      -
 \/XFER/metlife2out/KROGERDI_den_elig.dat.pgp \   -
 \XP17139018@199.74.150.228:/sftpinst/toMet/KROGERDI_den_elig.dat.pgp \-
 \>/XFER/log/metlife2.log 2>&1\  -
       \"\
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  SKPPOC
SKPPOC PROCESS  CLASS=1 HOLD=NO PRTY=10
STEP0010  COPY FROM (PNODE                                       -
               DSN=&DSNCDC                                       -
               DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                              -
               UNIT=(SYSDA)                                      -
                  )                                              -
               COMPRESS EXTENDED                                 -
               CKPT=0K                                           -
               TO (SNODE                                         -
               DSN=&DSNKMA                                       -
               DISP=(RPL)                                        -
               SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")

STEP0020  IF (STEP0010 GT 4) THEN
          EXIT
          EIF

STEP0030  IF (STEP0010 EQ 0) THEN
          EXIT
          EIF

ABEND    RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTSUB -
          PARM=("DSN=SYS4.CD.PDS.CNTL(CDERROR),DISP=SHR", -
          "FILE SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(CAONDM1)",          -
          "JOBNAME SKPCDERR",                             -
          "ZEKEADD '''ZADD EV 4161 REBUILD'''"            -
          )) PNODE
MEMBER NAME  SPSRPOL1
SPSRPOL1 PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                              -
                 PNODE=&PNODE
STEP0010 COPY FROM (DSN=&FROM                                 -
                     DISP=(SHR)                            -
                     PNODE)                                -
           COMPRESS EXT                                    -
           TO (DSN=&TO                                     -
                     DCB=(DSORG=PS                         -
                     RECFM=FB                              -
                     LRECL=&TOLRECL                        -
                     BLKSIZE=&TOBLKSZ)                     -
                     DISP=(&DISP)                          -
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY                         -
                     SNODE)

STEP0020  IF (STEP0010 GT 4) THEN
          GOTO ABEND
          EIF
          EXIT

ABEND    RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTSUB -
          PARM=("DSN=SYS4.CD.PDS.CNTL(CDERROR),DISP=SHR", -
          "FILE SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SPSRPOL&DIVCHAR)",  -
          "JOBNAME CAOCDERR",                             -
          "ZEKEADD '''ZADD EV 4801 REBUILD'''"            -
          )) PNODE

MEMBER NAME  MVSFFTP
MVSFFTP PROCESS  CLASS=1 SNODE=&SNODE
STEP01  COPY FROM (DSN=&DSNAIXDONE                   -
                  SNODE                              -
                  DISP=(OLD)                         -
                  SYSOPTS="strip.blanks(no)")        -
              TO  (DSN=&DSNMVSDONE                   -
                  PNODE                              -
                  DCB=&DCBMVS                        -
                  UNIT=(SYSDA)                       -
                  DISP=(OLD,,KEEP))
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN

STEP02  COPY    FROM    (DSN=&DSNAIX                 -
                        SNODE                        -
                        DISP=(OLD)                   -
                  SYSOPTS="strip.blanks(no)")        -
                TO      (DSN=&DSNMVS                 -
                        PNODE                        -
                        DCB=&DCBMVS                  -
                        SPACE=(CYL,(01,01),RLSE)     -
                        UNIT=(SYSDA)                 -
                        DISP=&DISPMVS)               -
                        COMPRESS EXTENDED
         ELSE
            RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
            EXIT
         EIF

         IF(STEP02 = 0) THEN

STEP03   RUN TASK(PGM=UNIX) SNODE -
         SYSOPTS="rm &DSNAIX"
         RUN TASK(PGM=UNIX) SNODE -
         SYSOPTS="rm &DSNAIXDONE"
         RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&DSNAIX)) PNODE

         ELSE
               RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
         EIF

             TO  (PNODE                                     -           00160000
                  DSN=&DSN2                                 -           00170000
                  DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                   -           00180000
                  DCB=(RECFM=FB                             -           00190000
                       DSORG=PS                             -           00200000
                       LRECL=150))                                      00210005
                                                                        00220000

             SYSOPTS=\"\                                    -           00250000
             \rm  &DSN1 \                                   -           00260003
             \"\                                                        00270000

                   PNODE=&PNODE                                   -
                   CLASS=1

                        PNODE                                     -

        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EXIT

MEMBER NAME  FMYNDMDW
FMYNDMDW  PROCESS
  SYMBOL  &DR=\file_land_dir\
  SYMBOL  &IPDS2=\'\ || &DR || \/ip_\ || &DS2 || \'\
 SYMBOL &S1=\"\ || &SR1 || \ \ || &DR || \ \ || &DS2 || \"\
STEP1     COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN=&DS1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&IPDS2   DISP=(&DISP1)           -
                      SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no:xlate=yes:")       -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF       (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=UNIX) SYSOPTS=&S1

MEMBER NAME  ESPSERR
ESPSERR  PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                              -
                 PNODE=&PNODE
STEP0010 COPY FROM (DSN=&FROM                                 -
                     DISP=(SHR)                            -
                     PNODE)                                -
           COMPRESS EXT                                    -
           TO (DSN=&TO                                     -
                     DCB=(DSORG=PS                         -
                     RECFM=FB                              -
                     LRECL=&TOLRECL                        -
                     BLKSIZE=&TOBLKSZ)                     -
                     DISP=(&DISP)                          -
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY                         -
                     SNODE)

STEP0020  IF (STEP0010 GT 4) THEN
          GOTO ABEND
          EIF
          EXIT

ABEND    RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTSUB -
          PARM=("DSN=SYS4.CD.PDS.CNTL(CDERROR),DISP=SHR", -
          "FILE SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(SPSNERR)",          -
          "JOBNAME SKPCDERR",                             -
          "ZEKEADD '''ZADD EV 4161 REBUILD'''"            -
          )) PNODE

MEMBER NAME  PASTRN2
PASTRN  PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                           -
              SNODEID=(connect,direct)                  -
              PNODE=&PNODE
STEP1  COPY  FROM(DSN=&DSNCDC                           -
                  DISP=(SHR)                            -
                  DCB=(DSORG=PS                         -
                       RECFM=FB                         -
                       LRECL=&LRECL)                    -
                  PNODE)                                -
             TO  (DSN=&DSNLEDGR                         -
                  UNIT=SYSDA                            -
                  DISP=(RPL)                            -
                  DCB=(DSORG=PS                         -
                       BLKSIZE=0                        -
                       RECFM=FB                         -
                       LRECL=&LRECL)                    -
                  SNODE)
MEMBER NAME  UNIXTIM2
UNIXTIM2  PROCESS                                                       00010003
STEP1     COPY     FROM(&NODE DSN=&DSN1   DISP=(SHR))            -      00020008
                   TO  (      DSN=&DSN2   DISP=(NEW))            -      00030008
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                                    00040003
*                                                                       00050003
         IF (STEP1 > 4) THEN                                            00060003
            GOTO ABEND                                                  00070003
         EIF                                                            00080003
*                                                                       00090003
*  ------------                                                         00100003
*  EXIT PROCESS                                                         00110003
*  ------------                                                         00120003
*                                                                       00130003
         EXIT                                                           00140003
*                                                                       00150003
*        -----------------------------------------------                00160003
*        Execute job CDERROR  to indicate Connect:Direct                00170003
*        file transfer error                                            00180003
*        -----------------------------------------------                00190003
*                                                                       00200003
*ABEND    RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTSUB -                                       00210009
*         PARM=("DSN=SYS4.CD.PDS.CNTL(PEYCDER1),DISP=SHR", -            00220009
*         "FILE SYS4.CD.CS.TESTLIB($DMRTSUB)",            -             00230009

                       SNODE                                          -     0050

                 COMPRESS EXTENDED                                    -     0090

MEMBER NAME  TRP2FCB
/*  NEW VERSION #6 ADDED email messages cr-240038             ***/
/*  NEW VERSION #5 ADDED CHECK TRIGGER FILE TRANSMISSION      ***/
/*  NEW 11-01-10   NOTIFY4 ADDED                              ***/
/*  This job sends a notify but will not abend if an error    ***/
/*  See file D911.fcbsq.pdetail.ndm.error(0) if error         ***/

TRP2FCB PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=U060BBPD1                -
   HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                           -           00020000
             SYSOPTS=\"\                                    -           00030000
       \mv /opt/cyclone/in/tradepoint/SDA_TRDPT* \          -           00040002
       \/opt/cyclone/in/tradepoint/work/  \                 -           00050001
             \"\                                                        00060000

        IF (STEP01 GT 0) THEN                                           00070000
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTFY2,                   -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG1,#911014,#910995)) PNODE
        RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTSUB                                   -       00360000
          PARM=("DSN=D00.DCMS.APABASE(FCBEMAIL),DISP=SHR",      -
          "JOBNAME FCBTRDPT"                                    -
          )) PNODE
        GOTO ABEND
        EIF

        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN                                            00070000
CATFL   RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                          -            00080000
             SYSOPTS=\"\                                   -            00090000
  \cat /opt/cyclone/in/tradepoint/work/SDA_TRDPT* \        -            00101001
  \ > /opt/cyclone/in/tradepoint/sda/SDA_TRDPT.DAT \       -            00111001
             \"\                                                        00120000

        IF (CATFL GT 0) THEN                                            00070000
NOTIFY2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTFY2,                    -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2,#911014,#910995)) PNODE
        GOTO ABEND
        EIF

        IF (CATFL = 0) THEN                                             00130000
COP01   COPY FROM (SNODE                                    -           00140000
                  DISP=SHR                                  -           00150000
       SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=TEXT:XLATE=YES:"                  -           00160000
                  DSN=&DSN1)                                -           00170000
                  COMPRESS EXTENDED                         -           00180000
             TO  (PNODE                                     -           00190000
                  DSN=&DSN2                                 -           00200000
                  DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                   -           00230000
                  DCB=(RECFM=FB                             -           00250000
                       DSORG=PS                             -           00260000
                       LRECL=207))                                      00270000

COP02   COPY FROM (SNODE                                    -           00140000
                  DISP=SHR                                  -           00150000
       SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=TEXT:XLATE=YES:"                  -           00160000
                  DSN=&DSN1)                                -           00170000
                  COMPRESS EXTENDED                         -           00180000
             TO  (PNODE                                     -           00190000
                  DSN=&DSN3                                 -           00200000
                  DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                   -           00230000
                  DCB=(RECFM=FB                             -           00250000
                       DSORG=PS                             -           00260000
                       LRECL=207))                                      00270000

        IF (COP01 GT 0) THEN                                            00070000
NOTIFY3 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTFY2,                    -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG3,#911014,#910995)) PNODE
        GOTO ABEND
        EIF

        IF (COP02 GT 0) THEN                                            00070000
NOTIFY4 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTFY2,                    -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG4,#911014,#910995)) PNODE
        GOTO ABEND
        EIF

        IF (COP01 = 0) THEN                                             00290000
RMVUP        RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                      -           00300000
             SYSOPTS=\"\                                    -           00310000
             \rm //opt/cyclone/in/tradepoint/work/* \       -           00321001
             \rm //opt/cyclone/in/tradepoint/sda/* \        -           00321001
             \"\                                                        00330000
        EXIT                                                            00340000
        EIF                                                             00340000
        EIF                                                             00350000
        EIF                                                             00360000

          PARM=("DSN=D00.DCMS.APABASE(FCBNDMER),DISP=SHR",      -
          "FILE SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(FCBNDMER) ",                 -

             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                -         00005300
             TO (SNODE                                        -         00005400
             DSN='/XFER/dpiout/istr701.txt'                   -         00005500
             DISP=RPL)                                                  00005600
         IF (STEP04 = 0) THEN                                           00005700
NOTFY07 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE            00005800
         ELSE                                                           00005900
NOTFY08 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE            00006000
         EXIT                                                           00006100
         EIF                                                            00006200

             DSN='D915.DSDSQ.PDATA.DSD8200.ISTR703(0)'        -         00006400
             DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                             -         00006500

         ELSE                                                           00007400

MEMBER NAME  SKPPEDW
SKPPEDW PROCESS
  SYMBOL  &DIR=\file_land_dir\
  SYMBOL  &IPDSN2=\'\ || &DIR || \/ip_\ || &DSN2 || \'\
  SYMBOL  &SC=\"\ || &SCRIPT || \ -x \ || &DIR || \ \ || &DSN2 || \"\

STEP1   COPY FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR)             -
             TO  (DSN=&IPDSN2 DISP=(RPL)             -
                  SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no:xlate=no:") -
                  COMPRESS EXT

STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 4) THEN
          GOTO STEP6
        EIF

STEP3   RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=UNIX) SYSOPTS=&SC

STEP4   IF (STEP3 > 4) THEN
          GOTO STEP8
        EIF

STEP5   IF (STEP3 < 5) THEN
          EXIT
        EIF

STEP6   COPY FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR)             -
             TO  (DSN=&IPDSN2 DISP=(rpl)             -
                  SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no:xlate=no:") -
                  COMPRESS EXT

STEP7   IF (STEP6 > 4) THEN
          GOTO STEP11
        EIF

STEP8   RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=UNIX) SYSOPTS=&SC

STEP9   IF (STEP8 > 4) THEN
          GOTO STEP13
        EIF

STEP10  IF (STEP8 < 5) THEN
          EXIT
        EIF

STEP11  COPY FROM(PNODE DSN=&DSN1 DISP=SHR)             -
             TO  (DSN=&IPDSN2 DISP=(rpl)             -
                  SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no:xlate=no:") -
                  COMPRESS EXT

STEP12  IF (STEP11 > 4) THEN
          GOTO SKPABEND
        EIF

STEP13  RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=UNIX) SYSOPTS=&SC
        EXIT

SKPABEND RUN TASK(PGM=DMRTSUB,                              -
         PARM=("DSN=SYS4.CD.PDS.CNTL(CDERROR),DISP=SHR",    -
         "FILE SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(&JOBNAME)",        -
         "JOBNAME SKPCDERR",                                -
         "ZEKEADD '''ZADD EV 4161 REBUILD'''"               -
         )) PNODE
         EXIT

 TO (DSN='\\N060RASCSRV01\APPS\PAYROLL\PRODUCTION\IMPORT\TEREJECT.STO' -
                  DISP=(RPL)                             -
                  SNODE)

        PARM=(CL4'FAIL',"&MSG1")) PNODE                                 00040300

MEMBER NAME  ACNNDM
ACNNDM  PROCESS SNODE=U060FTP1 PNODE=CDRM51 HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                     -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                                   -
        \rm &TODSN; rm &TODSNGZ \                                     -
        \"\
STEP02  COPY FROM (PNODE                                              -
             DCB=(BLKSIZE=32000                                       -
                DSORG=PS                                              -
                LRECL=125                                             -
                RECFM=FB)                                             -
             DISP=SHR                                                 -
             DSN=&FRMDSN)                                             -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                        -
             TO (SNODE                                                -
             SYSOPTS="strip.blanks=no datatype=binary xlate=no"       -
             DISP=(RPL)                                               -
             DSN=&TODSN)
        IF (STEP02=0) THEN
STEP03  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                 -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                                -
        \gzip &TODSN \                                             -
        \"\
        EIF
        IF (STEP03=0) THEN
STEP04  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                   -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                                 -
           \ncftpput -E -V -u kro0000 -p K75r48o \                  -
           \-DD -d /XFER/log/acnielsenout.log ftp.acnielsen.com /\  -
           \&TODSNGZ \                                              -
           \"\
        EIF

                DSORG=PS                                              - 00000800

                RECFM=FB)                                             - 00001000
             DISP=SHR                                                 - 00001100
             DSN=&FRMDSN)                                             - 00001200
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                        - 00001300
             TO (SNODE                                                - 00001400
             SYSOPTS="strip.blanks=no datatype=binary xlate=no"       - 00001500
             DISP=(RPL)                                               - 00001600
             DSN=&TODSN)                                                00001700
        IF (STEP02=0) THEN                                              00001800
STEP03  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                     - 00001900
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                                   - 00002000
        \gzip &TODSN \                                        -         00002100
        \"\                                                             00002200
        EIF                                                             00002300

        EIF                                                             00003100

MEMBER NAME  KHRN414K
KHRN414K  PROCESS    SNODE=&SNODE -
                     &SEQ=%NUM1  -
                     &DATE=%JDATE -
                     &TIME=%SUBTIME
   SYMBOL &T=_t || &TIME
   SYMBOL &D=_d || &DATE
   SYMBOL &V1=N060KASSRV01
   SYMBOL &V2=SHARE
   SYMBOL &V3=ACCOUNTING
   SYMBOL &V4=C-STORE_UPLOAD
   SYMBOL &V5=KROGER
   SYMBOL &V6=&LOCATION
   SYMBOL &V9=&FILENAME
   SYMBOL &V10=.CSV
   SYMBOL &VAR3=\'\ || \\\\\\  || &V1 || \\\\ || &V2 || -
    \\\\ || &V3 ||  \\\\ || &V4 || \\\\ || &V5 || -
    \\\\ || &V6 ||  \\\\ || -
    &V9 || \\ || &D ||  \\   || &T || \\   || &V10 || \'\

STEP0010 COPY FROM(PNODE DSN = &DSN1 ) -
              TO  (SNODE DSN=&VAR3 DISP=(RPL,CATLG))

MEMBER NAME  SKPESMVW

                        PNODE                               -           00030003
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=27900                  -           00040003
                        LRECL=225                           -           00050003
                        RECFM=FB)                           -           00060003
                        DISP=(OLD,KEEP)                     -           00070003
                        UNIT=(SYSDA))                       -           00080003

                        DSN=&F                              -           00100003
                        SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT) STRIP.BLANKS(NO)" -     00141009
                        DISP=(RPL))                         -           00142008
                        COMPRESS EXTENDED                               00143008
MEMBER NAME  FIDELIN1
FIDELIN1 PROCESS HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10 MAXDELAY=QUEUED
STEP01   RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE     -
         SYSOPTS=\"\                   -
         \scp -Q -v -u \      -
 \XC0307P@mft-dcc-sftp.efidelity.com:SFTP/pickup/exercze.dat \-
 \/XFER/fidelityin/exercze.dat > \   -
 \/XFER/log/fidelityin.log 2>&1\  -
       \"\
         IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
STEP02  COPY FROM (SNODE          -
             SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=TEXT" -
             DISP=&DISP1          -
             DSN=&DSN1)           -
             TO (PNODE            -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&DSN2)
         EIF
 IF (STEP02=0) THEN
STEP03 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE -
     SYSOPTS="rm -f /XFER/fidelityin/exercze.dat"
 EIF

MEMBER NAME  DSDCARD
DSDCARD PROCESS HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10 SNODE=&SNODE
MOVEFL  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                            -
             SYSOPTS=\"\                                     -
       \mv /opt/cyclone/in/cardinal/CAHSALES*  \             -
       \/opt/cyclone/work/cardinal/inbound/    \             -
             \"\
         IF (MOVEFL = 0) THEN
CATFL   RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                            -
         SYSOPTS=\"\                                         -
  \cat /opt/cyclone/work/cardinal/inbound/*  \               -
  \ > /opt/cyclone/work/cardinal/combine/cardinaldata.txt \  -
             \"\
         IF (CATFL = 0) THEN
COPY    COPY FROM (SNODE                                    -
                  DISP=SHR                                  -
       SYSOPTS=":STRIP.BLANKS=NO:DATATYPE=TEXT:XLATE=YES:"  -
                  DSN=&DSNNT)                               -
                  COMPRESS EXTENDED                         -
                  TO  (PNODE                                -
                       DSN=&DSNCDC                          -
                       DCB=(GDG.MODEL                       -
                       DSORG=PS                             -
                       LRECL=200                            -
                       BLKSIZE=27800                        -
                       RECFM=FB)                            -
                       DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE)                 -
                       SPACE=(80,(5000,500),RLSE)           -
                       UNIT=SYSDA)
         IF (COPY = 0) THEN
RMVUP        RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                      -
             SYSOPTS=\"\                                    -
             \rm //opt/cyclone/work/cardinal/inbound/*   \  -
             \"\
         EIF
         EIF
         EIF

MEMBER NAME  OLPTLAN

                   PNODE=&PNODE                    -
                   CLASS=1
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN1                  -
                        PNODE                      -
                        DISP=SHR)                  -
                   TO  (DSN=&DSN2                  -
                        SNODE                      -
                        DISP=(&DISP))              -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED

          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&GOODMSG)) PNODE
          ELSE
          RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&FAILMSG)) PNODE
          EIF

    SYMBOL &VAR3=&V4 || &V7 || &D || &V8

                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10                                 00020000
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -                                     00030000
             DISP=SHR             -                                     00040000
             SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=BINARY"          -                      00041000
             DSN=&FRMDSN)        -                                      00050000
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -                                     00060000
             TO (SNODE            -                                     00070000
             DISP=(RPL)           -                                     00080000
             SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=BINARY"          -                      00081000
             DSN=&TODSN)                                                00090000
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN                                            00100000
NOTFY05 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&TODSNC)) PNODE          00110000
        ELSE                                                            00120000
NOTFY06 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&CMPMSGF)) PNODE         00130000
        EXIT                                                            00140000
        EIF                                                             00150000

         SYSOPTS="gzip /opt/cyclone/out/connolly/vend104.txt"           00180000

MEMBER NAME  EDISXC
EDISXC   PROCESS   PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE          -
   HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01 COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=SHR                      -
                  DSN=&FRMDSN)                        -
            COMPRESS EXTENDED                         -
            TO   (SNODE DISP=(RPL)                    -
                 DSN=&TODSN                           -
            SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=BINARY:XLATE=YES:STRIP.BLANKS=NO:")
 IF (STEP01=0) THEN
STEP02 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE -
    SYSOPTS=\"\                                   -
    \scp -v -Q -u -P 9022 \                       -
    \/XFER/sxcout/&VAR \                          -
 \ikgr-kermitftp@RXDATADIRECTOR.CATAMARANRX.COM:IN/Eligibility/&VAR \ -
    \>/XFER/log/956edi.sxcout.log 2>&1\ -
    \"\
 EIF
MEMBER NAME  PID9550
PID9550   PROCESS
  SYMBOL  &DR=\file_land_dir\
  SYMBOL  &IPDS2=\'\ || &DR || \/ip_\ || &DS2 || \'\
 SYMBOL &S1=\"\ || &SR1 || \ \ || &DR || \ \ || &DS2 || \"\
STEP1     COPY     FROM(PNODE DSN=&DS1   DISP=SHR)                 -
                   TO  (      DSN=&IPDS2   DISP=(&DISP1)           -
                      SYSOPTS=":strip.blanks=no:xlate=yes:")       -
                   COMPRESS EXT
STEP2     IF       (STEP1 GT 0) THEN
                       EXIT
          EIF
STEP3     RUN TASK SNODE (PGM=UNIX) SYSOPTS=&S1
MEMBER NAME  EDI2KSH
EDI2KSH PROCESS HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE                              -
                   DISP=SHR                           -
                   DSN=&FRMDSN)                       -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED                  -
             TO (SNODE                                -
                   DISP=(MOD)                         -
                   DSN=&TODSN)
MEMBER NAME  VPSIASTA
VPSIASTA PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(NEW)           -
             DSN=&TODSN)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP02  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                              -
        SYSOPTS=\"scp -v -Q -u\  -
        \&PATHFN\ -
        \krogertransfer@sftp2.iasta.com\ || -
        \:/VPS/&F > /XFER/log/iastaout.log 2>&1"\
        IF  (STEP02 = 0) THEN
NOTFY03 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY04 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP03  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE               -
        SYSOPTS="rm &TODSN"
MEMBER NAME  KHRMETIP
KHRMETIP  PROCESS
STEP01   RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE     -
         SYSOPTS=\"\-
  \scp -v -Q \ -
\XP17139018@199.74.150.228:/sftpinst/ToXP17139018/KGRSDY.DAT.pgp \-
\ /XFER/metlifein/KGRSDY.DAT.pgp \-
 \>/XFER/log/metlife_pull.log 2>&1\  -
       \"\
MEMBER NAME  KHRMETUP
KHRMETUP PROCESS HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10 SNODE=&SNODE
STEP1   COPY FROM (SNODE                                     -
                  DISP=SHR                                   -
       SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=BINARY:XLATE=NO:"                   -
                 DSN='/XFER/metlifein/KGRSDY.DAT.pgp') -
      TO (PNODE -
          DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE) -
          DCB=(RECFM=VB,LRECL=1000,BLKSIZE=0) -
          UNIT=(SYSDA) -
          DSN='D922.KHRSQ.PDETAIL.METSTD.PGP(+1)')
MEMBER NAME  KHREYOUT
KHREYOUT  PROCESS
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&DSN1)           -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=BINARY" -
             DISP=(&DISP2)        -
             DSN=&DSN2)
         IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
STEP02   RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE     -
         SYSOPTS=\"\                   -
         \scp -v -Q -u \      -
 \/XFER/ernst_youngout/payroll.csv.pgp \   -
 \Krogerwotc.upload@ussecavSFTP01.ey.com:payroll.csv.pgp > \ -
 \/XFER/log/ey.log 2>&1\  -
       \"\
         EIF
MEMBER NAME  KHRUOTR
KHRUOTR  PROCESS                                                        00010006
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -                                     00030000
             DISP=SHR             -                                     00040000
             DSN=&DSN1)           -                                     00050000
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -                                     00060000
             TO (SNODE            -                                     00070000
             SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=BINARY" -                               00080000
             DISP=(&DISP2)        -                                     00090000
             DSN=&DSN2)                                                 00100000
MEMBER NAME  DBI1AUDT
DBI1AUDT  PROCESS    SNODE=&SNODE -
                     &SEQ=%NUM1   -
                     &DATE=%JDATE -
                     &TIME=%SUBTIME
             SYMBOL &V1=c060-isilon1
             SYMBOL &V2=tcim2
             SYMBOL &V3=manualcollections
             SYMBOL &V4=mainframedb2
             SYMBOL &V5=dbi1
             SYMBOL &V6=dbi1
             SYMBOL &D=_d || &DATE
             SYMBOL &T=_t || &TIME
             SYMBOL &V7=.csv
             SYMBOL &TCIM=\'\ || \\\\\\  || &V1 || \\\\ || &V2 || -
                                    \\\\ || &V3 || \\\\ || &V4 || -
                            \\\\ || &V5 || \\\\ || &V6  || &D  || -
                              &T || &V7 ||  \'\

*

MBE$COPY COPY FROM(PNODE DSN = &DSNMVS ) -
                TO   (SNODE DSN=&TCIM DISP=(RPL,CATLG))

MEMBER NAME  DB2PAUDT
DB2PAUDT  PROCESS    SNODE=&SNODE -
                     &SEQ=%NUM1   -
                     &DATE=%JDATE -
                     &TIME=%SUBTIME
             SYMBOL &V1=c060-isilon1
             SYMBOL &V2=tcim2
             SYMBOL &V3=manualcollections
             SYMBOL &V4=mainframedb2
             SYMBOL &V5=db2p
             SYMBOL &V6=db2p

             SYMBOL &T=_t || &TIME
             SYMBOL &V7=.csv
             SYMBOL &TCIM=\'\ || \\\\\\  || &V1 || \\\\ || &V2 || -
                                    \\\\ || &V3 || \\\\ || &V4 || -
                            \\\\ || &V5 || \\\\ || &V6  || &D  || -
                              &T || &V7 ||  \'\

*

MEMBER NAME  MFGTDAYM
MFGTDAYM PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP02  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                               -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                             -
           \ncftpput -E -V -u krogereoc -p krg02day \           -
           \-d /XFER/log/mfgdaymn.log transfer.daymon.com /krogereoc \ -
           \ /XFER/daymonout/krogerpo.txt \                    -
           \"\
        IF  (STEP02 = 0) THEN
NOTFY03 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY04 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP03  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE               -
        SYSOPTS="rm &TODSN"
MEMBER NAME  SHM003T
EDI856W PROCESS  PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=A003MFG1 HOLD=NO             -      00010000
                 CLASS=1 PRTY=10 SNODEID=(CDUSER,CDUSER)                00020000
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE DISP=(SHR)                              -      00026900
             DSN=&DSNCDC)                                        -      00027100
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                                   -      00027500
             TO   (SNODE DISP=MOD                                -      00028000
             DSN="TRAINING/KPSI29PF(&S)"                         -      00030000
             SYSOPTS="TYPE(MBR)")                                       00040000
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN                                             00040100
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,                           -             00040200
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL',"&MSG1")) PNODE                                 00040300
        EXIT                                                            00040400
        EIF                                                             00040500
STEP3   IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                             00050000
STEP4   RUN TASK (PGM=AS400) SNODE                         -            00060000
        SYSOPTS="CMD(RNMM FILE(TRAINING/KPSI29PF) MBR(&S) NEWMBR(&R))"  00070000
        EIF                                                             00090000
STEP5   IF (STEP4 > 0) THEN                                             00100000
NOTIFY2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,                           -             00110000
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL',"&MSG1")) PNODE                                 00111000
        EIF                                                             00120000
STEP6   IF (STEP4 = 0) THEN                                             00130000
STEP7   RUN TASK (PGM=AS400) SNODE                         -            00141000
        SYSOPTS="CMD(CALL PGM(KPSCLIB430/KPSI299C) PARM(TRAIN     ))"   00142000
        EIF                                                             00150000
STEP8   IF (STEP7 > 0) THEN                                             00170000
NOTIFY3 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,                           -             00180000
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL',"&MSG1")) PNODE                                 00190000
        EIF                                                             00200000

        SYSOPTS="CMD(CALL PGM(KPSCLIB430/KPSI299C) PARM(TRAIN     ))"   00142000
        EIF                                                             00150000
STEP8   IF (STEP7 > 0) THEN                                             00170000
NOTIFY3 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,                           -             00180000
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL',"&MSG1")) PNODE                                 00190000
        EIF                                                             00200000

MEMBER NAME  COPYDOWN
COPYDOWN PROCESS CLASS=1 HOLD=NO PRTY=10                                00000100
*                                                                       00000200
STEP1   COPY FROM (PNODE                                         -      00000300
               DSN=&DSNCDC                                       -      00000400
               DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                              -      00000500
               DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=100,BLKSIZE=27900)   -      00000600
                  )                                              -      00000700
               COMPRESS EXTENDED                                 -      00000800
               CKPT=0K                                           -      00000900
               TO (SNODE                                         -      00001000
               DSN=&DSDKMA                                       -      00001100
*              DISP=&DISP                                        -      00001200
               SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)")                              00001300
*                                                                       00001400
*  THE COPY STEP WORKED                                                 00001500
STEP2    IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN                                            00001600
SPLIT    RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                               -      00001700
         SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS                                               00001800
         EIF                                                            00001900
*                                                                       00002000
*  THE COPY STEP WORKED                                                 00002100
STEP3    IF (STEP1 = 1) THEN                                            00002200
SPLITB   RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                               -      00002300
         SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS                                               00002400
         EIF                                                            00002500
*                                                                       00002600
*  THE COPY STEP WORKED                                                 00002700
STEP4    IF (STEP1 = 2) THEN                                            00002800
SPLITC   RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                               -      00002900
         SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS                                               00003000
         EIF                                                            00003100
*                                                                       00003200
*  THE COPY STEP WORKED                                                 00003300
STEP5    IF (STEP1 = 3) THEN                                            00003400
SPLITD   RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                               -      00003500
         SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS                                               00003600
         EIF                                                            00003700
*                                                                       00003800
*  THE COPY STEP WORKED                                                 00003900
STEP6    IF (STEP1 = 4) THEN                                            00004000
SPLITE   RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                               -      00004100
         SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS                                               00004200
         EIF                                                            00004300
*                                                                       00004400
*  THE COPY STEP FAILED                                                 00004500
STEP7    IF (STEP1 > 4) THEN                                            00004600
         GOTO ABEND                                                     00004700
         EIF                                                            00004800
*                                                                       00004900
*  EXIT THE PROCESS                                                     00005000
   EXIT                                                                 00005100
*                                                                       00005200
*                                                                       00005300
*---------------------------------------------------------------------  00005400
* WHEN THERE IS A PROBLEM TRANSFERRING THE FILE USING CONNECT:DIRECT    00005500
* IN STEP1, THIS PROCESS CALLS 'ABEND' BELOW TO EXECUTE PROGRAM DMRTSUB.00005600
* PROGRAM DMRTSUB KICKS OFF A SERIES OF EVENTS TO (ULTIMATELY) NOTIFY   00005700
* THE DSD GROUP THAT THERE WAS A PROBLEM WITH ONE OF THE SUBMITTED      00005800
* CONNECT:DIRECT JOBS.                                                  00005900
*---------------------------------------------------------------------  00006000
* PROGRAM DMRTSUB CALLS THE COMMON JOB 'SYS4.CD.PDS.CNTL(CDERROR)'      00006100
* TO NOTIFY DSD, PASSING IT A UNIQUE PARM STATEMENT.  THIS JOB          00006200
* TAKES FILE 'SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(DSD4000E)' AND JUST COPIES IT          00006300
* TO A NEW GENERATION OF THE 'SYS4.CD.CDERROR.DSDCDER1(+1)' FILE.       00006400
* IT ALSO EXECUTES THE ZEKE COMMAND SPECIFIED, WHICH, IN THIS CASE,     00006500
* IS TO ADD ZEKE EVENT 14963.  THIS ZEKE EVENT 14963 TELLS OPERATIONS   00006600
* THAT THERE WAS A JOB FAILURE AND TO GO INVESTIGATE THE PROBLEM.       00006700
*                                                                       00006800
* 'SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(DSD4000E)' IS JUST A FILE THAT CONTAINS WORDING   00006900
* THAT WE WANT THE OPERATIONS PERSON TO READ WHEN AN ABEND OCCURS.      00007000
* THIS FILE IS COPIED TO A NEW GENERATION OF THE                        00007100
* 'SYS4.CD.CDERROR.DSDCDER1(+1)' FILE.  (THIS IS THE ACTUAL FILE THAT   00007200
* OPERATIONS LOOKS AT TO TELL THEM WHAT TO DO ABOUT THE FAILED CD STEP).00007300
*                                                                       00007400
* DSDCDER1 IS USED TO CREATE THE NAME OF THE DATASET THAT OPERATIONS    00007500
* IS SUPPOSED TO LOOK AT WHEN AN ABEND OCCURS                           00007600
* ('SYS4.CD.CDERROR.DSDCDER1(+1)).                                      00007700
*                                                                       00007800
* DSDCDER1 IS ALSO THE JOB NAME PASSED TO THE ZEKE EVENT 14963.         00007900
*                                                                       00008000
* WHEN THE CONNECT:DIRECT COPY STATEMENT FAILS, OPERATIONS KNOWS TO     00008100
* LOOK IN THE 'SYS4.CD.CDERROR.DSDCDER1(+1) FILE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON    00008200
* HOW TO HANDLE THE ABEND.  IN THIS FILE, THEY ARE INSTRUCTED TO SEND   00008300
* AN E-MAIL TO THE DSD HOST MAILBOX NOTIFYING DSD PROGRAMMERS OF THE    00008400
* ERROR.                                                                00008500
*---------------------------------------------------------------------  00008600
*                                                                       00008700
*                                                                       00008800
ABEND    RUN TASK (PGM=DMRTSUB                           -              00008900
         PARM=("DSN=SYS4.CD.PDS.CNTL(CDERROR),DISP=SHR", -              00009000
         "FILE SYS1.KROGER.CTLLIB(DSD4000E)",            -              00009100
         "JOBNAME DSDCDER1",                             -              00009200
         "ZEKEADD '''ZADD EV 14963 REBUILD'''"           -              00009300
         )) PNODE                                                       00009400
*                                                                       00009500
MEMBER NAME  KHRPED1
KHRPED1  PROCESS CLASS=1 HOLD=NO PRTY=10 MAXDELAY=QUEUED
STEP0010 COPY FROM (SNODE -
                    DSN=&DSNKMA -
                    DISP=(SHR) -
                    SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)") -
                    COMPRESS EXTENDED -
              TO   (PNODE -
                    DSN=&DSNCDC -
                    DISP=SHR)
MEMBER NAME  KHRPED2
KHRPED2  PROCESS CLASS=1 HOLD=NO PRTY=10 MAXDELAY=QUEUED
STEP0010 COPY FROM (SNODE -
                    DSN=&DSNKMA -
                    DISP=(SHR) -
                    SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)") -
                    COMPRESS EXTENDED -
              TO   (PNODE -
                    DSN=&DSNCDC -
                    DISP=SHR)
MEMBER NAME  KHRP412A
KHRP412A  PROCESS    SNODE=&SNODE -
                     &DATE=%JDATE -
                     &TIME=%SUBTIME
             SYMBOL &D=_d || &DATE
             SYMBOL &T=_t || &TIME
   SYMBOL &V1=n850tlcsrv01
   SYMBOL &V2=Share
   SYMBOL &V3=finance
   SYMBOL &V4=Payroll
   SYMBOL &V5=Kermit_Payroll
   SYMBOL &V6=B2B
   SYMBOL &V7=tlc_payroll_acct_admin
   SYMBOL &V8=.csv
   SYMBOL &VAR3=\'\ || \\\\\\  || &V1 || \\\\ || &V2 || -
    \\\\ || &V3 ||  \\\\ || &V4 || \\\\ || &V5 || \\\\ || -
    &V6 || \\\\ || -
    &V7 || \\ || &D ||  \\   || &T || \\   || &V8 || \'\

MBE$COPY COPY FROM(PNODE DSN = &DSN1 ) -
              TO  (SNODE DSN=&VAR3 DISP=(RPL,CATLG))

MEMBER NAME  FCB2PRG
* Send all files in /prgout/ folder to PRG
* cr-509840 send to ftp.prgx.com new 2-9-2014
FCB2PRG  PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE                     -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP02  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                -
 SYSOPTS=\"\                                                     -
         \ scp -v -Q -u /XFER/prgout/* KRO0069@ftp.prgx.com: \   -
         \>/XFER/log/prg.log 2>&1\                               -
         \"\
MEMBER NAME  KACPRGX
KACPRGX  PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEPDEL  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                  -
   SYSOPTS="rm /XFER/prgkacccv/*.txt"
STEP01  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                   -
    SYSOPTS=\"\                                                     -
      \scp -v -Q -u claims_kroger@ftp.prgx.com\ ||           -
      \:ReclaimUpload/Tbl_KrogerReclaimTxtBillingKAC.txt  \ -
      \ /XFER/prgkacccv/                                         \  -
      \ > /XFER/log/kac.log 2>&1\          -
      \"\
       IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
STEP02  COPY FROM (SNODE                                 -
             DISP=SHR                                    -
             DSN=&FRMDSN1)                               -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                           -
             TO (PNODE                                   -
             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                     -
             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=301,BLKSIZE=0) -
             SPACE=(CYL,(50,10),RLSE)                    -
             UNIT=SYSDA                                  -
             DSN=&TODSN1)
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'PASS',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EIF
STEP03  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                   -
    SYSOPTS=\"\                                                     -
      \scp -v -Q -u claims_kroger@ftp.prgx.com\ ||           -
      \:ReclaimUpload/Tbl_KrogerReclaimTxtBillingCCV.txt  \ -
      \ /XFER/prgkacccv/                                         \  -
      \ > /XFER/log/kac.log 2>&1\          -
      \"\
       IF (STEP03 = 0) THEN
STEP04  COPY FROM (SNODE                                 -
             DISP=SHR                                    -
             DSN=&FRMDSN2)                               -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                           -
             TO (PNODE                                   -
             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                     -
             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=151,BLKSIZE=0) -
             SPACE=(CYL,(50,10),RLSE)                    -
             UNIT=SYSDA                                  -
             DSN=&TODSN2)
NOTFY03 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'PASS',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY04 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EIF
STEP05  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                   -
    SYSOPTS=\"\                                                     -
      \scp -v -Q -u claims_kroger@ftp.prgx.com\ ||           -
      \:ReclaimUpload/Tbl_KrogerReclaimCustomerCCI.txt    \ -
      \ /XFER/prgkacccv/                                         \  -
      \ > /XFER/log/kac.log 2>&1\          -
      \"\
       IF (STEP05 = 0) THEN
STEP06  COPY FROM (SNODE                                 -
             DISP=SHR                                    -
             DSN=&FRMDSN3)                               -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED                           -
             TO (PNODE                                   -
             DISP=(NEW,CATLG,DELETE)                     -
             DCB=(DSORG=PS,RECFM=FB,LRECL=401,BLKSIZE=0) -
             SPACE=(CYL,(50,10),RLSE)                    -
             UNIT=SYSDA                                  -
             DSN=&TODSN3)
NOTFY05 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'PASS',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY06 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EIF
MEMBER NAME  KCLPRGC
KCLPRGC  PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP02  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                               -
        SYSOPTS=\"scp -v -Q -u\  -
        \&TODSN\ -
        \KRO0064@ftp.prgx.com\ || -
        \: > /XFER/log/kclprgf.log 2>&1"\
        IF  (STEP02 = 0) THEN
NOTFY03 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY04 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP03  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE               -
        SYSOPTS="rm &TODSN"
MEMBER NAME  VPSPRGFP
VPSPRGFP PROCESS PNODE=CDRM51 SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP02  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                                     -
        SYSOPTS=\"scp -v -Q -u\  -
        \&TODSN\ -
        \KRO0064@ftp.prgx.com\ || -
        \: > /XFER/log/vpsprgf.log 2>&1"\
        IF  (STEP02 = 0) THEN
NOTFY03 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY04 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP03  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE               -
        SYSOPTS="rm &TODSN"

MEMBER NAME  KHRNDMR
KHRNDMR  PROCESS HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10 MAXDELAY=QUEUED
STEP01   RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE     -
         SYSOPTS=\"\                   -
         \scp -Q -v -u \      -
 \XC0307P@mft-dcc-sftp.efidelity.com:SFTP/pickup/odt07474aa.txt \ -
 \/XFER/fidelityin/odt07474aa.txt > \   -
 \/XFER/log/fidelityin.log 2>&1\  -
       \"\
         IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
STEP02  COPY FROM (SNODE          -
             SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=TEXT" -
             DISP=&DISP1          -
             DSN=&DSN1)           -
             TO (PNODE            -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&DSN2)
         EIF
 IF (STEP02=0) THEN
STEP03 RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE -
     SYSOPTS="rm -f /XFER/fidelityin/odt07474aa.txt"
 EIF

KHRSOHND PROCESS                                                        00010004

                      DSN=&DSNCDC -                                     00012000
                      DISP=(SHR) -                                      00013000
                      DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE -                           00013402

                 DSN='/XFER/metlifein/kroger_SOH.xls.pgp') -
      TO (PNODE -
          DISP=(,CATLG,DELETE) -

          UNIT=(SYSDA) -
          DSN='D922.KHRSQ.PDETAIL.METSOH.PGP(+1)')

MEMBER NAME  KHRESSRS
KHRESSRS PROCESS
STEP0010 COPY   FROM (PNODE -
                      DSN='D922.KHRSQ.PDETAIL.OCC.ESSHDR' -
                      DISP=(SHR) -
                      DCB=(BLKSIZE=27972 -
                           DSORG=PS -

                      DSN='/ehr/xfer/rcv/KERMIT/esshdr.txt' -
                      DISP=(RPL) -
                      SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)") -
                      COMPRESS EXTENDED
STEP0020 IF (STEP0010 EQ 0) THEN
         COPY   FROM (PNODE -
                      DSN='D922.KHRSQ.PDETAIL.OCC.ESSCHK' -
                      DISP=(SHR) -
                      DCB=(BLKSIZE=31850 -
                           DSORG=PS -
                           LRECL=455 -
                           RECFM=FB)) -
                TO   (SNODE -
                      DSN='/ehr/xfer/rcv/KERMIT/esschk.txt' -
                      DISP=(RPL) -
                      SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(NO)") -
                      COMPRESS EXTENDED
        EIF
STEP0030 IF (STEP0020 EQ 0) THEN
         COPY   FROM (PNODE -
                      DSN='D922.KHRSQ.PDETAIL.OCC.ESSERN' -
                      DISP=(SHR) -

                           DSORG=PS -
                           LRECL=134 -

                TO   (SNODE -
                      DSN='/ehr/xfer/rcv/KERMIT/essern.txt' -

                      COMPRESS EXTENDED
        EIF

         EIF

MEMBER NAME  CRPVSE1
CRPVSE1  PROCESS SNODE=&SNODE                              -
                 PNODE=&PNODE
STEP1 COPY FROM (DSN=&MVSDSN                               -
                     DISP=(SHR)                            -
                     PNODE)                                -
           COMPRESS EXT                                    -
           TO (DSN=&VSEDSN                                 -
                     DCB=(DSORG=PS                         -
                     RECFM=FB                              -
                     LRECL=&TOLRECL                        -
                     BLKSIZE=&TOBLKSZ)                     -
                     UNIT=DLBLONLY                         -
                     SNODE)
STEP2  IF (STEP1 = 0) THEN
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,                            -
                 PARM=(CL4'GOOD',CL44'&MVSDSN'))           -
                 PNODE
        ELSE
NOTIFY2 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                    -
                 PARM=(CL4'FAIL',CL44'&VSEDSN')) -
                 PNODE
        EIF

             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=BINARY" -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP03  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE                    -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                  -
         \scp -v -Q -u \                             -
         \/XFER/connollyout/ftp889.txt \             -
         \ Kroger@b2b.sftp.connolly.com:ftp889.txt \ -
         \>/XFER/log/kats.log 2>&1\                  -
         \"\

MEMBER NAME  CMWSKPT
CMWSKPT   PROCESS    SNODE=&SNODE -
                     &SEQ=%NUM1   -
                     &DATE=%SUBDATE1 -
                     &TIME=%SUBTIME -
                     &TABLE=&TBNAME
             SYMBOL &V1=var
             SYMBOL &V2=bdsprod
             SYMBOL &V3=file_land_dir
             SYMBOL &V4=skope
             SYMBOL &V5=&TABLE
             SYMBOL &D=_d || &DATE
             SYMBOL &T=_t || &TIME
             SYMBOL &V6=.txt
             SYMBOL &TCIM=\'\  / || &V1 || -
                                    / || &V2 || / || &V3 || -
                            / || &V4 || / || &V5  || &D  || -
                              &T || &V6 ||  \'\

*

              TO   (SNODE DSN=&TCIM SYSOPTS=&TOOPTS DISP=(NEW,CATLG))

MEMBER NAME  KHRMETK
KHRMETK   PROCESS    SNODE=&SNODE -
                     &DATE=%JDATE -
                     &TIME=%SUBTIME
   SYMBOL &T=_t || &TIME
   SYMBOL &D=_d || &DATE
   SYMBOL &V1=N060KASSRV01
   SYMBOL &V2=SHARE
   SYMBOL &V3=HRSSC_LOA
   SYMBOL &V4=INBOX
   SYMBOL &V5=&FILENAME
   SYMBOL &V6=.TXT
   SYMBOL &VAR3=\'\ || \\\\\\  || &V1 || \\\\ || &V2 || -
    \\\\ || &V3 ||  \\\\ || &V4 || \\\\ || -
    &V5 || \\ || &D ||  \\   || &T || \\   || &V6 || \'\

              TO  (SNODE DSN=&VAR3 -
                   DISP=(RPL,CATLG) -
                    DCB=(BLKSIZE=&BLKSIZE -
                         LRECL=&LRECL -
                         RECFM=&RECFM))

             SYSOPTS="STRIP.BLANKS(YES) DATATYPE(TEXT) XLATE(YES)" -    00022000
             DSN=&DSNKMA)                                        -      00023000

             FROM (PNODE DISP=(SHR,KEEP,KEEP)                    -      00025000
             DSN=&DSNCDC)                                               00026000
MEMBER NAME  STH2VCOM
STH2VCOM  PROCESS                                                       00010000
STEP01  COPY    FROM (DSN=&DSN2                               -         00021001
                      DISP=SHR                                -         00021002
                      PNODE)                                  -         00021003
                TO   (DSN=&DSN1                               -         00021004
                      DISP=RPL                                -         00021005
                      SNODE)                                  -         00021006
                      COMPRESS EXTENDED                                 00021007
         IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN                                           00021008
         RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&DSN1')) PNODE          00021009
         ELSE                                                           00021010
         RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DSN1)) PNODE            00021011
         EXIT                                                           00021012
         EIF                                                            00021013
STEP05  COPY    FROM (DSN=&DSN3                               -         00021014
                      DISP=SHR                                -         00021015
                      PNODE)                                  -         00021016
                TO   (DSN=&DSN4                               -         00021017
                      DISP=RPL                                -         00021018
                      SNODE)                                  -         00021019
                      COMPRESS EXTENDED                                 00021020
         IF (STEP05 = 0) THEN                                           00021030
         RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD','&DSN1')) PNODE          00021040
         ELSE                                                           00021050
         RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&DSN1)) PNODE            00021060
         EXIT                                                           00021070
         EIF                                                            00021080
MEMBER NAME  FTPDSDC2
FTPDSDC2 PROCESS PNODE=&PNODE SNODE=&SNODE -
                HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01  COPY FROM (PNODE          -
             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=BINARY" -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP03  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE           - 000006
        SYSOPTS=\"\                   -
         \scp -v -Q -u \                                 -
         \/XFER/connollyout/ftpdsdpay2.txt \                 -
         \ Kroger@b2b.sftp.connolly.com:ftpdsdpay2.txt > \  -
         \/XFER/log/dsd.connollyout.log 2>&1 \           -
           \"\

             DISP=SHR             -
             DSN=&FRMDSN)         -
             COMPRESS EXTENDED    -
             TO (SNODE            -
             SYSOPTS=":DATATYPE=BINARY" -
             DISP=(RPL)           -
             DSN=&TODSN)
        IF (STEP01 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP03  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE           -
        SYSOPTS=\"\                   -
         \scp -v -Q -u \                                 -
         \/XFER/connollyout/ftp987.txt \                 -
         \ Kroger@b2b.sftp.connolly.com:ftp987.txt > \  -
         \/XFER/log/dsd.connollyout.log 2>&1 \           -
           \"\
