MEMBER NAME  KHRN414L
KHRN414L  PROCESS    SNODE=&SNODE -
                     &SEQ=%NUM1  -
                     &DATE=%JDATE -
                     &TIME=%SUBTIME
   SYMBOL &T=_t || &TIME
   SYMBOL &D=_d || &DATE
   SYMBOL &V1=N060KASSRV01
   SYMBOL &V2=SHARE
   SYMBOL &V3=HRCE3E~1
   SYMBOL &V4=Inbox
   SYMBOL &V9=&FILENAME
   SYMBOL &V10=.CSV
   SYMBOL &VAR3=\'\ || \\\\\\  || &V1 || \\\\ || &V2 || -
    \\\\ || &V3 || \\\\ || &V4 || \\\\ || -
    &V9 || \\ || &D ||  \\   || &T || \\   || &V10 || \'\

STEP0010 COPY FROM(PNODE DSN = &DSN1 ) -
              TO  (SNODE DSN=&VAR3 DISP=(RPL,CATLG))

MEMBER NAME  PWP2WIND
PWP2WIND PROCESS PNODE=&PNODE SNODE=&SNODE  -
   HOLD=NO CLASS=1 PRTY=10
STEP01 COPY FROM (PNODE -
      DISP=SHR -
      DSN=&DSN1) -
      COMPRESS EXTENDED -
      TO (SNODE -
         DISP=(RPL) -
         DSN=&DSN2)
 IF (STEP01=0) THEN
STEP02    RUN TASK(PGM=WINNT) SNODE                      -
          SYSOPTS=&SYSOPTS
          EIF
MEMBER NAME  CONLYNEW
CONLYNEW  PROCESS  &DATE=%SUBDATE1                           -
*                  &DSN1='IMS0.DSD.PUNLOAD.DSDPDA01(0)'      -
                   &DSN1='D915.ZIP390.DSD.ZIP'               -
                   &DISP1=RPL
                   SYMBOL &D=&DATE
                   SYMBOL &V1=/XFER/connollyout/
                   SYMBOL &V3=/ConnollyDSDVendItem_
                   SYMBOL &V4=.bin.gz
 SYMBOL &VAR2=&V1 || &V3 || &D || &V4
STEP010   COPY     FROM( DSN=&DSN1   DISP=SHR)                -
                   TO  ( DSN=&VAR2   DISP=(&DISP1)            -
                   SYSOPTS=":datatype=binary:xlate=no:")      -
                   COMPRESS NONE

        IF (STEP010 = 0) THEN
NOTFY01 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'GOOD',&MSG1)) PNODE
        ELSE
NOTFY02 RUN TASK (PGM=DMNOTIFY,PARM=(CL4'FAIL',&MSG2)) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP03  RUN TASK (PGM=UNIX) SNODE           - 000006
        SYSOPTS=\"\                                         -
         \scp -v -Q -u \                                    -
         \&var2 \                                           -
         \ Kroger@b2b.sftp.connolly.com:&var2 > \           -
         \/XFER/log/dsd.connollyout.log 2>&1 \              -
           \"\
MEMBER NAME  KHR1926A
KHR1926A  PROCESS  SNODE=&SNODE                                   -
                   PNODE=&PNODE                                   -
                   CLASS=1
 SYMBOL &DATE=\_20160413_\
STEP1     COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN1                                 -
                        PNODE                                     -
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=1476                         -
                        LRECL=1476                                -
                        RECFM=FB)                                 -
                        DISP=SHR)                                 -
                   ckpt=0k                                        -
 TO  (DSN=/opt/cyclone/out/conexis/KrogerFredmeyer || &DATE || -
                                             COB.TXT     -
                        SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT):STRIP.BLANKS(NO)" -
                        SNODE                                     -
                        DISP=(&DISP))                             -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE FOR NETVIEW
STEP2   IF (STEP1 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY1 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                    -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
STEP3     COPY     FROM(DSN=&DSN2                                 -
                        PNODE                                     -
                        DCB=(BLKSIZE=1476                         -
                        LRECL=1476                                -
                        RECFM=FB)                                 -
                        DISP=SHR)                                 -
                   ckpt=0k                                        -
 TO  (DSN=/opt/cyclone/out/conexis/KrogerFredmeyer || &DATE || -
                                             FSA.TXT     -
                        SYSOPTS="DATATYPE(TEXT):STRIP.BLANKS(NO)" -
                        SNODE                                     -
                        DISP=(&DISP))                             -
                   COMPRESS EXTENDED
* IF THE COPY FAILED, PUT MESSAGE TO CONSOLE FOR NETVIEW
STEP4   IF (STEP3 > 0) THEN
NOTIFY2 RUN TASK(PGM=DMNOTIFY,                                    -
        PARM=(CL4'FAIL','&MSG1')) PNODE
        EXIT
        EIF
